body: Been using it for 4 weeks and have definitely found that it‚Äôs helped me reach my goal. While its database of food items is large, it could be just a bit better. I think MyFitnessPal has a bit more in its database than this one since I‚Äôve found myself looking up things online when LoseIt didn‚Äôt have what I was looking for. Overall, I still like using it, it‚Äôs intuitive, and had more or less met my needs with the free version.

title: Incredible!
body: By using Lose It! since July of last year, I have lost 45 lbs.  I‚Äôm planning on losing another 20.  I weigh less than I have in probably 20 years.  Different weight loss methods work for different people.  Having a daily calorie budget based on my age, height, and weekly weight loss goal has made all the difference.  I was never told I could or could not eat that.  It was up to me to make sure I stayed within my daily calorie budget.  I recommend this app highly!

title: Better than Noom
body: This app is sooo much better than Noom. I‚Äôve used Noom for over a year but had been frustrated with the limitations of their app and feeling resentful that I was paying them $45/mth for the privilege.

title: Lose It!
body: I am an avid user of the Lose It! App. My diabetes doc introduced it to me about 3 years ago. I have lost over 100 pounds in that time and no longer struggle with 6-8 shots of insulin daily. I record everything but water if it goes over my lips. I‚Äôm a believer and cheerleader! The reward banners recognizing accomplishments are neat but the real motive is a healthier me. New cloths isn‚Äôt such a bad thing either. I‚Äôm grateful for the folks I have influenced to try it and love when they come and show their results.

title: Great at first . . .
body: I really used the app and for the  first 6-8 months & it was great. But there is not a lot of encouragement if you‚Äôre not losing weight. I mean, there is a badge for 5 pounds and 10 pounds and 25 pounds and then you have to wait until 50 pounds before you get any other kind of encouragement on weight loss. Not that I live for those Badges, but it seems like there could be some kind of reward for continuing even when you‚Äôre not losing weight. Right?!?!  I‚Äôve been stuck at 30-30 for a while.

title: Lost 15 pounds in three weeks so far
body: I always thought I could ‚Äúguesstimate‚Äù how much food I was eating and lose weight without counting calories. I was wrong.  I avoided it because I thought it would be tedious to do. But this app makes it a snap to burn more calories than you consume. And you can set your own goals and take as much time as you need, so you don‚Äôt feel like you‚Äôre ‚Äústarving.‚Äù Use the app whenever you eat anything, don‚Äôt lie to it or yourself, and you WILL lose weight.

title: Works for me
body: Although you will be constantly badgered to upgrade to the paid version which includes additional features for tracking nutrition, the basic free version does the job nicely. It also works in conjunction with Garmin wrist monitors to fairly accurately track and adjust calories for exercise done. This has the effect of rewarding you for doing more things that are active so you can enjoy meals with less guilt. I‚Äôve used this and similar apps to lose weight and become more fit and healthy. It works for me!

title: Love it, Love it, Love it!
body: Doctor said I needed to lose (more) weight (been fighting weight loss all of my life) & gave me the lecture, again(!), on diet & exercise.

title: This App is priceless!
body: If you want to truly lose weight without the expense of food plans and gym memberships, Lose It! Can be your key to successful weight loss.  Select desired a target weight and a realistic target date and the program will set you up with a maximum daily calorie intake limit.  You plan your meals by entering into chart food or drink selections and it will offer calorie amounts. You then make your food and drink choices based on not exceeding the daily limits. Follow the plan and you will Lose It!

title: Already down 3lbs!
body: I have use this app many times in the past when I need to drop some weight. I just started this weekend and I‚Äôm already down 3 pounds based on my goal. I was struggling to figure out what foods were Boking me up but this app makes it so easy to accomplish your goals. It really opens your eyes to how many calories you‚Äôre consuming per snack and per meal! Thank you so much for all of your help and with such a great, user friendly interface. Great features!

title: Strong app
body: I love this app, it got me into the habit of thinking before eating. Food = calories taken in ... how many calories did I burn today ? My thought process became simpler as I logged, I already knew how many calories this or that was and food choices was easier. It also helped me see in simple ways the division of the carbs vs protein vs fats. Yes, sometimes backtracking logging is difficult but you eat throughout the day in a mindful way knowing that you will log these items you consumed

title: Lost 50 pounds so far!
body: I‚Äôve been using lose it for almost two years now and it has completely changed my life for the better. I could go on and on about how awesome this app is but I‚Äôm going to keep it simple: I‚Äôve lost over 50 lbs so far and I pretty much get to eat what I want (as long as it is within my budget!). As time went on and my caloric budget was lessened, I started getting my diet in order. I eat pretty healthy now but I have my treats still. All thanks to this app!

title: Two years
body: I‚Äôve been using this program for two years. I‚Äôve lost a total of 45 pounds and have kept it off for six months. I‚Äôll continue using this program for the rest of my life. No the nutritional information is more helpful than keeping track of calories.

title: Please add fasting option
body: This app is amazing for keeping me on track. Syncs with my watch perfectly as well. I‚Äôve lost 10 lbs and only have a few more to go. I‚Äôm honestly back to the body I had when I was 21 and this app has helped immensely with that.

title: Calories Under for the Week stopped working
body: Been using this app for over a year and it‚Äôs been great up until now. For some reason the calories under for the week has stopped working and I have a suspicion the days til goal reached is broken too. Hopefully you guys can fix this I see you‚Äôve been getting a lot of negative reviews about this most recent update. I really like this app if this gets fixed it‚Äôs still a 5 star app. I‚Äôm actually going to leave a 4 star review bc outside of this Lose It has been perfect

title: - MUST HAVE - SO SIMPLE -
body: This app is an essential on any weight loss journey!!!  Easy to track food intake and exercise (scan barcodes, & integration with all your other apps and apple watch). HUGE database of foods (if something is not there you can add it/also, enter recipes)! Goals are customizable to whatever your objective. Badges and the social element make time with this app engaging.

title: Links don‚Äôt work
body: Overall this app serves the purpose of helping you count calories and macros to a limited extent. I wish there was a way to remove foods that are in the database as not accurate on their calorie counts. Also in the ‚Äúmore for you‚Äù section, all the tips and tricks and recipe links don‚Äôt work. That is disappointing as I use this for motivation and variety in my diet.

title: Great app
body: It is supper easy to use and it keeps you very conscious of what you put in your body. Before I eat anything I put it in the app first so that I can decide if I can afford to eat those calories. Needless to say it as taught me about portion control and thanks to that I have lost 15 pounds at a rate of 2+ pounds a week. I should also mention that I eat everything I want including dessert. The difference is that now instead of getting a large portion, I measure it to ensure that I am being portion conscious.

title: I lost 67 pounds using this app
body: Excellent app for counting calories, carbs, fats, and keeping track of exercises etc. I stuck with the recommended daily calorie count and it worked great. I developed better eating habits over the 8 months I used the app. I feel better and look better! I do wish the app interface could be streamlined a little differently but I got used to it. Plus it worked great without having to upgrade to the premium model. Thanks to the devs for helping me lose weight!!

title: So far so good
body: So, I was a bit skeptical. 11 days have passed and I have cleaned up a good deal of my diet. My approach is filling up with vegetables and fruits that have a low calorie count and end a few bites of what I love to eat. You have to be disciplined in logging in your meals. So, 11 days have passed and I have lost 10 pounds. It is working! I am really liking this app! I am 6ft, 220 pounds when I began. Now weighing 210 pounds as of this morning. Defiantly worth a try if you‚Äôre willing to log in your meals daily. You can do it!

title: Use to be great, now no help!
body: I am 347 days into never missing a logged day. I had used the app off and on before that. With its help I have lost 70lbs! But the new updates have made it completely useless to me. The only thing I needed was the ability to set a weight goal and calorie amount. Now that the option is premium only I will be looking for a different app when I hit the year mark. I could see paying for all the special parts of the app but I have been using the weight goal feature only and it isn‚Äôt worth paying $40 a year for that. Very disappointed since it was not a premium feature until a recent update.
response: Sorry for the confusion here. Setting a new weight goal is not a Premium feature. You can absolutely do this with the free version! Please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can assist!

title: No calendar view kind of ruins the experience
body: I‚Äôve been using lose it for several years now and my weight loss and gain has fluctuated. Unfortunately for me to go several years back to see what my diet was is far to difficult. I have to click the back arrow button over 1000 time to find out what I had to eat 3 years ago. Why not let us click the month and bring up a calendar which would then allow us to change the year as well? Why isn‚Äôt there any easy way to see past entries?

title: Why mess with a good thing?
body: I love this app. It really works when you do it with someone. I am doing it with my sisters and I‚Äôve lost weight. But recently the activity feed changed completely. Instead of just seeing things from my friends it‚Äôs full of spam from people I don‚Äôt know. And the spam has huge pictures that fill my screen so I have to scroll so much to see my sisters updates. It‚Äôs so annoying and makes me wish I hadn‚Äôt renewed my paid membership.  (I did what Lose It told me to to turn it off but it didn‚Äôt work.)

title: Extremely helpful tool in my weight loss
body: I have tried several food logging apps. Loseit is the easiest and most user friendly out of all of them and the updates to track macros and how you are doing with each one each day is fantastic. The only thing I wish would be added is Garmin compatibility. That is the only device I use so it would be a huge bonus if that was an option as well. Thanks for always being my go-to Loseit!!

title: Still the best
body: LoseIt has been my ‚Äògo to‚Äô app for tracking calories and weight control. But, it had gotten painfully slow to load and make any food entries. Customer support came to the rescue!- reinstalling the app according to their detailed instructions has made it fly along. I love all the exercises, foods and restaurants it has stored in its database, and my ability to customize new items. And the ability to customize to my age & weight profile and set my goals is powerful.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: Absolutely Wonderful & Helpful App
body: Wonderful app; have the Premium version and well worth it.  I appreciate the guidance provided us and the educational articles, tips and nutrition pop-ups that assist with weight management   I appreciate the ability to trend weight, nutrition factors and other diagnostics (eg, blood pressure, glucose, BMI).  My only ask would be that phosphorus, potassium and calcium be added to determine consumption and trends. These electrolytes are important measures of nutritional health for many acute and chronic conditions like kidney disease.  Thank you!

title: So effective!
body: The best thing about this app is that it helps to keep you accountable for what you‚Äôre eating. And I love that it automatically links up to my health app to take my daily steps into account as far as exercise, great app! And the food database is so extensive, virtually every food you can think of is there, plus the barcode scan function makes it so much easier to input your caloric intake and stay on track. This has helped me so much on my journey to a healthier me!! :)

title: Great app but could use a update
body: I downloaded this app last year when I started my diet and it is a great app. It allows me to accurately track what I‚Äôm eating and the calories I‚Äôm taking in everyday. The linking of fitness apps is also great because those apps give me a sense of what I‚Äôve burned and such. One change I would make is that the step counter is off because I do almost 4 miles everyday but the app does not reflect that accurately. That is one change I would make.

title: Waiting for LOSE IT! On TV next!
body: I‚Äôve been using LOSE IT for years now. I Don‚Äôt know if I could have ever met my weight loss goals without it! So important to review what your eating with nutrition content of entire day, for each meal, for

title: Love the App for keeping on track
body: I love this App

title: Good, but needs some improvement.
body: I had been a long time user of MyFitnessPal and wanted to try something new.  I went ahead and purchased the premium package for Lose It and am not sure I should have.  I like the fact that I can view recipes on the site, and honestly, they have been delicious.  Why can‚Äôt I print them?  These are not easy to find and I keep having to go back and scroll through options.  No search option available, no ability to print, etc.  please consider enhancements that save time if possible.

title: Great App with one request...
body: I really love this app because it‚Äôs easy to use for the basic calorie tracking.

title: Glitches üòñüòñ
body: I‚Äôve been in LOVE with this app forever and it has definitely aided greatly in my weight loss and tracking positive patterns. However, it‚Äôs been glitching a little with appropriately adding the calories I consume. Like, it doesn‚Äôt properly calculate it anymore, if I go over my budget it‚Äôs almost hard to tell unless I pay close attention to my numbers. It usually does it for me. This latest update has made it a little glitchy, but it‚Äôs still a great app!

title: I wish there was an option for different goals
body: I personally don‚Äôt want to lose weight. I want to gain healthy weight and muscle. The name ‚Äúlose it‚Äù is a bit off putting to me. Every time I achieve my personal goal for calories the ap tells me I‚Äôm ‚Äúover my daily calories,‚Äù however in my case this is what I want to do in order to achieve my personal health goals. Aside from that, I love how the ap makes calorie tracking easy and has also built my own personal awareness of how many calories are in certain foods.

title: 2 Issues with the app
body: I have been a Lose It user since the early 2000‚Äôs. It has really helped me stay on track with my food portions and it seems to be the easiest app to use for food tracking but the database needs to be enlarged. My Fitness Pal has a much more extensive food database.
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Updates constantly
body: I use your app and love it, but what‚Äôs up with this latest version?  I get a message when I open the app that says it‚Äôs updating, but that it shouldn‚Äôt happen often. Well, I don‚Äôt know how you guys define ‚Äúoften‚Äù, but it happens EVERY TIME I open the app. I open this app frequently throughout the day and EVERY TIME, I get this message.  I was good with version releases happening on their own usually when I‚Äôm not using the app. This constant updating is annoying and can‚Äôt possibly be needed this frequently. Please stop it.

title: Too pushy.
body: I don‚Äôt recall putting my email anywhere to receive a ‚Äúsecret ingredient‚Äù newsletter? I‚Äôm plant-based, something the app never bothered to ask. I‚Äôm very much not interested in the amount of calories in turkey. I‚Äôm not interested in recipes with animal ingredients in them. I don‚Äôt recall this newsletter being mentioned in the app but maybe it was my mistake. Either way because it wasn‚Äôt obvious if I was signing up OR they just added me to some list without asking I deleted the app and grabbed a less invasive one.

title: It really works, I highly recommend it!
body: I have used this app to lose weight and eat healthy.  It simply works.  I also learn how to maintain my weight.  You naturally begin to make better choices as you log and then see the results.  Each day it tells me I will reach my goal and lists the date.  This helps to keep me motivated.  It's easy to lose weight and it encourages exercise too!  Everyone who I know who truly used this app lost weight.  I highly recommend it

title: My lose it experience
body: I have been struggling with obesity for forty years. Recently I made an appointment with a weight loss phycologist. During our first visit I asked him for one piece of advice on increasing my probability of success on adhering to a weight loss regimen. He told me to track everything I ate. Next day I went in search of an app to log my food intake. Luckily I found this one. I have now been successfully sticking to my diet for 30 days now and have lost 26 pounds. Great great app. Thanks lose it!

title: It works great for stubborn people
body: Most weight loss apps make you feel like you can‚Äôt eat anything good. Lose it is good because it helps you limit yourself and lose weight without having to cut out foods you like. I‚Äôve been using lose it actively for a couple months now and am down to 185 pounds from 200 pounds As an obstinate guy who doesn‚Äôt want to follow a strict diet I found this nice because it let me choose what i ate and just helped me understand how much i need to eat.

title: Bait and Switch
body: I have used Lose-It for years as a free app.  It has lots of the features that I like.  The premium has more features that if I wanted to use them that I would pay for them.  The one feature that was free was that it would give bonus calories from my Fitbit usage.  Apparently, Lose-It was giving that as a free part of their free app usage however they decided that they need to charge for it.  It is a shame that the company decides to bait and switch their features that accommodate them.  If they give a feature as free from the beginning, they need to keep it as free.  I reckon that they like to sucker people into using their app with free stuff and then months later, start charging for it.

title: Yay
body: I‚Äôm really enjoying this app. I love that it puts how many calories for each meal and changes the numbers as the day goes on. I love the database and how supportive the messages are. Where it needs improvement is the recipes section. I just had to add an ingredient to the database and that logged me out of the recipe I was putting together with no option to go back in and edit. This would be a great option for that situation but also when changing up how much of an ingredient you have on certain days compared to others.

title: This app keeps me honest!
body: I‚Äôve tried many different approaches to get back to me ideal weight, and I‚Äôve not been successful. At all. I ate quality food, but just too much of it. For example I was not aware that my morning cup of coffee had 300 cal of 1/2 and 1/2; 2 table spoons of this delicious nectar has 30 calories. As the app suggests, log everything you put in your mouth. You won‚Äôt kid yourself anymore that you can eat this small piece of whatever without adding to your maximum caloric intake.

title: An absolutely fantastic app for weight loss!
body: Since I‚Äôve started using this app to track calories and know my limits each day, I‚Äôve lost 30lbs from March 2018 to September 2018. The calorie tracking and weight tracking tools are free, and honestly those are enough. For just 3$ a month though, you can also track your nutrition intake, from protein to carbs, and that would probably be more ideal for those who are into muscle building. Oh, and it also includes workouts and meal recipes!

title: What happened to the edit option for recipes?
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 3 years. It has helped me to lose over 100 lbs. All of a sudden I can‚Äôt edit recipes. I make similar dishes with a few changes every time. Sometimes I can‚Äôt tell what is in a recipe based on the name. I want to see the ingredient list. I don‚Äôt want to enter all the ingredients in every single time.  I just want to edit existing recipes to the current ingredients. This app loses it advantages if I have to enter everything in every time. I‚Äôll stop using it and use the app that came with my watch.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: I lost 14 pounds already
body: For 4 months, I lost 14 pounds without feeling starving at all. The best part of of the app is the nutrition goal. I never paid attention to my protein and fiber intake. I now adjust my diet to increase my protein intake and I felt that my weight loss is much healthier. My muscle mass increased a lot while fat dropped. I actually started to notice the muscle curve on my arms, shoulders and legs, which I was never able to get when I was even thinner before. This is a great app and I highly recommend it.

title: I Love the Lose It App!
body: I use the app every day and find that it‚Äôs perfect for me with one exception. Once you start to add your own food choices it very quickly builds up your personal data base, making it super quick and easy to use. I only have one request. I would love to be able to enter my daily exercise without having those burned calories added back into my daily calorie allotment. I want to be able to track my calories separately. If there‚Äôs an option to do that in the app, I haven‚Äôt found it.

title: Saved me!
body: I had always had a hard time with my weight struggling up and down constantly. I heard of this app and thought I would give it a try I am now a little over one year with using this and I am officially down 34 pounds! This is such an amazing app I don‚Äôt know what I would have done without it in this health journey of mine. I have recommended this to so many of my friends and coworkers and everyone is truly amazed and we are all doing great. Thank you lose it!

title: Loved it before, glad to be back
body: I have used many tracking apps. I keep coming back to this one. It‚Äôs the most complete while still being visually interesting, easy and quick to find the info I want. It‚Äôs almost fun with encouraging graphics and info. It tracks everything I need. Lost 80lbs with it before. Had some emotional trauma and stopped using it. I gained quite a bit back. Now I begin the journey again. I‚Äôm at 5wks and -12lbs so far. So glad to be back!

title: I was very sad and felt beyond insecure
body: I went through a terrible breakup and had gained 30 pounds in one semester, after I got cheated on and broken up with I was just left with a terrible version of myself and this app helped me lose 40 pounds, because of this app helping me keep track of my calories/carbs I lost weight super fast, And now I finally feel somewhat beautiful (not saying those of you who are overweight are not beautiful because you definitely areüíóüíóüíó)!! Thanks Loseit!!!

title: Longtime user, great app and Eng/CS team
body: I‚Äôve used Lose It! for a few years now and it has kept me on track with my weight loss goals and macro nutrients. The UI is so easy to use and I love all the different functionalities. The Customer Service and Engineering teams are also amazing. There was an issue that I (and others) had and they did a hot fix and released an update quickly. It‚Äôs service like this that reassures my loyalty to the app and keeps me from moving on to another one.

title: Love the app but
body: I‚Äôve been using the app on and off for a year and went to premium this past December. It‚Äôs keeping me on track and helping me to be more conscious of what I eat. However the last few days the search portion of the app has not been working so unless it‚Äôs in My Foods I can‚Äôt post what I‚Äôve been eating. It has happened occasionally but it‚Äôs been 4 days that I can‚Äôt complete tracking my meals. I‚Äôll happily rate 5 stars once this glitch is fixed.

title: Recent problems make it unusable
body: I used to love this app and recommended it to everyone. Now, recent problems have changed that.  It won‚Äôt keep my weight record. I‚Äôve lost weight and recorded my new weight - which affects how many calories I can have - and within hours or, sometimes minutes - it goes right back to the old weight and the old calories. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling and reinstalling- several times. No fix is permanent.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: This app is saving my life!
body: I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this app. In January I was almost 300 pounds, as of today April 19th I am down to 240. I use this app religiously when I choose what to eat and stay well below my calorie budget. This coupled with the Fitbit allows me to fine tune my diet and exercise routine. Many days at the end of the day my calorie budget is in the negatives. If you are serious about wanting to lose weight and feel better then get this app! Worth every penny!!!

title: I love this app so much
body: I have lost 75 lbs in 7 months with this app and I really love tracking what I‚Äôm eating with this app and it has helped me learn about calories and making better choices but I‚Äôm still able to eat my favorite foods on the weekends as long as I‚Äôm tracking it and eating healthy during the week I really really hope this app does not get removed for whatever reason because without it I would not be able to keep the weight off.

title: Success with Lose It!!
body: Years ago, I joined Weight Watchers and made my goal. It didn‚Äôt take long before my weight creeped back up.

title: Second Time Around
body: This is an awesome app it has a lot of the foods that I eat comparing to a few others that I‚Äôve tried when I was using the app one year ago it helped me to watch what I was eating to the point I went from 300 pounds down to 270 in December so I slipped sooooo this is the second time around So I will be sticking with this App all of the others I was not comfortable with too confusing or it didn‚Äôt have the foods plus I couldn‚Äôt even add the foods Thanks lose itüòÉüòé

title: Good tracking app, could use some better features
body: Convenient way to track food and exercise. Wish there was a way to more easily share a day with a friend or a personal trainer versus the manual report.
response: I'm sorry for the trouble here. If you're not already in contact with someone, please send us another email so we can help you get your features working.

title: Bravo! Amazing app, well coded.
body: Bought premium version on day 1. Been using it for 2 weeks now. Amazing insight into your eating lifestyle. Using it with my gym trainer to start me on a new lifestyle change. I lost 75 lbs prior to installing this. Wish I would have gotten this sooner I could have seen faster results with diligence. Best app I've ever purchased. Investment in myself. My trainer can make much better decisions on how to work with me knowing what my intake is like so it's not just a tool for me but him too.

title: A useful way to track nutrition and health stats
body: The app has good info on nutrition for lots of foods. I like how I can add things to my foods, limiting the search results I must wade through for commonly eaten foods.

title: Used this App since 2013! BEST there is!!
body: I lost 20+ lbs using this App in 2013. After I gained 60lbs in 2015 with the pregnancy of my daughter I have been able to use it again and I now only have 10 more lbs to loose to be back to my pre-pregnancy weight. It‚Äôs so easy to keep track of my calories, and log my exercises. I don‚Äôt think i would‚Äôve lost the weight without this app. It‚Äôs also cheaper than weight watchers, with the basic version of the app being completely FREE! üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

title: Too Complicated Now
body: I believe, in the rush to have one more feature over a competitor, the firm (and others) have just made things far too complicated.

title: If your honest......
body: This app. does what it's intended to- track what you eat. If your honest and you have a goal, it works. Large database of foods makes logging meals easy. Few very very minor annoyances that I'm sure if I paid for the annual subscription would be cleared. For what it's worth this app. is great. I give it 5 stars because if there is a question or a suggestion for/with user interface you get a very prompt reply (via email) from a REAL LIVE HUMAN BEING!!! (Hard to come by these days)

title: loved for years but update feels messy
body: I've loved this app for 5 years! It helped me successfully lose weight for my wedding... And 4 years later, the weight from having my baby!  I will say, it's very effective and easy to use!  It had typically also been very clean and simple, nice to look at.... Until the newest update.

title: Do your research
body: The app is great and very easy to use, but the biggest shortcomings are in the listed food items and their calorie contents. You can find too of the same items with different calorie amounts or sometimes one item that is way off the real amount. The app has been great so far and helpful, but I have been doing tons of outside research before most meals to make sure I am not exceeding my daily calorie quota without even knowing. As great as a 60 calorie slice of cheesecake sounds, it only exists in the app and not on your plate.

title: This is what I needed !!!
body: I‚Äôve been struggling to lose weight on my own for a long time. This is definitely a good tool and partner. My iPhone and Apple Watch are connected to the mobile app, which is great. I also like the scanning tool, it is very accurate and I use it a lot. The fact that I can record my cals and workout so easy, makes me move forward with my goals. There is also a lot of info regarding  nutrients, plan meals, recipes, etc.

title: Best weight loss app!
body: I really love this app and I am just using the free version.  Looking forward to maybe upgrading to premium.  Of all the weight loss apps I‚Äôve tried, it is the easiest to understand and use!  The more I use it consistently the better I like it.  My favorite feature is the weight loss graph that shows my progress in my choice of increments at any time for 1 week, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months and 1 year.  It is so helpful to see progress in action.

title: Lost 25 lbs with this app!
body: And still losing.  This app partners with Helix/EmbodyDNA. In November, I got the DNA test to identify the foods I should be eating. This app uses the DNA results to provide metics to compare what I‚Äôm eating to what I should be eating. Five months later, I‚Äôve lost 25 pounds and four clothes sizes. WITH NO EFFORT OR FEELINGS OF DEPRIVATION.  I go through the list of foods I should be eating and plan my meals.

title: Game Changer
body: This app has changed not only the way I eat but also also changed my mindset. I can still eat the things that I love, just in moderation. It‚Äôs also helped me back off on the amount of alcohol that I drink throughout the week. I have lost inches from my waist just since March, and I no longer feel constantly bloated. The app is easy to use, a s I love the articles and the recipes. It also syncs with my Forerunner, making tracking workouts a breeze.

title: Best Weight Loss App! +Macro Tracking
body: I have to say, this is definitely one of the best apps out there. I tried others, like MyFitness Pal and I truly believe it will never a la par with Lose It. One of the advantages is the fact that it tracks your macros as well (mostly once you upgrade but you have ways to see how you are doing without doing so). Either way, if you are serious about loosing weight and starting to build up muscle, this is the right place to start.

title: Great app...one small suggestion.
body: This app has been really motivating so far from my weight loss, and hits the mark in all areas.

title: Fix Issue with Food Updates
body: I love this app, I really do‚Äîso much, that I pay for it yearly. However, it drives me NUTS when I find an item from say...a restaurant...that is outdated or doesn‚Äôt have any nutritional value (although it‚Äôs available), I updated, and then THE UPDATES DISAPPEAR. It reverts right back to the wrong calories/nutritional information. Please fix this. It doesn‚Äôt have to update for the actual restaurant, but it should at least stay put on our end as it becomes part of My Foods. Also, the restaurant database might need some updating‚ÄîI‚Äôve found a lot of inconsistencies. Thank you.

title: Lose It Changed My Life
body: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äù, 59 yrs old, and was 255 back in Jan 2010 and by Sep of that year was 195.  My wife and I really watch what we eat Sun-Fri, then blow it on Saturday....anything...I might add I just use the step counter and most of the time break 100 bonus calories a day, sometimes over 400.  I even put a little running and bow flex in the mix.  Admittedly I‚Äôve crept back up to where I‚Äôm 211 this morning and it seems harder to keep off but I know HOW to lose weight thanks to Lose it.

title: Good calorie counter.
body: This ap makes monitoring food intake and exercise easy. It helps me avoid mindless snacking.  I have been able to keep on track without fad diets that I have tried in the past.  I would recommend and LOVE this ap.  Only wish the food database could be enhanced to have more ethnic food. For instance Vietnamese, Korean, and most regular Chinese foods have to be estimated without real data.  I have to keep track of my caloric intake in order to make sure I am not going to overeat.

title: Helped me change my lifestyle
body: Being told l was diabetic and had to count my calories and carbs was overwhelming until someone told me about Lose It. This is the greatest app. It takes all the worry and counting off of me. I recommend this app. To everyone who needs to count carbs and also lose weight. You can scan your food labels and not have to hunt for the correct food you are eating. Can not say enough great things about this app. It has been a life saver for me.

title: One week old
body: I've been using this app simply to count calories, although it does more.  When I started a week ago I was  280.  Now I'm 273 simply by allowing this app to help me live by a certain calorie count.  This, of course, means that some foods won't be eaten and some will be eaten in smaller sizes.  Big deal, it turns out.  I'm not deprived. I'm not eating cauliflower. Ha! And I'm losing weight! I haven't seen 273 in 6 months or more.  I'll update later when I get to half my goal.  This is energizing!

title: It works
body: I lost 40 pounds using this app. Recording daily food intake and following the suggestions provided made me more aware of what and how much I was eating and the daily reminders and goals kept me accountable.

title: Net Carb tracker pleeease LoseIt!
body: I started keto two months ago. I chose this app because I use a fit bit it syncs with that and it also syncs with the Nokia weight scale I purchased through Lose It! for 50% off - that was great.  What  I don‚Äôt like is the fact that you cannot track net carbs in this app. I have seen multiple comments in the community forum where people have asked the company to address this but no one seems to have received a response or an answer. So... if you care about net carbs go somewhere else. If you don‚Äôt this is a great app especially if you use Fitbit.  I may have to exit üòí

title: Tracking
body: While I do not have a lot of weight to lose, I really appreciate how this app breaks out my nutrients into macros, which helps with my high goals for fitness. The way it lights up with a bonus when I exceed my step count goal for the day is delightful. Very smooth interface with my iPhone and Apple watch. Easy to use overall. I‚Äôm the kind of person who always falls off the wagon about logging workouts. This app makes it easy and is motivating, too.

title: Great app!
body: It's hard to eat healthy without this app. Everyone talks about keeping a food journal and this is mine. I have come to realize when I stop using lose it, I tend to eat more than what I predicted. I've had this app at least 2 years and probably won't ever delete it. There are times I am shocked at the nutrients in some of the foods I have eaten. This app has definitely helped me maintain a healthy balance of nutrients. If you are considering a food log, get this one.

title: So-so, but only a couple days in..
body: I‚Äôve been using the free version on & off for years. I would get excited and motived and start journaling my food, but it always became so cumbersome and time-consuming to log everything all the time, so I would give up. For personal reasons, I bit the bullet and upgraded, mostly to get more nutritional data. I was super disappointed to see the potassium is completely ignored as is saturated fat in the nutrition goals area.

title: Love the new interface!
body: I love this app! I log all of my food and keep myself on track with the help of Lose it! I have never tracked my food in my life before using this app, and it really helped me lose +40 lbs. This wouldn‚Äôt have happened without using Lose it! I have struggled trying to lose weight all my life, and I would say that Lose it saved my life! I wrote this review to thank the team behind the app, the new interface is clean and beautiful.

title: Great for weight loss/missing nutrition info
body: I‚Äôve used this app for about 2 years. Tracking what I eat has been indispensable for making well-informed eating decisions. If all you need to do is lose weight, then this is a great app. The interface is intuitive and well designed. Having access to food databases makes entering food easy. HOWEVER I found I needed to track some basic nutrients and the app doesn‚Äôt have that function. I switched to another highly rated app which accesses the same databases and but also tracks basic nutrients like calcium, fiber, vitamins, etc.
response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what you'd like to see us do to make the Lose It! experience better!

title: Best app for losing weight!
body: This app helped me lose some long overdue weight. I lost over 60 pounds using this app to keep track of how much I ate! It had barcode scanners to help you log foods as well as a massive community database of different foods. It makes it easy and kinda fun to log.

title: Best app for tracking and losing!
body: I have lost 8 pounds in 2 weeks.  I first used the free version but the paid version is awesome! Easy to use and tracks everything I need on one screen. Even connects to my Fitbit! I‚Äôve used WW app and MFP they don‚Äôt compare.  Love it! I will reach my weight loss goal with this app and im excited that it will also help me to maintain once I‚Äôm there!  Also started a private group with my friends! So many tools here that are so helpful and make it easier!

title: Lose It
body: App is a comprehensive tool for monitoring your health metrics particularly when used in conjunction with a Fitbit watch. Improved capture of food nutrient values from barcodes.  With data from Fitbit record sleep patterns as well as exercise amounts. If concerned with blood pressure use app to record readings from an external device and compare it with sodium intake as recorded and calculated by Lose It app.  Would definitely recommend this app for both weight loss and overall health improvement.

title: Really nice app
body: This app is very useful and user friendly. It helps me keep track of my calorie intake in an easy and reliable way. It also helps me monitor my progress and tells me how far I am from reaching my goal.

title: It works for me!
body: I‚Äôve been using loseit on and off for four years. I like that it‚Äôs simple to use and has a good food library. It‚Äôs almost perfect for what I need but there are a couple of things that could be better. The ability to eliminate inaccurate food macros on some products would be great, eliminate duplicate food items in the library, accurate calculations of macros to calories too. Overall it works within a certain level of tolerances. I‚Äôll keep using it even with those minor flaws.

title: Flexibility and granny tracking for life long slimness!
body: This program has really seen me through a 60 pound loss.  Even when I tried tracking on paper for a while, I was surprised that I could change meal categories in lose it to match my diet tracking so now I am a lifetime paperless tracker!  I find tracking for maintenance is really important step to keeping it off!  I‚Äôm happy to track in exchange for the reward; how good it feels to be at a normal weight at last!

title: Weight loss through consistency
body: LoseIt has helped me lose over 37 lbs. by consistently entering the foods that I eat and my weight and other measures of health.  I can look back at my record of weight loss and other areas of my program including dance and exercise and see where I‚Äôve been and where I am now. Excellent app; however, the app has more recently slowed dramatically, especially in the area of entering foods. This makes it much more difficult to enter foods.

title: Don‚Äôt buy the premium unless you plan to get the lifetime package
body: The premium subscription is kind of nice because you can add custom foods and track things like your blood sugar. It brings in your exercise from the Health app. But that‚Äôs not very important to me, so after I subscribed for a year I stopped. That was a mistake. Now, every few  times I open the app it pops up  an obnoxious full screen ad for  the premium upgrade, with of course a tiny little X to close it. If it didn‚Äôt have all my weight loss history I would dump it.

title: 2 years going strong
body: I never write reviews, but I have been using this app since 2017 and I decided it's time. This app has helped me achieve and maintain a 50 lb. weight loss. It has made maintaining extremely easy, simply by logging calories, which I have been doing daily for 2 years now. It's so simple and quick to use with thousands of foods in the database. Whenever people ask me how I lost the weight I tell them about this app. Highly recommend.

title: Love the app, not a fan of the new update
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years and I love it, but the new update with the new look for macros is not good. All the information is there, but it‚Äôs harder to read. I can‚Äôt visually get an idea of my macro intake anymore. Too much empty space. Having to look down to say the percentage breakdown and actually intake per gram disconnects the intake from the visual, making it harder to learn if you‚Äôre on track. Just not a fan of that new feature.

title: Not all parts of the app work
body: It was great but then it stopped storing my data.  I couldn‚Äôt see how many calories I had burned the previous day or for the entire week.  I contacted customer service because if I pay for an app I expect it to work.  After several emails and resetting my fit bit and the app the request was sent off to be fixed with an unknown time it would be fixed.  Weeks went by without an answer and no follow up so I stopped using the app and now use another one instead.  Unfortunately they still got my money but I‚Äôm much happier with my other choice.  Just be careful that some parts of the app may not work and they don‚Äôt have quick fixes.

title: Amazing! Please consider these changes :)
body: This app has been so beneficial to me for losing weight. I only have 2 recommendations to improve this app to make it better for everyone who uses it!

title: Keeps Me on Track
body: I‚Äôve used the Lose It! app for several years now. I track my calories and carbs whenever I feel like I‚Äôm gaining a little weight. So far I‚Äôve been very pleased with the robust database. Occasionally it does not include the macro nutrients for restaurant foods when that information is available online from other sources. This doesn‚Äôt happen very often but when it does it can be frustrating. Overall though I‚Äôm very pleased.

title: So far so good
body: App is useful for recording foods- although same issue here as with many other apps: most of the first search choices are mass produced foods and eating right is all about choosing simple foods in simplest states. Misleading, erroneous data here and there- macadamia nuts for instance....

title: Great App! Start losing right away.
body: I love the app, I told my husband to sign up too!  I've been on WW before and this app is easier, cheaper and works.

title: Good design and scan feature; buggy
body: I paid for the premium feature because I wanted to track my nutrients. Problem is due to a bug, I can‚Äôt add all my food‚Äôs nutrients since the screen remains frozen and won‚Äôt scroll down to the nutrients listed on the bottom. Worst of all, I couldn‚Äôt find a contact button anywhere to report the problem! Fortunately, there are a lot of foods that are scannable so this is not happening with all the foods I‚Äôm recording but the fact is that my nutrient recordings are off. Consequently I‚Äôm wasting money paying for the premium feature.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! We're working on a fix for this, which will be available in the next release!

title: Busy Mom - LOVING LoseIt!
body: I‚Äôve been stuck at 185 pounds for so long that I thought that was just going to be my life forever. But at 48 years old, I have now lost 20.5 pounds in 3.5 months!  Slow & steady!  This App has shown me just how many ‚Äúrandom‚Äù calories I was eating and helps me find healthier options when eating out or at home. And you don‚Äôt need to be a ‚Äútechie‚Äù to use it!  Simple. Straight forward. Fast tracking. Perfect for this busy mommy‚Äî Cheers to the future & to all of our health!

title: Used to be better
body: I use this app from time to time, never stay consistent but I‚Äôm trying to be better with what I eat and watching what I eat. I hate that now I can‚Äôt use some features that used to be free. There are a lot of the premium things that I don‚Äôt need or wouldn‚Äôt use, so don‚Äôt feel like I should have to purchase it completely. I typically used this app to teach my weight and to see how many calories I could use for the day to meet my goal. Now I can‚Äôt even change the goal I had before that option became premium. I no longer wish to only have 700 calories a day.... wished it was back to the old lose it!
response: Sorry for the confusion! Changing your calorie and weight goal is still available in the free version! Please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can help you out.

title: Great!
body: I‚Äôve used the myfitnesspal app quite a bit before finding this one, and I absolutely like Lose It! better. It has a very sleek design. Very easy to use. Unlike mfp, there are not ads all over the place. I went ahead and got the premium version because it had some useful features, and it‚Äôs half the price of mfp‚Äôs premium version.

title: A great guide
body: I use the basic plan and find it very helpful and I loose weight with while eating enough food to keep me satisfied. It‚Äôs very easy to use and very nice to have a record. It requires discipline and dedication, but worth it.

title: Provide Information - Don‚Äôt Collect It
body: I downloaded the app, and immediately bristled at it.   I was hoping for an app that would let me easily count and track calories.   Before I could use this app, it began asking me for information about myself - first question: ‚ÄúHave you tried to lose weight before?‚Äù   It offered no option to skip the question.   Bottom line - if you want to use the app, start coughing up information about yourself.   When the app delivered the ultimatum, I called their bluff and backed out.   Not an app for me.    The search is back on.

title: A real help
body: I desperately need to drop weight. Their are so many different calorie Apps available. I chose this because it had a free seven days trial and a very very reasonable annual rate if I chose to continue. This App is so user friendly, I love the fact that it‚Äôs counter for calories included so many brands and restaurants, it made it all so easy.  Also should you choose there are at no cost many other added health and exercise features. This Apl is what I needed to obtain my goal.

title: It‚Äôs science
body: I was just speaking to the fact that calorie deficit is the only way to lose weight, I committed to a pound a week. The only way I stayed on task and made it a part of living well was to be able to track the calories readily, lose it is a companion and a steady reminder that all is well.

title: Easy to follow and it works!
body: I have tried a number of things to lose weight. ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù is the only thing that has worked for me. I lost 40 lbs. in a year, and that was even with cheat days (and weeks!)

title: Not completely accurate
body: Because so much content is uploaded by users, there isn‚Äôt necessarily an accurate measurement of what you are consuming. For example, a user might input a type of food and fill in the calories, but then they don‚Äôt fill in all the other statistics (like protein, fibre, etc.) meaning that insights aren‚Äôt right, nor is it accurate if you have daily goals to meet other than calories. On top of that, I have seen many entries by users that aren‚Äôt even the correct calories. Side random note: I have also discovered that at least 80% of the users can‚Äôt spell ‚Äúcauliflower.‚Äù

title: Never dieted before!
body: I'm in my 60s and have always prided myself in never being what I considered fat. Boy was I surprised when my doctor told me I was one BMI point away from being obese! Are you kidding me? A size 10 is obese? Doc said lose the weight and I had no idea where to begin so I downloaded LOSE IT! and have been losing pounds easily, with no stress and eat the same foods I always have. The app keeps me on track and I'm much happier knowing I'm at a healthier weight! Thanks so much LOSE IT!

title: Its a good tool
body: If you‚Äôre going to lose weight tracking is key. This app is great for tracking your calories and weight. It calculates how many calories a day you should eat to reach your weight loss goal. It also links to your watch to keep track of the calories burned during workouts. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is when you look up a food it shows several different calorie counts for the same food. Overall it‚Äôs a great app.

title: Effective and visually pleasing
body: Any diet app is going to need you to be honest and have discipline. For me, this one works because I am a visual learner/ note taker/ list maker by nature and having the little food icons helps me stay accurate. I‚Äôve lost 13lb in 10 weeks (better than my goal rate) and it‚Äôs very easy to use. My only suggestion is to make the available badges visible BEFORE you earn them. If I already met a certain level and get the badge it‚Äôs nice, but it would be good to know what is there to aim for and push myself.

title: I hate the update
body: Adding food used to be So Easy!  I loved it. Now I can‚Äôt find on the first, second, fifth try the simple plus button to add from the food library. I‚Äôm a lifetime member and I used to love this app. Now I HATE IT!  It should be easy.  Life is stressful enough. Tracking my food should not add to it!  I end up randomly tapping until it pops up! Deeply disappointed.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: great up until a few days ago
body: ok so hear me out i‚Äôve been using this app since 2018 it‚Äôs my favorite app to track my calories by far. However it‚Äôs been acting weird lately. Ok so I log my weight everyday and it‚Äôs been working fine since forever but 4 days ago it won‚Äôt let me log in my weight anymore. It only let me do it once and that‚Äôs because it was a whole number. Is it just because it‚Äôs not gonna let you get exact with your weight? Anyways other than that amazing app :)

title: Terrible Updated widget
body: I get that the new trend this week is to update the app and use widgets, but the previous widget for the app was fine and provided more information and ease of use. I want the ability to log my I formation right away, not log the info in the app and then see remaining caloric balances or macros at a glance. I‚Äôd rather have the widget on my pre-home screen (not sure what that screen is called) that allows me to quickly input a meal than a square that  displays minimal information and is a shortcut to get me into the app. Nothing was wrong with the old widget and I‚Äôm pretty sad that it‚Äôs now been replaced by something less useful.
response: Thank you for contacting us! The most effective way of sharing your suggestion is through this survey.

title: no premium review:
body: I‚Äôve used this app for almost a year now and i hate spending money on apps and things but this app is definitely worth it. I don‚Äôt use it to track weight just to be aware of what i‚Äôm eating and how it‚Äôs impacting my body. I hope you use this app to benefit your health and not watch your weight intensively. Drink your water and keep a good work at routine. working out and taking care of yourself will make you much happier and your life much easier.

title: Greatest yearly price
body: Before this app I had WW and many others I must say I love this works. Easy to navigate and keep track of everything. But the meal suggestions are fantastic. From meals for 2 people to your entire family. I have it for two weeks and was putting off this review to make sure it really was worth it. I first had the free version but love it so much I upgraded to premium. Money well spent. I lost 7 lbs in less than two weeks. Truly love it

title: Good but could be great
body: The app could be great but it has two major problems First once you use the scanner to upload calories and nutrition information you have to clothe app completely and Re open the app to scan a second item major flaw.  Second the app doesn‚Äôt remember items that you frequently like my morning coffee from Dunkin‚Äô I have to type almost the. large Dunkin‚Äô coffee hot before it recognised what I want to import you would think after a couple of days it would start to recognise I have it every day and come up first.  It is still a good app and use it regularly despite these issues
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Fantastic
body: I‚Äôve struggled with my weight for years. I decided to try this app as a last try before just accepting life being an overweight man. Without spending a dime, this app has helped me lose 70 pounds (I started at 325lbs) in about 6 months. It takes will power, but with these ease that the app gives you access to nutritional info on the foods you eat, it takes away all of the stress that comes with counting calories/carbs. If I can do it, you can do it!

title: Pay by the Month
body: I used to be a premium member, but I can‚Äôt afford the yearly charge. I wish they‚Äôd break it down to a monthly. Every time I see the ‚Äúonly such and such a price monthly‚Äù followed by ‚Äúcharged once a year,‚Äù I get really frustrated. It‚Äôs easier to pay a small charge monthly than a yearly charge. It‚Äôs not expensive, but for some of us, a monthly bill works better.

title: Lose the ads
body: Accidentally hit an icon on the bottom of a screen. Bam!  Charged $29 for premium. No confirmation or finger scan. Working with Apple to get refund. LoseIt repondes quickly but can't refund. Contacting Apple. Will update.

title: Perfect companion app
body: I've been on a Keto diet as of late, and decided to utilize this app to help track calories, as well as keep my proper ratio of fats/protein and carbs. It also came in handy to keep my sodium and sugar levels as low as possible, and drop certain foods off my diet plan. This app has helped speed up my process, and within a month and a half, I dropped 15lbs.   It has really helped me maintain peak weight loss, and I imagine it would be a big benefit to any diet plan, or its own diet plan.

title: Major Flaw
body: I have been logging on Lose It since January 2018 and paid the $30 annual fee to avoid ads. There is a major flaw. I notice that calorie counts vary wildly for the exact same item. Also, I noticed that when I misspell something, the misspelled words actually work, and pull up a calorie count, again the counts vary quite wildly. I finally figured out that people are adding their own data, and this data (highly inaccurate) is becoming part of the calorie database. There are so many calorie counts for the same item that it‚Äôs ridiculous trying to figure out which is correct. This problem needs fixed.

title: GREAT Tool for Success
body: This app helps you to really see how your exercise and diet together really impact your weight loss and health! Super easy to scan anything you eat and if you can‚Äôt scan it, you‚Äôll have no problem finding it through search! Takes only seconds too; for all those people who think they have no time to keep track!!! Love this App, thank you so much for how easy it is and how beneficial it has been to mine and my wife‚Äôs life!!!

title: Awesome App
body: This is an awesome calorie counter app.  It‚Äôs very accurate, and I love the barcode feature.  It‚Äôs very simple and user friendly.  I wanted both an app where I could log my meals and track my calories just to get an idea (estimate) of how many I was consuming in a day.  This app has been a godsend.

title: Great tool for weight loss/maintenance
body: Logging food & exercise really helps awareness of where those pesky calories lurk in your daily intake. I like the option of adding nutritional info for new recipes & watching your progress toward your goal. After a year & a half to goal, I now log my weight daily to keep me on track. It works like a charm!  You can use all or just a few of the many helpful options & the site is very easy to navigate. Love it!

title: Needs additional options
body: I agree with danno210. I have used this app for many years and always loved it to help maintain my weight or lose when needed. Lately you can‚Äôt even open the app without a pop up or ad that has to be cleared first. Many of the options that were available are no longer available without a ‚Äúpremium membership‚Äù. The cost of this is too high for something that we had for free till recently. Honestly if I had to pay a low one time fee (less than $5) just to make the constant pop ups and ads go away it would be worth it. But the $40 per year is not.
response: Thanks for your feedback on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make greats products for our members. To provide additional suggestions or for more information, contact us here: reviews@loseit.zendesk.com

title: Gotten very laggy
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years and it works great overall - does a good job of tracking, of finding foods and helping me lose 30 pounds.

title: It works!
body: I have tried and tried to stick with a "diet" or an "exercise plan".   To little avail.  However once I started using Lose It, I have finally been able to stick with healthy eating and successful recording of what I eat.   It is so easy to do and keeps me accountable. I also have connected with friends using the app which brings in another whole level of accountability knowing they can see my calories and weight loss.  LOVE this app

title: Perfect way to keep track
body: Keeping track of everything I eat, along with my activities IS the answer for weight loss and maintaining a healthy lifestyle, for me. The foods I eat are already in the app, with calories and breakdown of protein, carbs etc. No having to figure anything out - easy peasy!! I make sure to even keep track on my bad days. No way to forget anything with this great app. I am close to my goal weight and will keep using this app to maintain. I love it!!!!

title: Easy to use, well thought out
body: You might think that it is hard to record everything that you eat, but this app makes it pretty easy to fo. I would say that it takes only 10 minutes per day for everything, maybe its only 5 minutes. The items you have eaten recently are placed logically where you would think they should be: by meal type. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack. The item list is comprehensive.

title: This app is the BEST!
body: I‚Äôve used it for years and it‚Äôs only been getting better. The upgrade is worth it, but even when I was using the basic version, I lost 40lbs. Every product you can imagine is probably already in the database and, once you have your more established meals recorded, it‚Äôs so painless to use. It even helps you figure out the calorie counts for recipes you love. If you want to track it or improve it, it‚Äôs in this app. Definitely a winner!

title: Great
body: I have had this app for a long time. It has gone thru many revisions over the years and has evolved into a wonderful weight control/healthy diet tool. I have health issues related to diet and this app is the most important tool I have. It gives me valuable printout information that allows me to track things like sodium consumption over days with weekly summary included. I have the upgraded version which I

title: High price, hidden renewal, limited use
body: They bury the auto renewal feature in fine print at the bottom of a page in the app. I despise any company that sets you to auto-renew whether you like it or not and then actively works to obscure how to change that setting.

title: Great app, better than MyFitness Pal
body: This app has helped me a lot! I just paid for the yearly subscription. Been using it for years on the free version. I do have some suggestions if the developers read these reviews. I would recommend adding a section where you can write notes each day. And also expanding on habits would be nice, like taking vitamins or maybe even a place to make your own habits would be nice. Other than that, great work boys

title: Love this
body: I have used LOSE IT for almost a year and simply by NOT CHEATING and accurately putting in every single thing I that goes into my mouth I am currently at a loss of 35 POUNDS!! And no I don‚Äôt exercise because I am disabled which makes losing weight even harder!! But this app keeps me honest to myself and makes it very easy to stay focused!! Even over the holidays I managed to loose 3 MORE POUNDS!! How many people can say this?? I absolutely suggest this app to EVERYONE who wants to loose 100 pounds or 1 pound!!

title: Way too many annoying ads to ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù
body: If not for the incessant upgrade prompts and popups, this would be a good app. If you give people a free app, let it be free! There‚Äôs nothing wrong with offering and upgrade option, but the people at LoseIt seem to have gotten carried away with the concept. Nearly every time I open the app and try to use it, I get some full-screen popup to upgrade. They seem to time the pop-up with when you‚Äôre about to click on something so that you accidentally click it and then have to go back.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

title: Lose It is great!!!
body: Counting calories is made so much easier using Lose It!!! I especially love the way it connects to my watch to track all my workouts! Another fantastic thing is the bonus calories you earn. The more you move, the more calories you have to spend. I am beginning my eighth day and have already lost 4.2 lbs!!! I really like the premium version because I can track my water as well, plus many other benefits!!!

title: love this app, but here‚Äôs a wish
body: With so many people tracking macro ratios as closely as calorie count, I bet I‚Äôm not the only one who would love to be able to filter out user shared food results that list calories, but contain no nutrient info. Either a toggle in-app, or some mechanism to prevent entries without detail from becoming searchable. It‚Äôs frustrating to tap through countless versions of saut√©ed mushrooms, for example, only to find a list full of n/a in each one‚Äôs nutrient info.

title: Good, but could be great!
body: I am really enjoying this app. Easy to use. I love that it re-calculates my calories when weight loss occurs,however, I don‚Äôt like that I have to pay the subscription for the macros. I feel like this should be included. The other features you get when you pay I‚Äôm sure are great for some people - I don‚Äôt personally need the other things so I refuse to pay for it. If the macros could be unlocked I definitely would give this a five star and say that it‚Äôs better than MyFitnessPal.

title: 60 lbs
body: By far the best. Stick with it. It will retrain your brain to recognize how many calories you are really taking in on a daily basis. After a few months of tracking your brain gets retained to automatically recognize what you ate really putting in your body. I lost 60 lbs in 9 months with out a lick of exercise. I don't use the app much anymore because i don't need it. But i did come back to write a review. (My first). I love Loose It!

title: Great App!
body: I have used this app for several months now and I have lost a total of 40 lbs. (about 27lbs while using this app) it helps so much to see your progress each day and also to be able to look back at your history to see how you got there! Really enjoy using it and recommend it to anyone that is looking to being faithful in counting their daily calories and activities. It also works great with your Garmin watches!

title: So many taps!
body: Definitely think this is the best of the food tracker apps. But it‚Äôs very tap intensive to add foods, and there‚Äôs no easy way to delete foods from the ‚Äúmy foods‚Äù section. After a while you get a huge list of everything you ever ate, and it‚Äôs hard to find your regular items. To delete them you have to tap the minus button, then tap the delete button, then confirm it with another tap. With hundreds of things in the app that‚Äôs a crazy amount of wasted time.

title: Motivating App
body: I down loaded 3 apps and settled on ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù for ease of use. It reminds you to record your meals once it knows what times you generally eat. The best thing was a large database of products to get the true calories. They carry many Trader Joe‚Äôs products which is where I buy most of my foods. It also has items from major chain restaurants. It can do more if you opt for unlocking more features from the ever prompting buy option. I would buy but it‚Äôs a bit dear, as the Scotts day. Overall great app.

title: Pretty good if you only eat packaged food
body: I found that this was pretty easy to use when eating something packaged, but has issues with quantities. For instance, if I have a half a juice, and existing entries are for an entire serving, then it‚Äôs not possible to use that entry. Instead, I have to enter it all again, and provide the entire quantity in oz.

title: Love the LoseIt! App!
body: I have been working on my nutrition and fitness goals for some time now.  I have found that tracking my food and activity are essentials.  This app is the absolute best I have found.  It links with my iWatch to record my exercise which saves me having to do it manually.  The food tracker has many of the meals I get from BistroMD already entered and remembers what I record too.  Makes it very easy and fast to record meals I eat often!  Love this app!

title: The happiest I could be
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for many months to get my weight down, and I was doing a program with my cycling club for weight loss too. This app has been a great addition to the program I weighed 215 pounds and been trying to get down to 190 or below my doctor has been real happy with my progress I probably will be using this app the rest of my life The controller weight and right now I‚Äôm at 193 lb.

title: Long Time User
body: I have had Lose It after 2 pregnancies. When I am disciplined about entering my information there is no better tool at helping me with steady weight loss. I feel great & am motivated to keep working. Each time I‚Äôve lost the lbs. I‚Äôm currently working on losing after that third and final baby. üòä. I‚Äôll keep using Lose It even after losing though as a way to check in with myself. I love the competition for badges & challenges too. üòâ

title: Helped me when nothing else did
body: I managed to lose 15 lbs in 4 months by sticking to my daily food log. Putting in homemade recipes is really hard because it doesn't have a way to calculate cup measurements from totaled ingredients, but I guessed high where I could and stuck with it and it worked. The barcode scanning feature is amazing. I'm so grateful I found this app, it's helping me to finally take control of my weight after having a baby.

title: Give it a Try!
body: I never really wanted to be on a diet. I was only about 20lbs over a healthy weight and active. So, dieting wasn't on my radar. A co-worker suggested this app and it was a life-changer. I set a really easy goal, 20 lbs in 8 months. I am 1 month in and I've already lost 6 lbs. Tracking and recording info is incredibly easy.

title: Realize
body: This app keeps you in check, it makes you seriously pay attention and keep track of what you‚Äôre putting in your body. I went from eating 2300 calories a day to 1665. It seriously makes you REALIZE. You‚Äôve were eating to much, the choices you make make a huge difference! I‚Äôm dropping weight every week like crazy now and at present without exercise! Make sure you include all your condiments and bread. This apps Food search for brands and types of food is extensive. I love this!

title: This app is great!
body: I haven‚Äôt found a barcode that hasn‚Äôt worked yet and it‚Äôs easy enough to find most foods to manually input. I‚Äôm very impressed. I like how I can integrate all of my different devices to get a really accurate picture of my calories in and out each day too.  It pulls my BMR, workouts, weight, and steps from my Health app and allows me to track my carbs,fat, and protein intake for free. I could go on and on. This app makes managing my health so much easier.

title: Perfect for me!
body: I knew that I needed to lose weight, but I absolutely HATED calorie counting! With Lose It! The work is done for me on most everything that I routinely have to eat or drink. All I have to do is log it and/or scan it to put it in my calorie count. For me, seeing the numbers and realizing the additional workout required to make up for over indulging myself makes it easier to just pass on those things I should be avoiding. It is perfect for me!!

title: I LOVE this app!
body: I was reading an article about a woman who had lost like 150lbs and credited a lot of her success to the lose it app. Needing to lose almost 100lbs myself I thought why not try it, it‚Äôs free. The only thing I wish is that I had found this app sooner!! I LOVE IT! Within the first week I lost over 3lbs, had a lot more energy and felt GREAT! I would definitely recommend this app to anyone who has been struggling to losing weight and would like an easy solution.

title: Actually seeing results
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 2 weeks and I‚Äôve already lost six lbs! After a year of being at a plateau, I am beyond thrilled. Calorie counting has never been easier, I have tried before and failed. I love that you can search and scan so many foods. I‚Äôve recommended this to family and friends and they also love it. I‚Äôm thinking about upgrading to get even more insight, but for now this is working great for me.

title: I love this app!!
body: Lose It is awesome!! It is so easy to use. It has everything you need.  I‚Äôm able to track all of my food, exercise, and water intake. I also track my exercise, weight, and blood pressure.  It tells me when I have a negative eating pattern. You can set your own personal goals that you want to achieve. I could go on and on because there is so much in this app.  I have tried others but Lose It is the best one out there!!

title: Best in Class
body: Every now and then you run across an app that is simply amazing. This is one. I lost my WW subscription when I left my job. Every app I tried was lackluster. And then a friend recommended Lose It. Better than WW and I didn‚Äôt think that was possible. When I didn‚Äôt know how to do something, I try it and it works. So intuitive. Copy meals, finding food, changing meals are all so easy. This is the first app I purchased within 2 days of using.

title: cool app but chastises me for eating 1 egg
body: i love this app and i have used it on and off for about nine years. i love how you get a little icon for each food, it is so fun to list everything and see a little cartoon of what you ate. with the new updates, the ads for the premium version are more prominent, and my daily log is interrupted with ‚Äúare the foods you‚Äôre eating holding you back?‚Äù underneath a food logged that day. for me, it is eggs. i can understand ads throughout a free app, but why break up the log itself with clickbait of this type to advertise ‚Äúinsights‚Äù? why attach scolding messages to 72 calorie eggs in the name of marketing? the warning about the egg is bigger on the screen than the egg entry itself. it probably works for sales but i‚Äôm a lil toasted that i can‚Äôt eat an egg without the algorithm raising its eyebrows at me so i‚Äôm writing this. ads are ok but this is so stupid that i keep deleting the app after i download it and i realize it does this now.. my brain cannot handle it

title: This is easy
body: I‚Äôve tried many programs to loose weight some expensive and making you eat things you don‚Äôt want or get tired of fast. I‚Äôm eating whatever I want within the calorie count I set and I‚Äôve lost 5 lbs in 6 days. I‚Äôm even eating bagels and bread my favorites. This app does all the figuring for you. Wow, this is good!  Wish I knew about it sooner. I‚Äôve never been a fan of trying to figure out how to count calories but this makes it easy.

title: Very Helpful to Meet your Goals
body: I started using this app at the very beginning of June. This app allowed me to monitor my calorie intake along with tracking my carbs and protein intake. Very easy to use and once the routine of entering your meals kicks in, it really helps make you aware of what in fact your are consuming.

title: Apples do not have saturated fat!
body: This app has helped me to some degree to lose weight and to be fully aware of the quantity and nutritional value of what I consume. BUT I question it‚Äôs nutritional accuracy. I ate an apple and checked the nutritional pie chart expecting to see an increase in Carbohydrates and i did. However, I also saw an increase in saturated fats per grams. So to test my suspicion I inputed an additional apple. WHAT? Again an increase in saturated fats. This is false and now i wonder how accurate it is when it comes to other components of the app.i gave it three stars because I am losing some weight.

title: Love it and easy
body: This app is fantastic way to count calories which is what I‚Äôm doing ! It also keeps track of carbs, protein and fats to see where you may need to tweak your diet. Tiniest little drawback is I wish I can track or put a value to foods that are not in the app although few and far between. Seems like everything is in there. I also would like to create food and add the info myself and save so I can count it when I eAt it like my own recipes . Other then that I am addicted to this app

title: Great App
body: Both my daughter and myself have been fighting to loose weight, she even went and was paying for someone to monitor her intake. This app is extremely easy to use and I especially like the alerts when I forget to log my intake . This app I can honestly say I see as a life saver!!! My blood pressure escalation was bad that both my doctors said I can have a heart attack or a stoke , it has gone down tremendously since using this app. Thank you so very much!!!!

title: Awesome app and customer support
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years and it has helped me change my eating habits, improve my health, and lose weight. Even better, I have had a really excellent experience with customer support. Recently there was an update where some of the functionality was lost inadvertently and the team fixed the problem in just a few days. It was wonderful! Thank you so much for such great work.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Better than myfinesspal
body: Used mfp for 2 months and the boring interface with lack of useful dashboard is so meh. Everything I type goes to information black hole. I don‚Äôt wanna see it cause ugly

title: 26 days in 8 pounds down
body: If you need an app that will help you hold yourself accountable this is it! Whenever I need to shed some pounds I come back to this app! Quarantine weight brought me back and once again I‚Äôm not disappointed! I‚Äôm a free member and I couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied! This app is for that person who isn‚Äôt ready to give up their favorite foods like me! With this app I can eat whatever I want in moderation, track my workouts and watch the pounds melt! I love it!!!

title: Needs to include Intermittent Fasting
