body: I‚Äôve been a customer for years now.  I love LoseIt. They‚Äôre developers seems to be right on target with correcting bugs and always making this app run smoothly.  My only complaint is that it doesn‚Äôt support Intermittent Fasting.  It would be amazing if it did because I know you‚Äôd make an excellent tracker and provide great options for all IF customers.  I hope you can help improve it.   I‚Äôd pay the plus if you did since I wouldn‚Äôt have to pay for other IF apps.

title: YOU NOW HAVE TO PAY FOR ALL INFO BESIDES CALORIES!!!
body: As the title implies, with the latest round of updates Loseit! Now expects you to pay for premium in order to access any info about your day besides calories, whereas before you could access any information that was on the nutritional label.

title: Good tracker but has many issues
body: Lose It works well with my Apple Watch and my scale. It is easy to enter foods with bar codes. However, the food data base is corrupted with inaccuracies. It needs to be monitored differently, and egregious errors removed. I used My Fitness Pal for years, and it has a much better food data base.

title: Excellent help...
body: I've tried lots of diets and have finally decided to get back to some good ol' calorie counting, working out and lowering my carb/sugar intake. I realised early that writing down every, single thing I consume is key. This app, with its extensive food database, motivational tools and ability to track everything (including all-important daily notes!) keeps me on track. It's remarkably handy, fast and easy to use. I've already lost almost 5lbs in a week! Very pleased.

title: Best app!!
body: I was skeptical at first but this app has changed my life and all for free. I‚Äôve lost over 15 pounds so far. It made me realize how many calories and fat I was actually taking in. It forced me to face the truth of how many calories are actually in a medium dominos pizza. I‚Äôve changed my eating habits.

title: Excellent app
body: This is a wonderful app in so many ways. I have used it off and on for years. I love that I can enter my own recipes and then LoseIt provides all nutritional info when I log those foods. I now have an extensive recipe library. I love how well done the search database is, and how complete. I love scanning items when available. And, I love the interface with the Apple health app. Excellent app. I do not like the social media aspects of the app, but the core basics are so top notch!

title: Best weight loss app
body: I love how easy lose it is to use. The challenges and badges keep me motivated. The user interface is better than other free calorie counting apps. The integration with other apps like Fitbit and runkeeper help tremendously.

title: Love this app!
body: Using Lose it! has been an eye opening way for me to learn about how much I am actually eating on a day-to-day basis and facing the fact that all the exercise in the universe won‚Äôt negate how many calories I actually love to guzzle.  I really like the barcode scan feature for adding foods.  I synch it with Runkeeper and my FitBit with no problems.   This app will by my accountability partner for the rest of my journey to get healthier.  Don‚Äôt ever give up trying, folks.

title: Life changing App
body: Last May I seen a video of myself pushing my granddaughter on her swing! üò¨I had no idea that I had gained that much weight, it really just creeped up on me.  I asked my daughter to find me an app that I could use to track my eating habits.

title: Great app.
body: One critique I would give the developers is that the icons on the lower menu at the bottom of the page are too light - practically invisible - there should be more contrast down there for usability.  Even those of us who have used the app for a decade found this somewhat confusing when trying to navigate back to the home page to see stats. Please fix this.

title: THE BEST WEIGHT LOSS APP
body: I am so happy I have this app. I have lost all the weight I wanted and have maintained my weight loss for years because of how easy it is to count calories when using it. Once I lost all the weight, I followed the calorie count it calculated to maintain my weight, and I haven‚Äôt gained any back. The barcode scanning feature makes logging calories so easy. This app and a food scale to weigh portions is all I have needed to successfully stay the weight I want to be.

title: Lose It App
body: Great comprehensive food and lifestyle app. If you are SERIOUS about your weight and health, commit to a lifestyle change, not a diet. Buy the lifetime Lose It subscription and don‚Äôt look back. Log everything you eat, your activities, & your weight every day....& don‚Äôt cheat; why cheat yourself.

title: Absoloutely amazing
body: I‚Äôve used this app for a little over a month and I love it. This app provides accountability about how much and how often you eat. Its really easy to snack during the day when you‚Äôre bored, but if you stick to the log thoroughly then it can really help you cut down on those bad habits. I use the free version and its perfectly fine, but if I continue to use this app so much, which i intend to, than maybe ill consider premium.

title: The best app
body: Today I hit my goal that I set almost three years ago. That‚Äôs a 100 pound loss. I could not have done it without this app. Studies show that recording your daily food intake is key to successful weight loss and this app has been vital for me. Losing weight is a math equation and LOSE IT does the math for you. Calories in and calories out- that‚Äôs how it works folks. There are no shortcuts, pills, fads or diets that work like good old-fashioned calorie tracking. LOSE IT...one pound at a time.

title: Love to use lose it
body: I have used the premium version for about a year now and just have the habit of always putting in my food. It has made me be very conscious of what I am eating.  I love the clean layout of the app and the organization of it all me being a bit of a organized freak. I wish there were more theme layouts in the premium version like a Christmas layout would be amazing. Overall I love the app and don‚Äôt go a day without using it.

title: It‚Äôs helping me...
body: It‚Äôs helping me become very conscious of what I am putting in my body. I realized that I have to eat a lot more food. And not just food, but good food. My weight and health goals are not that far away. The only thing I don‚Äôt like about the app is that it is using steps for rewards when I do interval workouts. I should be rewarded for my workouts and not just steps. However, with the steps I do desire to move around more and not just sit.

title: My daughter used a 4-letter app
body: that uses a lot of their money to advertise on NPR. That requires a lot of money, so the app is very pricey. I tried it and liked it, but it was too costly for my taste. So I looked for alternatives. Lose it! does the same thing very nicely and efficiently, and for reasonable $$$. I‚Äôve done six days and have lost 4 pounds. 16 more to go. Not bad for a 70-year-old dude. If (I mean when) I reach my goal in six weeks I think I‚Äôll sign up for the lifetime plan. I‚Äôm enjoying this.

title: Good app but a couple of points off from 5 stars
body: Like the program and the data it produces. Wish you would let us put in our own calories and STOP changing them. It is very frustrating to have to be watching that all the time. Also, sometime in the distant past, I just have tried Lose It and put a starting weight. Can‚Äôt find where it was to get rid of it. Would like to have my recent starting weight from January as my beginning weight so my goals aren‚Äôt off.

title: Simple and Great
body: Great visuals to help you see how you're doing. Nice notifications to remind you to log. I've been using this app for about 5 years now and have never had one thing to complain about. I tell everyone who is looking to either loose weight or keep track of their calorie intake to download this app.

title: Ok
body: My first complaint is the constant nag to go premium. I was using this app and another to compare. The constant nag was annoying. I wasn‚Äôt able to set a calorie goal that I wanted. I understand your logic that too low is not healthy but still I prefer more flexibility. Finally, I didn‚Äôt like the way the daily totals were displayed. You had to go to another screen and I liked the apps that displayed the meal totals and the daily total in one place. Except for the nag all my complaints are minor aesthetics and I‚Äôm sure this app will greatly help some others. Just not me.

title: Excellent app
body: There‚Äôs a lot of information you can get through this app. Very comprehensive macronutrient tracking. Lots of great information here. One thing I don‚Äôt quite get is how there can be so many entries for the same thing. But that‚Äôs minor, I just scan what I‚Äôm eating, and if there‚Äôs no barcode, no big deal, that means it‚Äôs probably produce, so it‚Äôs not a problem. I love this app, I love breaking the food items down and seeing what‚Äôs really in them!

title: Like but over board on ads
body: This app is very helpful and I‚Äôve used it for years to track calories and loss.  It does work and helps add insight to your day and plan.  Where the app expands in one release; it then starts to get locked down in future releases wanting you to pay for an in app upgrade to premium for the advanced features.  Also some ‚Äútrends‚Äù are valid points but if you ask a dietician they‚Äôd advise much differently.  While it‚Äôs helpful it‚Äôs also ad heavy until you pay for premium.

title: Used it for years. LoveIt!
body: Even the free version of this app is so wonderful making it easy to plan meals, and then to bring them back up later on when I‚Äôm reusing the same meal again greatly simplifies my keeping track of my food and my exercise! As a result I‚Äôm at my goal weight after having been 36 pounds overweight at one point, and then I haven‚Äôt gotten 22 pounds overweight again, more recently I‚Äôve gotten back to my goal weight of 180 pounds.

title: More than 50 pounds so far...
body: This app is wonderful to help understand and keep track of how much and what is being eaten.  I started at almost 300 pounds and I have already lost 50 in 90 days.  I am confident that I will reach my goal and lose a hundred more!  The app is easy to use, and the upgrade is worth every penny.  Good luck and Get Tracking!

title: Gr8 app
body: This is a great app to keep you on track. Very easy to use. It makes tracking your calories and hydration so easy. I opted for the premium edition for a year. A lot of great nutritional information. Also sends you weekly report cards so you can see exactly what is going on with the food you track regarding nutrition. If your serious about losing weight and looking for an app to help. Look no further, Lose It will make it possible.

title: I‚Äôve used it for years and love it!
body: They have every food you could ever eat in their database. Every single one is accurate to the T with calorie count and nutrients. Super easy to use and it only takes a few seconds to log your meals. Never an inconvenience. Even has every restaurant menu accurately logged in the database. Keep track of your workouts and calories burned. This app has helped me lose almost 30 lbs in 2018 alone! Love this app!

title: Fantastic tool
body: LoseIt! has been an invaluable tool in my quest for fitness. It has gotten easier and easier over time to enter food in the daily log, and it‚Äôs integration with Health Kit means that with my Apple Watch all my exercise is accounted for automatically.

title: Easy to Use!
body: I am enjoying this app! It helps me stay accountable and I love that it is so easy! Having it on my phone makes it easy to check the calories of something BEFORE I eat it. It has hard for me on some programs I have tried in the past . Even though I have only been using it for a week, it has been helping out so much. Especially keeping me focused. I would highly recommend this app. Two thumbs up!

title: Was great, now app is sluggish
body: After comparing several apps I like this app the best and have used this app for years. The food data base is excellent, and I love the convenience of being able to add a previous meal from my history with one click. However, since an app update a few months ago it is slow, sluggish, several seconds time delay, so it is no longer quick and easy to use. I am a lifetime member but I have stopped using this app because it‚Äôs too frustrating. Please fix the bugs so I can use this app again!!

title: Staying at target weight
body: Lose It! has been helping me remain at my target weight for over 4 years. Any time I go more than 5 pounds overweight, I start using the app again. I can see my history and realize how successful I‚Äôve been. It holds a list of my favorite foods, allows me to renter meals I eat frequently, and even subtracts my exercise. It‚Äôs true, I have to enter the data on my eating, but that keeps me mindful. And I use the free version! What‚Äôs not to love?!

title: Been using LoseIt off and on for nearly ten years!
body: LoseIt has seen me through my heaviest times and ‚Äúcelebrated‚Äù with me during those times I‚Äôve reached my goal weight.  I love that it has kept a record of my ups and downs since April, 2010!  Also, any of my personal foods I‚Äôve ever recorded are right at my fingertips.  Now, it‚Äôs linked to my Garmin watch.

title: Good app with potential to be great
body: This app is very handy for tracking. Not very strong with motivational tools. I like the suggested meal plans, but, unfortunately the suggested plans only focus on dinner, not the whole day or the whole week. It would be great to be able to use their recipes to build a weekly plan for all meals included- breakfast, lunch, snacks etc. As to social tools - there seems to be only a few active groups and those are not moderated by the App developer, so anything goes on those posts - some rude, some advertising posts. Kind of junky social groups.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further. Best, Sal

title: Fantastic weight loss tool
body: This app is very powerful if you use it properly. I really love it!  I lost just about 10lbs in 15 days!!

title: Generally informative but frequently frustrating!
body: I find it could be better but it is generally efficient for recording the weight loss progress & finding info regarding food choices.  I am having the hardest time when I search for certain food & when I think I found it & try to look into the pertinent info I find the items are listed without any info next to it expect for

title: LOSE IT! with embodyDNA- AWESOME
body: Lose it! just allowed me to couple it with embodyDNA from HELIX. This is awesome tool to see how the way I eat affects making the healthiest choices according to my genetic makeup. I‚Äôm 63 yrs old so I kinda already know where my issues are but it was fantastic to see the science behind it.  I really recommend getting this calorie counter (AND SO MUCH MORE). I did the weight watchers app for a long time and have found this easy-to-use calorie counter to be more complete.

title: Challenges Feature Needs Work
body: Although I‚Äôve found this app very useful (when I hold myself accountable and use it), I have a difficult time using the challenges feature as there is only a search bar where you can use key words to find a challenge. It‚Äôs very difficult to find any challenges that aren‚Äôt already halfway over. If they changed this, I could feel good about giving a 5 star rating, but as it is, I feel like this is a feature with the potential to be incredibly helpful, but it currently isn‚Äôt.

title: Great App
body: This app is so helpful in getting me to achieve my goal weight. I am finally able to note why I‚Äôve had such a difficult time losing 20lbs. Documenting all food intake and the calories of each item has been eye-opening. I highly recommend if you are ready to commit to honestly counting all calories and remaining with the recommended daily calorie count. The pounds will eventually shed especially with a low to moderate exercise regimen.

title: Best app for losing weight
body: If you want to lose weight use this app. It teaches you what food to avoid by the simple fact that it gives you all the info you need besides calories. You can see the allowance for your day after you enter your meals as the day went on. Over time you can see what‚Äôs working and you end up eating healthier. I love it. Steady weight loss and keeping it off without feeling ill.

title: Losing weight and enjoying it
body: With the help of Lose It, I‚Äôve lost almost 100 pounds. Before Lose It, I tried to count my calories and watch my portion sizes but it didn‚Äôt work for me. I discovered my portion sizes were still too large. Lose It gives me goals, guidelines, and helps me balance sodium, sugar, protein, carbs and more. I feel more accountability logging daily and it‚Äôs given me long lasting results. I‚Äôm still on my journey and Lose It is by my side.

title: Almost Awesome
body: I was using this app on the reg for a long time but have stopped for the sole reason that I can‚Äôt plan my meals for the next day. I know you can unlock this feature if you pay for premium, but I‚Äôm just not willing to do that because I don‚Äôt care at all about any of the other premium features, I just want to plan my days ahead. So I would write out my meal plans and then enter them the next day but that got really annoying so now I don‚Äôt even bother. If this becomes part of the free version of the app I‚Äôll definitely come back.

title: Dependable
body: Have used this for years, when needed. It‚Äôs easy to use once you input your regular foods.  And not hard to scan in new ones. I prefer Premium for its coverage. So glad calories get deducted for exercise - a good incentive. Also appreciate the pings that get sent regarding my progress as well as tips relating to certain foods I‚Äôm consuming and their impact on my weight loss. Thank you folks for your design work and all enhancements! Sign me slimmer!!

title: Continues to be pretty darn average
body: Installing the watch version of the app results an endless annoying loop of being asked to give the app access to your health data - the alert pops up again and again and again on both the watch and the phone. Not Cool. The only solution is to delete the watch app.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Awesome!
body: UPDATE: I am changing this review because i do not like how they are forcing people to upgrade to premium for a fee. I have used this app for years and slowly they have been taking away features from the free version. Also every time I load the app there is an add to upgrade to premium. Such a shame I loved this app and may need to find another as they are limiting the things free users can access.

title: New update
body: I have had this app for two years and loved it! There were no ads, very easy to use, and inputting your water intake didn‚Äôt require upgrading to Premium nor looking ahead into future dates. Now, I have to pay for those features? Sorry, but I‚Äôd rather not have to pay extra expenses just to remind myself how much water I drank and or to gain access to preview future dates. Also, knowing what this app used to be prior to the upgrades just makes it even more of a challenge because I‚Äôm stuck with  ‚Äúwhy am I paying for this when all these features used to be free and I was already paying annually?‚Äù Anyway, the app had a good run.. gotta look elsewhere!

title: Love It!!!
body: This app is totally awesome!!! It‚Äôs really helping me to easily keep track of my food & overall health progress.  I‚Äôm telling & showing this app to everyone in my circle, including my medical providers.

title: Best Weight Loss App
body: I have tried to use other apps for maintaining or losing weight and gave up. This app ties my exercise with my Fitbit to the app so it keeps track of what I am doing seamlessly. It is incredibly easy to journal my foods. I like the way it shows how much fat, carbs and protein I eat during the day. There are even more parts to it that I haven‚Äôt even explored yet. In under 2 weeks I have lost 7 pounds and this app has made it so much easier!

title: Net carb bug!
body: I have been using this app for months on Keto and suddenly one day it started to add net carbs to foods with zero carbs. Contacted support and still is a big issue. Add something with zero carbs and it adds 1-2 net carbs but the total carbs stays the same which is zero. Zero carb foods get 1 net carb no matter how many times I delete and re-add then. Huge bug for someone watching net carbs! I deleted the app and reinstalled and that did not fix such a huge issue! If this keeps up I will have no choice but to use another app. And I have the paid version! This needs to be fixed asap!
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Simple, Easy to Use App
body: I like this app, in particular its simplicity. It's much better at searching and finding food items than other apps I've used. What I don't understand is why this app, and several like it, expects users to sign up for recurring monthly fees to go premium?  I want to purchase the app to support the creators, but I will not sign up for a recurring monthly charge. Seems like a flawed revenue model.

title: Best tracking app, even better with pro
body: I love the additional features and freedom to personalize and plan ahead with pro. Upgraded to lifetime pro plan after the first year since the features made it easier and easier to use as you continue tracking. This continues to improve as you keep logging. Developing recipes and combinations of the meals you eat most often really makes using the app easy.

title: Just Canceled Premium After Years
body: LoseIt only works well for those who pay, and there is no incentive so refer a friend to upgrade to premium after they‚Äôve tried regular.
response: We apologize that this has been your experience with Lose It!. We strive to provide a healthy weight loss program, and our goal is never to encourage unsafe dieting practices. To share ideas about how Lose It! could better help ensure member safety, please contact us: reviews@loseit.zendesk.com

title: Results!
body: This is an excellent tool for tracking. I like the fact that I can find out the calories and nutrients BEFORE I chose to eat whatever I am considering. There have been a few surprises, but that is all part of the journey. So far, LOSE IT has proven quite helpful. If you budget allowed it, I would purchase the Premium version. But, even without it, this tool works. But like anything to do with weight lose, you work the program, the program will work for you.

title: Great App - so easy
body: Having to log everything you eat really makes you think about that piece of cake you want. Suddenly a bite is enough. I hate seeing that weight graph go up on the weekends. While working from home, it‚Äôs easy to snack but if I have to log it in, I don‚Äôt snack so much. The list of foods available is enormous, you can find almost anything and the barcode scan feature helps log exactly what you‚Äôre eating.

title: Great program.
body: I‚Äôve been using this program for about 5 years.  The program contains just the right combination of helpful reminders, ease of data entry, and motivational graphics to make it a pleasure to use. It may be my imagination, but it seems that some features have been greatly improved over the years. For example, the scanning feature seems to operate much more quickly than it used to.

title: My favorite app!
body: For over 5 years I‚Äôve used this app. First time in my life that I've been able to attain my dieting goals! I lost 50 pounds over that first year.  I gained during the pandemic but it‚Äôs coming off again.  The fact that this app syncs to my Fitbit is wonderful.  The two tools that WORK!

title: This app is working great for me!!
body: I have used many tracking apps. I haven‚Äôt liked any until this one! It has made life so easy to track food, I didn‚Äôt realize how much I was actually eating until I started using it! So far I have lost 7 lbs in almost 6 weeks (I‚Äôve had some cheat days) it‚Äôs so easy to just scan your food barcode instead of having to enter everything! I would highly recommend it!!

title: Best App for what I needed!
body: I have used this app for three years! I‚Äôve learned so much about high calorie foods and nutrition by gauging my meals and snacks and how many calories I consume in a day. I have learned to stay within the parameters of the guidelines for my height and weight. I feel so much better eating healthy. I never realized how delicious fresh fruits and vegetables taste! I also eat leaner cuts of beef, pork, poultry and seafood. I have lost 45 pounds and I have 20 more to go to reach my goal.

title: I love it!
body: Love that when I put in a goal of sticking to 1041 calories per day, the app basically said, ‚ÄúAre you sure? you may want to go higher.‚Äù Realistic goals are important when trying to lose weight.

title: Great calorie-tracking app!
body: I‚Äôve used several calorie trackers over the years, but this one is my favorite because it has a simple, clean interface. Like other tracking apps, its database is pretty extensive, and it has a barcode scanner, which makes it easy to find specific foods. Regularly eaten foods are provided as options when logging, making it quick and easy to find food typically eaten. It‚Äôs a great app!

title: Cheat day mode suggestion
body: Absolutely amazing!! It‚Äôs so easy to use!!! I do want to make a suggestion. A cheat day option. Hear me out. Once a week you get the option to hit the cheat day button so you don‚Äôt have to count the calories for that day but the app knows you definitely went over your calorie limit instead of entering in all the foods or not entering it at all. Thank you for coming to my TED talk. Seriously though, it‚Äôs a really great app

title: Good reality check of your calorie intake
body: Great way to track calories with a good database already. Notifications to post are helpful on busy days. I‚Äôm using advanced version, so don‚Äôt know how that compares to free one. Love that it syncs info from my Apple Watch‚Äîone of the features I missed when I switched from Fitbit. Using this app along with a lot of exercise helped me take off 25 lbs. this year, and keep it off when I edge back up by a couple pounds.

title: Easy to use - And great screen layout
body: I have been using Lose It for 7 months, and really like this app. I have done Noom (which worked well for my first 2 months), but I wanted to get past the quizes and just track my food. This app lets me track my food, choose how to synch my workouts, and easily shows my progress. I have lost 35 pounds in 9 months, and I am very proud of myself! This app was absolutely a major factor in my success

title: Keep Track!
body: LoseIt! Helps me by keeping track of everything that goes into my mouth. Because of the discipline of putting into writing whatever I eat, I become more aware of the foods that previously have been consumed without thinking, without awareness. But this simple discipline helps me control what I eat. I still have long ways to go, but in a couple of weeks I have lost about 15 pounds. That is a great start, and I am happy!

title: Love, but last update made won‚Äôt sync active calories
body: I have been using Lose it for the last year continuously. I find it‚Äôs a fantastic app and I‚Äôm more aware of what I‚Äôm putting into my body. And I‚Äôve lost 35 pounds! However since installing the last update Lose It! no longer connect to Apple health to pull my active calories and workouts so I can get credit for them. I have tried all of the troubleshooting steps on your help site and still to no avail. Please fix this issue.

title: Easy logging
body: This app makes it easy to log in daily meals and exercise by remembering what you‚Äôve eaten/done previously.  ‚ÄúYour‚Äù foods and exercise types come up when you go to log either, allowing you to log with a single tap‚Äî no need to choose the food, amount, type of exercise each time. This is the first time I have ever been able to consistently keep track of what I eat and how much exercise I get.  Great app!

title: It works!
body: I have been using this app for about a month and I have lost 12 pounds. It really focuses on your calories and each time you lose weight your calorie count is slightly lowered. I‚Äôm not perfect and have had small cheats and do not exercise regularly but it is still working for me. By counting calories and eating much healthier I believe I am going to be able to achieve my goal with the use of this app. Thank you Lose It!

title: Love this app!
body: The only thing I wish is that it could upload recipes from websites, though maybe the premium version has that option. I have the free, so I wouldn‚Äôt know. But the free version pretty much has everything I could ever want! Love that it sinks with Apple Activity app and that it shows macronutrient breakdown each day. The premium version allows tracking of water consumption, too, though I track that elsewhere. Love it!

title: Effective
body: Keeping a log of your food intake keeps you on track for your weight loss goal. I am not always sure of the exact calories but I know when to stop eating and close the kitchen until morning. It is an easy app to use. I like how it reminds you to log your meals if you set it to do that. I try to have enough protein and exercise so I don‚Äôt lose muscle weight. The premium version will track your carbohydrates.

title: Unbeatable
body: I had gained weight, due to aging, and couldn‚Äôt seem to lose it.  I tried several apps/programs, and lost nothing, or lost a little, then gained it back.  Lose It is the only thing that worked for me.  The calorie intake seems to be calculated much more accurately than other programs, and the database of foods is far more comprehensive.

title: Disappointed
body: The app may be great. But if you think you‚Äôre going to try it for the 7 days and then cancel before it charges you the $40 bucks for the year, they make it impossible. I did everything thing in the world to try and get it off my phone and it not charge me and to no avail. I spent so long dealing with trying to prevent the charges that after it charged me anyway, I put off going back to deal with trying to get a refund. Now it‚Äôs past my 90 days since purchase so a refund is impossible. Another hard lesson learned. Just wish I had my money back since I never used it. Maybe someone will learn what I didn‚Äôt know from this.

title: Great tracker until they fix one bug and create another
body: Love the tool....but once their developers start fixing one bug invariably it winds up creating another bug and you have no clue until you trip over it.  I wish they sent notifications when they made a change to the app then I could look closely at the aspects I find invaluable right away and do my own user acceptance testing!  Actually I wish they did an adequate job of regression testing!  Very frustrating.  This happens much too often.  I paid for lifetime Loseit and feel like I signed up for a lifetime of pain!  I'm considering cutting my losses and trying MyFitnessPal instead.  Loseit is THAT aggregating.

title: Perfect for losing fat or building muscle
body: I‚Äôve used this app for cutting my weight when needed and also increasing it while putting on lean muscle. Tracking my calories and my macros especially has been invaluable in achieving my goals. The library of foods covers everything I dream of eating (and this is not common as I eat a mixed Western and Indian diet).

title: Nothing succeeds like success!
body: My goal was 1 pound a week. In the first week I lost 3!  What more can I say?  There‚Äôs a bit of a learning curve. I haven‚Äôt found a tutorial. The food database is impressive. I especially like the option of being able to scan foods into my meal logs. I‚Äôve been through a number of weight loss programs. One week in this one is both easy to use and successful. I like the hints and suggestions. Example:  who knew that a cup of coffee in the morning helps with weight loss?!

title: Glad I had to change to Loseit
body: I was using MyFitnessPal but after I upgraded my iPad to IOS 11 MyFitnessPal wouldn‚Äôt work properly so I switched to Loseit. I‚Äôm glad I was forced to switch because Loseit is WAY better! Loseit has a database of what seems to be most of the typical food products with commensurate calories which MyFitnessPal doesn‚Äôt. So far I‚Äôve found Loseit to be a great calorie counting app and the ads are not highly annoying. Highly recommended!

title: Great, but would like to see...
body: Overall this app is super easy to use and does what it says. I'm not overweight, but want to lose 10-15lbs. I've lost 4 so far. I upgraded to the premium. I was hoping to get recommendations but everything was "you're doing great", nice but not actionable. I want to know what I can do better. I feel like I paid for nothing. 5 stars for the free version, but the paid has no added value for me. What did I pay for?

title: Easy to use!
body: I use Lose It just for tracking calories.  It‚Äôs very easy to look up extensive database of foods, scan product barcode, or type in yourself on rare occasions you can‚Äôt find it.  It also remembers your entries by meal so you can one-click to add yesterday‚Äôs breakfast, for example.  Also easy to modify, e.g., change 3 donuts to 1, or change the meal.  I‚Äôve been using for 2+ years, lost 35+ lbs. and able to keep it off.

title: this app is a LIFESTYLE.
body: best app ever. this is the only thing that consistently motivates me to want to be healthy and lose weight. I log my sleep, exercise and water intake as well which only adds to the fun. there are so many challenges and recipes to keep things fun. but this app also encourages you to be healthy‚Äî it warns you if you aren‚Äôt eating enough, and offers tips and articles for how to improve your habits or feel confident in yourself. this app is a LIFESTYLE.

title: No longer useful for simple history keeping.
body: I used an earlier version on an old iPhone 5 to track and graph my weight as I followed another (low carb) regimen. That phone died and the version I found to use on my new rx forced me through a setup, gave nonsensical results when told that my goal was the same as my present weight, and finally presented a screen that had no exit without setting up an account or logging into an existing one. I want no account so deleted the app.

title: Great Apo
body: I paid for a program using another app to track calories and it was absolutely horrible. The nutrition information in their database was between 10-30 calories higher than the product label and in at least one case where their calories 60 lower. Furthermore, their scanning option was inaccurate.

title: My fav app
body: It is due time that I give this little app some well deserved love. I have tried almost every app out there, and this one is the most comprehensive most intuitive and easy to use app out there. Even tho I‚Äôve had my ups and downs as weight loss is not just a straight shot down, since Dec 2019 I have lost almost 28lbs and am at my goal weight of 117. I could not have done it without Lose It. You guys are amazing! Keep it up!

title: Keep me in check.
body: II love this app.  I have been Lose It for approximately 5 years. It has kept my weight in check. Since I don't have time to workout anymore (kids & work), learning to cut back on what I eat makes a big difference. You really get to see what you put in your body. It's alittle tough in the beginning to cut down on calories, but your body gets use to it. I still whatever I want, just in smaller portions.

title: Would have given 4 stars..
body: I love this app, and it‚Äôs really great. Easy simple way to enter food, and if you go premium, it‚Äôll basically track everything you need. I also enjoy the visual in the bar. But it recently updated its scanner and it works awful! The majority of the time it reads the food as soda. App developers; go back to the old scanner it works much better
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Redesign disappointing
body: Edit: it looks like now you‚Äôve removed the ability to limit the My Foods list. Please please PLEASE stop ‚Äúimproving‚Äù features out of the product. I am a lifetime premium user who bought it because I liked it the way it was.

title: What an effective tool!
body: Lose It has been invaluable in tracking my calories.  Before I had to rig up a system in my notes and it was not as precise as Lose It.  Half or more of the items I eat are already in the Lose It database, which makes it easy to add items and hold them for future meals.  And you can easily adjust portions‚Äîsomething that keeps me honest!  It has been so helpful AND I am losing weight.

title: Good alternative to the leading competitor
body: This App has everything you need to track your diet though it does fall short in a few areas. My primary issues are with the food database and weight log.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: prefer to myfitnesspal but premium is too expensive
body: would love to be able to log meals in advance and track water, but not for $30 a year. it won't even take me that long to lose the weight. I'd pay a year long subscription for $1 a month, or $2.99 a month if I could cancel whenever and not have to pay for the months I don't use. there aren't enough extra features offered with premium to make it worth the $$. not to mention the international database is pathetic compared to MFP. I do love the interface though.

title: Winning with Lose It!
body: My friend started using this app 2 years ago and lost 25 pounds, so I picked it up when I had had enough! And wow! In the first 5 months I lost 20 pounds & enjoyed my first trip to Hawaii in a bikini, my first bikini, and I have lost a total of 30 pounds and my life style has changed. I exercise daily, don't eat processed foods very anymore and I eat bunches & bunches of fruits & veggies up from none. I highly recommend this app, I love it & it works!!

title: Great tool!
body: I have been using Loseit with great success for a couple of years.  I have taken my time and worked with a moderate loss regimen, but that has enabled me to make and adhere to required lifestyle changes.  I have now lost 57 lbs and am near my ideal weight.  I have referred a few people who are now also using Loseit, and they are experiencing positive results. This is a great product that helps you keep on track without a crazy diet.  Well done!

title: 400+ Days In
body: User friendly, intuitive. Tracks massive data, easy to use. Encouraging- but badges should be more frequent to be motivating. Premium price worth it- kept off 25 pounds with metabolism issues, when nothing else has worked. Old app icon cuter- would like ‚Äúsettings‚Äù choice to keep classic look. Social elements could improve by allowing more flexibility for privacy, instead of all-or-none approach. Overall very good app!

title: Great for Tracking Food and Nutrition
body: Great for tracking food to maintain weight and to  understand the nutritional value of what I am eating. I wish it had a way of totaling saturated fat for the day in addition to total fat. I really like the way it lets you switch between summaries of calories and fats as well as other goals for the day. I also like being able to enter a recipe made at home and see the total nutritional value per serving.

title: Wish I hadn‚Äôt upgraded
body: I wish I had not paid $30 for the subscription. I did it because I wanted to track my water intake; on the free version, the water intake option sits on the main screen with your daily food data. However, after I bought the app, water intake was actually in a sub-menu in another screen altogether. That makes it laborious and easy to forget. It also has to be tracked through a different sub-menu. This app is pretty awesome otherwise.

title: Great app
body: I have done weight watchers in the past and it works but this is actually easier, you can still eat and or drink what you want you just have to be accountable for the calories you consume! The bar scanner works great. The search is easy to use and you create an alphabetical list of your foods which  is also nice. I would highly recommend the app and I have been telling my friends and family!

title: 4 Years In
body: Best food logging app out there. Easy to use, simple interface, lots of different options. I‚Äôve lost all my weight using this app and now use it to watch my macros while I workout. Would recommend to anyone who‚Äôs just starting and it all seems so over whelming. Just start it- don‚Äôt worry about going over your daily limit at first, just log everything and make slow gradual changes.

title: Discipline's Little Helper
body: No app will lose the weight for you, but LOSE IT! has had everything I have needed to track my eating behavior, which has helped me recognize where I have needed to make changes to finally drop the extra weight I have struggled for years to lose.  Knowing those numbers, seeing in real-time what I put in my body, makes saying No an easier task because LOSE IT! lets me know what saying Yes means to my health.

title: Great App for weight loss
body: I've lost over 30 lbs and the driving force has been lose it.  Having to acknowledge what I'm eating and how many calories that food contains makes  it a lot easier to make smarter food choices. Of course I also love to eat so it encourages me to exercise so I have the available calories for the meals I want.  Then when Im exercising I want to eat healthier to support my fitness plans.  I wish I'd had lose it years ago

title: Excellent tool for food tracking and weight loss
body: I‚Äôve used other apps and Lose It! surpasses them on ease of use and appearance (who wants a plain screen?). The barcode look up is so great. Just point and the app pulls in the food data.  I like that I can customize the look with themes.  Overall I find it much easier and fun to use than the other apps out there and because of that, I haven‚Äôt missed a day of logging.

title: Apple Watch update
body: So happy to see the ‚Äúprevious meals‚Äù feature on the Apple watch fixed. Now it runs as intended. I got the watch in large part so I could quickly add to lose it. I would love to be able to add individual foods (just favorites is fine) or delete foods. Now you have to do all that from the iphone, iPad, or computer. Right now I just add the whole previous meal and delete things I didn‚Äôt have later.

title: Built for the user and is not a sales tool for merchandise
body: Lose It! has become my daily trusted companion to manage my diet and exercise. The app is continually improved with a manageable frequency of updates. The personal technical support that I have used a couple of times was also impressive.

title: A little off
body: Yesterday I tracked everything I ate and indicated that I was through logging for the day. Today I got a message indicating that, although I didn‚Äôt track yesterday, I can still track today. Don‚Äôt appreciate an app that both disses and invalidates what I‚Äôm doing. Doing my best and an app acts like that, and it‚Äôs done it several days recently. I like seeing where I‚Äôm making progress or needing adjustments but I sure don‚Äôt need that attitude!
response: Sorry for the trouble here. We are actively investigating this issue. Could you please take a screenshot of this notification next time you receive it, noting the date and time you received it and send it in an email to us via help.loseit.com?

title: Love it, but there‚Äôs a bug!
body: I love this app. It‚Äôs my favorite one to use - it‚Äôs so early to insert food, they have so much already on there that you just need the name of the brand and what it is. I like how it tells your goal, and you can customize it to your needs.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Better and cheaper than Weight Watchers
body: I used Weight Watchers for about 4 months.  Then realized all I was really doing was calorie counting so I switched to Lose It.  Much easier to use and more effective too.  Most foods are already stored in the app and adding foods and recipes is easy.  I especially like the breakdown of fats, proteins, carbs, cholesterol, etc.  Makes it easier to catch bad habits and continue good ones.  Worth the small monthly for premium.

title: Just what I needed.
body: My sister is using another app like $20 a month or something. She‚Äôs going by points and if she has a big Mac she loses all her points and then some for the day. They exaggerate trying to teach her how to eat.

title: Down 60 - Focused by Lose It!
body: It takes time and effort to change your lifestyle to become a healthier you! I found Lose It! to be an incredible partner, and key to me staying focused and aware of my eating. Calorie tracking helped me to shift into a healthier diet, because I started to see what foods drove me over my limit faster and which did not. And measuring and weighing taught me how to eyeball a reasonable portion. I love chocolate and Lose It allows me to feel good indulging.

title: Lose It is helping me Lose It
body: 5 weeks in just following the plan I am down 25 lbs. I started at 361 and am now 336. Water intake is crucial and this helps me keep track. I just wish you could adjust the units as I drink 10 oz bottled waters vs 8 so I have to add on and extra 8 ounces as I log the 4th to make it 5 8oz waters for 40oz. Also follow the multiple meals and snacks and try to stay in the guidelines. More eating times helps the metabolism continue to work. Great App.

title: Lost 20 Lbs
body: This app is awesome! I had no idea how many calories I was eating. This makes it easy to know exactly what is going on your mouth. My favorite feature is scanning barcodes and magically all the stuff on the nutrition label goes right in there. You can take pics of ur meal too. I suggest getting a kitchen scale too. That way you know exactly what you‚Äôre eating. You can enter your weight daily and will update your end goal date too!

title: Good App But...
body: I love this app. I had such bad memories associated with the myfitnesspal so i had to switch to a new calorie counter. This one works great, especially since it lets you log even tho you‚Äôre below the recommended calories (unlike myfitnesspal).
response: We are sorry for the confusion! You can actually edit barcode scans with Lose It!. For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: THE APP YOU‚ÄôLL EVER NEED
body: I‚Äôve tried so many other calorie counting apps on the App Store and none of them have impressed me like this one has. Even my FitBit doesn‚Äôt do what this does! This tracks patterns in my diet and lets me know what I need to add to my diet to stay on track! And the barcode reading and food snapping is phenomenal! I‚Äôve lost 11 pounds of fat and I‚Äôm down from 35% body fat to 25% in just four weeks! I‚Äôve never been more motivated! Thank you Lose It!

title: Enjoy this App
body: I am really enjoying this App. I gave it 4 stars because the upgrade is expensive ($40) per year. The App does have the ability to do calorie deficits and contains thousands of foods. It also has the scan feature for store items. Be wary of folks who have put in food items and have calculated the calories incorrectly. This is common on most apps. Maybe on day I will splurge and purchase the upgrade, but for now, I am enjoying the simplicity of this app. Down 10 lbs.

title: Premium is super frustrating
body: Apparently, there is no way to reset the app for a fresh start if you have premium. The only option is to completely delete the account and loose the amount paid for the subscription. Come on Lose It, you can offer better than that. Sometimes we just need a clean slate and fresh start. (Without our former weights showing) Disappointed.

title: Great alternative to Weight Watchers app
body: I lost all my weight on WW but ended up gaining some back by eating too many zero point foods.  I also ended up eating the same foods everyday so I wouldn‚Äôt have to track points.   Lose it!  has the exact same functionality as the WW app but counts calories rather than points.   It allows me a much more varied menu than WW and I AM LOSING AGAIN.  It also costs 1/10th of what WW charges for a year.  Very happy with it so far.

title: Really wonderful
body: I have to say this app is truly great. It was a little challenging to figure out at first but now that I‚Äôm on my way it‚Äôs going very well. Both me and my wife use it now and I think just getting an accurate calorie count is vital to consistent weight loss and this app does it well. The scanning feature is very helpful in determining the correct calorie count in the exact foods you‚Äôre eating. I‚Äôd highly recommend this app.

title: Greatest Motivator
body: I had tried everything, without success.  However, The LOSE IT! app kept me focused on what I needed to do to lose the weight.  It kept me informed as to  what  I needed and what I didn‚Äôt need.  It was hard at first, but once I got the hang of what I was doing wrong and changed things, it became easier.  I still have quit a bit more to lose, but with the LOSE IT! app I am certain I can accomplish my goal.  Thank you LOSE IT!  Angelique

title: Works if you stick to it
body: Make sure you‚Äôre measuring everything. Try to scan the item you eat at least the first time because sometimes the ones in the app are incorrect. Sometimes they are off even when you scan. Power yoga/vinyasa style yoga calories are way off from what I‚Äôve read on a yoga website. Overall I think the app has helped. I lost the weight I gained at the beginning of Covid stay at home orders within a month by sticking to it.

title: Great scalable motivator
body: I have used several food trackers that I have been satisfied with but Lose It! is my all-time favorite. Their food database is extensive and easy to enter. You can track as many or as few food-related data points as you want, the but unique part about Lose It! is the insights they can provide that can lead you to continue doing what's working for you and avoid what's holding you back.

title: Has any food you could eat in the database
body: I‚Äôve never use a calorie counter app that was so easy before. And everything that I eat is in here somehow. You may need to choose the food selection that is best for you as far as which one you choose, so you still have to look at the food you‚Äôre eating, but it is extremely helpful I have lost 4 pounds on it and if you stick to it you can reach your goals.

title: Not a gimmick...it just works.
body: It‚Äôs simple. Track what you eat and you‚Äôll make better decisions. Make better decisions and use Lose It‚Äôs incredible database of foods to stay accurate, and you‚Äôll shed pounds. I‚Äôve always struggled with weight due to an unhealthy lifestyle as a child and to be in shape I used to work out an hour a day and go on Fad diets. Now I eat good food, stay active, and the weight is FALLING OFF! Use it and don‚Äôt lie to the App and you will not fail.

title: Great app
body: Since I have used LoseIt for many years now, I can look back at the history tracking info to learn of my nutrition patterns & see the awesome health changes my life has taken with LoseIt! Thanks you for always improving it too. I have told many people about it.

title: Best app out there
body: This is by far my favorite weight loss app!  5 years ago I lost 33 pounds!  I‚Äôve tried the my Fitness Pal and Weight Watchers app, but for whatever reason this seems to be the easiest and most friendly one for me!  I‚Äôm now back on it, have lost 4 pounds in 1 1/2 weeks but this time I‚Äôm gonna continue to use it after my loss and Maybe this time I won‚Äôt gain it back. Thank you lose it for creating such an awesome app

title: Keeping me mindful
body: I started using this app because I wanted to be able to record calorie intake. It‚Äôs turned out to be more than I thought. The biggest thing is by keeping a daily record it keeps me mindful that I‚Äôm eating differently. This is good because I‚Äôm far less apt to grab something unhealthy because I don‚Äôt want to overshoot my daily goal. I‚Äôve been successful since I‚Äôve started with Lose It. It‚Äôs a great companion to keep me responsible.

title: Latest updates need improvement
body: I have been using Lose It for a long time. I started with the free app then went to premium. Not sure what has happened, but there are certain features that no longer work for me, like saving recipes. What happened? My phone freezes up. Have to get out of App completely! My phone has the latest updates. This app could be so much better.

title: Lack of basic exercises
body: I‚Äôm liking this app with the exception of the lack of basic exercises. Disappointed to see pole dancing as a trackable exercise but no bicep curls, lat raises, tricep extensions and other very common exercises. I tried adding Russian twists but it would only allow me to add as duration vs reps. Then I had to know how many calories was going to be burned. If I knew how to calculate my own calories, I wouldn‚Äôt need to track my exercises here. Please add more basic exercises with the option to track both reps and duration.

title: It works!
body: I had gained weight after having my first child and even more after my second. I knew I had to try and lose weight but didn‚Äôt even know where to start. I found this app and decided I would try it giving myself reasonable goals to meet. And I‚Äôm now down 35 pounds. This has helped me so much and I recommend it to everyone who is trying to lose some weight. Thank you for this app!

title: Loved it more before
body: I've been using the app for several year in various levels of tracking.  Either I never noticed before or it‚Äôs changed but the weight bounces to your goal if you don‚Äôt enter daily,,, which is just ridiculous, it should stay where you last weighed.  It‚Äôs a giant pain to have to go in and manually enter weights do that it doesn‚Äôt appear that your weight is bouncing all over the place.  This is my only peeve with the app, plz fix it.

title: Easy
body: The app works great for my iPhone. So much easier to log foods with this app than many others. You‚Äôre able to add ounces/cups/tbls and serving sizes. Makes it so easy to measure this way. I‚Äôve tried multi using 2 apps in same week and this was way easier. Super user friendly. Highly recommend. The bar scanner doesn‚Äôt always work good though. I‚Äôm finding that the calories will be off most of the time.

title: Good for weight loss!
body: I enjoy using this app for weight loss. It‚Äôs easy to keep track of everything Im eating. The free version only lets you track your weight and calories. So if your looking to be more in depth you will have to will have to buy the paid membership. The only problem I‚Äôve found is when using the barcode scanner it will sometimes give you a different result than what‚Äôs on the label. So just double check your labels and you will be fine.

title: Forcing Apple health integration
body: I love this app and it has basic macronutrient breakdown for free which is amazing. But when I starting using this app again after a break, I have been going nuts with the most incessant full screen notifications trying to get me to integrate with apple health. My only choice is "not now" and I can't seem to find a setting to turn this off. I'm not exaggerating when I say that I get this request 50 times a day and sometimes 3 or 4 right after another. So close to deleting this app even though I'll have to pay to get the same features from a different app.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! This shouldn't be happening! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: MY POCKET HYPE MAN!
body: I‚Äôm the El Cheapo type that never pay for apps but this is worth it! I‚Äôve lost weight before with the HCG diet, but this time around I‚Äôm doing with just learning to cut my calories and choose healthier foods that aren‚Äôt too hard for me to cook. This app helps me stay motivated & gives me great food options. Although I‚Äôm a 44 yr old woman I still enjoy the Motivational badges that I earn along the way just as a child receives a start or happy face on there paper! MY OWN PERSONAL HYPE MANüòÅ

title: Never Get The Premium
body: There seems to be no way out of the premium plan that is apparently an auto renewal program.  It is super disheartening when a company does this kind of thing- anything for money must be the motto.  In the iTunes settings there is no way to not have auto renewal of some sort once you have had the program.  You must remember how you enrolled, either iPhone or desktop, if you challenge the credit card company you will pay extra fees for the time to review the case.  I seriously can‚Äôt believe it! Go for the free program but DO NOT GET THE PREMIUM!  And, there was seriously no difference between the free and the premium!!!
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Great App but nasty search feature
body: I have loved and used this app for a few years now. The latest upgrade is terrible and frustrating. If you click on the button 'previous meals', a huge error message appears on your phone. You can't close or move it. Your querty won't close so you can click the OK to close the error. This forces you to go to the website online to enter. I have yet to get the error to stop or close after 3 days. I am ready to quit.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. We expect this to be working normally now. Please update your app to the latest version, and if you are still experiencing any issues, contact us via loseit.live/help.

title: Best App I Have Found
body: As someone who works in software, I‚Äôm very picky about the apps I use. This is a great app. Extremely thoughtful in the design, great user interface and responsive. I have tried several calorie counter apps and I was surprised that this was the one I chose since I had never heard of it. It has a good food selection and the scanner also really works. I‚Äôm so impressed, I immediately bought the lifetime membership. Great job!

title: You‚Äôre in the Driver‚Äôs Seat with this App!
body: This app really puts you in the ‚Äúdriver‚Äôs seat‚Äù in terms of being in control of what you can eat at any given hour of the day. There is a lot of flexibility, and you can really see what you‚Äôre putting into your body on a daily basis. It‚Äôs a lot of fun, and I don‚Äôt feel so restricted like some other diets.  Also, the weight loss starts right away if you just stick with your program!

title: Easy Peasy!!
body: This app has changed my eating habits. Knowing the caloric value of what goes in my mouth is a game changer for me. I have used it for years now. At first, I used it to reach my goal weight. When I get lazy & don‚Äôt track for a few months, the pounds happily return. BUT I always return to tracking & remove those silly pounds. It is never more than a few, but I can track them away. I am so thankful for this tool. It is easy AND free!!

title: Working for me!
body: Keeping my food log in Lose It definitely helps me stay honest!  And the results are what count - at age 75 I have lost over 20 pounds - darn near miraculous!  About a pound a month with no extreme measures - just the log, my food scale and weighing EVERY DAY!

title: Um...wow
body: I tried this out to lose weight to fight my diabetes. Picked a reasonable goal of 10 lbs in 7 months. Stayed pretty close to calorie allowance, even going over once. Lost 8+ pounds in a week, way more than planned. I must have been really over eating, so this app is fantastic if for no other reason than to stop you from being stupid.

title: Highly recommend
body: I didn't have a lot of weight to lose (15 stubborn pounds), but tracking my calories on a consistent, daily basis really helped me be aware of what I am eating and exactly how those calories equate to promoting or hindering my weight loss.  This isn't a magic formula - like anything that is lasting, you have to work at it.  This app is just a great daily reminder of what you are doing to help yourself achieve your weight loss goals.

title: Awesome!
body: Still love this app!  I do wish it calculated net carbs though. Logging my food intake is one of the best ways to keep on track.

title: Your App keeps freezing on my iPhone X
body: I am using iOS 11.3.1 and my app (only the Lose it App keeps freezing and the only way to enter data is to hard boot the phone. Then it allows maybe two entries before freezing again.

title: Elegant and Excellent
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since it first came out more than 10 years ago and give it the highest recommendation. The developers have refined and perfected every aspect of the user interface to make it simple and intuitive. When I am faithful in recording my daily food and exercise, the app is faithful in keeping me on track and helping me lose and maintain my weight. I‚Äôd give it 10 stars if I could.

title: Loyal 4 life
body: I love this app. I appreciate its layout, versatility & ease of use. Whenever I have to email about an issue, I always get a super fast reply! Also I got a lifetime subscription for a discount. All I had to do was ask!

title: It works!
body: This app helped me lose 35 lbs in about 3 months! It gave me the tools to continue eating healthy just by making the right food and portion choices, and my main source of exercise was just walking! For years, I didn't realize how important it was to count calories until I started using this app! It's so easy to use, too! I would recommend this app to anyone who is serious about losing weight!

title: What a big improvement!
body: I used Lose It! years ago but ended up going with MyFitnessPal because it was slicker and the database was better. MFP‚Äôs quality has really suffered recently though. When I heard they were selling out I understood why. At that I decided to give Lose It! another try. Wow! What a huge improvement. The interface, the database, and the premium features are excellent. You guys set the standard now.

title: Ads fun and structure to weight & health
body: Pretty easy to use. More healthy suggestions or information would be a plus. (Has some, which is good) a few less ads would be appreciated.( or be able to hide them for the day) All in all, a good introduction to the app and start to better health and weight loss. I am loosing about 2+ lbs per week, and feel good that I am organized in my approach to all of this. Give it a try!

title: Great Calorie Tracking App
body: I love this app for tracking my calories! The constant pop ups and persistent ‚Äúupgrade to premium to see x‚Äù sections that clutter the UI are why I have only given 4 stars. I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 2 months and would like to stop seeing these things!

title: Love lose it!
body: I love lose it! I have lost a total of 20 lbs since I started tracking my food intake. You forget about certain snacks you eat. This places everything you eat in front of you and forces you to acknowledge your caloric intake. It‚Äôs so simple and has every type of food you can imagine in the search bar! Thanks lose it! 5-10 more lbs to go for my goal weight! I‚Äôm going to make it with your help!!!

title: Logging food so easy, painless, actually FUN
body: I was experiencing a stall for 2 months with my weight loss. Resisted logging because seemed so tedious but now desperate.

title: It works well
body: Keeping track of your calories is easy! The app is very helpful. I recommend it to everyone! For the first time in my life I‚Äôm actually managing my calorie intake in an easy way! I am so thankful!

title: Essential Tool
body: The Loose it App is without a doubt an essential tool that allows you to record the foods you eat. Calories information is easy to access, including most restaurant and supermarket foods. I myself had to reduce my daily caloric intake because I am unable to Lead an active life, however with weight loss my ankles and knees are less stressed and walking up stairs as well as walking in general has become easier.

title: Benefits
body: By typing in what you eat daily, eventually it changes you and how much you eat. It educates you. I‚Äôve set a very low bar of losing only 1/2 pound a week, and gradually I‚Äôm reaching my goal. It‚Äôs effortless and the app keeps me aware of what I‚Äôm eating.

title: Managing my Type 2 diabetes
body: Lose it is not only helping me be conscious about my food intake, it‚Äôs also helping me manage my Type 2 diabetes. The app is able to calculate carbs and proteins. This feature helps me to balance my blood sugar. I feel great AND I‚Äôm losing weight! Win-win!

title: Great app for portion control & weight loss
body: Logging is a breeze, especially as you get more of your own foods populated. I got the premium version to be able to use my own recipes. It helps to have a kitchen scale for accuracy, because accuracy = effective weight loss. Using this app, I‚Äôve learned portion control, which allowed me to eat what I want and still lose 50+ lbs. I‚Äôm looking forward to using to learn weight maintenance.

title: Knowledge = Control
body: I‚Äôve bought the premium app 2 weeks ago.  I am definitely considering the ‚ÄúLIFETIME UPGRADE‚Äù. This is so easy and informative.  I can find anything that I‚Äôve put in my mouth within this app.  It‚Äôs motivating for daily up keep and over all progress.  Love, love , love how it shows me what time frame I can expect to reach my goal weight.  I understand that I‚Äôm going to be successful and it‚Äôs not going happen over night.

title: I wish...
body: I love this app, and pay for premium. However I really wish it would tell me ‚Äúif everyday was like today you‚Äôll weigh x amount in 5 weeks‚Äù like MyFitnessPal. That really motivates me.

title: Love it!
body: This is great if you need to track what you eat to help you drop some pounds. My one suggestion is for the actual social board. Could you allow members to tag one another in the comments of threads or have a reply option under their comment? People ask for advice, tips and opinions and it‚Äôs difficult when someone will not be notified if you address them within an existing thread.

title: Nice tracking app
body: Previously used MyFitnessPal which was good until they updated to make it full of ads and premium upgrades that became super annoying! LoseIt is a great alternative, I should have switch much sooner. They also have a premium option but it is not as intrusive. Overall, I like the functionality and am seeing results! 15lbs in 10 weeks, with diet and exercise. 30 more to go!

title: Lose it great rate
body: This app is fantastic it's helped me so much in reaching my fitness goals. It is also helping me get to the weight rate I want to be in. If anyone needs help tracking what they eat so you can make sure your eating healthy, to see how many calories you burn from exercise and to help you be consistent to the point where you can do it on your own. To keep your body in shape I would recommend this app. It's great.!!!!!üòÄ

title: Baby wait
body: I have a hard time focusing on goals and this app outlines them and makes it fun to motivate myself I srsly love this app. I promise this isn‚Äôt a fake review trust me I look for them all the time. So understand how hard it is to trust this things. Their is very few things I can say I don‚Äôt like about this most has to do with operator error try it I even got the premium it‚Äôs worth it and it‚Äôs only 30 bucks for a whole year

title: Great app, very little training
body: For a FREE app, it is great.  It has a pretty good food database and it has allowed me to refocus on my goals.  There are some minor issues which I don't mind which is the portion sizes, sometimes onces could be more useful than cups, but if you remember that a cup=8oz everything kind of falls into place.  Upgrade for the premium version, worth the money. Overall, a great tool for losing weight and focusing on what you need to do.

title: Love this app!
body: LoseIt! makes it so easy to track your calories, and it‚Äôs inspirational too. Everyday after you log it gives you a date of when you are projected to meet your goal based on how well you did that day, very motivating! And the interface is so easy to use, I love the little food symbols, it‚Äôs a nice touch. I‚Äôve lost close to 15 pounds in my first two months! I‚Äôve been telling everyone about this app!

title: First impressions
body: I am just coming to Lose It from my fitness pal. I didn‚Äôt like the interface there and I knew there had to be a better way to track food.  I love how Lose it groups my foods automatically.  For example, I logged parts of my sandwich.  It grouped them into one all on its own, so now I just have to click on the meal to add.  There‚Äôs lots of free features here that MFP didn‚Äôt have even on premium.  I love it so far!

title: Not a paying member....yet
body: I enjoyed this they have because it allows me to keep track of how much I‚Äôm eating and my calories I‚Äôm taking in. That‚Äôs the upside and it‚Äôs very easy for me.

title: Super user friendly app
body: One of my favorite parts of lose it app is how you can scan each item since that will give you the most accurate calories (almost every food had a barcode even sometime produce). The charts and weekly totals are also super helpful. Having your friends on there also keeps everyone cheering for each other and accountable.

title: Great app for weight loss
body: This will be the third time using this app (over a 6 year span) to lose weight. I don‚Äôt need to lose but 5 lbs...although I feel that I don‚Äôt eat very much clearly I‚Äôm eating more than I think I am and logging my food certainly helps me get things back on track.   It just makes you more aware of what you‚Äôre eating and helps you make better choices along the way. Thanks Lose It!

title: Best calorie tracker ever
body: You don‚Äôt realize how many calories you consume in a day till you start to keep track of them . Lose It app makes this tracking so easy and keeps you honest with yourself. If you lower your calorie intake you will lose weight, so I stupid diets just eat less of the foods you love. But, soon you will find that you will learn to eat  the foods with less calories that will fill you up.

title: Well designed, easy to use.
body: Lose It! Is the best weight loss app I‚Äôve used yet. Everything is very nicely designed and easy to use. Listing foods you eat is quick and simple, and it‚Äôs represented visually by icons next to each food item. The nagging isn‚Äôt annoying, it only pops up to keep you on track. It semi-frequently offers up premium, but you don‚Äôt need to pay in order to enjoy this app.

title: Integration with Runkeeper isn‚Äôt smooth
body: You can integrate run keeper but the app isn‚Äôt clear on how to make sure your exercise doesn‚Äôt get counted twice if you are also using the Apple health app. I want to use the health app so I am getting credit for calories burned while doing my daily walking around etc but when I turn on run keeper to log my run I have to manually click on the run keeper caloric log to tell it not to count it. And I don‚Äôt understand why there are two Runkeeper logs after my run with different calorie counts?
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Couldn't of done it without Lose It
body: I have been using Lose It for 9 months and I've lost 40+ pounds. If you diligently record your food and weight every day you can do it. I will continue using it to help me maintain my weight loss. I kept my calorie count to 1,000 per day. I'm 65 year old female, 5'4". My starting weight was 188! I'm now at 146. I would like to lose about 6 more pounds. Scratch that...I will lose about 6 more pounds!

title: Good App
body: I like the App because it tracks my steps with my phone and automatically logs it and then it gives me credit towards my food I‚Äôm tracking for the day. Downside, when I look up food from restaurants, it doesn‚Äôt have all the food in its app. I then have to search separately for the sandwich or drink I had.

title: Great app but ads to get premium are annoying
body: I got this app originally years ago when I wanted to lose weight then deleted it but recently needed to track my food cuz I was having GI issues and it‚Äôs amazing.  In terms of tracking what I‚Äôm eating, in what portions, and what day, it‚Äôs phenomenal.  I don‚Äôt have the premium version tho and the pop ups every time I open the app are annoying.  I get they‚Äôre trying to get money from me, but maybe make it less annoying?  Idk shrug

title: Taught me how to eat mindfully
body: I downloaded this app two months ago. My eating habits were out of control, I needed help. At this point I have lost 18lbs, and that includes some plateau time. After about six weeks I got tired of the meticulous tracking so I didn‚Äôt use the app anymore. I am still on track, though - I learned how to eat sensibly! I learned my habits and broke the unhelpful ones. This app was a huge help in figuring out diet!

title: Love
body: i love this app so much. It makes tracking your calories/carbs so easy. I also love that it will identify positive and negative trends, to help keep you on track. I love the social side, too! ill go on and read people‚Äôs posts because it motivates me, i can cheer people on, and we can have conversations on what‚Äôs working well with others. i do wish i could get push notifications when i leave comments and get responses.

title: Looks interesting, doesn't support weight gain goals
body: I should've expected this, but my friend told me that despite its name the app supports weight gain goals.

title: BAD UX UPDATE!!! Very disappointed
body: They moved "me" (where I could access my foods and recipes to add to my log and help me manage my macros) to the top nav and buried all the foods and recipes UX under a bunch of social badges and other crap we don't care about as users. Going to have to ask for a refund of premium so I can purchase an app that cares more about utility and users than social sharing. SO DISAPPOINTED - this is extremely selfish and not user friendly. BAD UX UPDATE!!!

title: Barcode scanning is absolutely useless
body: Apple will not refund my money for Premium so I am requesting one from you directly.

title: Great app but wish they would add two things
body: First, I wish I could take a picture when I log my weight to track progress that way too.

title: Wanted to try it.
body: I am used to MFP but was looking for a change. I downloaded Lose It and wanted to see what it was like. Without realizing I purchased premium for a full year when I didn‚Äôt intend too, a monthly option was all I was looking for. I decided it wasn‚Äôt exactly what I was looking for and deleted and canceled my subscription. This is when I discovered I had purchased a year. They will not give a refund because I purchased through Apple, Apple will not give a refund because lose it doesn‚Äôt give refunds. Lesson learned. I will never purchase an app before trying on a free trial basis. I‚Äôm sure this app is amazing for some, it‚Äôs just not for me.

title: This changed my life
body: Okay. Hands down, this is the best weight loss app I've ever used. I'm 8 months postpartum and 47 days ago I weighed 121 pounds. I'm 4'11 and 20 years old. So self conscious with my body. Today. After 47 days of tracking what I put in my body. I'm 110.4 pounds and honestly couldn't be happier. I've recommended this app to every single person I know. So much love for this app. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. If you want to lose weight, maintain weight, or gain weight.

title: Live It
body: It should be called ‚ÄúLive It‚Äù!  It‚Äôs not just a tool for losing weight, it‚Äôs a health tool too.  I have used this App for many years!  I can look back at my highs & lows & get encouragement along the way.  I keep track of my macros & know my Nutrician health & fitness health by connecting to my Fitbit.  Knowing my percentage of Fat, Carbs & Protein, I can confidently talk to a doctor & tell them what I‚Äôm eating to help with health issues.

title: Keeping my calorie count and weight under control.
body: This App. is very good üëçüèº üëçüèºit keeps me from trying not to go over my calorie counts.  I mean I have gone over a few times but, most of the time I try to keep calories below the red line area in the green.  I‚Äôm losing weight and trying to reach that goal weight lose and I‚Äôm close but, not there yet.  Thank you for this App. and keep it just the way it is glitch free.üôÇ

title: Saved my life
body: This app has saved my life. I have tried everything under the sun, and every diet. This app make you NOT be on a diet. You put in some information and it will help you by telling you everything you need to know. You do have to work by putting information in to track everything you eat, but that‚Äôs what I needed. PLEASE try this if you have had a hard time losing weight.

title: Made so bad
body: I used this for quite a while on my iPad before interrupted for work relocation.  Now it says my iPad can no longer use it;  downloaded for my iPhone, and it wants a new account that requires answering way too many personal & unrelated questions;  once finally getting it open, the new interface is all but worthless (including more than 50% of the display interrupted by promoting purchases of upgrades or other apps/services).

title: Best Weight Loss App!!!
body: This is by far the best weight loss app I have ever used. This app is way better than My Fitness Pal because it is more detailed and allows me to input food items in grams. I have lost over 60 lbs using this app. Thank you Lose It for creating such an amazing free app that has helped me with my weight loss journey. I would highly recommend this app to anyone who is planning on counting calories to lose weight.

title: Been using for years
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years and I stay with it. I have the premium account, and it‚Äôs worth the few dollars a month.

title: A must tool from monitoring your caloric intake
body: This is the best app that I have found for easily and sustainably tracking what you are eating to ensure that you stay on pace each week to lose weight. It features a great user interface.

title: The best app for tracking
