body: I love the reminders each day and the food lookup is outstanding. I can almost always find the food that I‚Äôm trying to log. This makes dieting so much easier because one can see exactly what‚Äôs left after each meal.

title: Try Lose It - You‚Äôll Love It !
body: This app is awesome. This is the first time that I know that I will lose weight. This app does all the calories, sodium , carbs and other calculations needed to help you achieve your weight loss goals. The app also motivates you by awarding you with special badges for your accomplishments. So you‚Äôre excited to see the next goal you will reach and the awesome badge you are awarded. I definitely recommend Lose It!

title: Please Developers I Really need help!!!!
body: I signed in on my friends phone to log my lunch and it asks you to enter your birthday height and weight and I just entered random stuff cause I thought I could sign in later. (I know see where the sign in now button was) but it reset my entire weight loss journey and I feel ultimately defeated I hope there is a way you could reset my stuff to before it would be really nice I am devastated.

title: Question
body: So I love the app, it has a surprising amount of food items on there from stores so it makes it really accurate to track calories and other nutrients such as fat, protein, carbs, sodium, fiber, etc.. but I just have one question. What is the purpose of excluding the calories burned in a workout from the total?? It seems to be the default setting but I don‚Äôt know if it actually SHOULD be added or not. Plz help!!

title: Like it
body: I like the app. It helps keep me on track. The one reason I‚Äôm giving it 4 stars is it‚Äôs hard to find the right food sometimes. Certain things aren‚Äôt listed from restaurants and for example one chicken you can choose from ounces the other in cups. There is no centralized unit of measurement. Yes I know things are measured differently but all chicken should be the same for measurements. So I‚Äôm not sure if I‚Äôm picking the right thing sometimes when I‚Äôm eating. Other then that it‚Äôs great.

title: Used to be great
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for about 4 years now, and it has helped me make great strides in my fitness journey. When the app first started, the premium feature was far from mandatory. You could access almost all information without having to upgrade. Now, I can‚Äôt even see how many grams of carbs/protein/fat I‚Äôve consumed in a day or set goals other than weight (aka consume this amount of protein or achieve a BMI of ____). A little disappointed in the direction they‚Äôve taken the app... seems a little money hungry.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Teaches you
body: I've lost 60lbs in 140 days just using the free version of this app. It really helps visualize what and how much your eating. It's easy to input foods and recipes. It teaches you about how much you should be eating and how hungry you should feel all the time. Provides a great baseline for any conscious eating plan. Highly recommend. I'll keep using it even at my target weight just as maintenance, and probably because it's addicting...

title: Helps me make good decisions
body: I have done so much to help myself to lose weight and keep it off, and this app was the perfect partner. This app was is the perfect tool to help achieve my lifestyle changes. The one thing that sets the app apart from the others is the reports can be email to you or some you are being accountable with. Great feature.  The notes feature allows me to journal my days. Perfect for all my needs.

title: This USED to be a good app
body: Ok first things first - I did loose 53 pounds with this app. But then I stopped using it and went off my diet. That was two years ago.
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you. Best, Asha

title: Amazing App!
body: Lose It is a FABULOUS app to help you to get on track and to recognize just how much you‚Äôre actually eating. I use the free version and I‚Äôm very happy with it.  Additionally it is appropriate for everyone...whether you want to lose 5lbs, 50lbs or you simply want to maintain your weight. I‚Äôve got my entire staff turned on to it now and several of my clients have even told me that their Registered Dieticians have recommended it. LOVE IT!  Great app!

title: Helped me lost 38 lbs in 7 months
body: Updated: recently the weight recording has bug: it changes what i typed and stored wrong number.
response: So sorry for the trouble here! Please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can look into this.

title: Great App! Time stamp please!
body: I use this app everyday and because I‚Äôm honest about my food entries I have data to show why I did well one week or poorly another. It also makes it easier to spot trends. The only thing I would like to see added to this app is a time stamp of when you logged a meal that way I don‚Äôt have to constantly keep track and remember how long before my next meal. It would definitely help on the weekends when my days aren‚Äôt as structured.

title: Undue Change
body: While being able to change the mealtime for an individual food item is a very useful addition, please bring back the ability to copy an entire meal to another mealtime as well. Currently you can only copy an entire meal to the same mealtime, on the current day. It‚Äôs common to eat the same meal multiple times a day or week at different mealtimes when following a strict diet.

title: Terrific app
body: This app has every food, incl supplements like vital reds or even Metamucil,  you may be using in your diet.  It allows you to make notes if you are trying, for instance ‚Äúintermittent fasting‚Äù as I am.  I‚Äôm recording every calorie I‚Äôm putting in my body as well as water and I have set my goals.  Ive been using this app 6 days and I‚Äôve lost 4 lbs.  Its not just water weight since even losing this small amt is showing.  Use it and LOSE IT!

title: Easiest weight loss app ever!
body: I lost 33 pounds in 11 weeks. I was never hungry. As a retired math teacher, the numbers-based app was simple for me to understand. If the number of calories consumed during the day stayed lower than the number of calories in the daily budget....the pounds melted off. I increased my exercise and protein intake which helped even more. The ONLY successful weight loss program I‚Äôve tried. Met my goal in 2 months, 24 days!

title: My most used application
body: This application opened my eyes to what and how much I was eating.  Keeping track of my caloric intake is helping me achieve my goal. So far I've lost 15 pounds in 2 months. This program will help guide you to that promise land. It will not make you lose weight but it will give you he information to get there. I log everything I eat and it's awesome how much calories I didn't use in a day.

title: Lose It
body: I love this app. I‚Äôve done a lot of weight loss apps over the years, but this one actually works!  If you stick with it and log your food daily, it keeps you on track. The trick is, log every bite and it will no longer be a mystery why you haven‚Äôt lost weight in the past. I found out I was eating a lot more than I thought I was. I updated to the Premium so I‚Äôd have a further motivation ($$$).

title: Love it!!!
body: This app has really helped me stay on track. I've lost significant weight all ready. It makes counting calories so much easier.

title: Great App and even better customer service!
body: I‚Äôve lost 36 pounds with the help of this app! One of the most helpful features is it‚Äôs detailed nutrient tracker‚Äîgreat for keeping track of carbs (total and net!).  Also want to mention the great customer service I received. Had a bit of a technical glitch with my subscription renewal but with the excellent service representatives and the prompt response, everything was handled quickly.

title: Set Your Own Calorie Goal
body: I‚Äôm annoyed. I couldn‚Äôt figure out why my weight loss was going soooooo slowly. Then I realized, when my weight fluctuates upward a little bit daily due to water and carb take, the app keeps adjusting my calories upwards instead of keeping a steady rate until I drop back down.  It has an ‚Äúadaptive‚Äù setting that is supposed to respond to your weight changes week to week, but that feature was even worse at overestimating my calories, and I wasn‚Äôt using it.  This is a bad feature of the app.
response: Sorry for the confusion here! Please reach out to us at¬†reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you with this!

title: Has It All
body: I have done a LOT in my search to loose the weight I need.  This app has what I need and I have been the most successful through it.  It has the social, the goals, the tracking, complete food library and ease of measurement in different ways (ounces, cups, item etc) stickers when you have accomplished a goal, and even notices connections to certain food you eat/days you are successful

title: Mary Ann Raftery‚Äôs Weight Loss on Loose It!
body: I honestly can say this works!  I NEVER had a weight loss ANYTHING that worked.  This works because it trains you to eat properly.  I am doing my calorie counting.  Even if you eat something high in calories, you can make it up.  We are only human.  The great thing about the program, everything is on the food chart.  Just plug it in, and you always know!  Hey, I even treat  myself to Dairy Queen once a week!

title: Love the Lose It App!!
body: This app is great! And a very good deal at a price of $20 for the year for  premium with no ads.  Love the interface. It is much more colorful and interactive than MyFitnessPal, which, by the way, is $80 for the year for premium.  I would highly recommend this app for anybody who wants to track calories and exercise and reach their weight loss goals. To the developers-keep up the good work with this app   I love it!

title: Need option to disable calorie bonus
body: Love the app. Functions well. The only thing I wish could/would be added is the ability to disable calorie bonus (calories awarded for exercise, etc). I‚Äôm sure I could simply disable Runkeeper and Apple Watch, but I like being able to see everything.

title: You get out of it what you put into it
body: This is my second time using this app to shed extra weight. I successfully lost about 60lbs a few years ago with the support of this app and life style changes. Now I‚Äôm back at it and about 40lbs down. I also see a dietician and this app is a great way to show her my food diary so that we can find ways to enhance my patterns so they become more beneficial to my goal.

title: Pretty good
body: Pretty good. I‚Äôve been using for years. I‚Äôm not sure the premium upgrade was worth it for me, but I could see how some people could benefit. There wasn‚Äôt much more personalization options.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot! Best, Dia

title: Works for me!!
body: I am a 60 year old male who has been battling being overweight my whole life. Lose It has been a lifesaver for me. I have been using it faithfully for 476 days and have lost 28 lbs.. and still going. The app helps me plan my meals and intake all day long. So I have learned to eat smarter but still enjoy the foods I like. So it is not like I am on a diet. I want to loose another 50 lbs. and with the loose it app I am sure I can achieve it.

title: Worked for me multiple times
body: I‚Äôve used this for several years on and off. The first time I was at an unhealthy weight and set a goal to get in shape and reach a BMI less than 25. I met my goal by keeping myself accountable to not overeat using this app. When I‚Äôve had some big life changes (injury, newborn kid) that led to some weight gain I have been able to come back to this app to help get me back into shape. -32 yo guy in best shape of my life.

title: It‚Äôs good for the right people...
body: This app is good if you‚Äôre trying to lose weight and stay healthy. But this app also helped me further my eating disorder. It let me bring down the calorie maximum to a low number and it didn‚Äôt stop me from making my weight goal underweight for my age, height, and gender. Which is totally my fault but just use this app cautiously because it has no limits for what you can put into it.

title: This really works!
body: Love this app as it. just. works. You have to be diligent about entering things in real time. Only drawback is that I used this a few years ago & in the basic app they used to include the nutrients breakdown for every meal. In the present app, they made that only available if you upgrade to premium. Daily nutrient breakdowns are available on the basic app, but not shown by meal. I miss that! My hubby & I are losing weight together with the help of this app & daily exercise!

title: Easy to lose weight!
body: My husband and I are both on this plan and it‚Äôs been so eye opening and motivating to really get clear with how many calories we were eating. I reached my goal in a week, I only had two lbs to lose, my husband has a bunch to lose and he‚Äôs already down 3lbs in a week. Note: we are exercising a ton in addition to following the plan so our outcome might be more than the average.

title: Almased
body: Best weight loss program ever. My friends are asking how I lost so much weght.  I lost 50lbs in 6months. The first 3 days were aweful after that  it was plain sailing and I didn‚Äôt feel hungry in between snacks and meals. I drank 80 oz water now drinking 60oz.  Tried uploading photos to the Almased website and wrote a review but the app didn‚Äôt work and couldn‚Äôt upload photos so I‚Äôm writing the review here.  I guess Almased didn‚Äôt want me to win a coupon.

title: It‚Äôs working!
body: I have been quite happy with this app!  After trying to lose weight on and off for a year I decided to download this app and viola!  I‚Äôve lost 7+ lbs in less than a month (my goal is 12).  The data base is fantastic.  I love the scan feature.

title: Losing it with Lose It
body: Just started using Lose It a week ago. I have been religiously logged in my meals and snacks. I only wish to lose 5 lbs. and I‚Äôm down 2lbs... amazing!!!! I also exercise everyday and it syncs with my Apple Watch and logs in all my calories burned. I am so impressed that I think I‚Äôm going to upgrade! If it keeps my weight down for a whole year, $29/Year is well spent! I am telling all my friends about this App!!!!!

title: Great weight loss app!
body: Lose It is an easy to use way of counting calories and journaling your food intake to help lose weight. This app computes how many calories you need daily to get to your desired weight over the period of time you choose while making recommendations on how to use your calories per meal, making adjustments for exercise. It also adjusts your plan as you lose weight. Excellent app!!!

title: Wow! Really.
body: I‚Äôve tried other apps for food tracking, but never used them to their full potential. I‚Äôm 6 days in & have lost 2 pounds since downloading the app, plus 6 pounds lost in the three days before that. Today I realized that I have access to workouts. They‚Äôre not extensive workouts. We‚Äôre talking 10 minute boot amp routines. You get a good tracker & personal trainer in one app. For the price I think it‚Äôs amazing!

title: Food Journal
body: I love that this app allows me to be accountable for what I eat. As a busy mom I am constantly rushing to do errands so I‚Äôm constantly grabbing things to eat and go. This has allowed me to see what I absentmindedly eat throughout the day.  Placing the breaks and focus on healthy habits so thank you.  I use the free option (Mama on strict budgetü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è) and it been great.

title: Good diet tracker but calorie measurements of some foods are grossly inaccurate
body: I‚Äôve been using this app‚Äôs free version for two years now. It‚Äôs very limited as an exercise tracker but good for counting calories and recording meals. My one gripe is that many of the foods listed on its database have wildly incorrect calorie and nutritional information. I hope the Lose It staff goes through the lists and deletes the inaccurate entries soon: I‚Äôm prediabetic so I need to have accurate carb and sugar counts for my diet. Literally, my health depends on it.

title: Love this app years ago more than I love it now!
body: I use it for food tracking and weight graph... that‚Äôs all.    It‚Äôs frustrating to have to ‚Äúx‚Äù out unwanted pop up pages.  It‚Äôs also frustrating that I can‚Äôt start a new plan like I used to.   It‚Äôs very frustrating to constantly be solicited for upgrade to premium.   I‚Äôve declined it numerous times and shouldn‚Äôt have to keep being pestered with that sales pressure.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

title: ‚ô•Ô∏è
body: I‚Äôve been using this app on and off for about ten years  I highly recommend it to everyone I know that is trying to lose weight. It‚Äôs so easy to use. I don‚Äôt count my fruits and vegetables but I also don‚Äôt count my workouts. So far so good I‚Äôve lost 17 lbs. I don‚Äôt need people clapping for me either üòâ. Once I reach my goal I am going to set my calorie limit to maintain, and continue using this app. Lose It is a Godsend for me.

title: Like a mirror
body: This app is so great. Every time I get off track with body composition I use this as a tool to see what I'm doing wrong by recording daily. Then, I plug in to the goal section where I want to be and simply follow the plan I set for myself and I get right back on track.

title: Finally an easy to use app that really helps
body: I‚Äôve been trying to lose weight for years, and the pounds keep creeping on.  It was hard to keep track of calories and so easy to lie to myself.  This app is makes it very easy to find and record calories and then to make good decisions about what to eat.  And I see real caloric results when I add in exercise, which makes me more motivated to go to the gym.

title: Best healthy living app
body: I love this App! It links to my phone or watch or Fitbit. It gives me awards and there is a community to get advice or chat with! Best of all I love how you can make your own recipes and save them for future meals with calories and nutrients entered etc. just the free version is great I‚Äôve had it for years and when I‚Äôm able to get the premium I‚Äôd like to since it compares itself to weight watcher (300/yr versus 29/yr)! Great App overall!

title: Too many features are paid features
body: I love that this app adjusts calorie intake automatically for weight loss and it‚Äôs easy to use. I‚Äôve never found a food that‚Äôs not in the menu. The thing it lacks is that it locks most of the feautures for the paid premium mode, when most other well-known apps offer these for free with the free app itself. Also, you have to pay an annual membership. If it was a small monthly payment I would probably pay it but I have a hard time doing the annual chunk up front.

title: Good helped
body: Obviously losing weight is on you as a person, but this app is an immense help with tracking and staying on track. You decide what you eat, but this helps you know how much you should be eating. It may not work the same for different metabolisms and remember it takes time to lose weight. But it did exactly what i wanted it to do. (I do not have the premium. I just have the free version)

title: Honest Weight Loss
body: This App is truly amazing. They have made it so easy to track every aspect of your life. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks are very easy to track. The thing I like about it the most is that it keeps me honest. Whether I ate something healthy or not, at least I know how I‚Äôm performing. The more consistent you are with your tracking the better off you are. Very happy to have seen this app and use it to my advantage.

title: Great!
body: I‚Äôve been using this for about six months now and it couldn‚Äôt be easier or more fun. There are tons of resources built-in, but even if you just want to track what you eat it‚Äôs so simple. I downloaded this a while ago, but never really got around to using it until recently‚Äî and it has helped tremendously. Definitely worth it if you‚Äôre looking to change your health/lifestyle.

title: Extremely Helpful
body: I was introduced to this App while on a weight management program at Princeton Medical Center in Princeton. Not only does it add the needed discipline in recording your food everyday but it adds nutritional facts to help you understand what you are eating.  The most important thing is that it works. I‚Äôm losing weight at a reasonable pace and learning to make changes in my eating habits which will allow me to maintain the weight loss.

title: Great Program
body: I have been using this app for quite some time and have actually lost 40 pounds and keeping it off... Still need to lose about 40 more... Every other weight program was either too expensive or didn‚Äôt work and I ended up quitting them... I plan to stay on ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù until I lose it all... My opinion... Best weight loss and health tracking program out there!

title: Great!
body: Out of all of the weight loss and calorie counting apps I‚Äôve tried, this one is my absolute favorite. I love that it estimates how many calories each meal should be and your calorie budget is realistic as long as you choose to lose your weight at a healthy pace. The food database is absolutely amazing and more extensive than any other weight loss app I‚Äôve seen. I can see myself using this for a long time.

title: Logging
body: I am so pleased with this app.  I have lost a lot of weight knowing I'm eating better with this app!  It forces me to realize I have to eat better to loss weight!  No fad diets just honest eating and exercise you will reach your goals!  This is better than weight watchers because it's free!  I choose to pay for my program because for me it's added bonus.  I love "Lose It!"  I tell everyone that will listen!  Thank you

title: Great
body: I really like this app, even though I only use the free version. Very good for keeping track of what and how much I‚Äôm eating and it really helps me stay aware of what‚Äôs going into my body. I love the feature that lets you create custom recipes and calculates the nutritional information based on the ingredients and number of servings it makes. The integration with the Apple Health app is nice too. Overall, I‚Äôm very pleased with the app so far

title: Worked for me
body: I lost 50 pounds in six months with this app. I made sure to be accurate in my logging and did some basic exercise. That‚Äôs it. No special diet or anything.  During those six months I was still able to eat any food I wanted including dessert most nights as long as I stayed in my limits. I was so impressed with the results I‚Äôm still using the app to maintain my weight. Highly recommend.
response: Apologies for the trouble here! Our engineers are aware of this issue and working on a fix. It'll be out in an upcoming release.

title: Best tracking app!
body: I have used numerous tracking apps.; you name it, I‚Äôve used it. This one is by far the best! Love the simplicity and user friendly features. It encompasses everything I want to keep track off and provides motivational features. Of all the apps I‚Äôve used, this one ‚òùÔ∏è is the first one to provide clarity on my patterns and I have reach goals set for the week! I‚Äôm well on my way to ‚ÄúLOSE IT‚Äù daily!

title: A lot to like!
body: Like most apps it'll badger you to upgrade, subscribe, and sell your first born child to them. Outside of that there's a lot here that they offer without paying a dime. It's a fairly simple to use app with some interesting ways to import and view data from other connected apps all in one place. You can get complicated with this one or keep it simple. All in all I'm pretty impressed.

title: Effective tracking & feedback
body: Easy to use. Fast to track. Quick insights.

title: Works!
body: Love this app. Easy to use....thats huge because easy means I don't have a "it just takes too much time to enter my food" excuse.  I love how simple it is to capture food, through a search, barcode, or even scanning nutritional info!  No typing needed.  Simple to add my food again and again. Thank you, Lose it!  In just 7 weeks, I am down 16 lbs. And am making an important ifestyle change.

title: Amazing!
body: So I downloaded this app cause I wanna lose some weight. It asked me a lot of questions and things and was a little tricky to keep remembering to put in what I ate cause I would forget. But after only three days of having this app I have lost 2 pounds!!! I know that might not sound like a lot but I had a sort of round tummy but now it‚Äôs flat!! And of course I ate healthy and worked out. Recommend this app a lot!!!

title: Please reverse latest updates!
body: I have been tracking with Lose it for over 3 years and am a lifetime subscriber.  But these latest updates make the app slower, less intuitive and harder to log my food.  In addition and even more troubling is that half of the time then logged data does not get tracked in my goals!  For 7 out of the last 14 days all my goals are showing 0 for daily totals.  The individual food stats are there but they are not showing in any of the trackers.  Please fix!!!

title: Prompt Technical Support
body: A recent update inadvertently released an inconvenient data entry bug.

title: Great app terrible customer service
body: I was somehow subscribed twice to this app. LoseIt said go to Apple. Apple said they don‚Äôt refund annual subscriptions. I got the run around from both vendors. No onus from LoseIt.

title: Macros vs calories
body: I‚Äôve always counted calories and used that to keep my weight in line. However, this app has taught me to control my macro nutrients and use this to better enhance my diet regimen. My wife is now using it and we‚Äôre both seeing results. What‚Äôs even better is I can track my weight, blood pressure, sleep, calories and macros all in one place.

title: Great app
body: I love this app. I have been doing weight watchers for years and someone on the Weight Watchers social app mentioned this app. It is so much better and way less expensive!  Love the way it gives me calories for exercise and automatically syncs with my Apple Watch. My only wish is that the social app worked like the weight watchers app and Facebook where you can add pics and see what others are posting.

title: Awesome!
body: This app has really made me not only loose unwanted weight, but keep track of what I am putting into my body/taking out.  I have already lost 2.7 pounds in one week!  No that isn‚Äôt noticeable, but it is very good progress.  This app also made me workout more and overall become healthier :)  Love it! Def recommended to anyone who wants to loose weight and/or keep track of their calories! Two thumbs up!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love it!
body: I honestly love this app, it is worth the premium membership to get serious about food tracking. I love the goals, patterns and suggestions it gives. I ve been using it for a month and a half and not only have I lost weight and inches but I have been crushing my goals. This is SOOO easy and takes the guesswork work out of CICO.

title: Used to love
body: Although I still really like the app, I wish there was a way to turn off the goal projection. I have hypothyroidism with constant fluctuating levels, which makes weight loss challenging, not impossible, challenging. But I find that I feel like a complete failure because I‚Äôm not meeting the goal when the app is projecting a date that‚Äôs near impossible. While I can usually ignore it, I can‚Äôt always. That date gets pushed further and further and it makes me upset some days when I‚Äôm done logging...
response: Thank you for contacting us! The most effective way of sharing your suggestion is through this survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/LH6KTDC

title: Best weight loss app I've ever used.
body: Lose It is intuitive; it is designed for ease of use. It's also motivational. The longer you use it, the better it understands how you use it and predicts patterns. I adore the recipes feature so that I can figure out nutritional info for my own recipes. I also really appreciate being able to share recipes with my husband who is also using the app for weight loss.

title: Perfect weight loss aide
body: I recently upgraded to lifetime member because my first year with Lose It has been great.  It has helped me lose and maintain my weight and syncs perfectly with my fitness apps.... I love that I can easily adjust my goals depending on what‚Äôs going on in my life .... if I wanna lose 5 for a wedding or vacation I enter details and my timeline and Lose It Tells me how to meet my goal, brilliant.... Keep up the great work Lose It

title: Works well!
body: I bought the premium because I wanted the extra information. I‚Äôve also used MyFitnessPal, but trying to get that to load information from other apps can be a pain, especially if they aren‚Äôt from the same company. I like that this will take your information from Apple health if you allow it the permission. The only thing I am missing is the ability to just add a previous day‚Äôs meal. Keep up the good work!

title: Incessant Nagging to Upgrade!
body: Every time I open the app I am greeted by a massive upgrade screen that gives me the option to upgrade at a discount.  This is beyond irritating, when all I want to do is log in, and enter my food.  This annoyance has to stop.

title: Love it
body: I really love this app.  I‚Äôve been using it for a while now and it‚Äôs been very helpful. It‚Äôs been more helpful since the weight loss program I‚Äôm on actually recommended this app to log food.

title: Great APP for tracking and weight loss
body: I have been using this app for 6 years. I am an alcoholic and just like when I stop going to meetings I relapse. When I don‚Äôt track using this app cause I think I got this. I gain a lot of weight. This helps you use with daily vigilance. It also syncs wonderfully with Fitbit for taking exercise calories off once once you start going over your BMR. I would highly recommended LOSEIT!

title: Eternally grateful!
body: I‚Äôve never been one to pay much attention to what I eat. I eat anything...well I used to eat anything, until my weight started to creep up. This app has helped me track every single thing that I eat and drink, making me more responsible and mindful about what I eat. I find that I enjoy what I eat more because I put considerable thought into it. Long gone is the mindless eating. I‚Äôm grateful for this app.

title: Great tracking app!
body: I have used this app for four years now and it helped me lose 70 pounds in 7 months! Just by being aware of the calories that every piece of food had helped me change my eating habits! It‚Äôs not a diet but it‚Äôs a lifestyle change and I love it! It‚Äôs easy and it‚Äôs also very motivating. I also recommend getting a scale that syncs with the app, it‚Äôs also super motivating seeing the weight fall off.

title: Just started
body: I have only used this a week. For me it seemed easier to find foods than on fitness pal. It could be I was ready to try calorie counting. I like how it suggested calories based on weight, age and intended weight loss goals. It keeps me accountable. I make better choices knowing that I need to record it.

title: Almost ideal
body: This is a great app for tracking food intake. Although I first bought it in 2014 for dieting purposes, since I had major gastric surgery in mid 2018, I use it to track foods that create problems with my GI tract.

title: Perfect!!!
body: This is what I‚Äôve been looking for all along. Connection to Apple Watch makes it simple to track exercise and balances out calories burned vs intake. Has helped me make minor changes to diet that cut out loads of calories. And I don‚Äôt feel deprived because if I have the calories to spare at the end of the day I can have a treat. 1st time I‚Äôve been able to stay motivated and not get discouraged. This app is shear genius!!

title: Unethical privacy policy and data sharing
body: I learned shortly after buying the app last week that Lose It shares sensitive data with Facebook. I feel mislead. I assumed that paying for a subscription, rather than using the free version, would mean the app would be protective of my data. I cancelled and tried to get a refund from Apple, but they say I have to go through the app developer. I‚Äôm just sure if I call Lose It, they‚Äôll tell me to call Apple. Waste of $30 :/
response: We explain more information about how we were sharing user activity data through the Facebook App Events API in this statement: loseit.live/data_privacy

title: Best App
body: I paid 30 dollars to use this app recently beginning a long weight loss journey. The app has a scanner for barcodes, accurate nutritional facts, and is free for people who just like the basic aspects of it. I‚Äôve had this app for a week and am already down a few pounds. Couldn‚Äôt be easier to count calories with this app, so much cheaper than weight watchers online. Definitely worth a try :)

title: Similar to old school weight watchers
body: I love this app! It is similar to what weight watchers used to be when they counted calories. The scan feature makes things easier to track everything. I've lost 22 pounds in just over two months!

title: One app I really use
body: I've tried several other diet/exercise apps, but this is the first that really worked for me. When I get busy it sends a gentle reminder that I need to get moving a little--or a lot. Foods are very easy to track. And it's not judgmental when I go over--even when I'm nearly double what I should have. I lost the 10 pounds I wanted to lose pretty quickly. Great app. Highly recommend

title: Auto renewal cannot be turned off
body: The app is good for tracking calories so I thought I'd give premium a try. I did not use many of the premium features, so decided to opt out of renewal which comes up soon.

title: Great Tool- wish the calorie info was more accurate
body: Overall this is a really great tool. I have used it for nearly 200 days in a  row.

title: Excellent Wellness App
body: This app does more than help you count calories. It's a comprehensive wellness app. It's helped me to understand my eating habits and why I was gaining weight. It's helped me to turn that around and I'm actually losing weight for the first time in years. I also have high blood pressure. It helps me to track that as well as my sodium intake and my macros. Overall this app has been very helpful with my wellness program.

title: Perfect for me
body: This app is perfect for me.  I used to use Argus but am much happier with this.  Very fast to search and add food. Really easy to navigate because it is well organized and uncluttered. The goals are awesome for tracking things like fiber and macro ratios.  All and all, I can‚Äôt think of a single thing I don‚Äôt like about it and it has several features I never thought about before but have proven very insightful.

title: Really works!
body: I have always weighed myself every day but now I log my food every day with Lose it and it has really helped me immensely. I record my daily exercise and really enjoy watching ‚Äúmy day‚Äù which keeps me in check for my calorie intake. I used to go to weight watchers and this is so much better and

title: Track your food consumption.
body: The App has been very helpful to track the total amount of calories for day and to learn the calories for each kind of food I eat daily.  This helps to increase the motivation to reduce food intake below the allowed amount.  It also motivates to sustain the change for the long run.

title: Most effective thing that I‚Äôve found.
body: You simply be honest and put in the weight that you think is proper for your goals and then enter what you consume.

title: Too much incomplete/inaccurate data...
body: Been using this app for nearly three years. It‚Äôs helpful but there are a few issues... 1) nowhere for submitting feedback (hence this review) 2) there‚Äôs too much inaccurate and incomplete food data. It needs to have required fields for macros or just save the ‚Äòcalories only‚Äô entries as ‚Äò‚Äômy foods‚Äù with no public access. N/a n/a n/a n/a n/a is useless but shows up again and again for thousands of entries. 3) Sugar alcohols are counted as net carbs. Who does that? That is so basic I can‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs not been addressed. It literally makes the numbers inaccurate.
response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what you'd like to see do to make the Lose It! experience better!

title: I love it but it could be better
body: There needs to be more options for servings sizes and I wish the recipe builder was better. Sometimes the only option is to select ‚Äú1 serving‚Äù, which is not helpful at all if I don‚Äôt know what the serving size is. I wish there was a section for the whole container so then I could at least fraction it out. I have a similar problem with the recipe builder. It would be so much easier if I could simply copy/paste a the ingredients, manually type them in or upload the recipe

title: Free- scam
body: I‚Äôve been using the free basic version for 3 weeks and it works well. Just as I started accumulating data enough to see trends I got locked out and now need to pay for the app. If your going to offer a free version keep it free or at minimum say up front in the description that there‚Äôs a free xx day trial. I wouldn‚Äôt pay now just because of the deception! Don‚Äôt waste your time unless you want to pay.

title: Losing weight feels great!
body: Been telling coworkers that I like about this app and hiding it from one‚Äôs I don‚Äôt like. I‚Äôve lost 12 lbs in 8 weeks and I‚Äôve only been going to the gym once a week. Super easy to use this app effectively and I‚Äôm no tech star. Doctor was going to put me on meds for high cholesterol March 12th, gave more year to work on it. It‚Äôs May 7, and I have hope now. Who needs an expensive diet program?! Not me

title: In one week
body: Yes in one week I have been more conscience of everything I eat while still enjoying things like soda and candy, just less often. And definitely feel and see results, in one week with watching my intake and walking about 5 miles extra on the week I loss 9 lbs. to be clear I‚Äôm a larger man but determined and going to do this for six months to see the results fully

title: Keeps me on track!
body: I love the Lose It app!  It has kept me from gaining weight for about 3 years!  I use it to track my food and weight and it syncs with my Fitbit app to let me know how many calories I can eat. Before using this app I didn‚Äôt really count calories but had a basic diet plan I followed.  It‚Äôs just a great extra to monitor my progress and what I‚Äôm doing to help in maintaining my weight.

title: Overall good experience, cluttered design though.
body: Decent app, but I‚Äôm regretting having paid for it. The user interface (I think that‚Äôs what it‚Äôs called) is cluttered. Not just that, but there‚Äôs really no options for dietary limits.

title: Lose it is so flexible and easy
body: I paid a fortune for a custom macro tracking program - the app was so restrictive - lose it is so easy and flexible / I have lost 14 pounds since January 1.  I exercise 3xs/ week on my peloton. It was a peloton challenge that introduced me to lose it -  and with this combination I lost 14 pounds that I was not able to get off using a high priced macro based nutrition counseling program - I am convinced it is the simplicity and flexibility !

title: Not the best
body: First of all, I got an email one day with a receipt for $40 for a subscription to premium features that I don‚Äôt even know about. I‚Äôve only used the app to track my food, I have no clue what I‚Äôd get charged for. I also don‚Äôt like how it doesn‚Äôt assist you in setting nutrition goals. Myfitnesspal will tell you daily sodium and cholesterol, etc goals and this app just has you set the goal yourself. I think there should be recommended goals to help someone go off of. I‚Äôm not a nutritionist, I have no idea what number I should try to stay under for each category.

title: Super easy to use!
body: There are so many foods included to help track calories. The barcode scanner is my favorite tool! Picture scan and it finds your food. I‚Äôm amazed at what it can find! The guide for calories per meal is very helpful too. Instead of using up one big pool of available calories per day, it tells me how many to have at each meal including snacks. Love it!! It also connects to my Garmin tracker.

title: UPDATED - below issue fixed in next update and I never needed to log in.
body: Have used this app for years. The pop up every time you open the app is the worse thing ever. Shame on the developers. I even gave in and created an account I didn‚Äôt want and then it won‚Äôt let me log in saying invalid credentials. And the pop up remains. Wish I‚Äôd read the reviews before updating like I typically do. Ugh.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Motivated each day
body: Love this app!!

title: Love the app
body: I am a new to calorie counting and love that it has a look up for different stores and restaurants. The barcode scans is really nice.  It has really help me keep on track.

title: Love it
body: Easy and fun to use. The list of foods is comprehensive and informative. There are many additional features, including recipes. Free version is good. Try it.  If you are like me you will upgrade for the modest cost. I probably sound like an ad; I'm not. There is one great feature I haven't mentioned. A help line. Informative e-mails from real people will help you if you have questions. Happy dieting; you have an ally with Lose It.

title: Renewal issues
body: I auto renewed on 8/15.  Charge hit my account.  I can not access the premium features, have all the ads, etc.  When I check, it says it was renewed and up for renewal again in 2019.  I have sent three messages to the link in help and still have not gotten a reply.  I loved the app until this happened but now they have my money add don‚Äôt seem to want to help.
response: Hi,

title: Great Program! 1 Suggestion
body: This is a great app. It‚Äôs easy to use, and it takes a lot of the stress out of trying to track what you eat and make healthy, realistic goals. The only suggestion I have is to find a way to make it so steps counted from your phone and workouts such as walking or running (which also contribute to steps counted) don‚Äôt overlap and overcompensate or overestimate calorie loss from exercise. Once that is solved, this will be a 5-star app for sure!

title: Easy to use and accurate
body: It‚Äôs laid out well, easy to use and you can do tons on the free version.  The upgrade has even more features such as macronutrient tracking.

title: LoseIt helping me lose it!!
body: This app has helped me see the poor food choices I had been making & to change my eating habits.  My big ‚Äúah-ha‚Äù moment was when I would eat out, the portions would put me way over my daily goal. We now eat in more often, and cook foods from the Premium Recipe guide.  Even my picky kids are enjoying the meals!!  I‚Äôve only lost 8 pounds since Christmas, but I‚Äôm on the downhill path finally.

title: Wish we could share more
body: I like this app and have recommended it to a few people but think there is some improvements.  I don't understand why we are not able share pics.  I mean you allow us to take pic of our food, but what good is that if I can't share and get idea from others.  Also, I find it more inspiring to see before/after pics but that isn't something we can access on this app.  I know I can find people on FB/IG but wouldn't you want us to do everything on this app?

title: Where is the activity setting?
body: This seems like a great app, and I‚Äôve been enjoying using it.  However the calorie budges for the days are much higher than other apps.  Maybe because I didn‚Äôt enter my activity level at the start because I wasn‚Äôt asked.  I certainly can‚Äôt find a place to change it now to test the theory.  So while the form factor of the app is great and easy to us, it‚Äôs one purpose of giving me an accurate calorie budget is lacking because it assumes a level of activity.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Great app for tracking individual food intake, nutritional information, and exercise
body: Provides everything I was looking for to aid in weight loss. Easy to use scanning capabilities with an extensive library of foods makes it easy to use to track food intake.

title: Better than other apps
body: After using many calorie counting apps, this one seems best because it takes less time to record. It offers more jn-depth information - such as trends and graphs. Lose It allows me to design the colors and theme, which makes me happy. It recognizes and gives me positive feedback when I make healthy choices. Lose It does more than other calorie counting apps.

title: Perfect app for an accountant
body: I have lost a good amount of weight using this app. It keeps track of everything you eat along with exercise you do. The database of foods to look up is amazing. The database has calorie counts for restaurants as well as grocery items. You can also scan UPC codes on food packages, and it will automatically add to your meal. The best part is that it is so easy to use! Highly recommend.

title: If I can do it....You can do it!!!ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
body: I stumbled on Lose It by accident!!üòä

title: Great App!
body: I was unsure about this app at first, because I was using the free version. Once I got the paid version I feel that it was well worth the money to be rid of the ads! It has helpful info. and recipes too! Also has a lot of common and uncommonly found food items. As long as it works as good as it is now and continues to be as helpful as it has been-I will definitely pay to renew it!

title: Great for someone in a hurry!
body: Seems I am always running around and very busy, (in fact I forced myself to take a minute to write my review)... I enjoy this useful app because it only takes a second to log what I eat (while I‚Äôm eating to save time, of course!). It definitely keeps me on track. Estimating what I ate obviously didn‚Äôt work. I am happy to finally get my eating habits under control. Very eye opening!

title: Restaurant Nutrition not always correct
body: While I find this handy to use, I have found several discrepancies in macro nutrients such as sodium, calories, etc. I‚Äôm finding these discrepancies mostly when it comes to restaurant food. I can look up the information or get the nutritional values directly from the restaurant itself and what I find in the app is completely different. I have the paid version, and I think that Lose It! is just an average app, but probably still better than some of its competitors.

title: Great app for tracking food intake!
body: Lose It! App is great. It has so many items that no matter what I eat, or what restaurant or store I purchase food at, I enter in search mode, and it‚Äôs there! So much easier than listing what I eat and not knowing the caloric intake of each item. This app helps me keep from snacking and eating things I know I don‚Äôt need. Thanks to this app, I‚Äôve lost 19 pounds and continue to ‚Äúlose it‚Äù every day!

title: amazing
body: I used this app a few years ago and I dropped all the weight I wanted by being able to track what I was eating . I have now re downloaded it again and so far is as great as I remember it to be. I‚Äôm dedicated on loosing this new weight and I love the reminders that it gives me not to give up and to track what I ate. Super simple to track and find the foods that you need to find. I give it a five star!

title: Easy And Addictive
body: I‚Äôve tried other popular trackers and this one is my favorite. I did a side by side comparison of trackers for a week and ended up deleting the others.

title: Easy to Use and Customize!
body: This is a very user friendly program. I love the product scan feature for adding custom foods. The interface makes it easy to add foods and exercise and makes correcting mistakes like adding the wrong food to the wrong meal or in the wrong portion even easier. I‚Äôve found no issues of importance in the past two weeks of use. For the cost, a great bargain.

title: This app really works!!
body: I have been off and on dieting my entire life until my doctor told me about this app. I was facing obesity and cholesterol medicine. Lose It has been life changing; I eat healthier, I am able to balance nutrients, exercise, water intake, etc. which have resulted in a steady weight loss of 1-2 lbs a week. Yes, you have to be diligent about logging EVERYTHING, but it‚Äôs worth it, I have never felt better in my life!

title: Keeps getting better!
body: This app is great! Better than my recording consistency. üòÇ But, it has helped me improve my consistency and it continues to add more features that make being healthy easier. I‚Äôm even losing weight with seemingly little effort. I have shared this app with my son who is a certified physical trainer and he has been impressed with all of the features it includes. I‚Äôd recommend it to anyone.

title: 3 months, 30 lbs
body: I‚Äôve had this app for about 3 years. It always just sat there. A few months ago I decided to make a change and this app is the key to the success I‚Äôve had. It‚Äôs the best app for counting I‚Äôve used and keeps me accountable without constant notifications. I‚Äôm super thankful for this app and the 20$ yearly subscription was worth it to track everything about my diet. I‚Äôve never eaten healthier.

title: Good app
body: I tried WW and my fitness pal . Did not really like either  one. I like this app a lot. I bought an Apple Watch, which I have connected. Very easy.  I love the positive, helpful and fun feel of the app. My favorite part of the app was the ‚Äú Milestone‚Äù pop ups. ‚Äú two pounds lost! You have lost the weight of a pineapple‚Äù  Very motivating! And it was fun to send to my friends ! ( we support each other) But they have removed this feature. So I am rating 4 instead of 5 .

title: Confusing to use with Apple Watch
body: All i want is too input what i ate and have lose it subtract the calories i burned from my Apple Watch from what i ate. I can‚Äôt seem to figure out how to do this. My workout was there but had a line through it and wasn‚Äôt subtracting from the total calories i ate. If i add a workout through lose its feature, it works just fine. I swiped left on the workout hoping i could delete it, then re-add it but now i can‚Äôt add my Apple Watch workout at all.  The calorie burn bonus is extra confusing. Is it saying under calories to go that i still need to burn X number of calories? No idea. Super confusing
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Great App
body: This app is super user friendly and easy to use! My only suggestion is that the developers added a function for people who wished to slowly add weight (weight lifters looking to add muscle slowly). If it had that option, would be the best food tracking app available. I‚Äôve tried others (My Fitness Pal, LifeSum) and this interface, food selection, and ease of use is the best I‚Äôve seen.

title: Manage your health
body: This app has helped me to lose 45 pounds in 6 months. The ability to add metrics to my health routine is a game changer. If a user commits to tracking all food intake one can make intelligent food choices based on nutrition. I use this app everyday and I recommend it to anyone that wants to get fit. If you are wonderful a food tracking app can help you be health this is the on. Down 140 lbs in 18 months...

title: Took away features
body: I've had this app for a couple years and it is indeed very good. But somewhat recently they took away some free features and made them premium. Specifically you used to be able to see the full nutrient breakdown for all logged foods, including fat, sodium, fiber etc. I appreciated knowing which items I ate had the most sodium as I have borderline high blood pressure. Now I'll have to pay to see that. I don't think it's right to take features away that users were used to having.

title: Great app
body: Logging meals makes me aware of how much I'm eating. Easy to use, except it didn't recognize Burger King when I was in the parking lot. Did recognize all the other eating places around me.  The only real problem it had is that it allows anyone - I‚Äôm assuming since it allows me - to add food and nutritional values to the database. I‚Äôve seen the craziest stuff, i.e. a boiled egg for 17 calories.  Makes me a little leery of trusting what‚Äôs there.

title: Perfect!
body: This app makes it so easy to track what I‚Äôm eating. My favorite feature is the barcode scanner, with a quick scan of the package all my calories and macros are in! They have a large database of foods so when I‚Äôm in a restaurant I just type in the name and menu item and they almost always have it already entered. When I cook at home I use the ‚ÄúCreate recipe‚Äù feature. Keep it up guys ‚Äòn‚Äô gals.

title: Newest app
body: Have used for years and suddenly after upgrading yesterday and you‚Äôve messed with the meal placement again! Please stop moving it around! Now you can‚Äôt even see what meal it‚Äôs a part of when you open the food and less you scroll down to the bottom of the page and then to change it it takes a couple of clicks instead of just one. Haidet! It used to be so easy about five upgrades ago!!!!
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This option should return in the next release when editing a food from the Log.

title: Lost 10 lbs the first week!!
body: Just stick with the program!! No need to spend any money on the pro packs even! I‚Äôm 16 and seeing the calories as they stack up at each mean really helps me eat less and exercise more. I really love this app and have been using it on and off for about 3 years now. Would definitely recommend to people looking to monitor their food intake and boost their self confidence!

title: Great app
body: This app is incredibly easy for tracking food. Unfortunately it struggles with community. I bought the Premium membership expecting new and exciting articles to pop up every day- they have been the same for weeks and I am unable to access any challenges or groups. No fun to be missing out what I was hoping for but am enjoying tracking easily.

title: Great overall health aid
body: Handy- as it allows me to track percentage of my daily diet from each of the macro nutrients (carbs/fat/protein), calories burned from exercise, blood pressures, weight, and gives me access to multiple challenges and additional health related information. Takes a little time to learn to navigate, but once you do it is VERY useful. I recommend this for anyone whose serious about their health.

title: Lose It is Awesome
body: I love the Lose It app! I have been using it 8 weeks everyday to track my calories. I have lost 11lbs. I still exercise but having this app track my calories and tell me how many I should be eating to reach my goal is great. Several of my family members and friends have also used the app and are also seeing weight loss. If you follow the app you will lose weight!!!!

title: It helps but they need to add net carb tracking!
body: Excellent tool for staying focused and learning how your body responds to the food you give it! You can learn a lot from tracking your food every day!

title: IT WORKS!!!
body: I have never in my life been able to diet. I‚Äôve always felt so restricted and I have very little self control. This app gives me the guidance and information I need but allows me to choose the food I eat and the exercise I do. It helps me make better food choices (what I‚Äôm eating and how much) and the fact that I can exercise and get calories added to my day is great. I highly recommend it.

title: Beware when purchasing
body: I love the lose it app. However, when trying to upgrade to premium for only a month (to try it out) I ended up buying the whole year without my knowing until I checked my bank account. I was upset because there was no option to confirm the amount you will be billed. I was charged $31 instead of $2 a month As advertised.

title: Great for calories not for nutrients
body: I love using this app to track my meals, it really easy to use and that means that logging everyday is a lot easier for me than it is on other calorie counting apps. It‚Äôs very pretty to look at and I love the small images next to foods that identify what you‚Äôve been eating.

title: Awesome app to aid in weight loss!
body: Handy and fun app to help you drop those unwanted lbs.  Great to track healthy eating habits and keeps a log of your daily macros so you can make sure you are staying in your desired ranges. Also provides motivational achievement badges which are corny but fun!  The community challenges are a great way to connect with others that share the same healthy fitness goals. Highly recommend this app!

title: Logging and tracking
body: This app has helped my husband and myself lose weight.  He has lost 60 pounds and I have lost 50.  Of course with a little bit of exercise and a healthy diet the app enhances your overall lifestyle of healthy habits.  He has the premium and I have the free edition.  Both work well for our lifestyle.  Definitely recommend it for anyone who wants to see what you are eating üí™üá∫üá∏‚úåÔ∏è

title: Good for losing weight
body: I'm using this app to track my food, and am committing to keeping under the calorie suggestion. Over the last two months I've lost 10 lbs.

title: I‚Äôve lost 19lbs so far
body: This app showed me how much I really used to overeat. I‚Äôve lost 75lbs total and I hit a plateau so I download this app and kicked my weight loss back in to gear. I see where my old habits were coming back. And once I found I can get extra calories by working out I have started going to the gym every morning after I put my kid on the school bus. This app is teaching so much about portion control

title: Absolute Win!
body: For the last several years, I have tried to lose weight every way you can think of. It has always ended the same....gaining it all back before I could even finish losing what I wanted. With this app, I don‚Äôt even feel like I‚Äôm dieting!! When I go over my calories, I add exercise and balance it out. 47 pounds later, I couldn‚Äôt be happier that this app was recommended to me!

title: Amazing App but Premium is not worth it
body: The free version of this app is by far the best calorie tracking / weight loss app out there.  The reason for 3 stars is I  paid for premium only to find out it gains me very little.  The only premium feature I find useful is avg. carbs and fat.  What I would like to see is the ability to get emailed a weekly breakdown of my nutrition showing a summary of my week showing the histogram then also avg. calories, carbs, fat and some tips on how I can improve my nutrition / quality of my diet.

title: LOVE
body: I love lose it. I was with WW before using lose it, but I hate weight watchers new update so I searched for other option! I didn‚Äôt like my fitness pal as well as this app. Now, I would give 5 stars but I would like the lose it app to be a little more user friendly. I became a premium member and it can take me awhile to remember how to get to a certain screen, or how to change a setting so I‚Äôd just like that to be a little more smooth! Other than that I love it

title: My new favorite calorie counter
body: Great app! Easy to use, the data base is extensive and I like how the items have been reviewed.

title: Great App for losing weight
body: It has a list of food that you can eat, so you can count how many calories you had. More surprisingly, it has a list of exercises/workouts that could help you burn the calories while you are on track of losing weight. I have lost 5 pounds in a week because I‚Äôm limiting the calories that I‚Äôm eating. Sign up for this app and it will help you lose weight.

title: Damaging
body: I‚Äôm being punished loosing weight! The app started me at 1734 calories a day and I‚Äôve been loosing weight, BUT now my calories have been reduced to 1688. I hate it. I feel like it‚Äôs a punishment. I‚Äôve used this app before and failed bc it was too few calories and the app gradually reduced my calories then too. So I‚Äôm trying it at a goal of 1/2 lb per week so I don‚Äôt feel hungry. But I do not like the app taking away calories as I go along. The app should keep the calories it gives you initially. Stop punishing for loosing weight!!!!!!!!!
response: Sorry for the confusion here! Please reach out to us at¬†reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you with this!

title: Keeping me focused
body: I like how easy it is to find and record calories. Very rare to have the app say ‚Äúthis item not found ‚Äú which would be frustrating.  Also like that there‚Äôs usually a good range for how you want to record an item - ounces, grams, cups, teaspoon etc.,

title: Works very well, except there‚Äôs some confusion.
body: This app works very well, except something that always throws me off is the goal weight date. Why does it move back 1 or 2 days every time I finish logging for the day? This instills immense paranoia that I will never reach my goal weight, since it keeps moving back. Of course, it‚Äôs an app compared to actual real life results, but I am concerned about the actual algorithm. Thanks! Other than that, a great tool.

title: Takes away most or all excuses
body: You still have to do the work, but doing the work is easier when you know exactly how many calories you are consuming.  Recording calories is easy.  Numerous foods can be found by scanning the barcode or searching for the name.  For best results, record the food right before you eat it, and let the numbers guide your decisions.

title: Success with Lose It
body: I began my weight loss at 270 without the app. After several months my weight dropped to 260. My wife was told about the app. (lose It). We started together 10 weeks ago. I am happy to report that I am weighing 236. The key is documentation and exercise. The app tells you the calories you can have and a time period to safely reach your goal. It works and happy with results.

title: Preset Food item entries
body: I really like this app but there are so many food item choices on the log that are  totally incorrect.  Example... something like regular butter is logged as having no fat or calories. There are five choices of regular butter. Three of them may say no fat no calories. Or n/a in all of the nutrient lines.   You have to go through all of them to see what is true. If you don‚Äôt really know, than you may end up picking one that inaccurate and log your calories and nutritional intake incorrectly.

title: It works!
body: This amazing app gives you the tools you need to make good decisions about your food intake. Using it, I can eat intentionally and wisely, and I've already lost some weight after only six days. I love the barcode scanner as it makes things so easy. Sure, you still have to use self control to actually lose the weight but this app makes it so much easier. Love it!

title: Really Works
body: My wife has been a premium user for years. I mentioned that I would like to loose 10 lbs. she suggested trying counting calories and using this app. Definitely has changed my diet. And it worked. I lost 10 lbs over a 6 week period. Pretty crazy. Going for more.

title: Calories are all that count
body: This app is incredible! The database is full of every food I think of and does the math!

title: Very Helpful App
body: It's easy to log food items especially with the ability to scan in the bar codes .  It was a little trickier to figure out how to enter a frequent recipe but once it was in, then it was easy to access . I am amazed at the extensive food logs ..  everything has been in there already .. although you can create a new food if you find one .

title: What I needed!
body: I‚Äôm a grazer, especially after work or when I‚Äôm making dinner for my family.  All of those calories were adding up!  Lose it is holding me accountable for what I eat.  Rather than dieting (which I always fail at) Lose it simply lets me eat the foods I like knowing that if eat this, I can‚Äôt eat that later.  I‚Äôm finding it to be the best thing I‚Äôve found to keep me on track.

title: Lose It Works
body: Using this app allows you to keep a daily log of everything you eat. This is the only way you can lose weight and keep it off over time. Setting goals and monitoring your progress is easy with the tools provided. I have used this app for more than a year and have lost a considerable amount of weight and am keeping it off.

title: Soooo much better than MyFitnessPal!
body: I was a MFP user for years until the problems with Fitbit connectivity this summer made me finally give it up. I was worried about using another app (would it be as easy to use?) but now I wish I had switched over sooner. Logging food is faster (and cuter to boot), the app has a cleaner look, and I‚Äôve had no issues with it syncing with my 3-year-old Fitbit!

title: Inaccurate Calories
body: Using this app, I‚Äôve managed to gain weight. I‚Äôm putting the blame on wholly inaccurate calorie counts, that, if followed, have had me eat less than my BMR some days, and more than my caloric expenditure would allow on others.

title: Great App!
body: This is a great app if you want to lose weight and keep a somewhat accurate track of it. I do like how you can enter your weight, height, and everything. You can choose the quantity & it‚Äôll put in calories. But, it sometimes isn‚Äôt accurate or specific.

title: Free version is fine.
body: Even when used free, not terribly obnoxious, and still meets basic needed function.

title: Best Calorie Counter Available
body: Weight gain and loss is an equation. More calories consumed than burned = weight gain. More calories burned than consumed = weight loss.

title: Love This App
body: I just purchased this app for a year. I have had it for 1 week now. I add everything I eat and it keeps me in check. I love it for food item searches. It will give you the calorie count for your food. Even on days where you‚Äôre out and about and can‚Äôt make your meal, type in the restaurant and it will give you the cals for their food. It‚Äôll give you your best options. Love it!

title: Good app
body: I like this app a lot. Tried a few but this one is the best. I like the calorie suggestions for each meal, love that it syncs with my Nike app, and it has just about every restaurant‚Äôs nutritional info that I go to. Something most other apps don‚Äôt.

title: Calorie counting made easy
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs such a simple app to use, only takes a minute or two a day to log in your meals plus lots of choices for exercise types.  It‚Äôs made me more aware of my intake of calories and helped me make better choices to stay under my recommended daily allowance.  The weight is coming off at a steady rate and that completely encourages me to continue my quest, I‚Äôm so grateful!

title: Great app!
body: This is a great tool for keeping track of your food intake. Huge list of foods available and easy to use.

title: Add option for default food by meal
body: Great app, I've lost 14 pounds in 6 weeks, the first real weight loss I've ever achieved. I would love to see an option to set default foods, so my breakfast and lunches could be automatically filled in every day unless I manually change them because I had something different. Would save a lot of time for those who eat the same thing every day.

title: Menus non-obvious, but features good
body: Is comprehensive, but UX is not user-centric. You cannot log your weight under the 'log' menu. Instead, go to goals, then record. Cannot log yesterday's weight, only today's. A four star product, but nags a lot to get reviews -1 star for that.
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Saved my life
body: Best app ever. I always suggest this app to my friends. It saved my life. I lost 10 pounds in 2 months. Its amazing. I wake up every morning looking in the mirror smiling. I used this app since 2015 and still going strong. I used to be 135.8 now I‚Äôm 118.0 and so happy with the way this app keeps it off. It even counts the little things in life as exercise, like vacuuming, house cleaning, and gardening. This app changes you.

title: It‚Äôs all about the calories
body: No matterWhat combination of carbohydrates fats and proteins you use if you consume less calories that you burn you will lose weight. I have maintained my weight for two years knowing  this principle and using this app. I am a Physical Therapist and Kinesiologist and have studied human performance and rehabilitation for 25 years. This app is awesome and I recommend it to all who seek to lose FAT! , not just water weight.

title: Great app to help you lose it!
body: UPDATE: I had written a review that I love the app except for its tech glitch and they did respond with a fix. Basically if you are syncing to a Fitbit make sure apple health and other apps are turned off to syncing otherwise they‚Äôll interfere with each other. I can now Confidenitally give this app 5 stars! It has definitely helped me stay motivated and on track!
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: It‚Äôs so easy!!
body: I love the lose it app. It makes tracking so simple, so you really know how many calories your taking in. Of course it helps to have a food scale but it recognizes most barcodes, so just scan and save, done. I think it‚Äôs great and it links to my Fitbit app so only entering information once. Wonderful!! And you get credit for exercising if you want to eat the extra calories. Wooh hooh!!

title: Fantastic, but DON‚ÄôT PAY FOR IT
body: Absolutely fantastic app that allows you to track whatever data you want. Connects to other great apps and Apple health so you can access all the information in one place. Used it for a year and has taught me so many lessons about my habits and nutrition. I chose to pay for premium after a year with 50% off and I completely regret it. Not worth a cent with hardly any new features for what you‚Äôre paying for. Use it as the free app and save your $20-40. Maybe something will be added to premium that allows my money to be used for something but so far it‚Äôs been a disappointment.

title: Love Lose It
body: I started using this app in April. I stopped during the summer and started back up up the end of August. I have lost 25 pounds and cut my cholesterol in half. Eating whole grains and foods and tracking through the app has been the key. It is paired with my Apple Watch and it is great to see extra calories in my bank after I exercise. I still have another 25 to lose. Slow and steady.

title: Why are the notification always wrong?
body: It‚Äôs super irritating how the push notifications are always wrong. I‚Äôm in my second year of paying for the annual membership and it still doesn‚Äôt get fixed. Many mornings I get a push notification telling me I broke my streak and I should come back and log. Except I haven‚Äôt broken my streak. The app is just in error. Same thing happens with meals. I‚Äôm always getting pushes saying I forgot to log lunch or dinner or whatever, and then I go into the app and of course I‚Äôve already logged it. The app is just wrong again. Super irritating to be paying a yearly fee for a broken app.

title: Takes away free stuff so you have to buy
body: I loved the free version of the app - until suddenly logging afternoon snacks was only available through the paid version of the app.  You start out able to log breakfast, morning snack, lunch, afternoon snack, dinner, then evening snack.  Today my afternoon snack option disappeared and to add it back you have to pay for the premium.  In fact, all the snack options are showing as locked.  There are lots of great calorie apps out there for free that don‚Äôt play games with customers.  I‚Äôm downloading another app recommended by a friend.

title: Big for Motivation
body: Documenting calories for each meal helps me to see what I am doing in real time. This makes me stop and think ‚Äòdo I really need to eat this? What will be the consequences if I do?‚Äô  I am able to set my goals and stick to them. I have yoyo‚Äôd with weight loss for the last 2-3 years - lose 2 gain 6, lose 6 gain 12. This year I have lost a total of 14 lbs and have kept them off. Great motivator.

title: Helps me control my eating
body: Recording what I eat makes me aware of the calories I take in. Recording my activities helps me to know what activities burn the most calories. Tracking my daily weight helps me see my results in weight loss. There are lots of options that I can monitor and track. I have lost nearly 50 lbs over the last few years thanks to my Lose It App.

title: Calories count
body: The only way to lose weight . It syncs with my Fitbit Alta too. Set your goals & it tells you when you will each your goal. Bottom line: no fad diet... calories in less than calories out & you will lose weight. Don‚Äôt give up. If you want candy , scan it & add it. If you‚Äôre in red, don‚Äôt beat yourself up. Just move on. This is the only thing that truly works.

title: Wish I knew how to utilize program better
body: Good, very helpful, as I track cals plus nutrient values.  Dont know how to mass delete food in database that has been entered with no nutrient values.  Can time stamp now when you eat; but dont know how to use.  I eat several small meals so i wish we had (maybe we do) meal one, snack one; meal two, meal 3 , snack two, meal 4 ...or whatever.  Overall, it is good and has gotten better.

title: Cluttered
body: I got this app nearly 10 years ago - at the time the app was simple with a clear, clutter-free interface. It was simple to use and very useful for simply setting weight targets and monitoring food/caloric intake and exercise/caloric use. I found it to be elegant and practical. With daily use, the app helped me to easily drop >15 lbs in a few short months. Over the years, as they've added more features ("bells and whistles" IMHO), it has become more cluttered and less practical. I rarely open this app anymore, even when I need a little 'tune-up' on my weight because i find the app to be so annoyingly busy/cluttered. Clean it up!

title: Almost perfect exercise and diet app
body: Easy to use, huge list of foods, both brand and natural, easy to customize. Great graphics show you where you are on your journey to weight loss.

title: Legit.
body: This app is the real deal. I was never a big calorie counter but I knew I needed to start in order to drop some pounds and start some healthy eating. Super easy to work. Gives you an ideal goal. Has soooo many food options already saved so you don‚Äôt have to guess how many calories you‚Äôre actually eating. Even takes in to account your exercise. Totally worth the click.

title: Makes you aware
body: So this app is great without even buying the premium. I will say it‚Äôs got an extensive food data base and the capabilities of making your own recipe. It makes it easy to track your calories. This being said.. it is time consuming. But it makes you so aware of what is going on and it helps you recognize your portions! I recommend this app. I lost 3 lbs in 4 days! Safely

title: Lazy bones rejoice!
body: I have tried tracking my food intake many times in the past, but I usually drop off after about a week. This app makes recording my daily intake super easy and enjoyable! I have to say, too, it has been a real eye-opener to see how many calories I am actually consuming! Anyway, I am on the track to fewer calories and good nutrition and Lose It is the foundation. Thank you!

title: Valuable Weight Loss Tool
body: I am forty pounds down and at my goal weight.  LoseIt has been an important part of that journey.  They have an enormous database of foods that make tracking easy, and I love being able to scan foods in.  It‚Äôs so easy to sit down with my iPad and log my foods in.  It has become part of my daily routine.  I love it and recommend it often to friends who want to lose weight.

title: Does the job.
body: Works great, especially for a free app. No matter what anyone tells you, calories in and calories out is the entire formula for losing or gaining weight, and LoseIt covers that. Yes, calories burned is almost always going to be an estimate because metabolisms vary. I quickly lost 20 pounds a few years ago using LoseIt and running and am seven pounds down now after about six weeks of tracking.

title: Wow!!! I love it!
body: I have tried lots of tracking apps and weigh loss programs over the years. Including WW, Noom, and myfitnessPal. This has been the best one. It even had the smoothie my gym makes and I didn‚Äôt have to add it. The amount of items in their data base is great and so easy to use! The app does need a tutorial on what things are, I am using knowledge already gained to help in my loss but totally worth the premium price

title: Love
body: This is the first food diary I've been able to do online or off because they are so laborious and boring. But snapping barcodes or seeing if the algorithm can identify a bowl of spinach (it can!) is fun and easy.  I've lost 14lbs so far (3 months) and without a formal diet--just tracking calories--it has changed my habits, attitude, and my weight. I haven't been able to lose pounds for years, much 14 of them. 16 to go!

title: Embody DNA ATTN!!!
body: Love lose it, do NOT pay for embody DNA. I‚Äôm very disappointed with the information provided in these results. I feel as though your product was poorly advertised.  It is no where near worth the money I spent. I am a breastfeeding mother and I was hoping to get more insights into my weight loss and food sensitivities with your product. Although you claim this is personal information, it is all too general, obvious, and very loose with terms like ‚Äúlikely‚Äù and ‚Äúmay.‚Äù Since I‚Äôm a healthy person with good habits, there was no benefits in receiving your very limited information. I expected so much more considering my succsss with the lose it app.

title: Good tool
