body: I like this app.  We do low carb and so what drew me to it was the way it shows carb, fat, and protein for the day.  I use the weight tracker, I like seeing a graph.  The food log is easy too and it has lots of foods in it.  The only problem is you have to watch, sometimes the foods don‚Äôt have the right figures.  Adding your own isn‚Äôt hard though.  I have used it for about 10 months now.

title: Accountability
body: This is the easiest method I have found to keep track of calories in exercise out, etc.  Being mostly vegan I like being able to confirm on myday percentages of protein, carbs, fats.  LoseIt remembers your regular items at what meals and offers those selections.  Tips are good too.  Goals can be set, water intake tallied, sleep times, etc.  Much better and easier than several WW apps I have used.

title: SusieQ
body: Lose it! is the tool that has kept 30 pounds off for 4 whole years. We thought we would try an app February 2017 to track our eating. My husband and I have tracked EVERY day for over 1,584 days!! No matter what we eat, we tracked it. When the weight starts creeping up, we looked in the summary and find out where we were going off path. We love everything about LOSE IT!

title: LOVE
body: I love how easy it is to track everything in one place. I love the scanning option (I use it all the time!). This app has helped me with portion control because I put it in the system first and then decide my portion based off how many calories it ends up being to stay within my limit. It also encourages weight loss with fun facts like ‚Äúyou lost the weight of an average house cat‚Äù!

title: My most-used app!
body: Love love this app!  Makes tracking calories soooo easy because most of the foods, brands, health items, restaurant items are found in this app!!  If not, you can add them!  I love tracking my water intake and weight loss here, too. Don‚Äôt stop there‚Äî you can track sleep and exercise and more.  This app is NOT complicated.  I couldn‚Äôt imagine my weight loss journey without Lose It!

title: Better in some ways
body: I used LoseIt years ago and was very happy with it. The updated version definitely has benefits but also suffers from too many options. There is no validation of entries I suspect so the same food is listed multiple ways where quantity is unclear and not all the data is available. For chain restaurants, this should be fairly straightforward for the developers to clarify and would make the app much more usable. Otherwise your count could be off significantly!

title: NEW FAVORITE CAL APP
body: This app is so much better than mfp in my humble opinion!!! Same, if not better, features. Looking into subscribing soon, and investing into the scale they have too! One suggestion for developers: If you could add Intermittent Fasting as an option that would be so amazing!!! I fast for a day every now and then and it would be so helpful to have all my calories, exercise and fasting cals lost in the same app!

title: Genuinely Helpful
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since June 2019 and it‚Äôs helped me reprogram how I think about food. I used this app in the past but didn‚Äôt keep up with it in a healthy manner. Well flash forward to now and I‚Äôm 25 lbs lighter and no longer have a strange attachment to food. I can‚Äôt credit it all to the app, but combined with good sleep, exercise, healthy food and water consumption; you‚Äôll be good to go!

title: Data is NOT accurate
body: I‚Äôve used this app on and off for several years.  I like the interface and ease of use.  However I‚Äôve noticed the calorie and nutrition information is WRONG on many scanned items.  Most recently the honey I scanned was listed at 60calories per TSP when the bottle stated 60calories per TBSP.  I‚Äôve also seen widely varying caloric counts on things like gd beef and chicken, things that are not easily verified by packaging. This can be dangerous for people and really needs to be monitored to clear out bad information. So user beware... take nothing at face value with this app.

title: Amazing Weight Loss App!!
body: I have lost 55 pounds with the help of the Lose It app! It helps me set and keep goals and stay accountable. I am still using it to maintain my current weight and help me stay on track. I highly recommend the app and I tell everyone I know who wants to reach a goal weight to download it and use it! I can‚Äôt recommend it enough, thank you to Lose It for helping me so much!

title: Good enough
body: I loved this when I first started. Had almost everything I looked up. Just wish that the database of food could have a verified list of food so that you know the calories are right. Everyone could still enter their own recipes and food if can‚Äôt find it but would only be available to them unless calories verified. That would be perfect but I know not really something that‚Äôs feasible to do. Just my thoughts

title: Easy to use!
body: Love the way this app is one step ahead of you- great images, humorous reminders. The colors are engaging and never boring. The weight loss/ progress graphs could have a few more options -closer zoom when reviewing wider date range? Overall one of the BEST and easiest to use weight loss apps out there. Highly recommend - prefer it hands down to MyFitnessPal- and yes I‚Äôm a real person! üò¨

title: Fabulous support system
body: I adore percentageS of macronutrients, soSOso helpful as well as the capacity to track my weight! Fabulously helpful as my weight has dropped from 180 to 142.2, getting healthier by the day as I explore Intermittent Fasting (18:6) most days ‚ÄúDelay, Don‚Äôt Deny‚Äù, Author: Gin Stephens) and no longer take asthma, Diabetes, Thyroid and other prescriptionS that plagued me since 1984! I love how it remembers much of what I‚Äôve eaten in the past as well as the portions, too!

title: Best Free Calorie-Tracking App!
body: Out of every other app of this kind, Lose It has the most friendly interface for users and allows free users to log pictures of food without buying a subscription, though I‚Äôm sure a subscription would be worth the money. If you‚Äôre looking for a free app for calorie-tracking with an easy-to-use design, choose this one.

title: Excellent tool for weight loss
body: I‚Äôve used LoseIt for 2 years.  I‚Äôve tried several different weight loss programs and I‚Äôve had the most success with this one.  It has several beneficial weight-loss monitoring functions which have helped me gain better control of my diet and exercise plans. As a result, I‚Äôve developed better eating and exercise habits that have helped me keep the weight off.

title: Users of Paid Version Still Get Ads
body: I would give this app a five star review, but it still gives me the occasional offer for a scale that apparently works with the app.

title: Awesome!
body: The free trial is great to get you used to the App. Gave me plenty of time to decide whether to keep the subscription and purchase the premium. Found the the price was very reasonable and decided to keep the app as it‚Äôs helped me track calories and workouts extremely well. Connects to other apps like Apple Health and the Scan It option for foods is great. Highly recommend giving it a shot!

title: Journaling is the way to go
body: Several years back when Lose It was a new app I used it to lose 85 lbs. I kept the weight off for a few years and, sad to say, eventually gained it back. I have tried other ways to lose the weight without taking the time to track everything. It‚Äôs too easy to cheat. I‚Äôm back with Lose It and having good results.

title: Love it but...
body: I have used this app off and on for a few years. It‚Äôs great! I have lost weight using it and come back to it when I need to. My only gripe is with the recipe section. After you enter a recipe, you cannot go and see how many servings you entered, a serving size, and are unable to modify recipes you have already entered. If this feature was changed, I would give it 5 stars.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! Please email us via help.loseit.com so we can assist with your recipes!

title: Great tracking app
body: Great app BUT is very annoying typing everyday the same thing over and over again. The app should display the most used food or meals every time you need to fill out something.

title: Keeps me on track
body: I started with the app just looking for a calorie counter and quickly discover it is so much more. The food list to choose from is extensive as is the exercise list. This app allows me to amend information as my day changes and my early morning plan for the day no longer fits my reality. I love the feed back systems and rewards. Very motivating and easy to use.

title: LOVE IT
body: I‚Äôve only used this app for about 2 weeks, and yet it‚Äôs helped me immensely! I‚Äôve stuck with the free version only because there aren‚Äôt too many ads, plus I don‚Äôt need to track all of the nutrients in the food. It can be hard to find some food if you make it yourself, but it‚Äôs usually possible if you‚Äôre patient. If you‚Äôre looking to lose weight than you MUST GET THIS APP!!

title: Good app.
body: This is a really good app, but it would be nice to have more options for exercise programs that are out there in the fitness industry and to also have more options for restaurants. It would also be nice to be able to modify he restaurant items. For example I do. Not eat everything that restaurants put in my my burger, but I can‚Äôt modify it. Also I found that the restaurants menus do not have all of the food choices on there.

title: Must Get!
body: I personally diet to stay healthy, maintain my current weight, and be built. This app has seriously helped me keep track of my food intake and exercise. It keeps count of calories, carbs, and fat without the upgrade. You definitely don‚Äôt need the upgrade to enjoy this or lose weight, but it does add some cool features that help. Anyways, I love the app <3 I hope you find good in it too.

title: So far it‚Äôs great.
body: Are used My Fitness Pal previously and it was fine. Lose it is a bit easier with more graphics and excellent reminders.  I do like this app better so far. I do not like that you have to go to premium to get certain things, but I understand.  I have not gone premium because of the continual renewal that you have to actively opt out of. The rest of the app is killer.

title: Unauthorized charge
body: I‚Äôve never been so livid with an app. Was automatically charged after the free trial-was never stated that would happen. No notifications, just charged my credit card. Absolutely no contact information in the app or on the website. I was charged today and it seems like I was able to cancel the subscription via iTunes but it was unclear if that just means that I won‚Äôt be charged in another year. I don‚Äôt even know how to go about contacting anyone about it but I want my $42 back. The app itself is fine, I just don‚Äôt have the need for it and I don‚Äôt appreciate feeling scammed like this.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Needs to be cleaned up
body: I have been using this ap for years. In the beginning the calories posted were simple, clean and exact. Over the years people were allowed to enter their own item and the associate calories. What has resulted is several of the same items showing having completely different amounts of calories swinging wildly from one amount to another. Management needs to make these go away. It makes it hard to track exact calories eaten.

title: Easy, Effective
body: Very easy to use. When paired with the goal of eating healthy foods, it effectively assists loosing weight in a positive, balanced manner. Able to use when eating out, attending parties, etc. Notifications: short, to the point, funny.

title: Makes tracking what you eat and do a breeze
body: Love the barcode scan and that almost every food is stored up with all the major nutrients ready to go. The search has improved a lot since I started using it and I love the little compliments and motivation boosters when you do good things like lose weight and log everything in a day. Keep it up!

title: Simple enough to stay on top of
body: I have used this app for a few years, but only really stuck to it the last few months being able to track my calories, exercise, and weight with a graph has helped immensely in avoid both over eating and under eating. Great app if you don't want an overly complicated system. Calories in calories out.

title: Great tool for weight loss
body: This app is a little time consuming because you have to look for exactly what you‚Äôre eating. But they do a very good job of giving you an approximation of how many calories you‚Äôre consuming. Not to mention this makes you really think about your food choices. Great tool and I recommend it to anyone just getting started and needing a boost.

title: Thank you for this app!! Follow the plan and you'll lose weight!
body: Easy to use. Free version is fantastic! Paid even better. I made it to my goal and lost 30 pounds in less than 90 days and I upgraded to the premium and have improved my sleep and nutrition. Worth the upgrade. 9+ month user. So happy with my results!! The app made it easier and has kept my weight off!!!

title: Finally yay!!!
body: This is a great app it has helped me achieve my goal in record time and bcz of my success my whole family is using it too and seeing results, well of course you have to have discipline but it is easy to use and follow the recommendations are on point I‚Äôve lost 25 pounds in 2 and half month just with the app I have not been this weight in 15 years. Thank you Lose it

title: Lose It! Rocks!!
body: This is the perfect app to track calories and macros. I love how easy it is to enter in food items! You can just scan the barcode. It also saves your food and knows what you eat regularly. I started tracking my calories and macros two weeks ago and have lost 3 pounds so far. It's something that I can stick with. I highly recommend using Lose It!

title: Lose it for Life!!
body: Lose It app has given me the tool to stay on track and lose weight. It covers everything!! Calories,weight, water intake exercise and most importantly the great support system from others using the app. I‚Äôve lost almost 40lbs and for the first time in decades I know I will be successful!! Try Lose It you have nothing to lose except the weight!! üòÅ

title: Works for me
body: I‚Äôve logged over 1800 meals and even with surgery and being in bed ridden for couple of months I managed to keep the weight off and now I‚Äôm actually dropping my way again. Weight loss is always a challenge especially when you‚Äôre older but lose it it‚Äôs a very important tool for awareness and when you use it properly it works.

title: If at first you don‚Äôt succeed‚Ä¶..!!
body: Tried other online programs over the years!!

title: Using Lose It
body: I reached my goal weight in 6 weeks and have been maintaining that weight for 2 months.

title: They thought of everything
body: Buy the premium. It‚Äôs worth it. I‚Äôve tried many other apps incl WW and none have been as good as this. I need to track my calories & macros but also sodium intake. This makes it easy. Can log BP and many other things as well. I love how few ‚Äúkeystrokes‚Äù I need to perform to log something. That makes a difference to me at least. Thoughtful design.

title: Supplement Suggestion
body: Well I‚Äôm so in love with this app, but I‚Äôve been using Notes to keep track of supplements and changes in supplements, and I was thinking how great it would be to just add them to my meals! I was going to create a new entry for each supplement I take but then it occurred to me how great it would be if there was a supplement extension on the app itself! So what do you say, guys? ü§© Seems like the next logical step!

title: Better than weight watchers app
body: After paying for weight watchers, I switched back to lose it (free version) because it‚Äôs easier to use. Logging food is better because it remembers previous logs. The only complaint I have is the list of exercises when trying to log activity. Not too many choices. You have to log each muscle group separately. It would be nice if there was bundle like abs and arms or chest and triceps.

title: Easy weight loss
body: I lost about 120 pounds in 17 months. I was 315 in November 2011 and 290 in Feb 2012. I started loseit in February 2012. I lost 100 pounds with loseit and 20 on my own. I'm 194 at this time. People learn Visually with loseit you can lose up to 2 pounds a week. This very user Friendly.

title: Love this app
body: Everything about this app is just right for me. It has helped me lose weight in the past, but also since the baby! It helps me know portion sizes, make smart choices for snacking, and the fact i can log recipes is so valuable. I use the free version and have still been able to hit my goals. Combine this with an exercise routine and you‚Äôll see results. Promise!

title: Helpful
body: If you are trying to lose weight going on a calorie deficit is your best bet! This helps not only track calories but sugar intake, carb intake, and protein intake. I paid the yearly fee and honestly totally worth it! It also gives you an estimate of when you can reach your desired weight goal according to food consumption and exercise. Speaking of exercise you can link this app to your health app and NRC app !

title: Lost Free Features and Pricing Games
body: I used this app successfully when many more features were free. When I came back, and found so many features now cost money, I wanted to test it out before upgrading. No sooner have I had a few days for that, they raise the price, and a few days yet offer yet another price. A real turn-off from the marketing/financing arm of a very good app.

title: Best App Around!
body: While all the rest of the apps charge to use the Lose It! Is free and only charges for optional premium Services. It works great for helping people to meet their goals and I swear by it. I promote it every chance I get. Anytime someone  says they want to lose weight or are looking for a good calorie counting app I always suggest Lose it! so far I‚Äôve lost 20 pounds.  download the app, you can‚Äôt go wrong.

title: Loose It App
body: Love using this app it has helped me track my intake of food, calories and keeps track of protein, carbs and fats.  It has helped me maintain my 50 pound weight loss for 2 years.  I recommend using this app and will continue to use this every day for the rest of my life.  Love staying healthy and creating awareness everyday on what I am eating.

title: Great weight loss app and tracker.
body: I use it almost everyday. A year ago, I lost 25 lens by religiously using this app. If it went in my mouth, it went on the app too. This holds you accountable and soon tracking food becomes a habit. I like that it also records steps and gives you a calorie bonus for extra steps. Integrates nicely. I purchased the lifetime membership when it went on sale.

title: New update = no weekly breakdowns?
body: To all of the people asking for free water logging.... just add a 0 calorie drink with the water icon and update how many ounces you‚Äôve had throughout the day.. no brainer and you don‚Äôt need premium to do that.
response: We are sorry for the confusion! You can actually still access this with Lose It!. For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: It works great but....
body: I love the app. It will help you in the weight loss journey. I guarantee you that you will lose more weight with the app than without.

title: Amazing app
body: I love this app as it helped guide me through my diet. There were days of course that I didn‚Äôt stick with the plan and ate more calories then recommended but what I love about this app is that it calculates according to what you ate and let you know if you are above budget or below. It also calculates how much you should eat daily for that entire week if you decided to just binge that one day

title: Easy to use!! Fun & Great!
body: Lose It, is easy to use and a GREAT app!! I love being able to take pictures of my meals when I am tracking my calories!! The colorful emoji‚Äôs are a add bonus!!

title: Great app for losing and maintaining weight and monitoring nutrition!
body: I have been using Lose It for over 5 years and continue to use it.

title: would like to see a trail for the premium
body: Love the app.  Easy to use. I would like to get the premium version but I‚Äôd like to see a little more information on what these premium features could do for me before I invest the money just to find out that it wouldn‚Äôt. I suggest a one week trial of the premium version in order to explore the features before making a decision.

title: Greatest app ever
body: I had gastric surgery and had a sleeve done in September 20, 2017. To date I have lost 133 pounds and I have use this app since I came out of the hospital. I feel it is important for me to continuously monitor my progress and I love the scale that shows your weight loss travels. I will continue to use this app along with the total I have been given to control my weight for the rest of my life!  Great app!

title: Simple and effective!
body: I hate to log my foods but with this app, I have been logging for 18 days and love this app! It is simple and easy to use and I highly recommend! It helps keep me on track for eating better and weight loss with better choices. I upgraded for the year cost which was very inexpensive , less than $30 so no annoying ads or pop ups.

title: Lack Apple Health Integration
body: I recently updated the application and no matter what I do I have been unable to get the application to either write or read data from Apple health. This used to be an invaluable and easy tool as information would be pulled regarding workouts, and weight updates would be sent to Apple Health that would be sent to other applications as well.

title: Useful to diabetics
body: I use Lose It to help me keep track of my carbs to control my Type 2 Diabetes. It‚Äôs a convenient way to keep all my information at my fingertips, and also to use when I see my medical people. I kept back one star because I have been unable to find a way to edit my recipes. As I learn more about managing my diabetes, I would like to modify some of my recipes. If someone can explain that, I‚Äôd probably add back that fifth star!

title: Lose it
body: I have to say I highly recommended app called Lose it it‚Äôs free and you want to up grade it you can. It‚Äôs all about getting healthy and eating right for you so it happens. By writing it down you see what you are putting in your body, you start to control what you‚Äôre eating and the results of Losing weights happens for you. It‚Äôs great I have lose weight!!! So can you try it for free!!

title: Great app.
body: Love the app.  Perfect for tracking weight, meals and exercise.

title: Great!
body: I love the scanning! Very simple and easy to use. The only things that would make it better would to have the same units of measurements available for all the food choices because sometimes you have to convert if the food choice doesn‚Äôt have the same measurement unit on the packaging. Also consider expanding the restaurant feature so you can include GPS to show restaurants in the area to pick the food selection

title: Great Calorie App
body: Love this app super easy to use, has really made a difference in what and how much I eat and keeping my calorie intake in check.I am an almost 49 year old male construction worker and with the help of this app I have lost 21 pounds over the past month with no other exercise except for work. (starting work out routine soon) I am currently just using the free app but plan to purchase the premium

title: Very helpful, super easy to use
body: A friend of my mine who is a personal trainer and nutritionist recommended the app to me.

title: Great tracker!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a full month and I‚Äôve lost 22 lbs. it has really helped me keep track of what I‚Äôm eating and kept me on track. If there is anything I would change it would be the carb counter part as it only lists carbs, not net carbs. I do hate having to figure out what my real carb intake is when I eat foods with fiber. Still it is a great help and I intend to keep using it religiously.

title: Really great app!
body: Being a Type 1 diabetic, the app would really benefit from having a field for blood glucose readings before and after each meal as well as insulin units taken. Would rate this app with 5 STARS. (10 if it would let me). Please feel free to contact me for input and also if these suggestions can be added. It would be great to have a one stop app to track nutritional and medicinal information. Would definitely sign up for life. Thanks!

title: Free? Non sense!
body: This seriously should be a paid app, it is excellent! I used it for over 12 months every day and managed to lose 80 pounds total! Just by watching what I'm eating, drinking water and doing some excercise! You guys need to realease a paid version for those of us who want to buy it just to support you! THANKS! I still using this, if you are constant you will achieve your objective!

title: Keeps track
body: This app is excellent!! It runs smooth on my iPhone X and isn‚Äôt glichie. It really helps in the fact that what ever food or drink you submitt, it keeps track of all your sugar, carbs, fat, etc. and even tho sometimes I have to submit ingredients separate ( home made concoction), it still is very close to right on!! Thank you for an awesome app!! Well worth the money!!:) ps. I‚Äôm down 4 pounds in 6 days!!

title: Kind of bummed
body: Downloaded this app cuz my sister has been using it for quite awhile and she raved about it. I am eating Keto though, and while there is an option to set a goal for net carbs, the app tracks and displays total carbs so I have to keep going in and correcting my foods. Another reason I downloaded the app was the restaurant data base which is pretty amazing. The downside to that is most of the menu items only have calorie counts-no fat, protein or carb values which, again, defeats the purpose of tracking the foods‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.üòî

title: Great app!
body: I love this app! Weight loss can seem so daunting with all the crazy diet plans, shakes, programs, etc out there. It turns out though, it really is as simple as eating less and moving more.

title: I love Loseit
body: This app has been very helpful in my weight loss journey. For me, it is a slow process and this helps me to stay on track. I wish the people who enter the foods would include all categories. I like to know more than just calorie count. I realize since we are able to add our own foods, the owners are not able to control this. Otherwise I‚Äôm very happy with it.

title: Best App for me
body: I purchased this App and ‚Äúa very popular other‚Äù app. I kept this one. ‚ÄúThe Other‚Äù is a good App.  This one is much better for me.  Very simple and clean cut. Very easy to complete each day and the variety of foods/brands available is quite impressive.  The other App is great if you need a lot of encouragement.  This App let me work and my embrace my own discipline.  Tons of knowledge when I‚Äôm ready!  Thank you!

title: Nothing thrilling
body: I was talked in to paying for the year and, well honestly not that happy with it. Ive had other weight loss apps and they are mostly based on user feedback and adds. Like this app and the dozen of others, it has 20 of the same item, with dozens of different numbers. Or it does not have the product.

title: Great and fast customer service response
body: I found a glitch when entering my daily weight, and sent a message to customer service. OMGI heard back from Lose It! the same day and their engineering group was on it immediately. Issue resolved within a few hours. Great service! This app has really helped me stay on track and trying to shed extra pounds.

title: Everything You Need
body: Excellent food tracker. Easy to use to set or change goals. Keeps track of exercise as well. Offers prompts so you won‚Äôt forget to log your daily food intake. Gives me everything I need to lose weight slowly and in a healthful way. Although I don‚Äôt have the advanced tracker I imagine that it‚Äôs features are even better!  Jeannietta

title: Want to lose weight??
body: Great app for keeping track of your calorie intake. Barcode scanning is a great feature. Also their data base is vast. It includes fast food stops, restaurants, even truck stop food. My goal is to lose 2 pounds a week, and after 3 weeks I am right on track. I would suggest to anyone who is looking to lose weight and stick to their goals. Good luck!!!

title: Awesome app that works!
body: I love this app! I have been using it for all food intake for the past four weeks. One of my biggest problem with weight loss and nutrition is keep track of the foods and calories. This app does it. It has almost all the foods I eat in the database as well as most chain restaurants. This app has helped me lose 18 pounds so far in four weeks.

title: Success!
body: Lose It is an excellent tool for assisting you in staying focused on what you‚Äôre eating, and how your food choices impact your success. While I‚Äôve reached a plateau, I can review my prior food choices to see where I can make adjustments. Also, for those with health issues that require monitoring (e.g. cholesterol levels, carbohydrates, etc.) this application provides the information you need.

title: Worked for me!
body: I have lost 63 pounds in 15 months!  Everyone is different, but this app has totally worked for me.  This app encouraged me to MOVE!  I made exercise an essential part of my every day life.  I am a super picky eater, but I was able to just eat less of the foods I like. The more I exercised, the more calories I had to work with. Tip: buy a food scale. I weigh what I eat and drink at home for better accuracy.

title: Great App
body: Not only does this help you realize the amount of calories you consume it helps to make healthy choices. It‚Äôs basic math if you cut your calories and enjoy what you like it‚Äôs the best way to lose weight. Charting helps keep you on track. I‚Äôve tried the weight watchers app but this app is cheaper and works better. I‚Äôve lost 20lbs.  Only 10 from my goal!  Thank you!

title: Love it
body: This is the best app for tracking calories. The interface is perfect and layout makes it easy to use and motivating! My only wish is that premium upgrade was a one time cost and not a monthly charge. I would upgrade if this were the case. I highly recommend this app regardless however and won‚Äôt be using another anytime soon.

title: Great for tracking
body: I‚Äôve used ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù off and on for a few years now. It‚Äôs great for tracking food as it is very easy to find your favorites. My only complaint is that I wear a FitBit and cannot connect it to the app without upgrading the app. Since I haven‚Äôt upgraded the app I also cannot manually enter my walking distance. This is a big flaw in my opinion!

title: Logging food is the key
body: Its a hassle to do during the day but honestly tracking your food helps me learn about the decisions I are making. This app

title: Finally!!
body: I finally found something I can use! It‚Äôs fun, user-friendly, I really believe I‚Äôll be able to keep this up! Only complaint I have is that I haven‚Äôt lost 3 lbs in the first few weeks as promised - lots of the calorie counts are inconsistent. For instance, I looked up a grilled chicken salad from zaxbys and it gave me all these different calorie count results for the same menu item. I‚Äôm not happy with the inconsistencies. üòï Other than that - it‚Äôs the best!

title: Invaluable tool
body: I started using LoseIt in October and had lost 36 lbs by mid January. Sharing meals helped my wife easily start tracking as well. She lost 15 lbs in 2 months. Staying on a program is hard but the app gives you tools to set and accurately track the important/relevant metrics of intake and burn with easy to interpret visually compelling tools and encouraging messaging. Great app if you are serious about a program.

title: Great App!
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs so helpful for everyone, despite their goals! I‚Äôm not looking to lose pounds, but I did want to be knowledgeable of what I was taking into my body, to ensure I ate a balanced diet.  This app is so helpful. Lots of foods are already on the app, and the scanner is amazing for adding in quickly. I love that is saves my meals for quick log entries, because I do repeat meals a lot! I definitely recommend this app!

title: Easy to log food.
body: Very good database for logging food. Much easier than other apps I have tried. Premium is worth the upgrade in my opinion. Lots of extra info provided such as trends to your eating habits. If you are truly tracking your intake, it is nice to see what is and isn‚Äôt working to help meet your goals. Plus the recipes and simple short work out videos.

title: Free app
body: App works just as well being the free version.  I did buy the app to help me use something more paying for it, and the app works as long as you stick to the calories.  Remember you can eat even more calories if you exercise yes it‚Äôs a thought is it even worth it to exercise to eat more calories but you can be the judge with that to count the exercise or not.  A+ app!

title: Awesome in so many ways!!!
body: Superb app that is very easy to use yet is extremely robust! Has the capability to track as much or as little as one wants with connectivity to apple watches, fitbits, and glucometers etc. The food database is extensive and impressive which has allowed me to closely manage my health . Very highly recommend this app to anyone who wants become educated and take control of their health!

title: +10lbs down!
body: When I started Lose It I was 186lbs looking to loose at least 10lbs. After logging faithfully for 370 days, I now weight 173. Some say it‚Äôs not good to weigh yourself everyday, but I have. Weighing myself helps me to reflect on what I‚Äôve eaten days before and what I need to do to do better.

title: New Update is Horrific
body: I have been using LoseIt for 5 years and it was a great app but the newest update is ridiculous.  Over the years they have slowly pushed premium more and more, but now it‚Äôs just ridiculous.  Half the functionality of the app is now locked away behind a monthly subscription.  I would happily pay a one time fee to get rid of the ads or get some additional features but at this point it‚Äôs just a mess.  The app used to be clean and simple way to track my calories, nutrients, and exercise.  It‚Äôs a shame to see how it‚Äôs changed and now I‚Äôve lost 5 years of tracking data.

title: Very useful
body: Very useful app but it could be better.

title: Super easy
body: This app has made it sooo easy to keep up with my food intake. I normally don‚Äôt eat a lot but I try to work out at least 4 times a week. My body stores fat due to my low food intake. I was easily able to set a goal and this app took the guess work out of how much I would eat. I didn‚Äôt buy the premium version because this one works fine for me. I truly love this app it is slowly changing my life for the better.

title: Technical
body: I LOVE the app! I started using it just few weeks ago and I‚Äôve already lost 13.5 pounds since I had my son. I weigh myself every morning at the same time and always stay under my calorie budget. That being said, since the latest update, none of my pages want to load. There‚Äôs always an ‚Äúerror 500‚Äù, I cant see my friends, groups, or my own profile. Please fix! Other than that, I absolutely love it!

title: Works!
body: Tracking is the only way for me to lose weight.  This app is user friendly and free.  I like everything about it with one exception ... always asking you to upgrade which of course costs you more.  Tried other apps, liked Weight Watchers app because there are foods you can eat without points & I still lost weight.  You do not have that on this app.  Also used Fitness Plus, like this app better.

title: Love this app!!!
body: The barcode reader works perfectly, and I love the fact that I can sync my Apple Watch to it as well. Using this app has made tracking my workout progress and calorie intake beyond easy.

title: Fantastic app to track calories!
body: This app works so well even in areas with poor service. It has so many ways to find the food item you are interested in tracking. You can search by brands and restaurants or even supermarket items or just do a simple search. I love it!! Would highly recommend to anyone tracking calories.

title: Awareness tracker
body: Really good app. To know it simply takes a few seconds to track what your eating or could be eating to meet your goal each day -helps tremendously on your weight loss journey. This app helps you become more aware on your eating habits while helping you make smarter choices to prevent fails. Just make sure you use it and not try to hide your intake. As long as you realize it‚Äôs there to help you, you can‚Äôt go wrong. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: It works if you use it
body: This app is amazing. I‚Äôve been using for six years. I yo-yo quite a bit, so when I need to drop the lbs, I use this app. It works as long as you use it... which seems obvious. But you have to decide you‚Äôre going to log your food honestly and consistently. I‚Äôve lost up to 40lbs at a time, shooting for 50lb this time around. And I‚Äôm confident I will get there because of LoseIt.

title: 125lbs down!
body: Since summer 2014 I have been using lose it and have managed to lose 125lbs! I lost 80lbs within the first year and the rest has been disciplined slow and steady. It has helped me keep track of things and cut out calories I never realized made such a huge 400+ calorie difference in my daily eating. I went from 350 to 226lbs! Exercise and tracking are the keys!

title: Lost weight with Loseit
body: This is a super easy app to count calories.  I got the premium version and I think it‚Äôs totally worth it (watch for deals/discounts though)...  I‚Äôve been tracking for over 100 days and along with exercise, I‚Äôve lost over 20# and am at my goal weight.  I still track to maintain.  There is also a very supportive community group on Facebook!

title: Good App and Strategy
body: Strategy:

title: Interfering on my Apple Watch ring
body: I was really enjoying the app until my Apple Watch started to showing wrong move calories. I talked with Apple. Apple got on the conclusion that the app was changing true information on my phone. Uninstalled the app and everything went back to normal.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Calorie Budget Problem
body: I have reached my goal weight using this app, and I now use the app to maintain my weight. When I go over my goal weight, the Calorie Budget is adjusted downward to help me get back to my goal weight. However, when this occurs, it also adjusts the Calorie Budget downward for the previous three days. If you are trying to track your weekly calories over/under, this retroactive Calorie Budget adjustment is a problem and needs to be fixed. Otherwise, it‚Äôs a good app.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Nice app but a few problems
body: I like the app but the most recent update took away the ‚Äúx number of days until you meet your goal‚Äù display, which is a great motivator.  Or maybe they just buried it so deep I haven‚Äôt found it yet.  Or maybe it‚Äôs only available in the premium version now.

title: I wish I could copy my husband‚Äôs meal in my log
body: This is a great app. I and my husband have been using it for years. The only thing missing in this app is that I wish I could copy and paste in my log what my husband has logged for a meal, since we shared the same meal. This would be a major time saver for busy families. Family discount on subscription would be nice too.

title: One bug... but love it
body: First let me start by saying that I‚Äôve logged lots of food and Mose Atkins scans I add subtract the alcohol sugars leaving the net carbs. One of my favorite protein bars is Robert Irvine‚Äôs Fit bar crunch. When I add it in it does not subtract the alcohol sugars so my net carbs are not always correct. Aside from that this app is great, I paid for the year subscription and I‚Äôm glad I did. I find more things everyday that I love about it. I love the trending grafts that allow me to see my progress.

title: Going downhill fast due to greed
body: This used to be my favorite iOS app, an essential part of my health regimen.  But now  there are so many annoying banners urging you to upgrade to the paid monthly subscription version that the app is almost unusable.  On the main screen, there‚Äôs a giant banner counting down the time until the ‚Äúspecial upgrade offer‚Äùwill last, the seconds ticking constantly.  If you log in that you ate three eggs, another obtrusive banner appears and cuts the screen in half, inviting you to learn more about eggs by upgrading. You can‚Äôt get rid of it.  It is a terrible customer experience.

title: Great! But the ads??
body: I love this app, it truly helps me to keep track of what I‚Äôm putting in my body. The only thing I would change is the ads. I understand the use of ads that is fine, but I always get ads for unhealthy food!! I just got an ad for postantes with a picture of a huge burger. This is a great app but I think the messages should all point to one goal.

title: Lack of support
body: I have been using the app for years however, the lack of customer service is disappointing. Last summer I renewed my subscription manually, subsequently Lose it charged my credit card. Does that mean I have a 2 yr subscription? I was interested in going to a lifetime membership but not when there is no accounting for monies already spent.
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Great App
body: ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù is a great app to manage calories and nutritional data. I have used it for years and it is a constant reminder to keep me within a healthy regime. I have the basic version which works for me well; however, if you want more than the basics then you need to upgrade. They will offer you the ability to upgrade on a daily basis.

title: Love it
body: Been using this app for a month, it has helped me see not only how many calories but how much nutrition I was lacking. With this accountability and exercise I have lost 8lbs this month and feel healthier and stronger.

title: Best weight loss app, hands down!
body: Lose It! Is a wonderful tool to aid you in weight loss.  It is super easy to use and does everything it advertises!  Join the Lose It! community and get added encouragement from other members as well as join in on various competitions, it‚Äôll make you feel more involved and accountable.  I lost 48 lbs in a year using the app to count my daily calorie count üí™üèºüòä

title: Excellent tracker
body: This is so much better than WW!  And free! I actually enjoy using it. It‚Äôs fast and has everything‚Äîall foods and a scanner I don‚Äôt have a lot to lose so tracking is my best tool. I am having good a success losing weight using this as it‚Äôs keeping me on track. Love the visual thermometer at top.  Love the tips. I‚Äôve tried WW and others. This so far is the easiest and user friendly.

title: Calories not correct in food bank
body: I love the convenience of the app overall, I noticed that the food bank of calories is not always accurate.   It seems it is derived from other users input and in a lot of cases, way off.   Now if it is not in my food history I have to cross reference items to ensure they are right.   That is my only complaint.

title: Good app, but...
body: I really like this app.  I‚Äôm disappointed with the last update.  We‚Äôve lost the ability to revise an entry.  Now if the amount is wrong, you can‚Äôt change it.  You have to delete that entry, and then completely renter it.  For example, if you entered a cup of soup but need to update it to 2 cups, it won‚Äôt let you.  You have to delete that item and start over.
response: Apologies for the trouble here! Our engineers are aware of this issue and working on a fix. It'll be out in an upcoming release.

title: Such an easy app
body: I love that every purchased, store bought and even a local meal prep store meals are in the database of this app. So far all the nutritional information has been accurate with the food labels and website nutritional information. The breakdown of nutrition in each meal has helped me in my low carb plan. The charting of weight has helped me see my success and kept me motivated.

title: Worth the $ For Premium
body: I love this app because it‚Äôs very easy to use and make it part of your routine. You can save recipes and set yourself up for success. I used the basic version for months before I got the premium version and I think it‚Äôs worth the money- I‚Äôm very happy that it syncs up with my Apple Watch.

title: You Will Lose Weight!
body: There is no magic formula to the Lose It! app. It is simple math: Enter out how much you weigh, how much weight you want to lose, and the app gives you the formula for success! I love the fact that I can eat more food on days that I exercise. That motivates me! This app is all about accountability. If you are truthful and enter the food you eat properly, success is practically guaranteed.

title: 5 Months 50 Pounds !
body: The app is about as easy as it gets.  If you use it, you WILL lose weight! Fast!  Got my wife started, she‚Äôs lost 15lbs 3 months.  It is actually possible this app saved my life.

title: Really helps
body: This app helped me lose 11 pounds, I feel more energized, happy, and I love the way I look and feel now. I am have a food Phobia of vegtables and I could never lose weight because of it. But with this app I didn't need too eat veggies I just had to count calories of any food and lose it. Its amazing and aswome. I always recomend this to my friends and they all have great results. Its awsome!!!!

title: Works great with my workouts !!!!
body: I‚Äôm big about my calorie intake.  So I found it so awesome that it tracks my calories burned from my work out apps and Apple Watch.  This app works perfect if you are trying to lose weight or even gain weight.  Even if you have the free version it offers you so much to get you in the shape you are looking for.  By far this is the app to get hands down

title: The Perfect Tool
body: There‚Äôs no way I could guess how many calories I am eating without this fabulous tool!  Dialing in almost any kind of food and adjusting it by quantity to get an accurate count keeps me on the straight and narrow.  Am on track to lose 30 pounds in 90 days, without joining a gym or paying for special food.  You eat the correct calories, you lose the weight!

title: Decent but needs an overhaul
body: I‚Äôve been using this app on and off for a few years. It‚Äôs good for tracking what you eat and pretty accurately recording calories burned during exercise. The biggest problem I‚Äôve found is a lot of the nutritional data is wrong when comparing what the app says to what the actual food label says. You can edit the values which is nice but I think the app would benefit from an overhaul of their database.

title: Analytics are insane
body: I'm a huge data guy and this app let me know that I tend to eat less calories on days when I consume cookies. I had long thought that I overate when I didn't fill my cookie craving but it's crazy that this app picked up on it and gave me detailed reports.

title: Lose It
body: This app has helped me tremendously with my weight loss experience. Logging can be tedious sometimes, but watching my caloric input and being able to adjust around the calories I burn working out, in combination with healthy eating and an active lifestyle makes it seem like the pounds are a villain in a game that you need to work to defeat. I‚Äôm sure the premium version is even better and I‚Äôm considering trying it in the future.

user_name: Way too much food in a day.
title: Never knew I was eating so much!
body: I found this free app on my iPhone so I decided to try it. I could find the food I was eating and record the amounts. The app gave me the exact calories I just consumed. It did help me realize how many calories I was eating in one day. The app also has a feature that calculates the best amount for you as an individual should be eating to lose weight. Try it.

title: Use it to lose it!
body: Recently I just started back on the Lose It app. It is really easy to use and it you stick with it, the app. keeps you focused on your goals and the benefit is continued weight loss. This is a great app. And I would recommend it to anyone trying to lose weight or just wanting to change their eating habits. Thank you to the creator of the Lose It app.

title: This really works
body: I have been using Lose It for almost two years. If you are true to it and honestly record your calories it will help you lose or maintain weight. Exercise will be entered when you attach your AppleWatch or FitBit or whichever you use. You can also add in your own exercise, if you don‚Äôt have a AppleWatch etc...

title: Useful tool
body: It is a useful tool to help you on your weight loss/maintenance journey.  There is a vast bank of foods already in their log making it quick and easy to track calories. The optional challenges and reminders also help me to stay committed. I use the free version so the advertisements for premium get in the way and are a bit annoying - but that is understandable, I could just pay to get rid of them.

title: Want to lose it!!
body: I started using ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù six months ago and I have lost 45 pounds. This is the only way that I could have lost that much weight by keeping track of everything I ate and every exercise I did. I cut out all the breads, sweets, and most fried foods. I will continue to use this app as it has helped me lose weight and keep my weight off.  Keeps me accountable.

title: Can‚Äôt read input
body: Love this app, it‚Äôs working for me, but, my complaint is that you can‚Äôt read the food search results completely. You get a few words then...... It would be so helpful if you could see the entire entry, like having an info button that opens the full description of the item so I decide if it‚Äôs the right one for my calorie intake.

title: Was great, now it annoys
body: I really liked the app before. Everything was laid out well, easy to follow and enter. After the last update, you can see they‚Äôre pushing HARD to get you to pay for premium. All the options are there covered by a lock symbol, cluttering up everything. It‚Äôs constantly asking you if you want to upgrade. It‚Äôs extremely annoying and is making me take a look at other calorie trackers, even though I had enjoyed this one most for years.

title: I love this app!
body: Very easy and simple to use, both online and offline. Being able to count your calories and see yourself reach your goal is very satisfying! My favorite thing about the app is the wide and accurate selection of food items which makes it easier to track what you've eaten. Definitely recommend this app!

title: Useful tool for dieting and weight lose
body: Easy to use. Fairly easy to track food/calories each day which makes me feel accountable for everything I put into my mouth. Also easy to track my weight each day. That helps keep me on track.  When I use Lose It consistently I can lose weight. Highly recommend this app.

title: Easy to navigate!
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for over 3 years. Most of the food nutrition from other users is accurate (just pay attention) and it‚Äôs simple to use. I don‚Äôt have the premium version but I‚Äôm happy with tracking my calories and macros. I like the recipe feature too. If I make a new recipe for my family, I can input all of the ingredients and serving sizes.

title: Best food tracking/weight loss app!
body: The Lose It app is my favorite app to track calories and weight.  I have opted for a slow but steady way of losing weight and after so many failed attempts with other programs, this app is actually working!   I‚Äôm feeling great and with the help of Lose It, I‚Äôm beginning to fit into clothes I haven‚Äôt been able to wear in years.

title: Improvements to the app
body: I like the app. However what would make it better for me is a place to records meds that I take on a daily basis. Also having a feature that I can record my blood pressure and a blood sugar. Blood pressure and blood sugar would have to be completely private. But it would give a total picture to my health care providers without me having to write down that information separately.

title: Good macros tracker
body: Only suggestion would be to add a feature that allows you to set and save your macro goals by day for those who carb cycle. It‚Äôs the one feature that makes MyFitnessPal the better option for carb cycling over Lose It. Right now with Lose It, you have to set your macros goals every single day. If it‚Äôs there, it‚Äôs not clearly labeled - my friend and I both have the subscription and don‚Äôt see this feature.

title: Free version is good, paid subscription takes it to another level
body: I used the free version for a few years.   Its good but the paid REALLY keeps you honest, syncs to your Apple watch and has me realized how much i was eating and what part of those calories we‚Äôre killing my diet.  Easily scan food barcodes or you can manually enter say a homemade recipe.  I highly recommend it!!!

title: I‚Äôve had this app for 3 years. Best app ever!
body: I will start by saying that I love this app. I have had it since 2017 and it‚Äôs an amazing app to help you lose weight. It makes everything about counting calories, macros, and water intake so easy. It‚Äôs a very detailed app and the creators have put a lot of work into making it the best one out there. It‚Äôs so worth the $30 for premium. I truly love it.

title: Great app if you consistently USE it
body: I have lost 30lbs using this app and it‚Äôs wonderful. I have recommended it to many people who have noticed my weight loss transformation. Although many people have tried it for a little while and give up when they don‚Äôt see results. It takes time. You have to be committed in order for it to work.

title: Missing features and confusing calorie count
body: 1) you can create and login using ‚Äúsign in with Apple‚Äù but their website does not have an Apple sign in option. So if you set up your account on the iOS app that means you are restricted to only ever using the app and can‚Äôt ever log in on their website.

title: Easy and helpful
body: The app works very smoothly to help me record my calories, and knowing that I am recording them makes me think again about whether or not I really want that cookie or extra helping of dinner.

title: Best and Easiest App
body: I have struggled losing weight with so many other programs that are out there but this has been easy! Tracking my calories works for me, I‚Äôm not limited from any of my favorite things as long as I control portion. The app is easy to use. I have lost 26 pounds in 4 months, I‚Äôm 2 pounds from my target weight but may go for another 5 before maintaining.

title: Needs a place to track meal times.
body: I‚Äôve been faithfully using this app daily for nine months.  It‚Äôs a great tool for tracking meals/nutrition.  I only gave it four stars because I really need to be able to track the time of day that I eat and I don‚Äôt see where this app provides for that.  I‚Äôd also like a small note section for each day. Otherwise, it‚Äôs great!

title: You‚Äôre in charge!
body: I love this app because it works just like weight watchers except it‚Äôs counting calories which is something we should learn how to do on our own. We watchers is great but you live in pointing really don‚Äôt know how do you well on your own without depending on weight watchers. I love this app.  It scans everything and recognizes many foods. You can‚Äôt beat the price either.

title: Change
body: I have loved this app, but now the ‚Äúgoals has been changed. Knowing your average over time is good BUT the most useful to me when I am using it each day is seeing where I stand up to that point that day. I can‚Äôt see that now which probably subtracts more than one star for me but based on past use I only subtracted one. However, the change will start me researching other food tracking apps.

title: Demotivating
body: Something is seriously wrong with this app. I am so sorry I paid for premium. After several of these notices I‚Äôve determined they are just generic and the app is not coded properly to review your data. Been tracking daily for 100 plus days but still get stupid false messages like today‚Äôs another day you screwed up yesterday try today. Developers, if I don‚Äôt log a meal the prior day that doesn‚Äôt mean I screwed up. It means I skipped a meal for a reason. Many times I eat one meal a day. So do many other people. Getting messages you aren‚Äôt on track when you are is really demotivating.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: I love this app, but
body: This app is excellent with tracking my daily caloric intake and track my calories burned with exercise. I love it. I‚Äôve gone from 225 lbs to 177 lbs since March ‚Äò18. I have 7 more pounds left to lose. The only thing I wish were better is some foods I want to log don‚Äôt have the correct number for carbs, fat or protein. I have to manually put them in. Other than that A+

title: Useful, fun way to loose weight
body: I don‚Äôt usually key write reviews of mobile apps. But I downloaded this App 2 months ago - ate less than the allotted calories and got my step bonus most days and lost 15 lbs. It was pretty easy and has definitely made me more conscious of the food I eat. I highly recommend this app. It‚Äôs basically a little weight loss game against yourself.

title: Lose it used to be better
body: When I lost 15 lbs on lose it about 8 years ago, it was a newer app, and very simple to use. The added features and the constant reminders to upgrade to premium get in the way of the functionality that I like and make all of my interactions take longer. I suggest going back to the simpler way. I know that you do not want people to miss the opportunity to upgrade to premium however it makes the app more clunky to use.

title: Log In
body: I liked using the app but deleted it because I had major health problems that would complicate my eating habits. Now that I‚Äôm ready to start back up I have a new phone, iPhone XS. The app will not let me login through Facebook to reconnect with my data of a few months ago. I tried ‚Äúresetting my password‚Äù, but I haven‚Äôt received the email in a few days even after looking in my junk folder. I‚Äôm not sure if there is a glitch in the app but I‚Äôm disappointed.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Best App
body: When I downloaded this application I thought this is an ordinary application, showing me amount of calories and that‚Äôs it, but since I‚Äôve started working with it, I figured out it‚Äôs a really perfect application which considers different aspects of effective issues in terms of losing weight which can significantly help you to manage your weight loss progress.

title: Slowly but surely !!!
body: I‚Äôm trying to take off 10 or more lbs I have gained since starting a medication known to cause weight gain.  I‚Äôve only been using this app for a week; tracking my food intake and exercise activity. The app has helped me to be more mindful of what I‚Äôm putting in my body and I‚Äôve inched down the scale already!!  Easy and friendly app.  Highly recommend

title: Need to Track Potassium and Phosphorus
body: Been using this app for years. It‚Äôs great for tracking nutritional information to a point. But my husband is on a Kidney diet. I scan labels and customize my own recipes, but can‚Äôt keep track of Potassium and Phosphorus. Your Premium update says it allows you to customize, but there‚Äôs nowhere to keep track of this info even if it‚Äôs on the labels.

title: Snap was not there at first
body: I downloaded the app. Couldn‚Äôt find the snap feature.I googled it for help. Did all those steps. Still no snap feature. Waited a few hours and reopened app Now camera is there. Used it today.  You take the picture and then options come up. Which is it. Then I pick a category it most closely fits.  Or add the description.  So far so good

title: Great way to lose weight
body: Tracking has helped me lose over 20 pounds! I like the way it adjusts according to your exercise level each day. There are several ways to enter you food intake, which is very convenient. The only improvement I would make would be to make to challenges on the home screen. Thanks for such a useful app!

title: Love!
body: When I first started this app, I was just wanting to count my calories and set a goal for myself. After a little while I got the premium membership and have loved it! I have learned to set goals for my macros (which I had no clue what that was when I started) and get to see improvements and have celebrations for my success. Definitely will keep using!

title: User since 2013 - love ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù
body: I have used this app online and on my phone since 2013. It has been  enormously helpful in managing my weight and exercise habits. Over time it is great to be able to see patterns of eating and exercise and how they have an effect upon my weight. Have lost about 25 lbs and am maintaining within a few lbs of my goal using the free version of ‚ÄúLose It‚Äù.

title: No automatic time stamping!
body: App is great but one feature it is sorely missing (like many other food journaling apps I might add) is automatic time stamping. For example, say you sleep in and wake up late like at 11:30am, and you eat pancakes; do you categorize this as breakfast or lunch? I rather have the app time stamp my entry than have to categorize it. Also, timing of meals/snacks plays a crucial in weight management. It would be nice to have this information to help improve my dieting.

title: Do not upgrade from the app
body: This used to be great app - 7 years ago. Calorie counting is the only way to control weight and it really works. That said, this app got progressively worse over time. Interface got stupid, data got restricted, barcode scanner finds wrong food, loss of recipes; stupid useless functions added etc. basically psychological warfare to get you to upgrade. Ethics of that aside, I caved to the pressure and recently I tried to upgrade to premium to possibly get a better experience. It does not work. I got charged but the app was not upgraded.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! Can you please email us via help.loseit.com so we can help you get set up with your Premium membership?

title: VoiceOver
body: cIt is a great app for tracking calories. This app pairs with the Up app to give one a rating on meals consumed. It is not VoiceOver compatible, however. After you log your meals and  return to the app to view your individual foods, the buttons representing each recorded food are not labelled for VoiceOver.  Please make your app VoiceOver compatible. I will be glad to give you a rating of 5 stars when this occurs, rather than a 4 star rating. Thanks for your help. Darrell

title: Love This App!
body: My only request would be to have the Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks titles to be bold so they didn‚Äôt blend in so much with the rest of the text.

title: Disappointing Premium Upgrade
body: Wife and I started using your program together to lose weight and enjoyed the features so much we decided to upgrade to Premium. With us sharing the same iTunes account for subscriptions we were disappointed to learn that only one of us can use the Premium features. Your app is fantastic but it‚Äôs disappointing that if we both want to use the Premium features as a couple we have to spend double.

title: Good, but they‚Äôre tricky.
body: I absolutely love this app! I love the ease of it and the fact that I can update my day so easily! The only thing I‚Äôm upset about is that I feel like they tricked me. You‚Äôll be asked if you want to upgrade to premium and you‚Äôre gonna see that it‚Äôs $3.99 per month. The problem is that they charge you for the whole year at once! Same price in the end, but I may not use it for a whole year because I‚Äôm deploying soon. So basically I just threw $40 down the drain.

title: Easy peasy!
body: I enjoy the ap the only reason why I‚Äôm not giving 5 stars is because when I scan barcodes it will pop up a different food item, so for those using this feature make sure you don‚Äôt scan and trust what pops up. If I scan again it will come up with the correct item. It‚Äôs weird cause you can see it initially show up but then it changes when it goes to your log.

title: It keeps you honest
body: Lost it is a great way to start watching what you eat. Log what you want to eat before you do and once you see how many calories most likely adjust your meal or the next meal you will adjust. It is very easy it does take a bit to get in the routine of logging your food but just by logging and watch my I‚Äôm eating I lost 10 pounds in 25 days.

title: My favorite app!
body: I am in Weight Watchers and I secretly use the Lose It app instead of WW app.  I just find this a much better tool to track my food.  The most useful feature is the ability to see your % of proteins/carbs/fats, either by meal and by day.  You can also easily add foods from previous days.  I‚Äôve also tried MyFitnessPal, but ended up coming back to Lose It.

title: Using LoseIt for six years!
body: I thought I owed you guys a review since I‚Äôll bet I‚Äôm one of the few users who‚Äôs had this app since 2011. Mind you, I haven‚Äôt been dieting nonstop during that time, but I did do a big weight loss journey in 2011 with an earlier version of LoseIt and it‚Äôs been my go-to ever since. Now in 2017, the only reason I went 4 stars instead of 5 is the (ugh!) advertising. (But I realize it‚Äôs a reality of staying afloat as an app dev.) Great tool! Thanks guys!

title: Long time satisfied user
body: I have been using Lose-it for about 4 years now and subscribed for life!! I have tried several other popular trackers but none equaled Lose-it!! The ‚ÄúMeals‚Äù feature make it extremely easy to log food from previous meals. Now I like the analysis messages. I only wish it could discern the different types of fats and sugars.

title: I guess this is goodbye
body: BEWARE if you are looking for a completely free app without being forced to upgrade this is not the App for you. Very nice app and I love it EXCEPT after a week they try to FORCE you into buying premium.  Won‚Äôt let you log anymore !   Don‚Äôt like the bait and switch so I‚Äôll just LOSE IT‚Ä¶.the app that is.  Plenty of good free apps out there like My Fitness Pal !  My fitness pal also has a premium OPTION if you want more bells and whistles, but they do not try to force you into and and not let you use the free part if you don‚Äôt want to upgrade !!
response: Sorry for the confusion here! Please reach out to us at¬†reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you with this!

title: Weight loss Journey
body: This app has truly been the game changer in my weight loss journey. I am now fully aware of how much I was overindulging. I like the fact that you can edit most sections. The app also tracks your exercise from the Apple Watch as well, it makes suggestions based on your history. I hardly ever buy apps over $10 but this was the best $39 I‚Äôve ever spent!

title: Great food tracker
body: I have been using lose it for a few years now and has been great. I still have not hit my goal in weight but I am getting there which is good. I like how it tracks all my calories and food intake. I also love how it tracks all my workouts I do. It is a great app if you want to watch your calories and watch how much working out you are doing.

title: begs for more money even if you subscribe
body: I like the features in the app enough that subscribed, but even after subscribing i got pop ups begging for a lifetime subscription.

title: Update Bug
body: After the recent update, the app stopped saving input on weight goal.  Ironic that an app called Lose-It won‚Äôt allow you to save your weight.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: The BEST app for weight loss!
body: I‚Äôve been trying all other popular apps for weight loss and finding myself frustrated, disappointed, and out of a LOT of money! MyFitnessPal recently has decided that try a new premium price that was outrageous and a huge rip off. Lose it offers MORE for a great value, a friendly interface, and has great customer service.

title: Solid app
body: The free app is solid. I lost the weight in six months and have kept it off for almost two years.

title: Use it!
body: It‚Äôs called Lose It! But it works only if u use it! This app helped me lose 60 lbs  about 7 years ago. I had surgery 2-3 yrs ago that‚Äôs affected my ability to exercise, and now Lose It is helping to control control my nutritional intake. I‚Äôve become a walker, which is better than nothing. -Had 27 lbs to lose. Now, it‚Äôs closer to only 20 lbs & Thanksgiving was 4 days ago!!! USE IT!

title: Tons of features and great Support
body: We use this app daily, we don‚Äôt follow the app suggestions on nutrition or numbers because we have our own personal nutrition plan and the app works great to track our macros, calories and weight.

title: Lost 5lbs in 10 days
body: THIS APP IS AMAZING! At first it didn‚Äôt really work well for me, but after 3 days of going over my calorie budget, I gained the willpower to push through for another week of ~100 calories under my daily budget! Pro could definitely give you that extra push, if you need it! I recommend this app to anyone trying to lose weight.

title: Tracking and weight loss
body: I enjoy this app. Very much.  I have to track my salt and sugar intake and this app allows me to see exactly where I am each day.  I tried doing it without the app and failed.  The app actually lets me visualize what I can or cannot eat to feel well.  It has also help me track my blood pressure.  I guess best part it helps me be accountable to myself.

title: Great tool.
body: I like this app because it really helps you take accountability for your weight loss. I did the free trial. My problem was the $40 yearly fee. I‚Äôd feel more satisfied if it was an option to pay monthly, because the $40 is not a one-time application fee. It‚Äôs ongoing anyway so why not also offer it monthly? Nonetheless it‚Äôs a great app and I‚Äôll be purchasing it when I‚Äôm ready.

title: Super Helpful
body: I‚Äôm a dancer and I noticed how I was piling on pounds. This app has helped me keep track of what I‚Äôm putting in my body and has aided me in shedding the weight again! I‚Äôve lost most of the extra weight I‚Äôve put on through this app. I feel happier, more energetic, and healthier overall. I highly recommend this to anyone who is interested in making a physical change.

title: Great app for personal weight loss
body: I have the free version and love it.  Tracking calories have never been easier.  Have seen positive results.  Helps keep myself on track with daily calorie allowance.  Choose the right foods that are filling but low calories and you will see results as well. Remember to take in 1/2 gram of protein for every pound of weight to prevent loosing muscle while dieting!

title: Nutrition dad at grossly in accurate
body: This program is set up very well. It is easy to look up food and add it in your log. However the nutrition data itself is grossly in accurate. For example a serving of watermelon was 300 cal when in actuality it was only about 90. And checking up on the protein content of a chicken leg which was listed as 89 g, it only had 21 g.

title: Excellent app!
body: This is the best calorie counter app I have found and I have looked at a lot of them! They also have quite a few exercises you can track and of course, it can track all your other exercises with watches and such. Upgraded membership is an even better bet if you can swing it because it tracks types of diets, fat, carbs, BMI, cholesterol, water, etc.

title: Highly recommend
body: Love this app, it is so easy to use! I love that I can scan items easily and 99% of the time they are already in the app, and I love that I can make my own recipes as well! I have lost 19lbs since I started using this app seriously and I only have 10 more until my goal weight; which the tracker says I‚Äôll do in just under a month!

title: The best app out there
body: Out of all the apps I‚Äôve tried, this one has been the most helpful. It allows me to see everything. As soon as I downloaded the app, I became a member. I‚Äôve lost more weight using this app than any of the other ones. This app keeps me on track and encourages me. The helpful tips and healthy food ideas are always great. Thank you, Lose it!

title: Easy to use.
body: I am finding this so easy to use . Logging my food is super easy and it‚Äôs been really easy to calculate and log my food. I love the scan feature! Everything I have scanned has been in their system even store brands. Spoils me. I love the logging of my excercise. And the visual knowledge of how it impacts my weight loss.  This app is helping me to finally get the pounds off.

title: User Friendly & Intuative
body: I love how easy it is to scan and log my food. Also, love the tips, recipes, and workouts that come with the whole package. The challenges are very motivating for anyone who is competitive. Can we add the recipes and workouts within the list when logging so it brings up calorie count automatically. One think I love about this app is that I don‚Äôt have to guess how many calories I‚Äôve consumed or burned.

title: Works and becomes routine quick if you‚Äôre serious
body: i first tried this app back in september-ish and i gotta say, keeping what i‚Äôve eaten in check and getting a pie chart of my macros helps me lose weight and keep track of my macros. this apps got so many foods in the search bank and so many useful features that will not only guide you, but motivate you to keep it up üí™

title: Please PUT IT BACK
body: I count on this app to track my husbands blood pressure, weight, sodium, as he is in congestive heart failure. I rely on the blood pressure tracking to help regulate his many meds. Issue is when I record a pressure it takes the input and changes both numbers. So NOT accurate.
response: We're sorry for the trouble! Please email us via help.loseit.com so we can look into this issue.

title: Love this app, could just use a few extras
body: I love Lose It, it‚Äôs made tracking my daily diet so easy, and fun! The only thing I would really like is a feature that not only saves individual food entries but also whole meal entries. For example if you have a certain salad or wrap you make often I wish you could save the portions of the ingredients in one group instead of adding each individually. Otherwise it‚Äôs awesome.

title: Useful but nag posts are annoying
body: This app is very useful but I find the constant nag posts advertising the premium version annoying enough that I may be ditching this app soon. I understand having ads for a free version of the app and periodically asking if I want to sign up for premium, but it‚Äôs annoying to be asked multiple times a day. Every time I open the app, in fact. I also wish you‚Äôd quit the ‚Äúeating X keeps you on track‚Äù line. It‚Äôs stupid, not true, and unhelpful. Thanks.

title: Great! But glitch
body: I love this app! I‚Äôve been using it for a week now and it‚Äôs helped me lose 6 lbs! But there‚Äôs one frustrating bug that has been affecting my app the past couple of days. When I click on my fats for the day nothing shows up and I have to close out the app and come back in for the bar at the top to show up. This makes planning my macros out for the day really frustrating. Please fix!!!

title: Thank you
body: I‚Äôve tried it before, but this time around I‚Äôm taking it seriously. I track everything, and have been eating better and running. As if today, I'm down 30 pounds in two months. I know, without a doubt, I would not have been able to accomplish that without my Apple Watch and my Lose It app. 30 more pounds to go now

title: Lose Ir! Love It!
body: I‚Äôm a Huge fan of Lose It! So many reasons. It‚Äôs so easy to use and customize. All my foods are right there in alphabetic order. I record my exercise and my daily calories are adjusted with a click. My water consumption is easy to log. Just click on every 8 oz glass. My goal helped set my daily calorie allotment. It‚Äôs so wonderful. All you have to do is use It! And Lose it!

title: Finally Losing Weight
body: This app is so easy to use and very helpful.    I was never one to keep a food journal but this is super easy and lets you know how much you should be eating a day.  I think the best feature is being able to scan the barcode on foods you eat.  Also, there is no food or restaurant that I have found that is not on their list

title: Works for me
body: I use to logging my food intake on a note pad until back in November of 2020 then  I found and downloaded this app. I am so happy I did. I started using it the 3rd week in January 2021. This app has kept me on track with calories and is helping me lose weight. I only subscribe for 1 year but I will renew with a life time membership after my year is up.

title: Weighing Choices
body: I am loving using this to track my journey. I have used it in the past and that‚Äôs why I return to it. I am disappointed, however with the units of measure for food. There are a lot of choices that only have grams ounces and pounds as a choice instead of teaspoons tablespoons and cups. It made it a lot easier before to weigh in measure food. It‚Äôs a bit of a struggle now. Even so it is an excellent app and it really helps me stay focused

title: Feature rich
body: We used MyFitnessPal in the past, but it has not been keeping up with times, so we changed to Lose it. Lose is feature rich to help loosing weight. I will in particular mention integration with Apple Watch calorie calculation and ability to share recipes, important when a couple wants to loose weight together.

title: I Love the App
