body: I use it with a fasting app and have lost over 27 pounds. Only complaint is the plant based rhetoric. I started a low carb diet a year ago and my numbers are the best they have ever been. Butter, whole milk dairy products and beef and pork are consumed in good amounts. Traditional food is a lot better for my body than all the processed plant based imitations. Eat well my friends. Life is too short for fake anything.

title: Great library of food and exercises
body: I love this app, I finally signed up for the premium version after years of using the free version and I‚Äôve liked both. I would like some customization options for the measurements section and if anyone is reading this and wants to take a feature suggestion, it would be really cool if I could sort recipes by nutrition content like which foods I make are highest in protein.

title: Satisfied customer 10 YEARS!
body: For 10 years Lose It! has helped me maintain a healthy lifestyle. I recently had to reach out to their customer service for a problem (not on their end but a new app I started using to integrate workouts) and was so impressed with the service I upgraded to the premium. An excellent product that continues to impress a decade later!

title: I‚Äôve lost 25 pounds this year
body: Logging every bite really helps keep you accountable with your portions. This app has so many features to help keep you on track. I did whole30 for three months and got great results but it wasn‚Äôt until I started logging food every day with LoseIt! that I really developed an understanding of calorie intake. This app has become a great habit. Thank you!

title: Great App!
body: It‚Äôs a good value for the price.  I have lost weight successfully the ‚Äúright‚Äù way by determining calories in and calories out.  The calorie budget helps you determine the most food for the least calories.  You can have the higher calorie foods but it takes away from the calories you need for your body to function properly.

title: Beyond Fantastic!
body: I've only had it for a few weeks and I've already lost 4.1 pounds! I have the free version and I'm really, really pleased with it! I feel great, I'm losing weight I've been trying to lose for years and it sometimes comes up with messages saying that I should be proud of myself! If you're trying to lose weight this is an excellent app!

title: Intuitive and shiny
body: Great tracking app with a terrific interface, which is sorely lacking with most others I‚Äôve tried. Makes it easy to add homemade recipes, quickly select common foods, and has a huge database. Need Pro version to automatically import stats from Health app, but worth it for the additional data crunching and extra features.

title: Under Caloric Needs but Lose It! Still applauds you...
body: This morning I accidentally ended my day after only entering in my vitamins. Despite having only eaten 40 calories for the day, Lose It! applauded my progress and told me when I would reach my goal if I kept up the good work and continued to eat like this. THIS IS NOT OK. Yes, there is a disclaimer if you choose to lose too much on your goals page, but this pop up message is in direct conflict with that once seen disclaimer. Please fix this.

title: Super helpful!
body: I‚Äôve been using the app for 6 weeks now & have lost 12lbs. It‚Äôs insanely easy to use, love that you can track other things like sleep, water & measurements. The ONLY improvement that I‚Äôm wishing for is the ability to import a recipe from the web & have the nutrition values calculated (like you can on MyFitnessPal). The lack of this feature isn‚Äôt going to make me jump ship but would definitely add that fifth star :)

title: Love this app!   It‚Äôs life changing!
body: I‚Äôve been doing weight watchers for 23 years and using their app for the past several years to track my weight in food. After using Lose It! for just a couple of days, I was immediately impressed with all the features and functions and I‚Äôm only going to use this app moving forward.

title: I am a loser
body: I lost a total of 27 pounds today is my one year anniversary! It works if you are honest with yourself! Track every morsel that goes into your mouth you will be amazed. The app is user friendly as well. I will be 55 this year and never felt better. I can move so much better than before as I work in a restaurant environment it‚Äôs crucial to be able to move well -MHM

title: User-friendly and helpful BUT
body: I have really enjoyed using the app so far. It is very easy to use. ALTHOUGH, if you want to track other macros, you‚Äôll have to pay for that. I am just counting calories. There are a lot of foods already on file so just can the barcode of your food! The ONLY COMPLAINT I have is that I can‚Äôt log foods ahead of time like if I wanted to log breakfast for tomorrow, I‚Äôd have to upgrade to the full version.

title: Ease of use and a very complete list of items.
body: It took me about 15 minutes to setup.  When search for food or drinks the list is very extensive right down to the exact item you are using for many many  items.  The results on the scale show that when you stick to the plan IT WORKS!!!  You really lose weight.

title: LoseIt now incorrectly reports weekly workout calories and times
body: It appears that LoseIt no longer correctly reports weekly workout times or calories. For example, if multiple input sources record a workout (e.g., Wahoo and Apple Watch) and one of these workouts is deleted, LoseIt reports the sum of these workouts and doesn‚Äôt remove the calories and workout times from the deleted source. This is a new bug that started about three or so weeks ago. Please repair this software programming error.

title: Solid app
body: This is a solid calorie counting app. I wish I had a little more control over how the information gets ported over to Apple Health. For example, I could eat breakfast at 5 AM, but once I punch the food into LoseIt, the information gets ported to Apple Health as having been eaten at 9 AM.

title: Love It‚Äôs Ease of Use
body: It‚Äôs so user friendly & has helped me to journal my meals.  It holds me accountable throughout my day & helps me to keep on track and make better choices.  I have the free app, I don‚Äôt know if the upgraded version provides you with the daily times that calories are consumed because that would be a bonus to track when reviewing your results.

title: Back to Good Health
body: What a terrific program. I am not focusing on weight loss but rather concentrating on good health! By becoming more conscious of quantity and quality of food, I am finding that I truly feel better and have more energy while moving forward toward good health. I have lost 21 pounds in the first month and I can truly say I have not been hungry since day one! Thank you Lose It.

title: Lose it! helps you lose it!
body: I downloaded this app January 2nd of 2017, when it hit me that I really needed to make some huge life changes.

title: Healthy Retirement
body: My wife and I decided to get in shape for our oldest daughter's wedding in June. We are both in our early fifties and also want to make sure we have a healthy lifestyle as we approach our retirement years. Lose it makes it easy to track our calorie intake and our progress towards our goal. We have not upgraded yet but are considering it. I recommend the app to anyone as part of their toolkit to a healthier life.

title: Didn‚Äôt know just how good this app was!
body: Been using for several years (premium) but once I was diagnosed with diabetes really saw what the full value this wonderful app. Allowed me to track many more items than just weight loss and the normal weight related items.  I recommend to anyone who really wants to keep track of their health related items.

title: A Very Awesome and Useful App/Tool!
body: For me, it gives me everything I need to stay focused and on track with my eating and exercising.  From the foods that are already entered, including the awesome use of the bar-code scanner for foods, to being able to create your own exercises.  The Goals feature gives you a visual of your progress...very motivating as well!  It is exactly what I need!

title: Calorie Budget Unrealistic
body: Pros: This app is very helpful, it has helped me get a better understanding of my eating habits, calories eaten and the nutrition of my food. However the calorie budget it sets is laughably low and could be dangerous. For example, I am a very petite female and my calorie budget according to the app is around 800 calories a day. I don't think it's healthy for anyone to eat such a low calorie diet.

title: Used to be great when it synced with the scale
body: Ever since I got an iPhone 6s the lose it scale will no longer send my weight info to the ap like it used to. If they fix that then it‚Äôs a nice partnership for working your own program.

title: Love It!
body: Lose It! has really been a central part of my weight loss (-90lbs in 15mos, YMMV). The first couple of days, inputting my food seemed a bit laborious, but it swiftly became second nature. Really helpful when you have a week when you haven‚Äôt lost weight, and feel like the fates are against you, to be able to look back and see where you went off course.

title: Better than MFP
body: I was using my fitness pal for a long time, but it was difficult to track because of so many different user entries even under ‚Äúverified‚Äù entries. Lose It doesn‚Äôt have this problem with verified foods. This makes it easier to accurately track which in turn, makes it easier to lose weight.

title: Best Tracker of Calories
body: Keeping track of calories is the best way to get the pounds off.  You don‚Äôt have to be exact.  Somewhere close is good.  Sometimes you can‚Äôt find the exact food item and I use a non-sugar sweetener.  Also, 99% of my daily food is made fresh so I know the ingredients in the food item.   You have to be committed to logging each meal and/or snack.

title: It works!
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It! app for many years. It hasChange my life. My sister and I both use it and have lots of different amount of weight. Recently I have been tracking more of a balance with my  macro nutrients. Very user-friendly and I would recommend it to anyone who wants to check their weight and the consumption of food.

title: The only way to lose weight
body: First it is free. Second it is simple. It does everything for you from adding the calories to dividing up the protein vs the carbs and fats to deciding how many calories you should consume. The program recognizes familiar foods and sends them your way each time you log meals so it takes seconds to log.

title: Great App!
body: After going through years with different diet apps, this one, for me is the best. While I  like tracking, I  do like freedom too - I can record my weight daily or weekly. I like the calorie counts they are quite accurate. The upgrades that this company has done have been great, nice and seamless food log. Bonus, adding a recipe isn‚Äôt a task in patience.. Thanks for a great app!

title: Best app I have used
body: This simple app changed my life. It is so easy to use, but so rich in information -it made tracking what I was eating and how many calories I consumed something I actually look forward to doing. And its simple but powerful graphics helped me change how I ate.

title: Lazy nutritionists
body: Works fine for what it is, but the food scale is the most valuable accessory for the calorie counter. So why am I so often forced to edit nutritional information to out in weight calibrations?  I feel like yelling when I see a solid food measured in volume or even worse the ‚Äúserving‚Äù or the ‚Äúpiece‚Äùand I have to go in and edit information to provide the weight conversion. And that‚Äôs even when the selling company provides a weight measure in addition to volume and scanning the barcode. Really not optimal for ease of use.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: iOS14 broken
body: Hi, good day..

title: Good, could be more Keto friendly.
body: Long time 8 year user of premium version.   Good app. Could be better configured for Keto.  No direct fat macro tracking, but carbs proteins there.

title: Great app
body: The true point of this app is to make you cognizant of what you‚Äôre putting into your body. I‚Äôve found myself looking at new, healthier options throughout the day and also taking smaller portions. The barcode scanner is really helpful and convenient. That in mind they have a ton of pre-loaded foods and drinks to make it that much easier to log.

title: Saved me
body: I downloaded this app so I could manage my calorie intake. Little did I know that it would show me how much sodium I was actually eating. I am a vegetarian and I love the ‚Äúmeat alternative ‚Äú foods but I wasn‚Äôt smart enough to see how much salt was actually in the highly possessed food. So this app might have saved my life, and in return I am gonna right a good review. It‚Äôs the least I can do!

title: This app saved my life
body: Since I began using this app, I‚Äôve reached my goal of losing 100 lbs!  This app along with exercise really saved my life!

title: Great App
body: My wife and I have been using this app for over a year now. We love how easy it is to log food including scanning bar codes. One issue we have is sharing recipes. Its easier when we cook to log things as recipes when we eat them every week but the sharing feature doesnt always work. I created a few recipes and they are stuck in my wifes pending and wont let her accept them.

title: Fun calorie counting!
body: I‚Äôm just starting out with weight loss, and within two weeks of low - moderate exercise, eating lots of healthy foods and snacking, I‚Äôve lost 5lbs in my first week! I do suggest having a 24hr fast beforehand so it won‚Äôt seem like you‚Äôre starving yourself and it prevents going over the calorie limit! Fun app to see how much I was eating beforehand! Easy food lookup and guilt free calorie counting :)

title: Awesome
body: And to think this was impossible, this go around, to drop this weight!  Everyone says at your age, not probable.  Nonsense. Eat a balanced diet using the pyramid food guide and this site to keep you honest, along with the ability to enter your own recipes for accuracy in nutrients and charting, as well as keeping track of exercise, you cannot fail.  This a wonderful tool.

title: User friendly but...
body: Way too many different calorie counts on the same exact food is way too confusing. Also many of the calorie counts are ‚Äúper piece‚Äù instead of by weight. Big calorie difference between a small piece and big piece, for goodness sake. I end up having to bounce out to Google for accurate calorie counts. That‚Äôs my only complaint.

title: Love this app
body: This was the first app I downloaded when I started to try to lose weight. It has been so helpful. I thought weight loss would be impossible so I never tried before. This app helped me to simply keep track of what I‚Äôm putting into my body and it has helped me to lose weight by cutting back portions and eating better choices.

title: It Really Makes a Difference
body: I fart blocking my calories for a long time. But my daughter who is a certified personal trainer told me that I had to log everything I put in my mouth. What a difference it makes in awareness of the large quantities, frequency and amount of food that I used to eat. It‚Äôs truly helping me change my eating habits forever. And I lost 5 pounds my first week!

title: Lose It!
body: This is the first weight loss diet/plan that I‚Äôve been on actual works. I‚Äôm losing weight while still being able to eat what I want. I like the break down of fats, carbs macros etc. I‚Äôve done all the fab diets keto, Atkins, weight watchers and none have worked for me as this app has. Losing the weight slowing and learning what I‚Äôm eating is going to help me keep the weight off long term!

title: Expertise problem
body: This is a really nice app but the only problem I encountered was when I went to view my exercises, I would go out without adding it and when I leave and go to the home menu for some reason it always adds it... and it‚Äôs been super frustrating. I‚Äôm glad that this app has done really well for me everywhere else but it‚Äôs just this one problem that can be fixed.

title: So easy to use!
body: I love this app. I am working with a Dietician to lose weight and I use Lose It! to track a my food. I track calories, carbs, protein, fiber and water. I paid for the Premium version and it is worth every penny. You have to watch the values of some foods entered for accuracy but the scanner works very well and there are many more foods than the Weight Watchers app.

title: Good but
body: I was happy to upgrade to the yearly purchase. Then I see they‚Äôre asking for a lifetime purchase. Now I‚Äôm seeing shady moves by this company. I can‚Äôt get it out of my head they‚Äôre just looking for money. If they hid the lifetime membership i would respect that but smack in the middle. I think I saw it offered in 3 different places. Ad overkill. As for everything else I like the setup. I used it for a couple days and already can feel the improvement. Good job on everything else.

title: Changed my life!
body: I suggest this app to anyone who wants to lose weight. I started in March ‚Äò18 and have lost over 30 lbs. I reached my goal of 24 lbs. in about 9 months. I NEVER thought I would be a calorie counter, but this app makes it fun! I have cut out NOTHING that I want to eat or drink; it‚Äôs all about portion control. Two of my friends use it, too. We‚Äôve lost a combined weight of 100 lbs! üéâü•Ç

title: It's pretty good
body: Like all app makers, their primary goal is to make money. I have found the app useful in working toward my weight loss goals. In my idealistic world, there would be apps for the intrinsic value not so much for the cash value... but I realize this is not the way the world works... give it a try and see if it doesn't help you to be more accountable in your eating, the point is to keep track of everything you eat.

title: Really helps
body: So many great settings and features-even on the free version- being able to track your progress and visually see how many calories you're consuming makes all the difference. Lose it! Also gives you little badges for achievements so it almost feels like a fun game. This app has been key to my weight loss.

title: Would not keep track without Lose It
body: It is so easy to keep track a number of areas I target. Initially it was calories and sugar, then I was informed I had diabetes. After that Lose It became essential. I purchased the advanced app which has helped me shrink out of three pant sizes, get my blood glucose under medical benchmarks. Partnered with a diabetes app, I can keep track of what and how much I ate that effected my glucose levels and my weight. I would never have kept such a comprehensive paper list.

title: Great...except for ‚Äúpop ups‚Äù wanting you to upgrade.
body: I really like the app. It‚Äôs a great way to follow your calorie intake. I especially like the way you can create foods that you eat a lot and it stores them for future use. The meal tracking is also nice.

title: Looove this app!
body: I love this app! I can scan my foods and eat proper proportions. It also connects with Apple heath to notify me on my exercise & daily steps. It helps me not to over do my eating and motivates me when I am eating under my calorie amount! I do wish that the weekly log would start on Sunday‚Äôs & not Monday‚Äôs or at least if it could be changeable. Other than that... no problems!

title: Ok for tracking calories
body: My only complaints are the huge discrepancy between this app and Fitbit with regard to calories burned on total steps, as well as the need to pay for those two to connect. I don't/won't pay a monthly fee. And there is an annoying "one-time" event that occurs every day when the app is opened. But on the whole, this has been a good way to track calorie intake and I've lost the pounds I targeted.

title: Better than my fitness pal
body: I hate tracking my food and have tried all kinds of trackers, but never manage to stick with it.  I‚Äôm really enjoying this app.  I like how it constantly lets you know when you be at your target and allows much more modification than MFP for free.  I ended up buying the plan (again much cheaper than MFP), but it completely wasn‚Äôt necessary.  I would highly recommend this app.

title: Life changing
body: I started tracking in August 2016 and lost 60 pounds by August 2017. I‚Äôve spent the last 9 months maintaining my weight. I would never have been able to do this without LoseIt. I had no idea how many calories I was eating and it became clear I was overeating, to put it mildly. I love that food is easily searchable; it makes everything so much easier. Thank you!

title: Total game changer. Just what I needed.
body: Being able to see my health and nutrition as data is exactly what I needed to create the willpower and motivation to make better choices every day.

title: This really works!
body: I am a Life Time member of Weight Watchers, but I just wasn‚Äôt losing weight. There were so many Zero Point foods and I was eating way too much of all of them!

title: Love it!!!
body: Honestly, my weight loss journey would crash just as fast as it started. That was until I got lose it and in the first two weeks, changes happened. Results came. I lost three pounds and will still continue to lose more. My workout and everything matters and lose it helps me keep track of it.

title: You Lost 4 Stars Today
body: I have been logging my calories with LoseIt since 2016.  Prior to that I used other apps that were similar but I liked your interface and the way you verified certain food items among other things.  Love how you‚Äôre integrated with Siri.

title: Sharing! Why did you remove it?
body: When on a diet and in a relationship the two people don‚Äôt eat the same amount of food. So one, usually, preps the meal and needs the ability to share INDIVIDUAL food items with the correct weight measurements with the other person.
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Very helpful and convenient!
body: I lost 50 lbs with this app, what was pure guesswork before is now organized and easier to manage. With it I was sure when I‚Äôve had enough, and what foods I‚Äôve been eating that had too many calories. It also helped by connecting with my exercise apps as well as letting me track calories burnt from exercise.

title: Works!
body: I switched to Lose It! From My Fitness Pal and so happy I made the move! My Fitness Pal was broken all the time and fixes came slowly so I decided to switch to Lose It! . Lose It! Is on their game.. only experienced one bug so far and it was fixed in 2-3 days. Support was immediate and I knew when a resolution was coming.  Lost 30 pounds and am a lifetime member now.

title: Has the basics down
body: Good for weight loss, but does not otherwise work well for tracking healthy eating.

title: Good but calorie data is often unreliable
body: The app works quite well and will help you lose weight when used consistently. However, take care when logging foods. Unless you are scanning barcodes for every food you eat, the calorie counts for many foods, including allegedly verified ones, are incorrect and wildly variant. This can make having an accurate understanding of your consumption difficult.

title: It was good until it the app stopped working,took my money!!
body: The app was working fine for a week, and I was using it daily. I was really having a good time using it. I even bought the $10 subscription for a year. Then the whole app stopped working. It would try to update, or it would freeze and log out of the app, or my favorite, completely shut off my phone. So yeah, it was a good app until I got ripped off, and I can‚Äôt find where to get Tec support. Also it won‚Äôt even let me delete the app off my phone.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Great tracker
body: The only complaint I have is that the paid version is advertised too much. Almost time I try and access the app, it pops up to try and get me to buy premium. I don‚Äôt want premium. Never gonna get premium. I‚Äôm okay with the advertisements for other products for the developer to make money, but I really wish they would tone down the bombardment of ‚ÄúPremium is XX% off for limited time!‚Äù

title: Beware!!
body: They have mastered the way to cash in directly from your credit card without you having any control over it. I‚Äôm unable to cancel my subscription even after following their instructions to cancel the app, when I go there there is not an option to cancel...only to renew it ! When I contacted them about it they sent me an automated email saying that I have to go through Apple to cancel my subscription. When I go to my subscriptions in Apple the app doesn‚Äôt show there either for me to cancel it. Feeling robed here... I mean what is the difference?

title: Wow
body: Nothing was working for me. I was determined to lose but had no tools to help me. When I finally had enough I found this app. I decided why not? I am soooo glad I did it. Put in what you eat each time. It only takes a second and is easy to use. So far I have lost almost 7 pounds. I‚Äôm so excited and proud of my new lifestyle. You can be too. There‚Äôs hope. :)

title: Love this app
body: Always had trouble losing that stubborn 5 pounds. My dietician daughter told me that research supported the benefits of journaling/logging daily calories consumed. I tried but gave up each time. It was daunting to track the calories and log the foods I consumed daily. This app is incredible! It has made it easy to know exactly what I need to do daily to lose weight, and I am!!

title: Suddenly Not My Favorite
body: I had been happily using this app for more than 2 months. Lately, every time I logged on, I was asked to upgrade. The basic app was all that I needed, so I did not upgrade it.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on removing this, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Loving the Loss it App
body: I love using the Lose It! app. It has helped me so much, I have lost weight and always keep track of everything I eat. I know that I have to stay within my calories. I don't go by one day without using my lose it app. It's part of my life. I have used other App but loss it is my favorite.i don‚Äôt ever go to sleep with putting in my calories.

title: Why not more nutrition info?
body: It‚Äôs a great app, my only major complaint is that unlike My Fitness Pal, Loose it doesn‚Äôt show you nutrition like iron, and calcium, or saturated fat. I really liked this feature in My Fitness Pal and would like to have even seen Magnesium included. Maybe in the future? I may go back to My Fitness Pal after my subscription. I do love this app though.

title: Helped so much
body: Okay so I‚Äôve been having trouble keeping track of my calories. This app helps you count them and always know how many calories are in what. Like if it‚Äôs packaged you can scan it. And if it‚Äôs not packaged you just look it up and it tells you how many. So easy it‚Äôs only been three months and I‚Äôve lost fourteen pounds. It‚Äôs a lifesaver

title: Data driven results
body: This app is amazing. It not only helps you track calories, but other metrics too such as macros, food types, weight, blood glucose, etc. The best part - data analysis! Trends! Even incorporating DNA?!? This is way more useful than WW. And a fraction of the cost. Oh, and it works offline! The interface is quicker, more smooth, and less buggy too. Color me impressed.

title: Lose It App
body: I love how the app has prompted me to be more aware, on a daily basis, of what and how much food I‚Äôm consuming. It has definitely been a tool that has helped me to facilitate a significant amount of weight loss. I look and feel so much better than I did, prior to using the app. Thank you Lose It for aiding me in a major life change with my eating habits and my health!!!!

title: Easy and informative
body: I have tried a couple of apps to track food and landed on this one as my favorite! Although I am using meal replacement shakes and bars, I know once I reach my goal, this app will be a lifesaver to show me how many calories I have left. I do think the paid version would be much better bc it allows you to track water.

title: This app is exceptional
body: It does what it says. I‚Äôve been counting my calories for a week and a half and so far so good. I lost three pounds the first week combined with exercise, and I‚Äôm very pleased. However, after the latest update, I‚Äôm concerned. If I decide to update, will I no longer have the option to search for items in grocery stores and restaurants?

title: Helping me stay on track
body: I need to count calories for accountability.  Lose It! makes it incredibly easy to log food and keep the journal going.  I love the option to scan bar codes and the catalog of foods already entered is huge.  In less than 2 weeks I‚Äôve lost 2.5 lbs and only getting more money motivated to stay on track.

title: Great motivational app
body: With logging all the food and drinks you take in everyday absolutely makes you think about what you will take in. So far I have lost 7 pounds in 1 week. Logging food is super easy with the scanning feature. Now I‚Äôm still using free version but I will be upgrading to get the full benefits this app has to offer.

title: Great App - Always Lose Weight When I Use
body: Trick to weight loss is to burn more than you eat and to know when there doing that. This app makes to easy to I input your food and exercise. My only criticism is the restaurant menus are not always current and I‚Äôd always like the option to weigh food in ounces or grams as I use a digital scale. But those are small inconveniences

title: Good Guide to monitor yourself
body: I love this app because I can get a first hand look at how many calories I intake in. I like the fact that it can break down the carbs, salts and proteins by grams and it can be viewed as a pie chart. The fact that my watch and phone can sync my steps makes it a great resource for my daily exercise so I can view energy used and calories taken in.

title: Loyal User
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It since 2015. I like it better than Fitbit, Apple Health, my fitness pal, etc. but a few things make me crazy....

title: Used to love this App
body: When it functions it‚Äôs an awesome app. However after recent updates it frequently freezes, crashes abruptly, or most currently ‚Äúopens‚Äù with a blank screen and nothing ever loads. I‚Äôll give it another go if they manage to fix this problem soon. Otherwise I‚Äôm moving on to a different fitness app.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Great Tool for Weightloss
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years. When I use it, I make better choices and lose weight. When I don‚Äôt use it, I gain weight.

title: Net Carbs Broken?
body: I love this app and have used it for years. I have lost 60+ pounds with the help of Lose It.  So I give it a high mark.

title: Lose 20 lbs!
body: From August 20 to November 2! This app has TONS of foods that you don‚Äôt have to look up by ingredient. They show calories from foods at Costco, Dominos, In n Out, Walmart and lots of brands. I log everyday and I have the free version... counting calories is successful for me. I can eat whatever I want but I‚Äôm mindful of my calorie ‚Äúbudget‚Äù and rarely go over but if I do I can ‚Äúuse‚Äù my ‚Äúbanked‚Äù calories.

title: Hard to lose weight mom
body: This app is awesome! I have lost over 30 pounds with this app and it was really easy to use! My Son got me introduced to this and he has lost over 100 pounds with this app. Which inspired me to get this app too! What I really like about it is that it makes you accountable for everything you eat and do. It is so easy to use. Thank you!

title: Vero Beach Fl
body: I started using this app one month ago. So easy to use and very accurate. I track all meals and all calories so easily. Helps you realize what you are really consuming. Like anything else you have to be disciplined to track every meal. In one month I‚Äôve lost 8 LBS. That was my monthly goal. Got 2 more months to hit my target weight. Highly recommended.

title: Hard Task Easier
body: Best device/program for long term weight management available. Allows one to track weight, food intake , exercise and water necessary to lose weight and keep it off.

title: Workout calories
body: I love this app! My only critical comment/suggestion is for the workout calories. I like that I can exclude them from my net calories consumed for the day, but instead of showing ‚Äú0‚Äù calories expended for workout in the top info bar, maybe show a shaded number? So we can see how many estimated calories were consumed during workouts?

title: Love this app
body: I‚Äôve gone between Lose It and MyFitnessPal a few times, and it seems like MyFitnessPal comes up with useful app features first, but Lose It does them better.

title: Badges are given randomly
body: I have been on this app for a week and really like it but I find they give the badges out without a person earning them. I just got the exercise buff badge for two weeks but have only been on the app for the one week. There have also been some other questionable information given but still enjoy the app and will get the paid version.

title: Lost 42lbs
body: Lose It combined with intermittent fasting and exercise helped me lose 42 lbs in just over six months. Just do your best to enter all of your meals, water, and exercise. Careful not to intake more calories than you burn, and you‚Äôll lose all the weight you want. Slowly manually lower your calorie budget goal over time to get over the periods when you plateau. Good luck!

title: Needs Improvement
body: This app gives way too many calories right off the bat. There is no way to manually change your calorie intake and while I get that you can eat under the budget they give you, it‚Äôs still ridiculous that I have to look at what they‚Äôre suggesting. If I wanna lose 2 pounds a week, Lose It says to eat 2000+ calories a day. The whole app is busy, unorganized and measures things ina funky way or when you scan a barcode, the barcode is wrong. Either way it wasn‚Äôt worth the $20 I paid for the year. Uninstalling and going back to myfitnesspal.

title: Easy to use and it works.
body: This is my third time using Lose It!  Some nice improvements.  It's just an easy way to track your calories (in and out) and watch your progress.  All my previously entered food data were still available.  Easy syncing with my Apple Watch 2 for automatic credit for Active Calories  burned.

title: Great Calorie Tracker
body: This app is quick and easy and calculates the food I eat through out the day with no trouble. There‚Äôs tons of options for example; hard boiled eggs, scrambled eggs, over medium eggs. Instead of just ‚Äúeggs‚Äù you can specify what kind, how many, there are options for added salt or pepper, etc. This app is really detailed and tracks breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and exercise intake, I love it.

title: Love it!
body: This is my favorite weight loss app. So far, I‚Äôve lost 20lbs. My only suggestion is the ability to create a food and it calculate all the macros for you instead of having to add in and plug it yourself. That‚Äôs hard to do and extremely time consuming. For example, if I have a smoothie, I want to be able to add spinach, strawberries, banana, yogurt, honey, coconut juice and whatever else I add into one thing. Other than that, I absolutely love it!

title: Great if you only have one goal
body: This app is really really effective at helping you achieve your weight and health goals. The only drawback is if you want multiple goals, or if you achieve your goal and want to set a new goal you will have to upgrade to the premium version which is about $40, probably worth it but I'm going to try out my fitness pal which has similar functionality for free

title: Great!!!
body: It is simple to use, no pop up ads like the other apps and it has exercise and weight tracker on top of the calorie tracker with scanner or search mode. I lost almost 20 pounds in 2 months with just calorie search. Had no idea that a slice of dominos pizza had 500 per slice!!! I could eat 3 salmon burger patties from Costco for the same calorie count and it is much healthier !!!

title: Great app
body: Excellent app. The best one on he market for tracking calories and exercise. I have personally lost over 20 pounds tracking calories and exercise on this app. Of course strong will had just as much to do with it:)

title: Everything but the nutrients
body: I use Chronometer to track all the same things LoseIt tracks PLUS micro and macro nutrients. If LoseIt could also have a nutrient tracking feature, it would be even better. What LoseIt has that Chronometer doesn‚Äôt have is the achievement badges, as well as the social aspects, such as the ability to form competitive goal focused teams.

title: What did u do??
body: Have loved the app for over a year but had to uninstall and reinstall recently. U added this slider for how fast u want to lose and it doesnt work properly. It reverts from 941 to 1161 and cant get it somewhere in between! Tried twice. Better to just say when ud like to hit your goal and let that calculate the # of calories per day to get there.

title: Living Life  longer
body: Hey I am bigger guy went to my Primary Doctor on October 9 he told me control my weight and get exercise well this app lets me do it my story short and sweet my Goal is 200 lbs I was 324 lbs when I seen him the App works great with the food you put into your diet Daily  long road to go but at 54 years young I want to be around a lot longer enjoy my family üòéüòé

title: Stop the madness
body: I really used to like lose it and used it faithfully. I have lost a lot of weight (not using lose it, though, but I do use it to track my weight. But it‚Äôs insane that they offer me the premium version ‚Äúon sale‚Äù almost every single time I log into the app sometimes that‚Äôs 5 times a week! They‚Äôll even say ‚Äúlast chance ‚Äú then offer it again the next week and you have to dismiss the offer before you can use the app. I‚Äôm sorry but don‚Äôt offer a free version that‚Äôs so annoying.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

title: Trim & Healthy!
body: Lose It! is a fantastic app! It makes logging one‚Äôs calorie intake really easy. And, the more you use it, the easier it gets!

title: Love this app!
body: When I first started using this app, I was impressed. I have been logging for a few month and now I absolutely love this app. Being able to log my food and water in one place is wonderful. I did ask the makers to allow more blood sugar readings and poof... now we can. That is fantastic. Yes , the premium is worth the money. I definitely love this app!

title: Great app tracks fat, carbs,proteins ...
body: ...Micro-nutrients and calories, etc. I never thought I would keep track of my food but scanning in products makes it easy. Glad I bought it because it took 3 weeks of gaining back my 2 pound loss when I realized its not the calories it‚Äôs the fat. Time to start over. Oh the down side haven‚Äôt mastered entering  my recipes. Enjoy.

title: Awesome tool!
body: I have been "obese" for years. Reached a new all time high weight and decided things HAD to change. A friend suggested this app and 'dieting' has never been easier. This still takes will power but makes dieting easier because you can budget for treats and still get to indulge (maybe just one cookie instead of four)! Love this app!

title: Lose Weight and Get Your Nutritional Needs in Order
body: I absolutely love this app. I was on the Keto diet forever and while I did lose weight at a certain point that stopped. Without fruit and other healthy foods I began to have health problems. With lose it I am learning to use portion control and make healthy choices! Thank you for this life changing app.

title: Mostly great for a free app
body: The free version has most of what I need to keep myself on track. The ability to scan foods and choose past food items is very helpful.

title: Fantastic
body: This is the best app on the store to keep you on track. Simple to use, it is very intuitive and will send a gentle reminder if you forget a couple of meals. Not overly annoying, just exactly right. This app is helped me tremendously. I never purchase any kind of memberships or anything, but I did for this app. It is worth it. The free version is amazing however.

title: Helps Keep Me On Track
body: I log my food no matter what is going on. Most days I do good at it. Other days I eat whatever but, I still log it in. The reason for this is that I am diabetic. When my sugar goes up or down I can always go back and see what I had to eat. This helps tremendously to see trends, bad habits, and also to see what works great! Great app.

user_name: Not a fan of this app!
title: Better than noon
body: Database is more extensive than noon and easier to use.  I wish the app converted to other units easier. For example if all it has is grams then the app should know how many cups that is and ounces and other measurements. Tired of converting things in another app and coming back to what ever loseit has. It‚Äôs an app on a computer. Do the work for me.

title: Get This App, It Shows results!
body: This is an 100% honest review.

title: Best weight loss app!
body: I‚Äôve tried a number of weight loss apps but this is the one that stuck! It‚Äôs cheap, easy to use, and actually works. I have it synced to my scale and steps so it incorporates that data into my weight loss plan. It also has barcode scanning for logging and you can add your own foods and recipes. So far I‚Äôve lost 10lbs! It just works!

title: Really great app, one caveat
body: I love this app, and have used it for years. The interface is intuitive/user friendly, the library of foods is extensive, the badges are fun, and it‚Äôs cool to join groups and do challenges. My only issue is that, in the free iPad version, it does an update almost daily, even though it says it ‚Äúshouldn‚Äôt happen too often.‚Äù I don‚Äôt have the same issue with the one on my iPhone.

title: do not download this app
body: this app is so unbelievably toxic and promotes disordered eating. when i had the app it made me think that if i ate more than 1,400 calories it was the end of the world. it made me think that i needed to eat things that had a lower calorie count rather than things that were actually good for me and fuel my body. it promoted me to want to burn off everything that i ate by exercise so i could have that low number of calories, rather than eating food a let it fuel my body with the nutrients that it needed. because of these poor habits i couldn‚Äôt excel in sports due to malnourishment and enjoy the foods that loved. there are so many different ways to lose weight without this app; i lost 15 pounds over quarantine after deleting this app and just listening to my body and practicing healthy habits. this app is very dangerous for young girls and boys who are self conscious or worried about their weight.

title: Loosing the lbs in FL
body: Great app. It‚Äôs simple to use.  The free version lets you track your weight, food intake, exercise and calculate the amount of time and weight loss necessary to meet your goal. It even has a scanner feature that lets you track calories etc...from food labels. I definitely would recommend this to anyone trying to loose weight.

title: Good app
body: This app has helped me drop a few pounds already. My only complaint is that I am unable to manually upload my miles walked from my Fitbit without upgrading to premium. This is annoying because I do more than 5 miles a day on a regular basis.  Is there anyway to manually input your exercise without the premium option?

title: Daily log friendly
body: This app allows a broader list of foods to track. I like the macronutrient tracking lends a more accurate account to my daily intake and also find the exercise log equally as accurate!

title: Great App - food selection needs work
body: Love the app but wish foods added by others were not visible to me until verified by you. Soooo many duplicates and incorrect restaurant information. Maybe it would be better if clear instructions were provided. For a long time, I didn‚Äôt even know I could create food items with nutritional information from my work cafeteria.

title: Best weight lost app ever!!!!
body: I have been using this app for three years and I must say I first I was a little skeptical on downloading it but when I did it change my life forever. With this app I lost 80 pounds it has all the foods that I usually eat and it always has the right calories, I recommend this app if u want to loose weight in a healthy way.

title: Outstanding app
body: Ive used this app for years to track my food intake and help me lose and stay at the right weight. Now with the new iOS widgets the app is even easier to use. I upgraded to the lifetime premium membership because I see that without tracking what I eat, I will eventually have weight problems again.

title: Consistency
body: This is a great app!! It has it all to help you track your food intake, exercise, and had tossed in a reward system.  All you have to do is stay consistent with entering your information consistently.  You are still the engine that drives your weight loss success.  It‚Äôs hard but goals are achievable and this app does provide good assistance with that.

title: Lose It, free version
body: Remember this app is just a tool to help in weight loss. I‚Äôve done real well with it in counting calories and it‚Äôs a adequate device for that. When it comes to figuring out the calories in some foods it‚Äôs just listed as ‚Äúper serving‚Äù without telling you what a serving is. I‚Äôve lost 25 lbs in 3 months, this app helps me determine where I stand throughout the day with my intake and let‚Äôs me know when I‚Äôve had enough. Get yourself a food scale to accompany this app. Good luck

title: Confusion
body: The customer support is non existent. The lack of info being the same on each device is beyond frustrating. In addition, their ‚Äústep by step‚Äù on line support is not accurate. How hard is it to record each step and accurately transcribe that info? And most important, you need to alter your info if you actually want to lose weight. The amount of calories they tell you to have according to standard weight guidelines - would only help you to maintain weight not lose weight. So really this is just a calorie recording device. A frustrating one.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: More than Expected!
body: And exactly what I need. Basically I need a food/calorie tracker & goal tracker. This app offers both via an intuitive, easy to use  interface (& I‚Äôm & grandmother). There‚Äôs much more available to motivate your healthy eating & exercise habits, too. Calculating home cooked meals, eating out or already prepared foods presents no problems. Very well thought out app!

title: Super helpful
body: I have honestly never been able to lose weight until now, and this is honestly such a helpful tool! It really does encourage healthy weight loss, and I think it gives very helpful and realistic goals that show you how much you should eat per day. (i have also definitely learned the value of zero calorie drinks)

title: Very helpful to stay on track...
body: I love this app and it really helps me make good choices and stay on track. I enjoy the option to have it sync with my Fitbit and get a read on how my day is going. The only reason I gave it four stars and not five is that I am a little frustrated by the recipe option and find it hard to use.

title: Great useable app
body: Free app is very useful/somewhat motivational.  Upgraded to Premium (great price!) and this app is changing my perception on how easy weight loss and management can be.  I am very impressed with all the options to be informed on my food intake/and even more impressed each time my Fitbit gives me bonus calories!  Great job developing this app,looking forward to the year ahead.

title: It works!
body: The lose it App really works.  My husband (who hates apps) lost 50 lbs and kept it off for three years thanks to lose it.  I lost 15.  I tend to get off track sometimes but when I do - getting back to lose it helps me to get back to where I should be.  Try it - you have nothing to lose - except extra ‚Äúyou‚Äù

title: Works if committed
body: Using this app since 2015 and love it but making things that used to be free part of the ‚Äúpremium‚Äù package turned me away from this APP. Used to be able to sync the my Fitbit and other apps for free and now you must pay for the premium to have that capability. Going to find another calorie counting APP now. I will not pay for things that were once free. Plus too many ads now.

title: Awesome App :)
body: I love, love, love this app. So easy to use, user friendly, inspiring. I‚Äôm on a 135 day streak of entering...so on board thanks to you guys. I love the new updates we get occasionally. One feature I miss (unless it‚Äôs somewhere), is when inputting your daily calories and completing the day, it used to tell you a date you‚Äôll reach your goal by. I miss that! Overall, this is a great app üëçüèª

title: A few bugs but fantastic!
body: So far, I‚Äôve lost 5kg in two months using the app. I have my off days, but I exercise and try my best. This app helps a lot!

title: Watch out for auto renewal!!!
body: This pro version is expensive at $40 and auto renews. You don‚Äôt get a ton of features with pro. I‚Äôm not sure it‚Äôs worth it though I do like the app. It becomes work and a bit burdensome to constantly enter data but the app tries to make it easier if you eat the same foods over and over and over.

title: Love it!
body: I may have inadvertently posted a negative review because I thought I was under Noom reviews...  which is why I am back to ‚Äúlose it‚Äù.  After trying a much higher priced diet and tracking app (Noom) I now know that I am getting so much more for my money with Lose It.  Love the App.  Barcode food data base is huge (compared to other Apps).  I will not stray again.

title: It‚Äôs great for normal dieting, but....
body: I am on a keto diet. I would like to see it work there as well. Especially when dealing with nutrients such as potassium. I would like that addd to nutrients we can track as that is very important. I struggled with dry mouth for three weeks and found the big reason was my body‚Äôs need for potassium and with keto I have to get it differently. Please add potassium to the nutrient tracker.

title: Lost nearly 100 lbs
body: Great app. Easy to log food and I followed budget and met my goal.

title: Best App to count calories!
body: Love this app! It helped me go from over 4,000 calories to an average of about 2,500 a day. I lost about 20lbs in about 2 1/2 months. At first I felt like I was starving myself, so my advice would be to do the easiest goal first then work up to a more aggressive goal. Just becoming more aware of the foods I was eating helped me make better food choices. Great app!!!

title: Best Diet and Fitness Tracker!
body: I've been using this app on and off for about 6 years now. This year I subscribed to the premium features, and I've been keeping up with it every day. The app is so simple to use, and it makes keeping track of my diet and exercise so easy! I would absolutely recommend it to a friend (I actually have already)!

title: Lost 20lbs in 2 months!
body: This app helped made it so easy to log calories. It has a huge data bank of foods. It also saves previous meals. It made me aware of all the crap I was consuming and I cleaned up my diet. It also pulled the workout data from my Apple Watch and calculated the net calories I consumed for the day. It‚Äôs awesome! Be consistent and it‚Äôll work for you!

title: Loved It But Will Not Update Now
body: I have loved and recommended this app to many! I have never had an issue with it updating until this latest version. It just will not update. I deleted the app to start all over, and now it will not download. At all. I still have it on my iPad. The idea of switching to a new program makes me sad because after 2 years, all of my regular foods were saved. I don‚Äôt want to start over, but I need it on my iPhone.
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Suggestion: Energy Level
body: Can you add an option to track energy levels?  A report that would show the results of energy level based on food and sleep. It would probably be a question a few times a day asking how energetic or tired one is feeling. Then the feedback would analyze how much protein, fat, sugar, etc was consumed and also the amount of sleep.

title: Good app with suggestions/requests for improvement
body: I‚Äôve used the app off and on and find it beneficial. I paid for the upgrade for two years.  Then went back to free version whileI search for something that allows me to indicate time that I ate and add a note about a particular food or meal.  I have food allergies and sensitivities.  I wish that Lose It would allow me to add a note about any food item.

title: Disappointed
body: I love this app, but I have had it now for many years and noticed water intake was removed unless you pay for a subscription and a daily request to that requires me to tap ‚Äúno‚Äù has become so irritating. I just want to log my calories and move on. It certainly feels like the developers want you to buy premium or scram. I did so well while my Dad and I used this to encourage each other and have a healthy competition but now I may need to search for a new app. Very saddened by corporate greed.
response: Thanks for your feedback on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make greats products for our members. To provide additional suggestions or for more information, contact us here: reviews@loseit.zendesk.com

title: Love this app so much just one change!
body: I really love this app I‚Äôve been using it for about two years now and it‚Äôs helped me a lot with staying on my calorie deficit. The one thing that I wish is free for everyone is The step tracking with the Apple Watch. I think it would help a lot of people better calculate their calories with that one feature free.  otherwise great app will continue to use!

title: Cannot record weight with decimal
body: It was working fine until the last update a few days ago.  Being able to record the decimal and tenths of your weight is important to people who are using this app.  I‚Äôll check back on it because I did like this app the best of everything out there but if that doesn‚Äôt get corrected, I‚Äôll be using a different app.  I hope it‚Äôs just a glitch and they fix it.  I see a lot of others reviewing that this is an issue for them as well.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Very good tool
body: First class app to track and measure food consumption combined with a reasonable calorie ‚Äúbudget‚Äù to guide you. My IOS step counter links in. Gives you target date to reach your own goal and can adjust it if you take less calories daily. Also a ‚Äúsocial‚Äù component if you like sharing your story or encouragement for others.

title: Horrendous Privacy Abuse & FAILS to give calorie 411
body: Avoid this app!! Exercise, Google and protect your privacy instead.  It extracts all of your personal 411 b4 u can "use" it. But even after you're forced through dozens of screens of spam, questions and general annoyance - DATA COLLECTION, it doesn't even have a simple search for food calories. Save your time and just Google the 411 u need. Also, if you're overweight, you'll lose weight much faster if you spend all the time it would constantly take filling out this invasive app by exercising. If you want to stay fat, this app would be great!

title: Amazing
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for over 2 months straight, logging all of my food everyday. It is a truly amazing app and has thousands upon thousands of foods in their database to choose from. Also a great community of likeminded people all trying to achieve the same goal. It is an amazing app and I wish I started my weight loss journey sooner!

title: Mindful Eating = Meeting Goals
body: Lose it helps me stay mindful about my eating habits, the snack here and there really adds up. I couldn‚Äôt seem to ‚Äúlose it‚Äù by winging it alone.

title: I LOVE IT
body: I admit I bought this app by mistake. I have used another one for a long time, but I really like this (paid premium version). There are so many features like trends, for example, and valuable info from nutrition and fitness experts. I especially like that it counts calories and not points or bites. It is more meaningful and I do need to learn actual calorie counts. It‚Äôs a great app!

title: Love App
body: I love the app and have been using it daily for almost a year and a half. I would love to see the water tracker added to options for lose it competitions. The competitions keep me motivated, but now that I no longer need to lose I would like to see more options to focus on beyond overall lifestyle points and logging days.

title: Food weight
body: I love this app in every respect but wish the food would show up in measurements (cups/spoons) or number of pieces rather than weight or just the word ‚Äúserving.‚Äù  I scanned chips which showed a serving size of 28 grams which later on will not be useful to me.  As far as reviewing this app otherwise it‚Äôs great.  It is colorful and encouraging and doesn‚Äôt seem like a chore to use.

title: Can only lose it
body: Like the title says, this app is only for losing weight (I get it, it‚Äôs the name of the app after all) my only gripe with this app is if you are tryin got gained weight, there is no way this app will work for you. If they make this a feature I would come back to using this app again.

title: Free app meets needs
body: This app has exceeded my expectations for about 8-9 months. Need it to track my meal/snack intake. So far there are enough food entries I haven‚Äôt had to create a new one. The reminders are timely but not annoying. The measurements are great, especially for specific restaurants. The home style servings measurements also allow for cups, ounces, etc. That is super helpful. Thanks!

title: Nice way to track what you eat
body: Nice way to track your calorie intake. The problem is trying to figure out what the nutritional valves are. Hard to input a meal if there are multiple ingredients. Simple items are easy to input. It‚Äôs great if you eat processed foods. Kind of hard if you make your own items. Still in the process of getting use to the app. Only using the free part of the app. It at least makes you think about what you are eating.

title: Awesome App
body: I really appreciate this app. I used the free version with ease a couple months and then treated myself to the premium. Great value either way. I have lost 25.8 pounds since August. There is a lot you can do with it and it‚Äôs very user friendly. My employer said she lost 80 pounds using this app too! I can‚Äôt say enough how great it is! Ya got nothing and everything to lose! :)

title: EASY PEASY LEMON SQUEEZY
body: This app makes sticking to a certain amount of calories so easy that I wish I had started doing it years ago.  I love that calculated how many calories I needed to stick to in order to lose weight to reach my goal by a specific time.  The whole app is set up so great!!!  I would recommend ‚ÄúLose It!‚Äù to anyone who is trying to lose weight.

title: Easy to monitor weight and calories
body: I really like this app to monitor my weight, calories, exercise and steps although I forget to carry my phone on my person all the time so all my steps don‚Äôt get counted. It is easy to enter your meals and snacks and in a week and a half I have only found a couple of items mot listed so I entered them. Easy app.

title: The Best App for Losing Weight
body: If you are serious about losing weight AND learning how to eat healthy, this is the app. Yes, it does take more time than any point based system but by using it consistently, it shows you how you are eating and what corrections need to be made to permanently change the way you eat. I can not recommend it more highly.

title: Great tool!
body: I think this app is a great tool for anyone who is trying to track the amount of calories they consume or who is interested in losing weight. I‚Äôm really happy with the free offerings from this app. I assume there‚Äôs a ton of added benefits to the premium version but if you just want to have accountability for what you‚Äôre eating, I highly recommend this app!

title: Best app for weight loss
body: This app has helped me to be successful in weight loss each time I have used it. My weight fluctuates up and down by 15 lbs. the weight comes back when I don‚Äôt use the app. It forces me to be mindful of what I am eating and how much. Portion control, food selection. I like how it tallies the left over calories, so you can have a splurge here and there.

title: Lost 10 so far!!!
body: This app has taught me a lot about weight control. Knowing what nutrients are in the food on a menu, in the fridge, or at the store, helps me edit my eating. It‚Äôs so easy to scan something rather than entering all the data. I am currently dropping several pounds a week on a keto regimen. This app gives me the macronutrient breakdown so I can stay in ketosis.

title: Pops ups on Apple Watch can block data collection until dismissed
body: Some pop ups will take over the Apple Watch and and freeze the os until you clear the prompts. No app should do this on the Apple Watch since I use it to collect sleep data and heart rate.  I woke up to see the a loseit prompt on my Apple Watch and in the background the time on the Apple Watch was 11pm which was 8 hours ago. Once I clear the prompt the time updated and I confirmed no data was stored for the last 8 hours.  I have had the Apple Watch for about a year and never seen an app do this. Uninstalled!
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Bring back custom goals red/green indicators!
body: The red/green indicators have been removed on the Premium custom goals page. I used to be able to take a quick glance to be sure all was green but without the red/green indicators I have to look at each goal individually to assess if I‚Äôm within the goals I have set. This is very inefficient. Please bring back the red/green indicators!

title: Updates are poor...
body: You can no longer view past meals for more than one month. Previously you could go back for the life of your logging, but no longer. I‚Äôve lost a lot of data they I‚Äôll have to recreate, them actually put down on paper since the app won‚Äôt access it for more than 30 days.

title: Does not track nutrition
body: This is a great calorie counter and that is it.

title: Love this application
body: This application helps me focus on losing weight. Tracking your food intake and subsequent weight loss is very similar to Weight Watchers. For me it‚Äôs meant being more mindful of my eating habits and moving more so that it shows up on the graph provided. Also great if you are eating out since many restaurant choices you might find are included!

title: Lose weight with Lose it!
body: Been using Lose It for 7years. Weigh every morning and then record weight. Lost 50+ lbs overall!!! Wish Lose It had been around years ago when I started the Atkins to see the TOTAL graph! I weigh every AM & check the graph. I'm always patting myself on the back... Have recommended it to many friends too!

title: Well organized and intuitive
body: Great experience tracking the things I need to. Only drawback is my Apple Watch doesn‚Äôt directly integrate for the workout information, nor does my Bluetooth scale to track my weight.  These items are entered manually. There‚Äôs some deeper level fine-tuning that can be done, but I‚Äôm not there yet.

title: Makes Food Fun
body: I have been enjoying this app.  I can log all my food and see what my nutrition comes from.  I need more protein and this app help me adjust it.  I put every piece of food and every ounce of drink I never could imagine what my calories where when I didn‚Äôt see the total ring up.  Over eating is expensive.  Now to lose fifty pounds!

title: App messes up at least once a day
body: It works with helping keeping your calorie count, but lately at least once a day when I go in to log my calories it doesn‚Äôt work. I will click on the app and it will come up with a blank white screen with the orange border on top, then after a minute or two it will just kick me out of the app. I have to delete the app and then download it again and log in again just to count my calories.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Useful but needs a couple tweaks
body: I was a religious MFP user for years and switched to this. Never going back! My only complaint is the push notifications. I get alerts asking me to track at certain times of the day, even if I‚Äôve tracked an hour before. The notification trigger needs a bit of work. Overall, though, I‚Äôm super pleased with the functionality of this app.

title: Focus...Focus
body: This app allows me to really focus on the calorie count of the foods I eat, daily!! :)

title: Amazing!
body: This app is great! Even though I eat foreign foods everyday, it gives me a great estimate of how many calories I‚Äôve been intaking everyday. Using this app really makes me want to try my hardest to lose more weight! I completely suggest this app if you want to know how many calories you should be intaking everyday and how you can fix it. Seriously amazing.

title: The Premium version is well worth the money.
body: The Premium version is well worth the money. This is a comprehensive and excellent app.  I have been using it since May, 2013. I recently started a more serious effort to lose weight and have lost over 30 pounds and am well on my way to reaching my goal weight. I highly recommend it.

title: Solid tracking app
body: I have used this app and fitness pal and have found this one to be more user friendly. There seems to be a better library of foods and exercises here also. I like how you can track weight training.  Not sure if my fitness pal has that yet. Only thing missing would be to offer specific types of dieting programs to follow. Example: Low carb diet, Atkins diet, Ketogenic diet, Bulking diets, etc.

title: Great app but....
body: There is a daily ad to purchase the premium which is a subscription not a one time purchase. I would give this app 5 stars if it wasn't for the daily sales pitch!  I would more than likely buy a one time offer but not a subscription. I've used several calorie counting apps but have always returned to this one.

title: Great app! Only one thing...
body: Love this app, it‚Äôs been key to help me track my calories, exercise lose weight and stay fit. My only problem is when you tap the ‚ÄúDone logging for the day.‚Äù  Even with just about the same amount of calories per day, one day it might say you‚Äôll reach your goal in February 2018. The next day June 2018. Wish this could be more consistent because it gets discouraging.

title: Easy to use! Been using it for years!
body: I love it!!! Tracks your progress well so you can easily see where you‚Äôve struggled and where you have succeeded so you can continue to succeed.  Easy to add foods, the barcode scan is awesome, but so is the ability to add a recipe! Super easy way to manage your calories w as little or much detail as you want!

title: Updated: Loving the New Layout
body: I've used this app for years and it has taught me so much about nutrition values and watching caloric intake.

title: Ridiculous
body: This app is ridiculous, tricks you into subscriptions . I was reading online and found that this was a great app to help you lose weight. I thought why not give it a try when I downloaded I kept getting pop ups for premium. And there was a deal for 2.50 a month. So I thought why not try a month and see what happens there. I was charged the yearly subscription  & am now fighting to get my money back. To be honest I haven‚Äôt used any of the other futures. But for it to be advertising 2.50 a month for a limited time I charge me full price is despicable.

title: Accountability
body: I love using the LoseIt app because it makes me accountable for what I eat and motivates me to incorporate workouts into my day so I can still have some of the foods I like. It‚Äôs not about giving things up, it‚Äôs about finding a more responsible way to have the foods I like. That means paying attention to portions and knowing when enough is enough!

title: The Lose It way
body: Three years ago I weighed 248 and even though I‚Äôm 6‚Äô5‚Äô‚Äô I was fat

title: Accountability works!
body: Knowing I‚Äôm going to record what I eat, including other health aspects, reminds me NOT to snack as often or grab things that are not as healthy for me!

title: Calories
body: I like this and use it daily, but I only use for tracking calories and exercise. I would like to see, upon clicking on Br, Luch, or Dnr, that ‚Äúadd calories‚Äù would appear at very top, where ‚Äúscan food item‚Äù does, instead of having to scroll thru to get to Calories near bottom. It‚Äôs a small thing, but an easy change and wouldn‚Äôt affect anyone that does NOT use calories only.

title: Great weight loss tool!
body: This app has helped me immensely with my weight loss and wellness journey. I‚Äôve yet to not find a food that hasn‚Äôt been placed in their database and being able to set my own calorie limits keeps me on track. The macronutrients tracking is also helpful being as I am working with a low carb diet. Love the  inspirational articles too!

title: Editing the Body Mass Index, Update needed!!!
body: Update needed!! Please update the app., so we can edit the BMI.  The universal BMI scale is not any good for everyone. Some of us do have more muscle than fat. The bathroom scales have been able to tell us for years, yet there has never been an option to edit that the into the app. Please, let us be able edit our own BMI!!!

title: Superb app
body: I gain knowledge about this app through a friend at work. I‚Äôve been using it for a few months now. I‚Äôm really elated over the results I have achieved just by tracking what‚Äôs go in my body. I‚Äôm healthier and eleven pounds lighter as result of using this app. I have taken the liberty of introducing it to family members and others. Well thought out application.

title: This is the best app for calorie counting!
body: This app is so easy to use and has so many great features!!! I LOVE that it tells me how many calories I have eaten & how many I have left for the day, and that it even gives you a break down of how many calories at each meal you can have yo meet your caloric goal. Thank you to whoever created this awesome app!

title: This app works!!
body: This app really helped me, I wanted to lose weight slow to keep it off and it really works!! I lost 10 pounds in a month!! It‚Äôs great I totally recommend. The only thing I find quite annoying is the adds to tell you to go premium, they pop up and are quite annoying. I 100% recommended this FREE weight loss app!!

title: The most perfect app !
body: This Lose it app is just great. It‚Äôs extremely comprehensive and adaptable and enables food and exercise recording/ tracking easily and enjoyably. It has what seems like unlimited foods built in plus an easy way to add and track your own foods.

title: Lose it 65 pounds
body: Excellent way to track calorie and exercise on the free plan is the way I did it with Lose It‚Äôs free plan.

title: I Lost It
body: Input food daily, app calculates Apple Watch exercise.  Lost 26 pounds in three months with 2000 calories and 2 mile walks daily.  Limiting calories forces good food choices or you will be hungry.  Stomach definitely shrinks over time.  60 years old with 256 lb starting weight, goal is 210, or less!  Great food library, very easy to find and input food daily.  You can do it!

title: Better than weight watchers
body: I‚Äôve used weight watchers for years - like 10 years. This is just as good and waaaay cheaper - free even! I paid for premium and it‚Äôs not worth it for me. If you don‚Äôt need a ‚Äúplan‚Äù and just want to track your food and set weight goals free is all you need. Tech is way better than WW AND has an Apple Watch option!

title: Lose It
body: I recommend the Lose It app to anyone who wants to lose weight. I have tried everything over the years even Weight Watchers. Although it worked at the time, I always regained the weight..n then some. My GF n I did this together n had a fun time trading info. We‚Äôve been using the app over a yr n have kept the weight off!!

title: Losing it!
body: I have already taken off two of these nagging pounds that crept back on to me and that‚Äôs just in one week!  A friend of mine has lost 27 pounds In the several months that she has been tracking her calories. This is a fabulous app and makes it fun to become aware of what you are eating! Thanks so much for 10 years of helping folks!

title: Why doesn‚Äôt the app recognize I already am a subscriber?
body: I like this app a lot. I don‚Äôt use it consistently, but I enjoy it when I do. However, the app seemingly bombards me with invitations to subscribe, when I have been a subscriber for years. And although I am a subscriber, the app fails to recognize me as one. There is no ‚Äúrestore purchase‚Äù button. Instead there is a ‚Äúsubscribe‚Äù button which produces the message ‚ÄúYou are currently subscribed to this‚Äù when I push it. However the app give me NO access to any features required by a subscription. For that I give it one star.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: It‚Äôs helping me lose weight
body: Mostly, I like the UI, but its a bit muddled in managing the food database. The meanings of My Foods, custom food, recipes, etc. are not clear. For instance I create a new food and then try to add it to a meal and I can‚Äôt find it in the menus and have search for it.

title: Great, Could be even better
body: I enjoy using this app and the convenience that it offers for calorie counting and scanning food. However, it does push constantly for you to upgrade and even simple things like healthy recipes are only for the upgrade not for the free version. It would be nice if more could be offered for free even if you have to watch or look at ads.

title: Great app
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs so easy to use and really is helping keep me on track. I‚Äôve tried Sparkpeople and it doesn‚Äôt work as well for me as this app does. The only thing they could improve is enabling users to log their water intake without having to upgrade to premium-I mean the whole point IS to track everything you eat/drink right. I get why the tips on what‚Äôs keeping you on track etc comes only with upgrades but water...really?

title: Love it, but......
body: Macronutrient information is now a premium feature. Why? I have a protein goal and it‚Äôs annoying to have to tap on the individual foods that I eat and add up the protein number myself. Same thing with fats, carbs, fiber, sugar, etc. I can understand macro GOALS being reserved for premium, but I think non-premium users should be allowed to see their macro information. It‚Äôs more convenient that way.

title: Works!
body: I had my 3rd baby 6months ago and have been struggling to lose the 20lbs extra I gained with him. I downloaded this app two weeks ago and have lost 4lbs already. It really does work! Takes a bit of work figuring out the diet changes you need to make to fit the calorie intake but once you do it gets easier.

title: Great App, But with One Small Glitch
body: I can‚Äôt say enough about this app and how it‚Äôs served as a useful tool to help me lose more than 30 pounds in four months. My only complaint is there appears to be a glitch when my Fitbit scale weigh-ins transfer to Lose It! The weigh-in appears a second time in the Social activity window later in the day. It gives the impression I weighed myself twice in one day when, in fact, I weighed myself only once. Please address ...

title: 2nd Time User
body: I always lose weight on this app, especially when you need to lose the last 10 lbs. Recording food is easy and tracks exercise from the Apple Watch. I took advantage of the annual subscription, priced just right! As a senior you need to track your calories to maintain a healthy weight, a life commitment to yourself.

title: Easy to use
body: I really like this app and use it daily. Recently, I was diagnosed as diabetic and the app allows me to track carbs and daily glucose readings as easily as calories and weight. The only problem is that many of the calorie and carbohydrate data is incorrect, sometimes 2-3 choices for the same item and all with different values. But overall, works really well and has helped me a lot.

title: The Best App Ever
body: I‚Äôm able to keep track of everything I eat! It helps me not go over and I actually been eating less than the required amount they gave me! Now when I look at food I look at it as calories! And I don‚Äôt want too many calories! I‚Äôve lost 12lbs staying on track within one month and one week!

title: Great app, one flaw
body: So when I started with this app one month ago I was able to mark decimals in my weight. My phone and thus numbers use a , for decimals and not a . which has made it so that I cannot track anything more specific than a pound. If the devs could address this one minor problem I'd push this to 5 stars, and if you write decimals with a . please do take this as a 5 star review!

title: Overall good, but friends feature doesn't work
