body: A friend and I have each added the other's email and requested that we be friends, but so far nothing has happened.

title: User for 590 days straight!
body: This is a great free app.  Easy to use, and syncs with my Apple Watch.  However, I only eat ~1,000 calories daily, and recently when I go over my 1,000 calories by as little as 37 calories, the app says ‚Äúhey, don‚Äôt feel bad, we all have off days.‚Äù                       Are you kidding me?  Don‚Äôt condescend!  The comment is enough to make me quit the app.

title: Love this app b
body: This app is very user friendly. Keeps me focused and on track. Helps keep me aware of calories and is a great self-control method. Just love it. The only way I think it could be greatly improved would be to make it voice activated so the user doesn‚Äôt have to type things in. But just the way it is now is fine for me.

title: Inconsistent icons and lacking Pro iPad support
body: The user interface could do with some rationalizing. Grey buttons imply inactive and buttons are not universally the same color.

title: Love this app!
body: I‚Äôve had this app for years and I love it. I‚Äôve always contemplated going premium but never pulled the trigger. I recently took the plunge and I have to say it was well worth it. Free version is great but the paid version is that much better. So far I‚Äôve lost 10 pounds and I must say Lose it! has definitely played a huge part in my success.

title: Best Fitness App, ‚Äúwhen working‚Äù
body: I love my Lose It app, but it keeps crashing on me! I‚Äôve made sure my phone is up to date, that I have the most recent version of the app, and have tried deleting and reinstalling the app, but it still doesn‚Äôt work. I‚Äôve noticed it starts to crash when I sync my Apple Watch information to it, so I believe that is where the issue lies. I really wish they could fix it because I feel lost without it!
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Great app - steps aren‚Äôt tracking properly
body: Really good app for tracking calories and I have lost weight on it. Thanks Lose It!

title: Charged me $32 dollars without a subscription
body: Came to find out that this app had automatically renewed by premium account without my consent. I had originally purchased premium when it was $12 for a year subscription, the year subscription had run out and I was back to the free version for multiple months only to find out that this app had automatically signed me back up for nearly 3x the original amount without notifying me. However, even though I have been charged $32 my lose it account is still limited to the free subscription.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Great app! Easy to use
body: I'm just beginning my weight loss journey and this app is by far the best I've ever used. I was never able to stick to using one on a daily basis. Well until I found this one. It's amazing, you'll get hooked on food journaling and losing weight. I've lost 35 so far! Can't wait to hit my goal weight! Thanks to the makers of Lose it!

title: Lost 140lbs!!!
body: I started counting calories 3 years ago because I was tired of being winded with the slightest movement. I was 336lbs and gaining fast. I was eating over 3000 calories a day and didn't know it. Thanks to this app I was able to keep track of what  eat. Along with walking I'm down 140lbs and have managed to keep it off as I'm still using the app.

title: Track net carbs?
body: I like the app, have used it for almost 2 years and have lost 17 lbs. (I was down 27 more but gained 10 back). I liked the ability to scan and the large database and ease of use.

title: This helps so much!
body: I knew I was gaining some weight, and I fugitive it was from what I was eating since that's how these things most usually happen. So, I downloaded the app and it determined my calorie limit per day and after a month I've lost 23 pounds. I'm almost to my goal of 30 total lost, and I couldn't be more pleased with the ease of this app! It's great!

title: Easiest Weight Loss App
body: This app is the easiest weight loss app I have ever used. It is highly intuitive and easy to use. I especially love the customizability it provides, allowing you to create your own entries. I have experienced success with weight loss and reduced stress over eating and working out with this app and it has only been a week so far!

title: Not much support
body: I love the app and love how it does so much for me. I was not happy when they took away the step-feature from my Fit Bit and now you have to pay to upgrade to premium in order to have it sync with LoseIt. Regardless, I logged my meals for two years straight and never heard a PEEP from LoseIt...some support system you have there.

title: No longer any good
body: This app used to be cool, because you could track food, caffeine, water, ect., but now you need to pay in order to get access to all the old features. They literally rolled features back and require you to pay for what you used to have. There is no value added in the update, just value taken away. If you don't use the app every day, then the investment us not worth it (though if you do use it everyday, you should be giving back anyhow). Regardless, I'll find a new app

title: Best Food tracker and so much more!
body: It took me a while to develop to discipline to use the tracker on a regular basis. Once I did it became clear I wasn‚Äôt being honest with myself regarding my food intake. That‚Äôs all changed! I‚Äôm right on track for losing 60lbs this year. According to the app it will be achieved by Mayüëç .... get the app and develop the muscle it takes to use it daily.

title: Accountability
body: I like this app. Been on Weight Watchers for years and their point system changed often. When the pandemic hit I stopped and gained maybe 7 pounds. Decided I like calorie counting better. This app has been pretty easy. I‚Äôm almost back to my goal, it‚Äôs only been a couple of months. Good luck and just keep tracking.

title: Progress Picture Feature??
body: I am a big fan of the app; I find it to be very simple and easy to use and a great way to track my food/water intake. One suggestion I would make is for a feature to upload a daily or even weekly progress picture to further track your progress visually.

title: Greatest Blessing in an App
body: I have been praying to lose weight, and God has helped me have the motivation and endurance to faithfully use this app over long stretches of time. I have lost over 90 lbs. I‚Äôve gained some back every time that I stopped using this app. I resubscribed and restarted. If you use it faithfully, the weight will come off and it will be a blessing.

title: Best App!
body: Won‚Äôt ever use another app to track calories. This is the best. I‚Äôve been doing intermittent fasting and tracking my calories for 5 months and I have lost a total of 40 lbs.  It keeps you accountable and helps you see where you are wasting valuable calories. It helps change your perspective on food. Food is fuel. Make it count!

title: Love this App, Needs One More Thing
body: I really really love this app, and would give it ten stars, only holding off because the addition of one more feature would absolutely push it to the top. It would be extremely helpful to be able to track vitamins and minerals, for example calcium. Right now I would need to use a different app and record everything twice. Not fun.

title: Keep to your goals
body: Whether you‚Äôre doing this for building healthy habits or for weight loss, this app will help you on your journey. I love how it breaks it down to macronutrients. Makes me realize the small changes I can make on my diet to reach my goals. Only thing is I wish it would link to many more fitness apps i also use.

title: Easy to use, intuitive
body: I mainly use this to log my Factor75 meals, most of which are preloaded. On the occasion I‚Äôve had to manually enter it was simple and intuitive. I especially like the feature that shows me how many macros I have left for the day after each meal. Makes it so easy to stay within my diet requirements.

title: AMAZING APP
body: I have used WW in the past and I must say this APP is even better!!!!  Tracks everything under the free version except water intake. The paid version is with it for $40 a year to get the full benefits of it and way cheaper than WW at $300. Download the free version first before you buy the yearly just to make sure you like it. I love it!!!!  Hold you accountable üòÄ

title: Amazing App needs more sections
body: This app is amazing one feature that would

title: Lose it! Premium is working great so far!
body: Always-improving app. Recoding steps is better than Apple's built in app.

title: Makes a big difference!
body: The difference in my weight loss with this app is more than a little noticeable. I've lost 7.6 lbs in 2 months. It took about 6 months to do that before. I also like the app for Apple Watch. My wife and I both decided it was worth upgrading to premium after 2 months of using the free version.

title: I love Lose it
body: It‚Äôs an easy to use app that tells me exactly what I need to know to keep myself on track. It even reminds me when I forget to track my calories. The only negative is that there can be several values for the same food, so it can sometimes be difficult to pick the accurate calories. That said, I use this app all the time and share it with everyone!

title: It Works!
body: I have never enjoyed an app this amazing! Lose It has helped me to keep track of ALL the foods I enjoy and even  gives me feedback on how well I am doing. Whenever I feel like nothing is happening it offers me reminders like of how much I can achieve and sends me messages when it doesn‚Äôt hear from me in a while! I love it!

title: Great App
body: Love this App.& the scanner is awesome too.  I have never dieted before but need to lose 20-30 lbs. at 50 years old I was skeptical. I lost 4 lbs the first week with this app and no exercise. It is just eye opening knowing how many calories you‚Äôre eating. Definitely changed me for the future!  Looking forward to being healthy & fit again!

title: Could easily be 5 Stars!!
body: This app is so well designed with so many great features but it‚Äôs very frustrating when creating meals or recipes, because if you later log them you have to go back to food settings too view exact ingredients/amounts. Sometimes you change amounts or a few ingredients in frequently eaten meals so would be nice to be able to edit them in log as opposed to going back out to food settings.

title: Not what I expected.
body: Really thought this app was not going to give me fast results. I am very bad at eating healthy but this app helps me give myself a limit at what I eat. Because of this limit I have become more creative and changed my eating habits. Have lost already 10 pounds and still going for more! Definitely recommend!

title: Helpful tool some suggestions
body: Great tool tried others is best so far. Suggestions is there a way to sync calories used during exercise with what my Apple Watch says. Also food calories with us gov official a standard wt as values seem to vary. I've had to look this up online. Also find it difficult to put in recipes

title: Hooked on capturing info
body: A friend recommended this a while back, but only recently did I start truly levering all of this app‚Äôs capabilities. I track my nutrition, fat, carbs, calories, and protein and more. It has helped me immensely in keeping track of my foods while on the keto plan. Looking back in my first 60 days, I couldn‚Äôt have been successful without it!

title: This is the key!
body: This app is the first thing out of my mouth when people ask ‚ÄúHow‚Äôd you lose so much weight?‚Äù By tracking my food and water intake, and Lose It calculating up my exercising... it all comes together! I never realized how much I was eating and not drinking enough water until I purchased Lose It. I recommend it to anyone!

title: Great tool in my weight management
body: So easy to use this app. I have recommended it to several family and friends.   My favorite app for this type of goal.  I have lost 66 pounds slowly and methodically since I had been inactive with a broken leg.  This was totally by counting calories on this app as I am unable to do a lot of exercise. Thank you.

title: Great app
body: I love this App! And before a few days ago I would have rated it a solid 5. For some reason it stopped communicating with the Apple health app. I used this a lot and really miss that functionally. Please restore this feature! Thanks.

title: Best app
body: I have tried myfitness pal, SparkPeople, and a couple other apps.  I like this one the best.  A lot Easier to use and less time consuming logging your food.  Works great with my Apple Watch.  I use the free version and still like it.    Tried the subscription in the past and liked it.    Just don‚Äôt need all the extra features.

title: Free version is fine, premium was worth the extra for me
body: I needed to lower my cholesterol and loose weight or go on a statin. Lose-it helped me track what I was eating and how much exercise I was getting. With premium, I can set cholesterol and fat intake goals, see patterns in my diet, and track nutrients. I‚Äôve lost 7 lbs in 7 weeks. I‚Äôve been very happy with the results.

title: One place to track
body: Before I got this app I was tracking my calories and weight in an electronic notepad which was tedious and inefficient. This app makes it so easy to track my calorie intake and weight loss. And with the function of scanning the barcodes of the food I eat it makes it quick and easy to see my progress. A very good app.

title: AMAZING for keeping up with calorie intake
body: I love this app, every time I go on a weight loss journey I have always depended on it. I personally use it for calorie intake management, but you can also monitor carb/fat/etc intake and log your daily exercise! It makes me look forward to my weekly weigh in and I genuinely don‚Äôt think I could lose weight without it.

title: Great App!! I‚Äôve lost over 60 lbs.
body: I started logging on Lose it over 5 years ago. I have lost over 60 pounds and have kept it off for 5 years. I have never had a diet that was so successful. I would recommend this app to anyone who wants to track what they are eating. Logging everyday keeps you on track as to what your eating.

title: Great app; easy to use!
body: This app is super easy to use. I‚Äôm using the free version and it has enough features to help me; the premium version has many more features for those who want more support. The food database is extensive and the process of logging foods and weight change is intuitive. The community members are supportive & helpful!

title: Good but can‚Äôt add friends
body: Been using the app for a awhile and convinced my wife to get it too. She did and now we can‚Äôt add each other as friends to share recipes etc. spinning and spinning is all it does. Seems to keep losing connection to the network. At home on WiFi and it doesn‚Äôt work. Tried on LTE nothing there. Just a message that they are unable to load privacy settings (tried to check them based on online faq). Help!  Thanks...
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Lose It Works!
body: A great app if you use it faithfully! Keeps track of calories by meal, provides a calorie base to meet your goal, and provides hundreds of food items and brand names with calorie count. Easy to use app. I have lost weight using Lose it! I would recommend this app if you are serious about losing weight.

title: Thanks to LoseIt!
body: LoseIt is the only thing that has worked for me. I just didn‚Äôt realize how much I was still eating until I began logging my calories.  With the help of this app., I have made lifestyle changes which allow me to eat what I want and still be healthy. I simply weigh in and log my meals/snacks and exercise. I‚Äôm well on my way to being the real me!

title: Stick with it
body: The app has a lot of categories to help keep you on track and give you nutritional information. Explains your knowledge of one new category each day until you know the full extent of the program. It‚Äôs pretty amazing. At first I was so so on the app but now I can‚Äôt live without it and the great tracking. Stick with it!

title: Excellent health tool
body: I‚Äôve used this app on and off for years, but it is absolutely my favorite out there on the market. Whether your goal is to lose weight or eat healthier, lose it‚Äôs easy to use food and exercise logging makes it the best free tool I‚Äôve ever seen. Considering upgrading to premium just because of how much I love the app!

title: It‚Äôs All About Accountability
body: You can go about your day thinking you are ‚Äúdoing well ‚Äúor ‚Äúdoing poorly‚Äù with what you‚Äôre eating, but Lose It holds you accountable.

title: So that is what a Calorie does to my weight!
body: I am 52 years old and have never had to ‚Äúcount calories‚Äù.  But i have realized that I have gained 5 pounds a year for the last 10 years and need to put that to a stop.

title: Great to keep you on task with goals!
body: I have been using this app for a few years now. It is great in keeping me on task when it comes to my nutritional goals. Very easy to use all you need is commitment. I have lost 20 LBSin the last three months thanks to keeping tabs on my nutritional and caloric intake. This one is definitely worth updating to pro.

title: So annoying it just might work
body: I get daily notifications from my Lose It app reminding me of my laziness. Best thing about this app is how easy it is to use. I love that I can just scan the barcodes on my foods, it‚Äôs makes tracking so much easier. I count macros so i like that it records fats, protein, and carbs. The goal setting option is great also!

title: Simple, efficient, surprisingly fun!
body: I love this app! I do not pay for the premium. I use it to track daily calories. It has been a huge help! Easy to find foods or scan them. Helps you stay motivated to track using push notifications (not an annoying amount) and goals. Definitely recommend.

title: Integrate Glycemic Index Scores
body: Overall this app does its job. However, for the amount of money I pay for the annual subscription, I‚Äôd like to see more healthful food indices, like the glycemic index, integrated into the food catalog. There are so many more ways to support a healthy lifestyle than just calorie counting. I gave this app 4 Stars because I believe this platform has the absolute best interface for tracking food intake.

title: Lost 15lbs & 2.5% Body Fat
body: Have used this great little app for almost 3 months. I lost to my target weight with exercise and tracking my intake through this app.  It helps you slowly lose weight. It remembers your dietary habits makes very it easy to input the foods you commonly eat. More people should use this app. I recommend it to my patients.

title: Stick to what you know
body: Tried doing a number of things to lose some weight quickly and failed.  Fact is, calorie counting always works. With this app, I can still obsess over food, but in the opposite direction. It‚Äôs user friendly and fun. Losing weight is simple. Ignoring your excuses is the hard part. Try it!

title: Game changer
body: I hate dieting and to me counting calories is different. If you are honest with yourself you can clearly see where you go wrong and make adjustments. It‚Äôs problem solving!! It‚Äôs help me to lose weight but more importantly changed the way live. Only wish it had meal grading and better nutritional breakdowns like another app that was discontinued.

title: great until updates break basic functions
body: Most recent update break.. weight won‚Äôt save on iPhone... Apple Watch weight won‚Äôt display weight so accidentally saved incorrect weight... corrected on website but  iPhone won‚Äôt remove incorrect weight.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Better than any Diet Plan out there!
body: You choose what you want to eat which includes everything! This is the only thing that has worked for me. Just maintain your calories and the weight will come off while enjoying all your favorite foods! Lost over 60 lbs so far. Easy to use and record your foods. A++++

title: Love this app wanna know the best part about it ?
body: The free app is ready to go, normally apps take away a ton of key features for the paid version. But not lose it! Everything I want to do able to do to track what I want to track is on the free version. That‚Äôs what I love about this app, the fact that decided to give us the best possible free app is so great.

title: Not great for Keto
body: I really like this app and have used the premium service off and on for a while BUT, I‚Äôve been doing keto for a couple of months and have to track net carbs outside of this app.  Since that kind of defeats the purpose, I think I‚Äôll be looking for a new app that works with Keto.  It doesn‚Äôt seem like it would be too hard to develop a little toggle switch for keto people so we could track NET carbs instead of total carbs, but hey, that‚Äôs just my opinion.

title: Why did I not download this sooner?
body: This app is a game changer. If you‚Äôve struggled with losing weight, this app will help immensely. I‚Äôve already lost 14 pounds, 10 more to go! I‚Äôve lost the weight solely by tracking my food and adhering to the calorie goal. I stay active, walking, occasionally working out (honestly not really, I know I should!). This app is awesome. Download it!!!!

title: Motivational
body: My husband and I both use this app and has helped us by allowing us to eat what we want as long as we stay within the calories and then we can exercise 2 to 3 miles a day to allow a little more food consumption. My husband has lost over 20 lbs and I‚Äôve lost about 10 in 12 weeks.

title: A Keeper
body: I‚Äôve used this app -free and then paid subscription- for several years now and it‚Äôs easy to work with, encouraging and whether things are going well or not, this app is always there to help keep me or get me back on track.  I especially like that I can create my own recipes, a feature I use often.

title: It works but has issues
body: It depends what you‚Äôre eating of course, but I‚Äôve found that the search function for food items is directly on point/finds the exact food item 85-90% of the time, so pretty good. My biggest gripe is that the app does not save my entered weight correctly; I‚Äôll save my weight in the morning but the entry does not save; the next morning the saved value is not present; I have to renter the preceding day‚Äôs weight; an inconvenience.
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Things Scan Wrong
body: I've used this app for years and have absolutely loved it up until about a week ago. It's helped me lose weight and stay on track with my goals.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Accountability
body: I have found that tracking my meals and exercise with Lose It helps keep me accountable and keeps me from slipping. The days that I have a gain makes me more determined to stay on track. Thank you, Lose it! I have recommended your program to my brother who has just learned that he is type one diabetic.

title: Success
body: This app is amazing, I‚Äôm actually losing weight! You put in what you eat and just stay below your daily amount of calories, no guessing here or there, a simple button press and its saved. Highly recommended if you want to lose weight and you‚Äôre tired of second guessing yourself on freehand recording.

title: Losing it
body: I really enjoy this app very easy to use and log under premium wide variety of items with nutrition guide also syncs with my Fitbit and my activity calories are included I know throughout the day exactly how many calories I have left It also tells you what date you will reach your target weight goal

title: In a word:  outstanding!
body: Easy to use, feature rich, seamless syncing across devices.  Completely satisfied with this app. Highly recommended.

title: Not always accurate but I can live with that !
body: The free version serves my purpose of having a high-level overview of what I eat. There are issues with accuracy of data as most foods are user entered. I would love to see moderated and accurate data for foods over time to consider premium version.

title: Great app for calorie intake awareness
body: This is such an easy app to use.  I really like that I can scan barcodes and it will bring up the item.  I also like the positive encouragement it gives meüòÄ. It makes me aware of what I am eating.  I also like that it divides my calorie total amongst meals and snacks.  If I eat more for breakfast, it adjusts the recommended calories for the other meals.

title: Great Free Accountability App
body: I‚Äôve already lost 10 pounds since January 1st using this app.  It is a great tool for sustained weight loss.  If you haven‚Äôt entered your weight or tracked your meals -after a few hours it will send you a friendly reminder.  I highly recommend using this app. for weight loss or to just better maintain your current weight.

title: Keeps me on track
body: Such a great application.  I have been using this off and on since 2014.  Trying to re-educate now with foods and this is really helping to see the results and use the diary.    On track to reach my goal and learning as I go along.  Love the food digest. Has a lot of name brand foods I can use to figure calories before I eat

title: Lose it sad
body: I‚Äôm sad bc before when I had lose it  there were more things I could do and see on here yrs ago when I was a member and had a lot of challenges I could choose from

title: Creating reusable food items.
body: I create/cook/make food all the time.  I can scan the kind of bread I use to make ham sandwiches, I can scan the ham and I can scan the Swiss cheese, I can even scan the mayonnaise I use, but it would be great if I could create the sandwich on this app once and reuse it over and over, instead of having to enter it ingredient by ingredient each time I make the same food item.
response: We are sorry for the confusion! You can actually do this with Lose It!. For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: Excellent Calorie Counter
body: I have used this off and on, but this is a great app for losing weight. I was recommended for this app from my mom‚Äôs personal trainer. It‚Äôs user friendly and I like the barcode to scan the food you eat. The only thing is you have to be accurate in what you eat and how much. Other than that, I like it!

title: Not bad
body: For the most part this app is great. The push to subscribe is irritating, and maybe if you spent more time fixing the food offerings and exercise calories (they‚Äôre not all correct and the serving sizes are very vague for many items) instead of pushing a subscription. I would be far more likely to pay once for a full app than subscribe, because the free version is adequate. I also miss the step-counter bonus that used to exist on this app.
response: We are sorry for the confusion! You can actually still track steps in Lose It!. For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: Track it!!
body: Very good app for those changing your lifestyle for weight loss. Only one thing that is a solid fact. For this to work you must log everything you eat and drink. No cheating or it will not work for the new life you seek. This will change your daily diet, (diet used in not as a fad weight loss but the true definition of diet as way of eating for the remainder of your life). Track it and Lose It!!

title: No way to edit error
body: I am only using the app to track my weight right now. If I mis- type the number and it applies 1270 pounds instead of 127, the app should recognize that there is a huge discrepancy and alert the user to correct üòÑ

title: Amazing! But...
body: Great app I have lost a lot of weight already! But there is a bug on iPhone X where when you have Face ID log in enabled for the password on the app, you cannot clear it from your dash, it takes a while to work. To close it you have to re open it and close it in dash before the Face ID log in appears.

title: Less calories in than out = weight loss
body: I tried a number of diet and tracking apps, but this one is the app that worked for me. Calories are the most accurate, has a huge database for barcode scanning, and  does a great estimate of caloric restriction. I love this thing, I have lost 35 lbs!

title: A weight loss essential!
body: This app has been an integral part of my weight loss journey. Tracking my calorie consumption was virtually mindless thanks to the food database included in the free version of the app and checking in periodically on my phone every day became an effortless part of my routine. I lost 30 pounds using this app and look forward to losing 25 more using LoseIt!

title: Excellent weight reduction program
body: Been using this app since June 2013 - have lost 34 pounds, but most importantly have kept it off. To keep it off it‚Äôs important to adopt a change in lifestyle- exercising more, cut out sweets, saturated fats, lower sodium intake, which required eating at home more often. This program has helped in keeping me on track.

title: Great App that is easy to use
body: This App has been great to use to help me track my calories, exercise, and weight loss. I currently use the standard version and find it to be all that I need to be successful. I would have liked to be able to track my water consumption, but that is a feature available to the premium users. I would highly recommend this app!

title: Definitely Works, Hate the Upgrade Crap
body: The Lose It app is great for tracking calories. I love the ease of use. It‚Äôs great for lazy people...like me. The only downside is the annoying and constant reminders that you should upgrade to premium. It‚Äôs frustrating. I‚Äôm never going to upgrade. I have no intentions of ever doing so. The constant reminders to do so grate my nerves. I think it‚Äôs the biggest fault of this entire app.

title: It‚Äôs ok calorie counter app
body: I have lost 11 pounds as I have had to log everything I am eating but I wish I could log my steps as exercise as I also have a pedometer app which counts my steps. And I wish I could track my water consumption but those things you have to pay to upgrade to premium üôÅ which I won‚Äôt do. To me-water, exercise and diet are the basic things. Now a providing a coach...that‚Äôs premium. Providing a nutritionist to plan meals...that‚Äôs premium

title: FEATURE REQUEST
body: I‚Äôve been a user for years and I believe accountability is the best way to stay in shape. With that said, it would be a great idea to allow friends on lose it to see another‚Äôs food log for the day. I know something similar is available on the website but please make this part of the app! Many of my friends would like this functionality as well.

title: Great App for Tracking
body: Everyone knows tracking what you eat is necessary for successful weight loss and to keep it off but this app is also great to help analyze what you are eating and how those nutrients or lack thereof are playing a role in how you feel. I think the full version is too expensive but all you really need is the free one anyway.

title: Excellent Resource for Weight Control
body: I was out of control with eating habits. Heartfelt prayer to Jesus resulted in discovering this great app.  In nine months I lost 20 pounds using the daily calorie counter. I never denied myself anything I wanted. The app helped me make healthful choices and adjust and train myself to recognize correct portion sizes. I will keep going back to it to help me maintain a proper balance.

title: Helpful and motivating
body: I've used this app off and on for a few years. It has gotten better and better. I love that it can scan codes from food packaging and has a watch app version. Even when I‚Äôm not faithful about tracking calories, the goal section keeps me from veering too far off track.

title: Great App
body: Please add a foods favorite list I curate so I can add something I consume a lot of to the list without seeing all the other things in my foods or searching. It would be great if there was a way to see when something was added to the log (maybe just put the time next to the item when it was added).

title: I was shocked at how much I was eating
body: I tried this app several years ago when it was more stripped down with fewer types of food entered, and it did not work. I picked it up again, and it is now so much more seamless to the point that I was able to lose a ton of weight and feel in control for the first time in my life. No more yo-yo!

title: It works!
body: I have tried many weight loss apps, but this one is by far the best! This app really changed my mindset and is helping me maintain my weight. Now, I am leading a more healthier lifestyle! I have lost a little over 10 pounds in less than a month. This app definitely works, and I recommend it to anyone who wants to lose weight!

title: It‚Äôs good !
body: I‚Äôve been using it for a month now and it‚Äôs really helpful! My only complaint is that I wish that there were something that could show the time of when you marked your food. But overall great app! I‚Äôve been using the free version so far and I prefer it to any other food tracking app

title: Great App, needs 1 change
body: I love this app! It works well and the colors are vibrant. The only thing I wish they would add is an option to make food combinations. If I go to chipotle I want to add all of my ingredients to make one meal. Not have 10 different additions for the same thing. Also it would be nice if I could then save that order.

title: Actually works!
body: I've always been skeptical about calorie-counting apps and weight loss apps, but this one really does work. You simply record your weight, enter your ideal weight, and then the app tells you how many calories you should spend on each meal! 100% recommend if you want to lose weight.

title: Downgraded from 5 stars
body: Please bring back the current calorie burn info on the log screen. The changes are terrible. Projected and goal is not helpful throughout the day. I‚Äôve been using this app since it first came out, and recommended to all my clients. I‚Äôm frustrated with the changes to the Exercise display. Even once the calorie info section is open, the info is confusing and redundant. I‚Äôm no longer recommending the app to clients and friends.

title: Easy to use
body: Lost around 30# over a year, now just trying to maintain. This app keeps me accountable at all times and motivates me to exercise. Even if I go way over my calories I can see it‚Äôs not really that bad, it‚Äôs a manageable number, and keep going.

title: Beware
body: I deleted the app and cancelled before my free trial was up and now it‚Äôs been trying to charge me.  There‚Äôs not even an option to cancel subscription because I‚Äôm not subscribed. Now I can‚Äôt download anything from the App Store or even update anything on my phone. The app isn‚Äôt even on my phone nor can I even download it again if I did want to use it. Apparently the only way to be able to download anything from the App Store is to pay the 40 something dollars and ‚Äútry‚Äù to get a refund said the rep from apple chat. Makes no sense.

title: Best app
body: The best food and activity app I have ever used. Lost 42 pounds. I am a person that almost always put of logging, but with this app it is so easy I seldom miss a day. Also, I love the way I can switch between calories, protein & many others so easy!!!  I know several others that use it too. We all converted to lifetime subscription.

title: Keeping me on track
body: A friend suggested this app and I liked it immediately. I have been on and off programs my whole life and I know to be successful I have to log my food intake. This app makes it so easy! I always know how many calories I have left and I can use the extensive database to plan future meals. Thanks to the developer!

title: Keeping Tract For Healthy Me
body: Regardless the results of my own behavior I love this app. It supports my needs every single time I need it too. The people in the groups are kind and I never had a problem with their staff either. I recommend this app for anyone interested in tracking their eating habits and more. Give it a try. You will love it!!!

title: Easy to Use
body: I like the camera feature, which makes it easy to know exactly what you are eating.  Diets don‚Äôt work, but making small permanent changes do!  This app helps to limit salt, sugar, and too many carbs, as you can see what amounts you are taking in. My blood pressure and cholesterol have dropped to normal.  Thanks for helping!

title: Wow it's easy!!!
body: I've lost 10 lbs in 10 days, I set my calories at 800 per day, exercise elliptical 30 mins, or do core strengthening you tube video for 30 mins, or walk for30 mins per day and that's it.

title: Fun to use, effective tool for weight loss
body: The last 15 pounds can be so hard to lose but make a huge difference in the way you look. Lose-it really helped me reach my goal in a healthy way, and through tracking my food and exercise, I learned a lot about nutrition.  I highly recommend this app.

title: Helping me with my type 2 diabetes
body: I recently started LoseIt and have lost weight.  Also, it is great for my type 2 diabetes, because it helps me keep track of carbohydrates.  According to my nutritionist, watching carbohydrates is important to keeping blood sugars in check.  High blood sugars can cause eye problems, foot problems, high blood pressure, strokes and heart disease.

title: Journey to good health
body: I started using the LoseIt app when I completed a triathlon several years ago - the year I turned 50. This app helped me reach my weight and fitness goals by helping me see what I was eating and how many calories I actually consumed and burned, and what types of foods I was really consuming. Seeing it helped me make necessary changes

title: Even good for the technologically impaired
body: It‚Äôs so simple, i can do it in seconds. None of the complications of the other apps. Counting my calories became easy, even though I started a Keto Diet. I have recommended it to everyone in my diet club . Even had to tell them I do not work for the company, I was so enthusiastic. It counts the percentages of macronutrients  without complications .

title: Could be better
body: I sort of regret going premium.  This app does not support integration with apple health to track all nutrients and vitamins as other apps do.  It tracks the main nutrition like fat carbs and protein.  Hoping they can update the app to integrate all nutritional values including vitamins.  If I‚Äôm taking time to log my food I want a full breakdown of my intake.  Until they are able to integrate this feature then it will not be worth the money. If they never update and add this feature I guess I just wasted my money.

title: Super App
body: I have used Loseit for over 8 years and probably missed just a handful  a few days of logging over those 8 years. I started at 191 and have reached my goal weight of 157 within the first year. Today I weighed 157.4. Exercising and using Loseit has done it for me. I will continue to use this helpful tool.

title: Outstanding Help
body: If you set realistic goals and honestly enter the data this is an excellent tool to help guide you to weight loss and health choices. Set attainable short term goals, enjoy you success, learn from challenges and don‚Äôt get too frustrated along the way!! We all fell down when learning to walk and we eventually could run.

title: It's a wonderful tool
body: I'm down over 60 pounds since I first downloaded this app I couldn't have done it without "lose it". It keeps me honest & makes me aware of foods who's calorie content it just not worth it. It‚Äôs taught me how to eat. Now, after a couple of years,I don‚Äôt need to log  foods. I instinctively know what I can & cannot eat each day.

title: My thoughts
body: I think the app is a good app.  I track everything including my exercises. Would have given 5 stars but I believe we should be able to decide if exercise has an impact on our calorie intake. While I can change it on each individual workout, I cannot just change the setting as a whole.  Other than that, it does work very well.

title: Amazing
body: This app helped me to lose 30 pounds a year ago. I still use it to keep me in check and keep the weight off. I was clueless about calorie counts before I used this, but when I started inputting my food into the app I lost the weight rather quickly. It showed me that little changes add up. Grateful for it, and love that it is free.

title: On track thanks to Lose It!!
body: Great program. It makes me aware of overeating. It keeps me on track with my goal weight. I lost 11 pounds in 7 weeks and I am realizing I can eat less and be satisfied. I am also more

title: I love this app!
body: I did 4 months on another app to lose my weight and I joined this one to lose the last few pounds and keep track of my calories.  Logging foods is easy- there is nearly every recipe listed. The app also synced with my Fitbit and keeps track of my activity and adjusts my allowed calories accordingly.

title: This is the best app for weight management that I have paid for .
body: Prior I was subscribed to other apps like fitness pal but those did not have the same approach as this app does . I like that this app will send me daily encouragement and I also like the layout and the nutritional info that it offers. It also offers the best price on the market.

title: A good thorough treatment of calories in calories out weight loss
body: Many useful features, but difficult to use if you were visually impaired; they do not respect the iPhone‚Äôs native text size adjustments in most places. And in those that they do, clearly no quality assurance testing has been done to see that text doesn‚Äôt overlap.  But if you have a sighted person to help you, it‚Äôs a great app.

title: Work it everyday
body: The thing I like most about this app is the daily reminders to log in my food. It helps me most by looking at good and bad food days and seeing why did eat bad that day or good another day in long run I have picked up on some of triggers that make me over eat so by knowing them I don‚Äôt repeat them as often

title: Awesome app
body: I have been using this app for 4 years and it has been a remarkably easy tool to help me go from 210 pounds to 164. Easy to enter. Easy to search for items. Tracks water. Tracks my workout calories. If you are looking for an app to cleanly track calories in and calories out...then I cannot recommend this app enough.

title: Great way to log your diet.
body: I wasn‚Äôt so strict with my calorie counts, but, having to write down everything, kept me on track. Gives great insight into how, just adding a small snack can undo a lot of hard work. Highly recommend. Step up to the paid app, great to track water intake, very important, easy to forget. Still great value!

title: Great App
body: This is easy to use and track weight loss.  I don‚Äôt have the premium yet but after using it for one week it is easy to find the foods you eat and a huge data base to pick from and it is motivational because it sends you notifications.  I highly recommend giving it a try!

title: Great app to support for healthy eating after baby
body: After having 3 kids and currently nursing my youngest my body did not bounce back and breastfeeding was not my saving grace for my, thankfully, only pregnancy major complaint - weight gain . This app is amazing ; the accountability is a huge help and a great reminder to leave my older two‚Äôs leftovers alone - #garbagedisposalmodeoff

title: Good but
body: The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that the food selections keep getting populated with similar options that people put no nutritional information about. I lost 85lbs using this app but it was much easier to log a few years ago. Maybe lock it for adding to the general database unless you populate all nutrition info.

title: Love this app
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 4 months now and I love it. It helps me stay on track and with portion control. I‚Äôve lost 20lbs so far and met my goal. I‚Äôm now using it to maintain my weight. My only problem is that all of a sudden it won‚Äôt open on my iPad only my phoneüòî does anyone know why? I want to use it again on my iPad...

title: Sticking to it!
body: I never stick with anything.  I never finish.  I‚Äôm into my 2nd month and still logging my progress every day. Watching my calories has really been a game changer.  After 6 weeks I‚Äôm down 6 lbs. but my body fat is down 8.2 lbs and my muscle weight has gone up 1.3 lbs. (Thank you Nutrishop for letting me log myself when I want.)

title: My review
body: This app has worked for me. It forces me to make healthy food choices AND workout. It‚Äôs easy to use. The daily calorie count is lower than any other app but that‚Äôs exactly what my stubborn body needed. This app now has more food choices than when I started. It‚Äôs easy to use and I‚Äôve lost 41lbs up to this point thanks to it.

title: Simply works great!
body: I lost 20 lbs because this app makes it so easy to log food. Syncing with my Fitbit balances my steps & exercise with my food  intake so my macros come out right. It helps me eat just the exact amount needed to lose weight daily.  All this app needs to be perfect is a way to log recipes created. Highly recommended.

title: Lose it
body: This is the first diet technique that has/is working for me.  I am 63 year old male and have lost 19.5 lbs mainly by logging which makes me more aware of what I am eating.  I occasionally go over my goal when I have a treat but I am aware and then right back to hitting my goal of 1850 calories per day. I want my BMI to get to 29.6. That‚Äôs 220 lbs as I am 6‚Äô2‚Äù tall.  Love this product.

title: Maintain!
body: I‚Äôve lost more than 40 pounds with this app and my Fitbit. I have been able to maintain it for about 4 years.  You have to be honest and track everything but it is very easy to do.  The app will guide you all the way.  You have to workout but you don‚Äôt need to go crazy with it. Just Move!!! It‚Äôs up to you.....You Can Do It!

title: Great Way to Meet Your Weight Goal
body: If you are interested in setting a weight goal and tracking your calories, this app is very helpful and easy to use. After doing it for a week I began to understand the food that should be minimized in order for me to lose weight. I took off 3 pounds in my first week of using it.

title: Weight Loss
body: I am way more mindful of what I eat with this app. Easy to enter in what I eat during the day. Usually am able to log everything I plan to eat and will eat  before dinner. Am combining with his app something I learned in a previous weight loss program‚Ä¶..Failing to plan is planning to fail‚Ä¶.also setting 5 pound goals.

title: Highly recommended!
body: Lose it is an excellent app. They have so many accurate food searches including obscure restaurants. I love how it allows you to track your protein along with your calories. It is incredibly user-friendly. Much better than other calorie tracking apps that I‚Äôve tried.

title: LoseIt! Success
body: I adore this app and have been a premium member for a couple of years. It has been an integral part of my 90 lb weight loss. It makes it clear where I stand on my calories and makes me much more aware of what is going in my mouth.

title: Better habits through easy, consistent monitoring
body: One of main tools in losing 30+ pounds over a year. One of most useful apps on my iPhone. Exercise tips, diets guidance and recipes. Now with embody DNA very insightful and educational about food chemistry and my body. Well done, Lose it! Team. Has also helped members of my family. Thank you!

title: Use this one!
body: I‚Äôll preface this by saying that I struggle with my mental health.

title: An exceptional app, that continues to get better!
body: Started with this app years ago, and it was decent. Bought the lifetime membership on a good deal, and have enjoyed using it ever since.

title: Great app for beginners
body: Hey guys! I literally have never written a review before but here we go. I enjoy this app very much. The best part about this app is it‚Äôs Free and has every feature you want. It‚Äôs super easy and friendly to navigate. Trying to deal with macros and micros won‚Äôt be to hard. Good if you want to start building a habit. I enjoyed this more then MyFitnessPal

title: Lost it
body: Lose it is a great tool for keeping on track for weight loss. I have used it successfully for several years and it recommended it to family, friends, and even strangers. If you are serious about your body, this app is for you . Thanks Lose it for being there for me.

title: Calorie amount not supplied
body: Unless I‚Äôve missed some little tab, you have to look up the calories for each food you log.  I would have thought that would be the benefit of having an app count calories on line - but no.   You have to find out on your own how many calories  a serving of broccoli or jello or a tablespoon of peanut butter is.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: Not Really Helpful
body: I started with the free version and at first it helped me become more cognizant of what I was eating and I became more mindful of what was nutritional vs. boredom/stress eating. I wanted more out of it so I can start to lose the weight and upgraded to the paid version. Not much changed. There are a few more options like tracking your water intake and connecting your exercise app with the program which is kind of cool, but it‚Äôs not intuitive and does not tell me anything more than I already know. Save the $30 and look into another option.

title: Greats App
body: This app keeps getting better and better. If your serious about sticking to a weight loss plan, upgrade to premium, it‚Äôs significantly cheaper then other calorie counting apps, but delivers so much! You can learn about your habits, track your nutrients, and even set personal goals. Syncs seamlessly with my Apple Watch as well, so I‚Äôm sold.

title: Committed
body: Lose It is a great program.  Its very easy to use and understand.  It works but you have to stay committed and log in daily.  I have seen the weight drop as I stay within the daily calories and log in.  I have gained weight since coming back from my cruise so, I‚Äôm getting back on track.

title: Better than MyFitnessPal, finally!
body: I‚Äôve been looking for AppleWatch compatible calorie count app with a nicer interface and dashboards for a long time, but none had food database as good as MyFitnessPal; so I had to stick with it... until now, that is. Finally!

title: Motivational
body: To me, being able to keep track of everything in one place is invaluable. I also love the function of being able to scan the barcode of thousands of food items in order to get their calorie count quickly.

title: Please bring back the old ‚ÄúGoals‚Äù page!
body: Lose it is by far easier to use than my fitness pal the only thing is now for the goals page I used to be able to see in a quick snapshot a running total of my macro nutrients in grams i.e. protein carbohydrates and fats.  But now there are all these graphs that are just not helpful!  Please bring back the old Cowles page!!!

title: Helpful in many ways
body: The premium is so much better than the free.

title: Saves lives
body: This app is so simple so easy I recommend it to everyone who is inspiring to lose weight!!! A lot of food choices in the data base which I love!!! I track everything I am obsessed thank u for creating such a wonder app I‚Äôm down 23lbs since June  all by being aware of what is healthy an I read more labels Bc of this app thank uüí™üèΩü§ó

title: Better instructions!
body: Good app but it could be more user friendly! There should be a tutorial on how to use more confidently.

title: Keeps me on track
body: Love this app! It‚Äôs so easy to use and has reminders to keep you logging and getting excited about your weight loss journey! It‚Äôs so fun and cute as you can choose your theme and I LOVE the food scanner!! Tons of foods are easily searched through the scanner to get your counts accurate!! So glad my granddaughter suggested this app!!

title: Sad but still like this app
body: I used to use this app all the time back in the day before it was all about making money I swear you can‚Äôt buy an app anymore that doesn‚Äôt ask your for money. This app used to be the best weight tracking app and it still is but it used to give you all the stats and meal ideas for free and now they charge ? So sad you guys would probably make more money if you lowered the prices just saying ...

title: Too many features require premium

There were always too many ads urging you to upgrade to the ridiculous premium price (expensive even with their ‚Äúmarkdown‚Äù), but now LoseIt won‚Äôt sync data from your Fitbit without getting premium. title: It‚Äôs simple and effective
body: Teaches you to focus on eating healthy, treat food as fuel.  Also good at educating you on what foods to add and eliminate from your diet.  Healthy Calories in and calories out works to reach and maintain your goal.

title: Road to your wanted weight

I lost 52 pounds with zero exercise and not starving myself.  Next phase is working out to continue the weight loss and get my body in shape.  This is not a diet it‚Äôs a lifestyle.  I highly recommend this app!!!

title: Slipping

That‚Äôs where Lose It comes in to help me get back to basics and back on track feeling comfortable once again.  Just a little effort organizing and making good choices and being honest with myself adds accountability for me, to me.

title: Amazing App

title: Amazing Tool 408 Days & Counting

title: Awsome
body: Weight is coming off came across this app as a recommendation from my works health plan , after reading an article I found out that the only way to lose weight is to eat less calories, unless your a Marathon runner, 15 lbs later I‚Äôm loving this. Put in what you‚Äôre weight

title: One of my "Home Screen" apps!

My fault, not the app.  Lose it gives me the tools I need to stay focused and eat right. I‚Äôve been using it for 8 years. How many apps can you say that about?

title: Love this app!
body: The most successful I‚Äôve ever been at losing weight and maintaining that weight loss has been with an app like this. I lost 25 pounds two years ago and have kept it off. I do occasionally creep up a few pounds and then I‚Äôm right back in lose it to take it off. I think accountability makes all the difference.

title: Couldn‚Äôt lose weight without it!

title: Please try it!
body: I‚Äôve never found an app that I‚Äôve actually stuck with and liked. I even bought premium and I‚Äôm poor af. I‚Äôve tried MyFitnessPal etc. this has it all. It links with my misfit and reminds me track my food even if i eat terribly. I really really like it so i hope someone else will find it as helpful as i did!!

title: Great App for weight management
body: I downloaded and used the free version. I was so impressed with the food nutrition database and the ease of use I upgraded to the paid version to get the recipes and meal plans that are great. I‚Äôm enjoying the food, the tips and the insights provided once you have the meal history built up. I recommend this app to everyone.

title: Good app but food register needs updating
body: This app has been really useful to help me track exercises, water intake and especially food, BUT there are so many foods that have changed formulations ( especially prepared and canned things) so the calories and breakdowns of carbs and proteins and vitamins are different and there needs an easy option to update them for accuracy but there is not. Thanks

body: This easy, simple app for tracking calories has been useful. But the daily popup offers to upgrade are way too annoying. I understand the need to promote your products, everyone does but,..every time it opens ?!! Please... and it would not take "No Thanks" for an answer.

title: I like
body: Can you make an icon for green tea because I drink it every day. This app is very good with tracking calories and nutrients. I found out that it‚Äôs not the app, it‚Äôs my eating habits. I‚Äôve learned that

title: Weight loss partner
body: This app makes logging my calories second nature.  There is also opportunities to interact with other dieters, if you choose to.  I love how easy it is to find foods I‚Äôve logged previously, and ability to scan labels of new foods.   I have been losing weight slow but sure since using this app.

title: It works, especially with a step tracker
body: I love this and can‚Äôt believe that I have continued to use this religiously for 4 months. I am down 20lbs. I love that it‚Äôs creating habits and that just daily movement counts and if you move a bunch, it will go toward calories. I have used other trackers in the past, including WW and my Fitness pal. title: Love it
body: Great App!!! I was inspired by a friend who used it and lost weight. body: If you follow a specific way of eating this app is worthless if you want to use their meal plans. The plans are base on calories only and there is no way to filter the meals to your preferences. There is no way to filter for allergies, taste, or ingredients. I only eat whole food plant based and there are little to no options in this category. However, if you want to pay $40 for a calorie counter this is perfect!!

title: Upped My Rating
body: PLUSES: It is much more than a calorie counter: has options for goal setting and tracking of fats, carbs, sugar, protein, exercise, other  types of nutrition, micronutrients... I   really like the trend data that identifies possible trends in successful weight loss, for me I loss weight when incorporating a vegetarian burger. Some insights not too helpful but does help me to think about why I might have lost more weight.  Actually I think I‚Äôm going to go to 4 stars now that I think about it.

title: What I was looking for

I don‚Äôt have a smart watch and it hasn‚Äôt affected my successful use of this app. It‚Äôs almost like playing a game, what can I eat this meal, and the win is lost pounds.

title: Extremely helpful
body: I personally use the app to track my calories and weight for wrestling, and their isn‚Äôt an easier way to do it except using this app. However, I think it should have a setting for people who want to Gain weight, as the app can be just as helpful if not more, overall great app

title: Love it!!!
body: I will be truthful, I downloaded this app and deleted it several times before I decided to get serious. If you truly want to loss weight, this app will help you stay on track. title: Fitness

title: Best system I‚Äôve found
body: Using Lose It! forces me to stay aware of what I‚Äôm putting in my mouth. title: One of the few apps w sodium tracking
body: One of the few apps I found w sodium tracking. Food library is huge and vast. Even has King Taco menu items, small chain in Los Angels. Scanning is fast and saves time. Scan library covers almost all things I have tried, even a few food gifts from friends traveling abroad.

title: Lose it

title: Premium Version is the Best Tracker

title: Super app -Update

title: Good Program, not responsive to feature requests
body: I‚Äôve been using the program for at least 3 years and it‚Äôs helped to lose over 50 pounds.

title: Like it but...
body: I‚Äôve been using the free app for a month and like it enough to decide to upgrade when I received an email offering a 25% discount. It‚Äôs not a cheap subscription and I‚Äôm questioning renewing my year if this is just how it‚Äôs going to be. Please fix it! I‚Äôd give it five stars but I‚Äôm only giving it two because of this.

title: Decent food tracking app
body: I like the app, been using for it for a few years, easy to track you food intake. Some of the features that come standard on other apps you have to pay for on this one. I wish there were more advanced options that came standard.

title: Best food log I‚Äôve ever had!
body: I have tried several weight loss apps in the past, but this one has surpassed any app/program I have ever seen! It keeps me on track and offers suggestions, and even gives me an ‚Äúattaboy‚Äù when I achieve a milestone! Can‚Äôt say enough about it! Try it! You won‚Äôt be disappointed!

title: Great app

title: Staying true to the app

The key is consistency and it teaches you a lot about what you eat, the quality of the food portions you choose and the and subsequent consequences/rewards as you stick with the plan.

title: Best app for weight loss

Simple to use and as a bonus it‚Äôs free (unless you purchase the premium plan but that still is inexpensive) Try this app you will not be disappointed!

Or it‚Äôll be a plain white blank screen with an orange bar at the top like it‚Äôs not done loading. It‚Äôs really annoying bc I liked the app and was doing a good job. Hopefully whatever‚Äôs wrong with it gets fixed really soon so I don‚Äôt have to start completely over with a different app

title: No longer trapped in a series of failed diets!!!

title: Love this app!

title: Lose It WORKS!

My blood pressure had dropped 20 points and my GERD has virtually disappeared. My jeans size has dropped by two. Thank you, Lose It developers‚Äîyou‚Äôve saved my life!

title: Works for me
body: I‚Äôm a pretty repetitive eater, and this app works really well for me. Being able to look up previous meals and quickly modify them has been useful. The recommended calories have kept me right on pace through more than 2 months.

title: Better App
body: I have used just about every app out there to lose weight.  This one doesn‚Äôt force me into some logins with under armor and has the same feature better laid out.  I like the premium features and waited to get them for $20 for the year.

title: Weight loss journey.
body: This is hands down the best app I have ever found. It blows Weight Watchers away & is simple, accurate & I love how it reminds you to track, if you haven‚Äôt all day. Working out & this app is the reason I have lost over 50 pounds & l tell every single friend of mine about it.

title: Amazing
body: I have tried every diet known to man and never got results, and was always miserable. I started doing lose it and the weight just started falling off and I didn‚Äôt have to give up any food that I loved. I recommend lose it for anyone who is trying to lose weight and not succeeding.

title: I love it. Update: mostly.
body: This app does exactly what I want, and added charts I didn't know I wanted.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. title: Log if you‚Äôre serious about losing weight
body: I‚Äôve tried three other weight loss logging apps.  This one is my keeper!  I love how I can scan a barcode and most times the particular food is there.  If I need to create a food, it‚Äôs pretty simple.  Like the experts say:  ‚Äúlog if you‚Äôre serious about losing weight.‚Äù

title: Great app
body: I started out on my weight loss journey over 400 days ago. I have used this app every single day to count my calories and balance my nutrients. It‚Äôs very easy to use, and I love the barcode feature to register the food I am eating. I lost 61 pounds in about nine months. I am currently still using the app to maintain my weight. I love it!

title: Extremely helpful as a tool to control calories and weight

title: This is great for losing weight!!!
body: I am extremely happy with this app. You don‚Äôt have have to pay for the premium to help lose weight. I feel more healthy and more energetic after using this app because I‚Äôm not constantly snacking. I want to watch my calorie intake and lose weight and this has helped me do so.

title: Incredible
body: I love this app and would recommend it not only to those that are wanting to lose weight but also to those that want to maintain a healthy lifestyle. I have used it for about five years, I think. It's information of nutrition is accurate and up to date. Thanks to the programmers.

title: Don‚Äôt upgrade to premium

title: Best free calorie counting app
body: I have been using this app for 6 years and it has helped me lose so much weight and best of all it‚Äôs free I have upgraded to the lifetime subscription but I think it‚Äôs so worth it counting calories is the best way to loose weight and this app helps you do that better then any others that I have tried.

title: Love it!
body: The Lose It! app is super easy to use. I love the food package scanning option. It also remembers food that you eat regularly. That makes it faster to record your favorite meals. It connects to my Apple Watch, to easily track my fitness. I‚Äôve been using it regularly for a week, and I‚Äôve already lost a pound.

title: Don‚Äôt wait
body: Tracking your calories could not be any easier. Even for a parent that‚Äôs on the run and is forced to eat out a lot, tracking my calories has allowed me to lose almost 11 pounds in 2 weeks. My health is more important than any food. Give it a shot, what do you have to lose?

title: Need to be Premium in order to sync Fitbit ‚òπÔ∏è
body: I think it is messed up that you must be a premium member and pay $40 a year in order to sync your Fitbit info into the app. That just seems greedy to me. I loved using this app but I don‚Äôt appreciate that they make you pay to sync certain apps and not others....

title: Need more access for apps
body: I have been using this app since long time . I love this app. It is simple and very nice to log and to know the steps.

title: So Helpful!
body: This app is really easy to use and helpful for keeping track of my meals and exercise. I‚Äôve always struggled with maintaining diets on my own, but having an app where I can record every little change is really motivating! It‚Äôs like every day is a challenge to get better, I‚Äôm so glad I started using it üí™

title: Great app but annoying sale tactics
body: This is a fantastic app with all the bells and whistles one could want. However, if you stick to the free version you are faced with countless pop-up windows and in-app messages that request you to upgrade to the paid version. title: Monthly Payments

I would love to be able to upgrade as this is my key source of health tracking, but won‚Äôt be able to so long as there is only an annual option.

title: Good app

Wish it were more customizable in the mineral, vitamins, and other components of one,s health. Worth paying the premium subscription though.

title: Better than weight watchers
body: Similar concept as Weight Watchers, except you‚Äôre not eating unlimited 0 point foods. Lose It actually helps us learn about macronutrients. It‚Äôs not a business that simply wants to scam people into getting their money, they‚Äôre actually here to help us because they want us to be better.

title: Great app
body: Lose it is really helping me lose weight. At first I tried to do the fastest option but for me it just wasn‚Äôt doable. I put it on the one pound a week option and it‚Äôs going great. I feel like I can actually eat and still lose weight. I guess in a sense it‚Äôs similar to weight watchers minus paying all of that money.

title: Easy to use + stick to!
body: I've been on my weight loss journey for over a year now and the last half of it has bee aided by lose it! I'm currently down 65+ pounds and counting...I love how much tracking your food makes you realize what you are putting in your body! Fantastic app...I recommend it to everyone

title: Fitbit connectivity a disappointment
body: And when I say connectivity I mean that you have to pay $20 a year to sync your Fitbit to lose it.   I like lose it.  I've used it for years off and on.  But at this point I will be finding an alternative.  Otherwise I like the app.   But several months ago they took away a significant level of functionality from the basic version.   With so many apps out there why pay for features others give you for free??

title: Lose it + Regular Exercise = Success
body: This app really helps you become awakes at what you are putting in your body and helps keep track of daily workouts. I have lost 30 pounds with the aid of this app. I highly recommend it to anyone who needs a little help with discipline in losing weight or getting in shape.

title: üëåüèª helpful app
body: I think this app makes a lot of sense and is very convenient. I used to eat senselessly and Lose It! Helps me to see what I eat throughout the entire day and actually think ahead how many calories I have to play with. I still eat burgers and stuff but it‚Äôs a good amount and I have already lost weight.

title: Getting your stuff together has never been easier
body: When you eat junk food, not only do you have to feel guilty about it but you have to log it! Great way to stay the course and make sure your life‚Äôs in budget, food wise.

title: Down 100 lbs. in one Year
body: No, seriously, I began tracking my weight, food, and exercise through this app - diligently - on Aug 1st, 2020, and I lost over 100 lbs. by Aug 1st, 2022.

title: Love it and Lose!
body: I have to admit I discovered this app a while ago and have used several other tracking apps since then. I rediscovered this last year and love it for its simplicity and ease of use! I‚Äôm definitely better when I‚Äôm on track and accountable and Lose It makes it easy!

title: Love this app!
body: I‚Äôm learning about my mental side of why I eat the way I do, but that comes along with tracking my food. I love this app! It has everything I need. I haven‚Äôt figured out a way to view my recipes though, without adding them to the meal and the selecting edit to see the ingredients‚Ä¶ other than that it‚Äôs great!

title: Easy to use
body: I‚Äôve gone back to basics, with counting calories for weight loss. This app makes it very simple. I can chart exercise and calories.I especially like that it calculates count calories and macro nutrients. I have not upgraded to the premium yet. For now the basic is meeting my needs and I‚Äôve lost 2.2 lbs the first week.

title: I hate it
body: I wish I never got premium, The food database is an absolute joke. I‚Äôm so sick of not being able to pick things like a single rib and I have to figure out how many ounces or grams or fractions of a pound is in a rib. I don‚Äôt carry a scale around with me. Also about 10% of the barcodes I scan come up with the wrong food item. Their tech-support just tells you to edit it yourself, if that‚Äôs the case why don‚Äôt I just have a food diary and do all the work myself later on anyways?

title: THE best calorie counter
body: I have been using Lose It since 2012 and have lost over 100 pounds.  I have used others including Noom and this is by far the best and most intuitive app. You have just have to start a short streak and you will become addicted to using this app and lose the weight.

title: No Marco Tracking only shows Calories Counting
body: I should have looked into the app before down loading it. There is no option to see how much Marcos you have left for the day. With MyFitnessPal you‚Äôre able to customize your Marcos and able to view what is left after inputting a meal. This one only shows how many calories you have left. I was hoping this app would replace MyFitnessPal, but I‚Äôll be deleting the app unless the developer adds on the feature.

title: Needs more
body: It‚Äôs a cool app, good stuff, really enjoy it. BUT YOU CANT SEE MICRONUTRIENTS, I know it‚Äôs not an easy thing to add, but seems odd to not have it. Not even an option to make write your own micronutrients in, I think it‚Äôs a major thing to be missing, but I would give 5 stars if it had that. Interface it good. I think autotime stamps would be nice, and micronutrient tracking. That‚Äôs all this needs to be great.

title: It‚Äôs.... fine
body: A generally feature packed food, calories and exercise tracking app. It‚Äôs supposed to be able to detect trends after enter at least 7 days worth of food. But it has to be 7 days in a row. And, if you track everything, but forget to smack the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm done tracking for the day‚Äù button your data doesn‚Äôt count. You can‚Äôt even go back and close out a previous day. I‚Äôm not joking. üòû

title: Very Well Thought Out
body: Great app. Tried it out and kept finding it useful. Lots of great functionality and design - they really did a good job with this app (as a developer I appreciate the amount of effort that went into this). So many bad apps out there now, but this one is worth the price if you want to track nutrition.

title: Eating choices.
body: Before I started using Lose It I thought I was eating healthy foods. After starting the APP it made me become mindful of what I ate, when I ate and the calories.  Many days I have gone over my desired calorie count but the total is less than before using Losing It. I am losing weight. Knowledge is power!

title: I love this app!
body: It really makes you aware of what you‚Äôre eating!  Helps you make healthier choices!  I don‚Äôt know how often I check calories on something I want to eat and then change my mind because there‚Äôs too many calories.    I‚Äôve lost nearly 30 lbs and I attribute a great deal of that to this app!

title: An Error Occurred Message
body: An error occurred when I tried going premium, I don't know what that means... I love the app but I don't know why it says that every time I try to go premium ü§î I get a pop-up that says "We ran into a problem when trying to complete this purchase" Again I love this app, no hate in the slightest ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Won‚Äôt sync calories to FitBit
body: Won‚Äôt sync calories to my FitBit. Without that this is useless to me. I have updated both apps, uninstalled and reinstalled, revoked access and then gave access again on both apps, logged out of everything, deleted both apps, turned off my phone and restarted then reinstalled and logged back in and gave access and checked permissions. I‚Äôm done spending time reading articles trying to get calories to show up in FitBit as advertised. MyFitnessPal does this without any problem.
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Best I have found
body: I‚Äôve tried several apps for tracking calories. This one wins for the following reasons:

title: Review
body: I have been using this app for approx 6 months and love it!  It is easy to use and makes me accountable for what I eat.  You need to be truthful about what you eat and then it will help you succeed at whatever you want to do, either weight loss or healthy eating, or both!  It is easy to do on your phone so no excuses... good luck

title: Great app but ads are annoying
body: Using LoseIt has really been helping me lose weight. It‚Äôs only been a month and I have already lost about 12 lbs. One downside though - I paid for the upgraded version that is supposed to be ad free but I am still getting ads in the app and email marketing. It would be nice if the paid upgrade was truly ad free as advertised.

title: Love but not liking right now
body: In general I love this app. But... as of late it is not counting all my steps and if you don‚Äôt stop about 20-30 mins before midnight it doesn‚Äôt count them for either day. I just did 2400 steps to get to next level of calories (200) and it counted less than a 100 steps taken. If they get this taken care of I will up my rating to 5 stars.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: One week down
body: So far I‚Äôve really enjoyed using this app. It‚Äôs very simple and very thorough. A word of encouragement for those using it the first week‚Ä¶ Your calories will balance out at the end of seven days. So if you go over your calories one day, just keep on counting the rest of the week. You will be pleasantly surprised!

title: Love it!!!
body: It is so easy to use. I tell everyone to try it. It makes me see exactly how I‚Äôm doing day by day. No excuses. When I‚Äôm eating the right portions of the right foods, the weight drops off. When I‚Äôm taking in too many calories along with those poor choices, the less likely I‚Äôll see the rolls in my middle disappear.

title: Amazing app.
body: Love this app.  Been using this app for four weeks now.  Been serious about losing weight and exercising.  I‚Äôve lost 6 pounds so far by using this app to show my calorie intake.  Love being able to use it at restaurants as well.  I can truly see what is best for me to eat.  Great app if you are serious about losing weight.

title: Works well, if you stick to it.
body: Been using for a while and down 40 lbs. works well but two things would be nice. 1. The ability to search/scan foods without going in to logging and 2. Ability to reset and start from scratch, with out having to delete an account and make a new one.  This would boost this to five stars.

title: Long time user
body: Been using Lose It for roughly 5 years (if not longer!) and I love this app. It‚Äôs easy to use and works with other apps to keep you on track. I definitely recommend this app to those who want to track their macros and are interested in losing, maintaining, or gaining weight.

title: Helps with weight loss
body: I have been using this app to count my calories which has been a huge help. Logging the food for each day is easy since they have several selections and it‚Äôs forced me to take a good look at what I have been putting in my body. So far, I am loving this app and losing weight!!

title: Simple and very easy to use
body: Great app that has been a game changer in my weight loss journey. Honestly the only knock on this app (if you are using the free version) is that almost every time I open the app I get the annoying pop up about buying the paid subscription version. Besides that aspect it‚Äôs a great app and easily helps with tracking food and counting calories.

title: Great :)
body: This is a very well made app! Since fitness pal wasn‚Äôt downloading on my phone, I chose this app, and it is really greatly managed and has good info and facts regarding your schedule and information. However, I found I needed to change a lot to the foods I generally ate in order to make a difference (just a tip!) as you do any diet.

title: I Love lose It!
