body: Lose it makes it so easy for losing the 15 pounds, I feel I need to lose. I have been using  the app since late March and I have lost 6 pounds.  I am being patient and I know I will lose the rest of my weight in time.  I am confident I can maintain my weight as well, and as a 57, year old active woman this is important.

title: If only it tracked glucose readings too...
body: I am very happy with this app.  It‚Äôs user friendly and I‚Äôve yet to find a food not in the database.  I wish I was able to track my blood sugar readings too.  I‚Äôm a Type 1 Diabetic and haven‚Äôt yet found a comprehensive app that tracks both.  I‚Äôd be willing to pay for that level of support.

title: Lose it works.
body: If you use lose it, and you are honest with your food log, and you use it every day, you will lose weight.  You will also learn how much you should eat to keep weight off.  I lost 35 pounds last year, and I‚Äôm on track to lose 30 more this year.  Thanks lose it!

title: Keto Tornado
body: Lose It has helped me, not only stick to my keto diet, but also identify a pattern of foods that are keeping me on track, offer fun challenges to keep me motivated, and provide a community of support. I‚Äôve lost over 50 POUNDS and am down 4 SIZES!!! The best part is, IT‚ÄôS FREE! If you are ready to start a new healthy you, Lose It is exactly what you are looking for!

title: It‚Äôs ok - always upselling
body: Helpful in logging CiCO and weight daily hence the 3 stars but the graphics are weak and unimaginative.

title: Desperately need to lose weight
body: This app is amazing. Everything I put in my mouth I record. It tells me my calorie intake so I don‚Äôt go over. I have lost 8lbs since I started this app. I have not been disappointed or have not had any problems with app. My daughter told me about this lose it app and I am so thankful she did.

title: Super Helpful
body: Started using Lose It in March 2018 to track my exercise and calorie intake. It‚Äôs now August 2018 and I have lost 45 pounds. Started at 225 and am not at 180. It works if you work it. The easy to use app was especially helpful in making me calorie aware. Both my intake of calories as well as my burning of calories through exercise.

title: Really helped me
body: I started out just tracking to see how it worked and that lead to major changes over the next 10 months that resulted in losing 45 pounds. It‚Äôs just a tool and there‚Äôs a lot of work in making sure you‚Äôre eating right but seeing the numbers so easily is a great motivator.

title: Best calorie counting app available
body: I left WW after Freestyle stopped working for me. Five week plateaus are not my thing. Never liked MFP so started Lose It. It‚Äôs excellent. Very easy to adjust amounts from ounces, tablespoons, grams, servings etc. Huge selection of foods, I have yet to enter a food and not find it. Colors are bright, app is easy to use. Losing weight. Five stars.

title: Hope you like ads
body: I actually paid for a subscription and yet this morning when I went to log my breakfast I was greeted with a full screen pop-up ad for some garbage I don‚Äôt care about. This is ridiculous.
response: So sorry for the trouble here! Can you please email us via help.loseit.com so we can look into this?

title: This app is amazing!!!!!
body: I totally would recommend this app to anyone who is looking for a challenge!!! It has changed my life and has adapted to my personal life as well. It has multiple settings to change to your personal traits and lifestyle, as well as a variety of foods and workouts to choose from!!! Best app ever!!!!

title: Loving LoseIt!!
body: With a nickname like Cookie, losing weight has always been hard. LOVE LOVE LOVE

title: Best free option I‚Äôve used
body: LoseIt is the best free option for food and exercise tracking that I‚Äôve used. I was able to lose 15lbs when I actually was being mindful and logging, and after a few months of not so great eating I‚Äôm back to it again. I took one star away because the constant nagging to upgrade to premium version is annoying as heck.

title: PLEASE GET THIS APP
body: i‚Äôve been trying to lose weight(more than 25 lbs) and i always end up breaking my diet. this app is LITERALLY perfect and helps me keep track of everything i need to. i have so much hope and confidence in my weight loss journey thanks to this app. i‚Äôve been losing 2lbs a day just by counting my calories. this app is a blessing thank u!!!!

title: Doable!
body: Most apps and programs make it difficult and overwhelming to lose weight. This app makes it doable! Easy to use, plenty of options to track (but keeps it simple unless you want to add all the trackable options). I feel like I can finally hit my weight loss goal! Definitely recommending this app!

title: Cluttered
body: I have used the lose-it app for years. It is the first app I ever downloaded on my first iPhone. I have never had a complaint about an update until now. The ‚Äúadd to log‚Äù page in now cluttered with all the premium options. Even when I have used premium membership in the past I logged the meals, not the specific protein/carb. This page needs to be clean and user friendly. If people have a premium membership they should be free to add or remove the option.

title: Easy to use
body: Logging the food is easier than I thought. They gave a huge installed library. I wish the features I cant use were hidden(morning snack) and I don‚Äôt want to upgrade.

title: Lose it!
body: Super easy app. No excuses. Takes seconds to log your food and the numbers don‚Äôt lie. Not even one week in and I am down four pounds!! As much as we hate to log our food intake, it‚Äôs more important to watch the calories than to run 22 miles a week. Together = perfect combo. I can‚Äôt wait to see me on May 28. üéâüéâ

title: Would like less flashy themes and bar graphs.
body: I love the app but I am not fond of the food logs new bar graph on top which is annoying. Sometimes less is more.  I wish you had the option to turn it off in the log. I just want to see the caloric numbers not a a flying graph going across the screen.  I did find that it was less annoying in certain themes.   Good thing I can use my kindle instead of this iPhone app.

title: Great for gaining discipline
body: This app is helping my whole family to gain control over our eating and make much healthier choices when we eat out too. I‚Äôve lost 15 pounds in 7 weeks, my husband 25, and my daughter 7. Has been great for my teen daughter who needed to learn to make healthier eating choices - without mom chastising her.

title: Best I have found!
body: I really love using this app.  It helps me reign in my out of control eating and give me accountability.  HOWEVER..... I don't like the editing feature on foods.  One day I edit a food and the next day I come to add it again and it's been changed.  That's frustrating.  Otherwise is would have a 5 star rating!

title: Awesome app
body: I did a program that worked for me where I was required to write it all down. When I tried again I was having problems. Started using this app and amazing... doing great again! It makes you accountable. That's why I did so well before and this is even better as it's so easy!!

title: It's great even after you reach your goal!
body: You can understand macros, ratios, nutrients and nutrition and be much more accountable for your choices throughout your day. If you understand what it breaks down as and how it affects your body, then your in better tune with yourself! I'm so much more conscious! And I understand the foods that work for me!

title: It Works GREAT!
body: Really good app for counting calories.  I actually use it to plan meals so that I‚Äôll stay within my calorie budget.  I love the face that the food data base is so extensive, that I can scan barcodes (pay attention to serving sizes when you do), and I can customize my own food entries.  As of this morning, I‚Äôve lost eight pounds in 9 days.

title: It‚Äôs a good tool, but only a tool
body: Just as a good power so will make you more efficient than a manual saw, this tool is more efficient than paper locks. But you still have to do the work. The app won‚Äôt stop you from overheating, it just makes you more aware as long as you‚Äôre following through.

title: Made it to my goal weight
body: I‚Äôve used the free version, which is fine. I‚Äôve used the paid version, which gives you your money‚Äôs value.

title: Easy to use, and fit into your busy schedule.
body: I am a nurse working in a large hospital. My work can be very stressful and fast paced. I am trying to eat better, and drink more water, and lose a few pounds, I find it easy and quick to record my information, and I have enjoyed it very much so far.

title: This app has it all
body: I joined initially for calorie counting only. I have ventured further into the app and now enjoying the chat groups. I have been given so much support and that gives me willpower to take my dieting to a new level. This is so easy to use.  I would encourage this app for anyone wanting to live a more healthy lifestyle

title: Can‚Äôt believe this is free
body: Of all the apps I have ever downloaded, this is the most functional, easy to use, and fully comprehensive of them all. Not just calorie/weight apps but of ALL the apps I have ever used. It‚Äôs amazing to me this is free and I am eternally grateful to the developers. It has been instrumental in my weight management for months.

title: Loyal user
body: I‚Äôve tried other nutrition & fitness tracking apps and I‚Äôve consistently came back to this one. The navigation, the ability to maintain recipes and macros, plan ahead in days to come for your meal plan are all super functional and important for those who are trying to remain consistent

title: I'm A Fan
body: I absolutely love how user friendly and sufficiently equipped with a plethora of foods--store brands, name brands, and restaurants...wow! I can even enter  nutrition facts for unlisted food and/side portions AND note how well I'm keeping up with my weight goals. Eating has become so fun--and empowering for me. 'Lost It' has become my ride or die! Can't wait to log my next meal!

title: Great once, now continues to get worse
body: Lose It used to be a great app and very helpful for tracking food intake.

title: great for losing weight if your ignorant to calories
body: 1/ If you don't know anything about losing weight then this is the app you want.

title: More exercise options
body: Hey I really like your app I‚Äôve been using it for the past 3 to 5 years and it‚Äôs a really great way to help me lose weight. But I wish they were more exercise options you added a few more since the last update and I‚Äôm happy for it. But could you put some like welding in there and maybe a few more that be a great help.

title: Life changing
body: Never realized what I was actually eating until I got this app. Takes a tiny amount of work to realize what I needed to change. It really helped me with nutrition and portion control, which was a big problem for me. I‚Äôm much more conscious of how much I need to eat vs. how much I can stuff my face. You guys are the best!

title: Used to be better...
body: I used to love this app... was constantly finding new features to make tracking and sharing info with my trainer easier. Was just about to go lifetime.

title: Great Weight Loss App
body: Want to lose weight? Try this one weird trick: make a reasonable plan and follow it, both of which this app will help you do. You don‚Äôt have to starve yourself or follow some weird scheme of things you can and can‚Äôt eat. Have what you like but keep track of it so you don‚Äôt have too much. Simple.

title: Used to love
body: Previously I had this app and it helped me lose 30 pounds. But now they changed it up and made it a little harder to use. I found that everything I used before is now all used I‚Äôm premium. I just wish the app would go back to the older version that was easier to use and more things were available to use and not a premium. I‚Äôm really sad about this I used to recommend this app to all my friends not sure I will after this update.

title: Messages
body: It is a big hassle to message my coach. Every time I type and correct, key board disappears and then when I go to find it when you touch message, then new typing starts there. Can‚Äôt navigate well at all!

title: Do it!
body: It works! I‚Äôm down 75 pounds in 2 years and I‚Äôm never going back! Daily and weekly goals and long term goals keep me on track. I eat whatever I want, but am forced to make intentional, healthier decisions to stay on track. I‚Äôll do this the rest of my life, and I‚Äôm happy about that. Been looking for this for years!

title: Lose It! Is Awesome
body: If you‚Äôve set goals for yourself to lose weight, eat healthier, or create a food journal this app is awesome. It‚Äôs super easy to use, fun and intuitive, and free! The ads and promo pop ups are not obtrusive, though, the premium features offered are worth it if you want to take things to that next level.

title: Eating Healthy
body: I did not start using Lose It to lose weight but to track healthy food and feel better. I have been using Lose It for over a year and it has helped me track my food intake and weight.  I feel the best I have in my 68 years and lost 40 pounds in the process

title: Great tool!
body: Not only for weight loss, but for tracking nutrition. Connectivity makes it easy , and provides an All in one place to record exercise.....intake vs output. It‚Äôs been my go to when I get off track. And now with some health concerns, it helps me keep on top of that as well. Great app, great tool for healthy lifestyle. Thank you!

title: This app used to help me so much
body: I used this app 4 years ago to kickstart me losing weight. It worked at the time and I lost 20-30 pounds! However, since coming back, there are major changes that make the app virtually useless. I can‚Äôt enter my weight when i need to update it. There are so many features that used to be free that only come with premium now, which makes the app useless for me. I have to track my cholesterol and keep in mind how much protein and carbs I‚Äôm consuming. üëéüèº
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further. Best, Dia

title: Great app to keep you on track
body: I have previously attempted everything from old weight watchers tally points to trying to maintain my carb count, and nothing has been more user friendly, allowing me to effortlessly track my food intake for the day, along with my exercise, water count, etc. Wonderful app!

title: Best weight loss tracking app ever !
body: I love all of the features of this app that helps me stay on track and become more aware of how I can have a balanced diet and helps me manage my portion control.

title: Easiest and fun app to log food
body: I really hate calorie tracker apps. They are usually so hard to use - just clunky. But Lose It app is different. It‚Äôs really easy and feels intuitive and seamless. I love how it estimates how many calories I should have for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. I‚Äôll be using this from now on. I think it‚Äôs actually fun to use!

title: Already seeing progress
body: I‚Äôve always wanted to lose weight and this app was something that I doubted when I saw it but after using it and following the steps I‚Äôve seen weight loss but it‚Äôs in a healthy way. I recommend this to anyone who‚Äôs looking for results in a healthy and reasonable time span

title: Thank you
body: Excellent self paced way to lose weight using smaller portions of your favorite recipes and adding their recipes! Being accountable and recording calories for each bite is the secret. I did not know how much calories butter and oils added to my diet. I cut that out . I was never hungry even though I started eating smaller portions. I am thrilled!

title: Has Kept Me On Track For 10 Years
body: I absolutely love this app. I started using Lose it in 2009 and it has kept me honest. I‚Äôve enjoyed all the features which have been added. The premium feature is the best of all.

title: You make it so easy
body: I love the ability to scan the package and have all the nutritional information recorded! It‚Äôs making it so easy to track what I am eating. Also the little reminders to record my food like it doesn‚Äôt matter what you ate, just record it! Can‚Äôt get away with anything!

title: I will get there!
body: Wish I were losing more weight but it‚Äôs my age more than anything. This app makes me completely accountable which is what I need! It helps! Gets easier after using it the first day. It also calculates how much I can take in which is a big shocker. Exercise is what saves me every day.

title: This works!
body: I am a 55yo, non exercising female. I Started using this app on Jan 1st this year. I weighed 192.  Today is Mar 2 and I‚Äôve lost 18lbs. This app has opened my eyes to all the things that I was eating that were so high in calories. I eat what I want. But I am aware  that I have a caloric limit each day and it keeps me on track.  When anyone has asked what I did to lose sight I tell them I use this app.

title: Lose it! Has helped me lose 40+ lbs
body: Hansen using The. Free version of the app for about 13 months and it has helped me track daily intake of calories, carbs, protein and fat. It has been an invaluable tool for me to lose 40 lbs and keep it off. On 8lbs to go to reach my goal weight! I‚Äôll continue to use it to maintain my weight!

title: Focus and Challenge
body: This app is awesome in the manor and ease in which it keeps you focused on your intake to reach your goal. It provides a solid platform to challenge yourself to meet or exceed the expectations to continue your success. Also, logging your food intake is super straightforward. I will defiantly recommend this to friends.

title: Upgrade is a waste of money. Not accurate
body: I found the basic app useful so upgraded to the premium. It is a waste of money. It does not accurately calculate fat, protein,  fiber and carb percentages. As soon as I installed the upgrade and discovered how misleading it was immediately, I tried to get a refund but was refused. Save your  money and use the free app. I have already cancelled the upgrade so I won‚Äôt be automatically charged when annual renewal comes around.

title: GREAT WEIGHT LOSS ASSISTANCE
body: Great way to keep up with calorie intake, exercise and weight loss. Isn‚Äôt always consistent with calorie content, measurement means and choices of food on different phones. My husband and I both use the app and eat the same things, but our options to choose from for entering our meals are not always the same.

title: Nope
body: 1. Setting goals was easy. I would be nice if you could edit/delete from one screen, but you can‚Äôt, you can only add and change the goal from the add screen. Two too many screens for one function.

title: Wow!
body: I love this app! It is user friendly and very motivatingüòÅ. It has everything you need to stay on your course with weight management. Logging food and exercise each day, all in one place works for me. The challenges and social/ sharing are great for accountability and motivation.   Great app if you actually work it!

title: It is possible
body: I‚Äôm only down 10lbs and frankly it‚Äôs mostly because of my own discipline! This Lose it app WORKS! Just use it and be committed. Simply pay attention and daily and let it hold you accountable. Be patient and understand it took awhile to put that extra weight on and it will take awhile to LOSE IT!!

title: BEST EVERRR!!!
body: I LOVE LoseIt! This app is the absolute BEST I‚Äôve ever found that has helped me keep track of my goals, calories, weight, exercises, burned calories, and my daily steps using my FitBit. My goal started in August at my heaviest weight ever (240 lbs)....6 months later, I am now 194 POUNDS!!! ...when I haven‚Äôt been under 200lbs since I was 19 yrs old!!! ...(now 34 years Old)!!üôåüèºüíØ Thank you LoseIt!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Has it all
body: I‚Äôve lost 30 pounds and kept it off, because Lose It has such a user-friendly interface‚Ä¶ including every food known to man! I‚Äôve been using the app for close to two years now, and I can‚Äôt imagine switching away. Thank you to the engineers that designed!

title: Great App!
body: I‚Äôve tried tons of weight loss apps before, but this is the only app thats truly worked for me. I lost 46 pounds with this app (at once) and if you count the weight I gained back and lost again, I‚Äôve lost a total of 71.5 pounds using this app over the past seven years. Love this app. Trust this app. Get this app. PS. The upgrade is 100% worth it.

title: The best and easiest way to really know how much you eat!
body: I have always eaten a healthy diet, I just ate too much of it. Not until I started tracking my food with Lose It! did I really know how much I ate in calories. I upgraded to the premium app the first day and it was the best decision I‚Äôve made for my health. Down 5 lbs. the first week!

title: I‚Äôm 60 and this was the solution to a dieting life!
body: Lose it has helped me maintain my weight like no other program! You have to be consistent but if you are you are so rewarded! Been dieting since I was 12 but tracking and the friendly encouragement of the app have made it happen... thanks Lose it.

title: Glad I found this app
body: I read about this app in the New York Times and like its features.  It lets you set your own pace for losing weight, rather than imposing a caloric restriction.  I opted to lose weight more slowly but not suffer from deprivation.  It has an incredibly comprehensive index of foods by brand names and very clean graphics.

title: Please add food sharing between friends
body: I‚Äôve used this app for about 3 years and it would be so helpful if you added a way to share foods between friends. I think the whole ‚Äúsocial‚Äù aspect needs a revamp in general- what‚Äôs the point in friends if you can see what their eating and help encourage them??

title: Great health app
body: Been using LoseIt for years.  The apps continues to improve making easier and easier to track what you consume. Plus, the app has way to track other health metrics to track such as blood pressure, fat percentage, water consumption,...  You can also access your data on the web.

title: Get it
body: It definitely helps me to be more mindful of what I am eating,. I try to log what I am thinking about eating before I eat it so I have time to ask myself ‚ÄúIs this worth the calories?‚Äù I still eat the things I like but in much more reasonable portions. The free version is helpful but Premium has some nice options that I feel are worth the cost. Good luck on your health & wellness  journey!

title: Love the app
body: I wasn't sure what to expect when I first started using the app, but I'm about 8 weeks in and I really feel like it has helped me.  I'm not a big fan of calorie counting but I must say that it has helped me; it keeps me accountable to what I eat.  I use one of the exercise apps that download to the app and I like that too.

title: Mr. Delighted
body: In the passed 731 days Lose It has kept me on track to losing of 54 lbs. so far. This was two goals that I set. By seeing what I put in my mouth it showed me just how bad My eating habits were. This weight lose has inspired others, including health professional, asking me how I did this and getting details.

title: The Perfect Weight-loss App!
body: Perfect just like it is! I have no need for the Premium. All I need to track is carbs, protein and calories each day, along with what exact foods that I am consuming. So happy I found it! I‚Äôve been able to lose 70lbs so far, using this app! Won‚Äôt stop until l lose 40 more! And I can‚Äôt wait!

title: The best tool out there
body: When I got on the scale and it hit 262. I decided it was time to change and Lose it has been my companion for the journey. I am down to about 232. And I still have a ways to go but would not have gone this far without my helper

title: AWESOME!
body: For the second time in my life (the first being 7 years ago) this app has helped me get my health on track. It's so easy and fun to use! I had always dreaded the idea of counting calories... But this app has changed everything for me. My favorite part is adding in exercise to get some calories back. Yay! 72lbs down and counting!

title: Accountability
body: I lost 63lbs in 8 months with the help of lose it!! Once I started keeping track of what I was putting in my body I saw how unhealthy I was. I started eating cleaner food and using my daily value of calories on solid foods, not wasting my calories on junk food, coffee creamer and soda. I highly recommend this app!

title: Works but need to clean up database
body: Lose it has worked but can be discouraging at times. I would log in and be under my calorie range (even after adjusting for my metabolism) only to discover after looking at labels that something I logged in from their foods database was way off. Now I try to scan as much as possible but not possible for everything. Just be aware if using the database.

title: Best
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 640 days it gives me accountability and helps me in so many ways to watch my weight and take it off or modify however I want to do it . Love the way it reminds me to eat, and keeps me on my goal with the calories being counted. It is my go to app every morning at breakfast!!!

title: Too many ads
body: I used the app last spring, and there were no ads, and the app worked great! This year there are tons of ads, and the rankings don‚Äôt refresh very quickly.

title: Fixed short-term weight logging issue super fast
body: I‚Äôm writing this review to balance a pre-new-bug-fix review I submitted after a bug was introduced preventing decimal weights for the first time since I‚Äôve used the app. The developers apparently saw feedback and fixed it super fast and replied to the reviews commenting on the issue. Thanks!
response: Apologies for the trouble here! Our engineers are aware of this issue and working on a fix. It'll be out in an upcoming release.

title: Lost 70lbs!!
body: I lost 70 lbs with lose it!! It‚Äôs the most intuitive food and exercise logging app I‚Äôve tried. My experience is that it is accurate within +/- 100 calories for me. (In other words, I needed to undershoot by 100 calories to lose weight BUT your mileage may vary since everyone‚Äôs metabolism is different.)

title: Great App! Lost 35 lbs!
body: I use the premium version of Lose It! And I love. I track calories, macros, weight, water intake and sleep everyday. I‚Äôve lost 35 lbs since March and the app has taught me what I can and cannot eat and how many calories I really need. I‚Äôve gone from a size 8  to a size 2 at 53 years old and I feel great!!! Thanks Lose It! team!!!!

title: Down 17 lbs in 2 months
body: This app truly works. I have lost over 17 lbs in 2 months just by using the free version. I have eliminated sodas from my daily diet and significantly increased my water intake. This app helps you lose weight based on your daily activity level. I don‚Äôt even exercise outside of my daily activity!

title: Success
body: I have tried many things over the years as I fight obesity. This seems to be the only thing that has worked for me.  No pressure, just gentle nudging to stay consistent with using the tools.   This works for me!! Also love the way I don‚Äôt need to look up the foods. The app has that included!

title: Could be more user friendly
body: I really like this app and the visuals/analysis it provides. My biggest issue is the function of adding recipes. On this app, you have to individually add each ingredient for a recipe. Other apps you can paste a link to the recipe and then the app tries to best match each ingredient automatically‚Äî way easier!! Hopefully LoseIt can add this function!

title: Great app but still getting ads with premium
body: The app works great! However, if I‚Äôm paying you for a year of premium then there‚Äôs absolutely no reason I should be getting ads for a lifetime membership. If I chose to purchase a year instead of lifetime, it means I‚Äôve made my decision and I don‚Äôt need constant up-selling.

title: Amazing
body: The absolute best tracker I have used. 99% of the foods I have scanned are always pre-loaded into their system. Even my supplements. Easy to keep track of daily water, weight, sleep, and exercise. Allows you to set goals based on WHAT YOU WANT. Not what the company says you want. Definitely worth the subscription üëèüèºüëèüèº

title: So far success
body: I have using this app for the past month and 2 weeks and I‚Äôve lost over 10 lbs . I haven‚Äôt upgraded yet . Counting calories and seeing them on this app very helps me but it all in perspective! Thank you . 20 more pounds to go . I had a baby 8 months ago. When I delivered I was 180. Now I‚Äôm weighing in at 141.2

title: I got the lifetime membership
body: Lose it has been instrumental in helping me eat healthy knowing where all the calories are going, how to make a plan and track my water, exercise, food and weight. I joined for the lifetime membership. Great other features are menus, recipes, shopping lists and exercise suggestions.

title: Great weight loss app
body: If you are a calorie counter this is for you. Easy and intuitive. Saves past meals for easy retrieval and allows for favorite recipes to be stored. Even has a list of restaurants to check items from and a great food search feature. Use it regularly to regain goal weight.

title: Tangible Information
body: I love this app because it gives you specific parameters based on your weight and activity level, adjusting up or down. There are different ways that work for everyone but if you‚Äôre someone who likes something concrete, this is the way to go.

title: Life changing
body: It did take awhile but it‚Äôs better to loose weight slowly than fast. I lost 40 pounds in about 4 months. I never upgraded but I‚Äôm sure it would help a lot to let you see the different nutrients your putting in your body. I would buy it any day I just don‚Äôt have the money.

title: Way better than MyFitnessPal
body: I was a loyal MFP sub for over a decade but once under armor took over the app has sucked ever since. A friend recommended Lose It and it‚Äôs been the best decision ever! I can log everything with ease, get recipes and exercise programs, and it really keeps up with the data. I‚Äôll be using this app for life!!!!

title: Love it!
body: The App is so easy and it really helps keep me on track! It tracks everything for me so I can make sure I live healthy. Even if I go over my allowable calories now & then I know that I am not gaining weight and over eating all of the time. It keeps me conscientious about what I put in my mouth. Very motivating for me so far !

title: Helpful app
body: I have been using this app for over a year. It has been an important part of my routine to plan for the next day and to hold myself accountable when I have not made good choices. The app isn‚Äôt going to make those choices for you, but it has helped keep me focused on my goals.

title: Amazing App!!
body: When I first tried I thought that it would just be another app, but then as I went on it kept getting better. I love how you can scan the barcode and count the calories so easy!  If you are trying to lose weight I definitely recommend this app!

title: Works as intended
body: I‚Äôve never had issues with this app. I use it in intervals, and it helped me to track my weight/food intake when I had gained 40+ pounds and gave me perspective on how to change my eating habits, etc. I particularly like the goals you can set and the food selections are pretty broad and include all sorts of brand names to add.

title: It‚Äôs easy
body: No group therapy or coaching bullcorn.

title: Karen C
body: Been using this app for 4 years and have lost but once I did my DNA along with the app my weight loss started showing results. Often become discouraged but finding it to get me through the hard times. Also great for my health in general, blood pressure, blood glucose, and weight lose all in one place.

title: Hate the new update
body: I‚Äôve used this app off and on for about 6 years. I love it and I pay for premium every year. But one thing that really disappointed me was that they took out the restaurant and grocery category! I am especially annoyed about the restaurant category because it is not always feasible to look up the nutrition info or ask for the nutrition menu, so it was really convenient to look up the product or at least something similar.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Helpful
body: The LoseIt app offers great support. I find it easy to record everything I eat. A calorie count is available for nearly every food in every grocery store and restaurant. I especially like the scanner. It‚Äôs easy to set goals and progress with weight loss using the app. I highly recommend it.

title: Greatest weight loss app ever!!
body: I love the fact that I am accountable to something. And it‚Äôs so easy to log your food and see exactly where you are at with calories. You are able to see how many calories you can eat and how many you have left for the next meal. I love it,best way to lose weight ever.

title: First ‚ÄúCompleteüëå‚Äù App
body: This App is completely seemless with workout entry, food intake, providing a visual representation of exactly what you‚Äôve eaten compared to the goal line of calories you are aiming for each day.  The visual for the day and week and the summary really help you see how you are progressing (or not) and examine those days that may be your pitfalls

title: Wish there was a Keto option
body: I‚Äôm currently doing a Keto diet and I wish the daily meal plans and calorie counter would be on point with that. It looks like I‚Äôm going way over my calorie budget. Plus side it counts carbs if you go premium and you shouldn‚Äôt stay on a Ketogenic diet for long periods of time so I‚Äôll get better use out of it as a maintenance tool once I reach my weight loss goal.

title: Easy to use
body: Lose it app is easy to use and very convenient.  I like that it already has lots of food already in the system.  I upgraded to premium to be able to track me water intake as well. I had difficulty previously tracking how much water I was drinking

title: Incredible app for a healthy diet
body: This user-friendly app helps you maintain a. Balanced diet (tracking macro nutrients) while managing the amount you eat. I have lost weight using this app even though it does not feel like dieting because you can eat all of your favorite foods, just not too much of them.

title: Great food/exercise tracker
body: I know tracking my food intake is huge to losing weight and my scale agrees! I have been pleased with how easy it is to scan my foods and the food database has everything I have looked for. I also like how my Apple Watch tracks my every move and gives me credit/calories!

title: LOSING IT is a great weight loss app!
body: I have been using LOSING IT since New Years, and it is so easy to chart your food intake! I chose to attempt a one pound per week loss and was assigned a generous calorie count per day to accomplish this. I have often eaten under this amount and occasionally gone over, but have lost 17 pounds so far this year! Hooray!

title: Dbl counting
body: I‚Äôm a weight watcher person on the freestyle program. Have not been able to lose 5 pounds in two months. I have now lost 4 pounds in only had it a week. The free foods (0 pt) on weight watcher are not calorie free so they work against me. Love the app, helps me to maintain and see how many calories I‚Äôm eating a day. Hope this helps.

title: Freezes up constantly
body: In the past I‚Äôve had good success with this app. However, after the last update it freezes constantly, and I have to shut it down to get it to work correctly. I will not continue to use the app if this continues.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: So helpful to be accountable for what you eat
body: After awhile you are very conscious of what has calories and what you want to ‚Äú spend‚Äù you calories on!  It takes about a month - trick is KEEP logging even when you are over-even of you eat 4 packs of peanut m&ms-just stick with it-it will work!!!

title: Thank you
body: The LoseIt app has made tracking so easy. I‚Äôve done other programs and if I knew it was as simple as this I would‚Äôve done lose it years ago. Thank you so much but I must say it‚Äôs a slow going process for me regarding results but at least I‚Äôm getting results. And that‚Äôs what matters.

title: Working like a charm!
body: I‚Äôm down over 50 lbs just by using the app! Even on days I splurge I keep writing it all down, over 550 days straight I‚Äôve logged all my food and it‚Äôs working! I‚Äôve used this app and ones like it over the years, it has only gotten easier and more user friendly!

title: New phone lost premium
body: I paid for a year of premium about a month ago. I got a new phone and when I logged into my lose it! account it‚Äôs no longer premium and it wants me to pay for an annual subscription again. I‚Äôm locked out of all of the extras I paid for. Calories burned, recipe nutritions, water intake. Now I‚Äôm out my premium plan and my annual fee. I fee kind of robbed and it‚Äôs a total let down. I can‚Äôt believe because I changed devices I lost my paid version. You would think it would be saved to the email.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: Great program if you are true to yourself.
body: If you really keep track of every bite you put in your mouth and looked at your caloric total you would find how little or eat to much you eat.

title: Easy to use
body: This app helped me lose 100 pounds!! I quit using it and Gained 10 back. I am back at it and have lost the weight again. The ease of use and tracking of micronutrients has allowed me to eat healthier. I love the pop ups at weight loss goals.i especially loved having lost the equivalent of a Dalmatian.

title: This app helps me eat mindfully every day!
body: Lose it helps me to eat mindfully. I love it when the app points out a positive pattern. It motivates me to stay on track. It amazes me how quickly it can calculate information about protein intake or carb intake. It keeps me from eating seconds and I really need that help. Thank you Lose It!! I need you‚ù§Ô∏èüí™

title: Losing weight with lose it
body: While I only started  to you use this app about a week ago, I‚Äôm pretty happy with it. I‚Äôve tried other apps that were too much work which led to discouragement toward sticking with it. Once you take a short while to see all of the features you‚Äôll see how easy it works and how quick you‚Äôll log!

title: Can‚Äôt enter recipes
body: I had the app for a year and it had a lot of excellent applications.  However, for me, the main attraction was it‚Äôs stated ability to enter your own recipes. I cook a lot and always a variety of whole 30 recipes. I wasn‚Äôt able to enter ONE recipe. I tried a myriad of times, contacted the company and tried figuring it out on Their website.  No response.  No success. Sorry for the 3 rating, but it‚Äôs a no-go for me.

title: Easy to use
body: This app is easy to use, has a lot in the data banks and seems like you can find just about any kind of food. You can also easily add to the data bank if somehow you can‚Äôt find what you need. When I use this app consistently, I have good results. I‚Äôm very happy with it.

title: Need help
body: It won‚Äôt let me sync my workouts automatically I have tried everything to get it to even try to follow the instructions of how to get it to work and it still won‚Äôt do anything even says that I‚Äôm allowing them to record it but nothing is being recorded

title: No customer service to speak with
body: I took my DNA test through Lose it! 12 weeks ago, I didn‚Äôt get the results back yet. They claim it‚Äôs supposed to be released in 8 weeks. I sent an e-mail 2 days ago, still didn‚Äôt get an answer (there‚Äôs no customer service to speak with). I‚Äôm afraid I was caught in a trap
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: So convenient!
body: I‚Äôm using the free version and I love it! I lost a lot of weight recently, and I‚Äôm scared to regain it, so I‚Äôve turned to this app for help. It‚Äôs so easy to get into the habit of tracking calories and exercise. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to lose or maintain their weight in a way that‚Äôs healthy.

title: Losing it
body: I haven't bought the full version, so I can only log daily, great ap. I‚Äôve been stalled out on keto for 2 months, so frustrating. I downloaded Lose It, and in one week I‚Äôm down 2 lbs. it keeps me focused and on track. Logging my food, to checking my macronutrients couldn‚Äôt be easier Love it

title: Three of five stars‚Äîgood, but not great
body: Oh how I wish they‚Äôd make some changes.
response: We apologize for the confusion. You can actually do most of these things with Lose It!; please reach out to us at loseit.live/help and we'd be happy to help!

title: Love it !!!
body: Love the reminders to log food

title: This app rocks!
body: Not only is the look bright and cheery but logging calories is easier than any other app, and I‚Äôve tried them all! I got the yearly membership so my Fitbit automatically pairs with Lose It! No going back and forth. Brilliant! Plus, when I use it regularly, it works- I lose weight!

title: Want to lose weight with ‚Äúlosing it‚Äù?
body: This is absolutely a wonderful app if you are trying to lose weight. I haven‚Äôt even bought the full version yet, but I certainly plan to. The free app is wonderful beyond my expectations. It keeps on encouraging you if you start to slip. Motivating to see your progress!

title: Mostly good, but recent change for the worse
body: Overall easy to use and helpful. I like that I can see macros for the whole day as well as each meal. However, I do not understand why they have made it harder to access one‚Äôs saved recipes on the tablet version. It is so well hidden as to be almost impossible to find it!

title: Easy to use
body: I‚Äôve tried a couple of calorie-counting apps and this one is easiest to use by far.  Its food library makes the difference.  The only issue I have is that it must accumulate its database from its users and any given item could have several different calorie counts assigned to it.

title: Invaluable Weight Management Tool
body: This App has been absolutely crucial in helping with my weight loss over the last couple of months.  Very intuitive and easy to use!  Makes logging all food super easy and syncs activity with my Apple Watch to help motivate my exercise and activity level!  Love this App!

title: Same problems as everyone else, won‚Äôt start
body: Best app out there to track your macros and calories. The streak/gamification also makes you stay pretty dedicated to tracking, and it‚Äôs pretty straightforward and easy to use. The free version goes a long way. Have lost and kept off 20 pounds.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Very useful, Watch app needs improvement
body: I successfully used this app for my weight loss plan and currently use it to keep my weight in check. The app is very user friendly while also being thorough. I have experienced some issues with the my Apple Watch losing connectivity when I switch out my watches, a series 0 and a series 4.

title: Ok...but constant push for in app purchases ruins it
body: It works ok.  I like the layout of MyPlate better but tried this for several months.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

title: You can‚Äôt do much on it
body: I use MyFitnessPal religiously, but it crashed so I downloaded this. It‚Äôs a good app, but I seriously have to complain about how it wont let you change macros or let you log your food in a day in advanced. I also hate how it doesn‚Äôt ask you your activity level to calculate calories. I burn up to 2300 calories a day, so I don‚Äôt think I should be eating 1300 when I weight lift for over an hour ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Wanda
body: I have only been using this app for a few weeks but so far I love it. It keeps me update on my calories consumed which is making my food choices easier to make. If I have eaten something higher in calories earlier in the day knowing my calories balance aids me in making dinner choices.

title: Losing it!!!
body: I am in love with this ap.  It tracks everything. And so many restaurant food are in it too.  Very very easy to use!  It will track your macros, your protein, your water, and your exercise!!  I can‚Äôt rave enough.  It is free for the basic but it is worth the $29 per YEAR to get the in depth version!  (Way cheaper than WW and just as good)

title: Best app
body: This is the first time I‚Äôve taken the time to write a review. I‚Äôve tried many apps and this is the only comprehensive one that includes every food, exercise, macro and nutrition content. The ease to use is priceless. And the $30 fee is well worth the time and energy I‚Äôve tried with several other apps.

title: What are you waiting for??
body: Finally an app where free gets you a comfortable and necessary amount of tools to properly track and monitor health goals. It even has upgrades for users who want to track everything down to the nitty gritty. This app is on the top of my list for recommendation!

title: Premium Plan
body: I have paid for the premium version but am not able to access it. The email address that is associated with it is no longer a valid email. I am unable to update it. What do I need to do? If I am not able to use the premium version then I would like a refund.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Apple Watch error
body: I like the app but I am having problems connecting the app to my Apple Watch. I went to ‚Äúapplication preferences‚Äù and then ‚ÄúApple health integration‚Äù and checked ‚Äúactive calories + workouts‚Äù but it still shows that the workouts have the yellow hazard sign and everything else is checked. Please help. Thanks

title: 17lbs down in 20days
body: I‚Äôm using this app along with the Hcg diet and this tool has been life saving. Holds me accountable for what I eat plus I can check my macros.

title: Really helped
body: I know there‚Äôs other apps like it, but after having done so much reading about the value of calorie restriction and nutrition I find the LoseIt! Interface to be perfect for my needs. I‚Äôve already lost more than ten pounds and it also helps me get regular insight into the nutrient profile of my meals.

title: Great tool for reaching health goals!
body: I have used Lost It for over a year now. It has helped me keep track of my intake in a simple way. And it provides encouragement along the way. I reached my goals six months ago and continue to use Lose It for maintenance. It is a lifelong process of eating well and staying healthy!

title: Easiest way to lose weight!
body: When you see where the calories are sneaking in, it‚Äôs easier to resist those foods. Knowing I can eat a little more as long as I get that exercise in has kept me moving. I‚Äôve allowed myself treats and still lost 25 pounds! Couldn‚Äôt have done it without this app!

title: Too much
body: The moments after I bought this app the first sales pitches began: buy their scales followed by more pitches for thing and too many reminders every day. I don‚Äôt recommend this app. I used it faithfully for over 6 months to count calories but the exercise reminders were infuriating. I have Ortho problems and a debilitating spine disease...quit with all the activity stuff or have a way for people to opt in for what they want. This was not a cheap app and I didn‚Äôt sign up for the hassle.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Update
body: In your most recent update the fats section in the macro nutrients view disappears when you scroll down and does not come back unless you force quit the app.  Other than that, have been using this app for almost 6 months and love it and never had an issue.

title: All the tools one could want!
body: Ability to easily log both food & exercise calorie consumption and expenditure combined with tailored and clear daily and weekly goals make this a great app. Easy to use accountability.  Have lost 26 lbs in 10 weeks using stock functionality.  Highly recommend!

title: Very capable
body: LoseIt so far has been everything I want: calorie counter, very good food database, weight tracker, accepts exercise calories, etc ... I‚Äôve tried few other apps and this my favorite so far.

title: New update doesn‚Äôt work
body: It was swell until the new update...it‚Äôs been frozen on Thursday, Oct. 4 since that morning. I‚Äôve updated the app 2 times since and it‚Äôs either a blank screen or just frozen on that day! Booo. Hopefully it‚Äôll get fixed because I do like using it. But I‚Äôm not going to keep fooling with something that doesn‚Äôt work, especially when I‚Äôve gotten others to join the app, too!
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Our engineers are working on a fix for this issue, and it will be out in an upcoming release.

title: Exactly what I needed
body: Wasn't sure what to expect when I downloaded Lose It but it's nearly exactly what I need to keep me on track. We all could use more beneficial exercise and portion control to stay healthy.

title: Wonderful app! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
body: It's a wonderful app! I recommend the premium.  Are usually do not buy apps but this one is amazing. You can track your carbs really easy.  Takes the guess work away. It can also be a nice way to connect with others as they go through their struggles of weight loss.

title: It keeps me on task
body: This app does for me what I need. It reminds when I haven't eaten enough. I reins me in when I start to eat too much. For more than a year, I have stayed within striking distance of my "ideal" weight. Because of Lose It, I quickly know what adjustment to make before a problem can develop. Thank you.

title: I LOVE THIS APP
body: This app is literally the best weight loss app ever if you want to count calories and track everything for exercise and food this is the app this app is amazing!! If you want to loose weight you NEED this app I love this app it's amazing!! There's challenges you can do to drop weight and there's just so much you can do with this app. I love it!!

title: Still working
body: It's pretty easy to keep track of what you're eating-the database of foods is large. I'm slowly losing weight-5.6 pounds in five months. The pace is deliberate-I've lost weight fast before -gained it right back. Hoping to keep it off this time-will probably use this app for a very long time.

title: Awesome App! Keeps me on track!
body: Yes, awesome! Being a pescatarian, I love knowing where my protein is for the day, as well as tracking other nutrients. Use it even when I'm at my target weight to track nutrition participate in challenges, and monitor my exercise. When I don‚Äôt use the app, weight and exercise fluctuates. THIS RIGHT HERE is my accountability!

title: If you want to lose weight, download this app
body: I‚Äôve never written a review for any app ever before, but I love this app so much and have had so much success with it that I felt compelled to review this one.

title: Practical App
body: Most practical way to lose weight or maintain weight, everyone is different there is no one way to lose weight. This app lets you realistically set goals and makes you aware of what your habits are good or bad so you can adjust. Already lost 12lbs in 3 weeks of using the app daily.

title: Great app!
body: This app is easy to use and has lots of great features.  If I could change something, it would be to either have the water log at the top, or to be able to customize the log page.  I log water more than any other category, but have to scroll down quite a bit to get to it.

title: Love it! Get it? Lose it? Love it!
body: 1. I love that it works(35 lbs!). 2. I love that it saves me time by saving my meals(I eat the same breakfast almost everyday). 3. Love the scanning feature. 4. I love that it has Tree House beers in the database! 5. Would like to see a refreshing of the database since there are many conflicting amounts for the same foods, even commercial foods.

title: Just do LoseIt!
body: The ONLY time I can lose and maintain weight loss is when I honestly TRACK my intake.  I never make lasting headway with diet and exercise alone. Until you TRACK TRACK TRACK you are unlikely to either. Of the three, diet, exercise, and TRACKING, definitely TRACKING is the most important. Oh and did I mention tracking‚Ä¶?

title: Love it!
body: I love this app. I bought it originally to lose weight but it helps me keep track of my exercise as well as what I‚Äôm eating! It‚Äôs actually helped me eat more meals! I didn‚Äôt manage to lose any weight even going under in calories and exercising like crazy but could just be my body!

title: Actually Loosing Weight!
body: I always love reading reviews to better understand the app, and if it is worth it! Well I can happily say that I have lost 8 pounds using this app within 2 weeks!! Counting your calories really works, they give you great meals with low calories and workouts as well! Totally worth the money!

title: No vegan recipes, charts are inaccurate
body: I've been using the app since 2018. I found it very user friendly especially in the beginning. After going premium I noticed things like the charts are always inaccurate and there are over 130 low carb recipes, but no vegan ones. It's almost as if the low carb diet is being promoted by Lose It. I think I'll be trying another app after my subscription expires

title: Success
body: This is the only way I have ever been able to manage my weight. I am data driven and this app works for me. Also, the menu of foods has expanded dramatically in the last couple of years. It is well thought out, user friendly, and easy to learn and use.

title: Easy to use, realistic goal setting
body: In other apps I have been unable to set my own goals. This app allows me to track my food and keep to a calorie count that will help me gradually lose the weight. The ease of adding exercise compared to other apps is absolutely superior. Love Lose It!

title: Nice to view weight goals
body: It helps to keep track of what you are eating  and how much you‚Äôve lost. Keeps you focused on Not eating too much of you have to write everything down, especially snacks. That‚Äôs where people go wrong. We think we are eating good snacks, like nuts, but they still spike your insulin.

title: Great App
body: This app is one of the better ones in regards to tracking. The database however has a lot of entries that do not have complete entries, you have to make certain what your adding. This is a common issue with all apps such as this. The design and flow of app makes it really easy to use and understand. Been logging for 447 days straight so far!!

title: Lost functionality with food ‚Äúmemory‚Äù
body: Hi,
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots or a screen recording if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Only Tracks Meals and Limited Snacks
body: Inputting the food you eat is centered around meals and a fixed number of snacks. Rather than being able to put in what you eat and when you eat it, the food has to fit into some category.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Thanks
body: I just want to let you know that I 32 pounds on this app it‚Äôs great for people who afford the Other weight loss program really want to thank you for your help and I will continue using this app until I reach my goal weight again thank you very much for changing my way of eating healthy

title: Easy way to track food and exercise
body: Well designed app that makes it easy to track weight, food and exercise.  With many foods and types of exercise in the database one can quickly enter the information.  Nice summaries of food values helps in  tracking sodium, fat intake, etc.

title: Tracking is the key
body: I needed a good and fast tracker.  This App is good for tracking.  It reminds you if you haven‚Äôt put your meal in.  Also you can see your data, trends for what and when you‚Äôre eating that works as well as what you are eating when you aren‚Äôt losing.  It tracks carbs, protein, and fats.

title: Outstanding at Helping You Modifying Your Behavior
body: The app is well thought out and easy to use. I have used the app for over two years and at this point on my journey to learning new behaviors I have lost over 40 POUNDS.

title: User Friendly and Comprehensive
body: This is so much easier then My Fitness Pal!  With the upgrade I can track my macros easily and see weekly reports. Which helps me see the overall picture to retrain my eating habits    Also the list of foods is extensive and love the scroll feature for portions.

title: It Really works to count your calories...
body: Especially if you‚Äôre busy, because it‚Äôs easy! I have been using it for s few years now and couldn‚Äôt live without it for maintain my weight (and sometimes to lose a few).  What a relief to be in control of my weight!

title: Solid fitness companion
body: Easy to use, great library of foods, and easy to add custom items. If it‚Äôs not in the database, you can even scan the nutritional label to add it; or for made to order places like Cava or Chipotle you can hand enter your favorite concoctions

title: No more upgrades
body: Overall I like the app, but it asks you to upgrade every day when you open it. Literally every day! This really is annoying. Why can‚Äôt it ask once a week or once a month? I know it‚Äôs about money, but that doesn‚Äôt change the fact that it‚Äôs frustrating for those using it.

title: Great App
body: I really like this app!! Nothing compare to other apps... This app allows you to search your meals and track your calories!! ‚ÄúAmazing!!‚Äù I like being able to track my weight and be able to put data and see results.. I totally recommend this app and hopefully upgrading!

title: Slight adjustments
body: Lose it is a good app. I find easier to keep track of meals with this app than on paper, I use the paid version. It‚Äôs not perfect though. Sometimes when I scan a barcode for a food it appears as a different kind of food, not often. I think it would be a good idea to be able to add what time you had your meals.

title: Lost 12 pounds
body: Lose it finally helped me lose those 10-12 lbs that I have been meaning to lose for the past 10 years. Have kept it off for 3 years and occasionally return to Lose It for tracking calories when the scale creeps up a bit.

title: Great, but so annoying it‚Äôs unusable
body: This app works great for tracking weight and meals. However, it comes with a major, highly annoying flaw. A couple times a day I receive 10+ notifications (same time) on my Apple Watch requesting access to my fitness data. No way should I have to spend so much time closing notifications from this app requesting access to fitness data I do NOT want to get. There are many tracking apps. Do NOT get this one.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Apple watch app constantly out of sync and laggy
body: I‚Äôve had this app for over two years and the apple watch app and complication are very slow and unreliable. I enter the calories on the watch and sometimes it makes it to the app, sometimes it doesn‚Äôt. Sometimes the app gets it but the watch app doesn‚Äôt show it. After two years you expect kinks like this to be ironed out. Otherwise it‚Äôs a good app. The weight entry could be located somewhere easier.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Powerful
body: I believe that many people underestimate the power of logging your activity. In the case of Lose It! it is a tremendous app that allows you to track your calories on a daily basis.  I would encourage anyone who is serious about losing weight to try this product.

title: Best way to lose
body: They said on AM a few days ago that a food log was the best way to lose weight. If you are consistent about logging foods, it‚Äôs a real eye opener to see the caloric value, and how much you are consuming. It helps you make better choices, and setting goals helps immensely.

title: Making losing weight less stressful
body: All the features and ease of use makes this the best weight loss tracking app. I have tried a few others but was frustrated & just gave up on tracking but not with Lose It. They make it EASY! Keep up the good work

title: Five stars but in app purchases not working?
body: If the developers read this, I‚Äôd love to give you my money for premium but can‚Äôt because I get a message saying, ‚Äú An Error Occurred: We ran into a problem when attempting to complete this purchase. Please try again later.‚Äù I‚Äôve checked my settings and should not be prevented by my user settings.

title: Makes input of my data easy
body: I used another app prior to Lose It. It was ok but I preferred Lose It because it simplified food input. I also liked the way I could set up custom goals. I am at my desired weight now and hope Lose It will help me do the hard part of weight control... maintain.

title: Great App
body: My daughter talked me into downloading this app after she lost 25 lbs using it.  I thought it would be too much of a hassle to keep up with on a daily basis, but in reality it is the total opposite....I am addicted to entering everything that I eat and my exercise.  I am down 10 lbs since starting and absolutely love this app!

title: Losing the weight
body: This app has helped me lose 9# in just 7 weeks.  Doesn‚Äôt sound like much, but it‚Äôs more than I‚Äôve been able to lose in my own. Searching the foods you eat is easy & it has made me more aware of what I‚Äôm eating & has helped me make better food choices!

title: Overall good but recent update has bugs
body: I love this app but ever since I updated it, it refuses to scan barcodes at all. It will open to the camera but no matter how many different angles or different kinds of lighting I try, it won‚Äôt focus and it won‚Äôt scan it. Please fix it!

title: Great App, Just needs a Fix
body: People are happy they can change different meals, but I‚Äôm not really happy that I can‚Äôt change DATES. Like, if it‚Äôs after midnight and you missed the other day, they have to log it over all over again if they put it on a different day. That‚Äôs really the only fix I need. Hopefully there will be a update to this app soon.

title: Holds me accountable
body: Very easy to use. Love the app. The hardest part is estimating the portions when it asks for ounces. But besides that it holds you accountable. Plus, the fact that it alternates your calories when you eat or workout makes it very convenient. I‚Äôve recommended it to many friends and family. Great app.

title: Awful set up
body: I purchased embody DNA and that forces you to use Lose It- but you have to purchase Lose it as well. I am currently using the ‚Äúfree‚Äù version. You cannot upload ahead for the week for food, there‚Äôs no option to have decimals/half adds for food- only scrolling options so you are over adding or under adding calories. Also, the free version does not let you sync your fitness watch to it so you manually have to add your activies in.  I have used MyFitness Pal for years- that is much more user friendly and free.

title: Best App whether  Paleo or Vegan
body: After a bout with angina, I decided it was time to get serious with my diet.  I had the free version of the App for some time, but now I bought the pro version since I needed to track nutrients and salt.  It worked like a charm.  I put in my ‚ÄúHeart Healthy‚Äù recipes and track everything.  I couldn‚Äôt be happier.

title: Nice app but beware
body: Lose It is a nice app which I‚Äôve personally have been using for about 4 months now and have lost about 40 pounds in the process but be very careful not to join the premium service online.  If you do, you will only be able to access the premium services online and not on your phone.  They are treated as two completely different platforms and therefore you must pay for each both online and phone separately
response: I'm very sorry for the confusion here. You should be able to access the Premium features on both loseit.com and the app with one subscription. Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can assist!

title: Keeping me honest!
body: What I love about this app is that it keeps me honest.  I use it to log meals, miles and water.  This app has everything!  I can even share my good news with my doctor so she can have relevant information of my weight loss journey so help us keep me on track!  Thanks for being apart of my team Loseit!

title: Lose It
body: Journaling is always helped me lose weight.

title: Makes Tracking Easy
body: I love this appl, it‚Äôs always there when I need it, to get me back to where I should be. Makes tracking easy. It could only be better, if they gave me back all the features I had before, that now years later, they want to charge me for

title: You COULD do it without this app...
body: But if you‚Äôre serious about keeping yourself in check and losing weight, it‚Äôs invaluable. I‚Äôve found the more I use it the easier it gets (and the recipe feature makes logging that much quicker‚Äîtook me a while to figure that out lol).

title: I'm convinced and it's helping
body: I was skeptical after trying three or four other food logs; However, this app really is a great tool.

title: Excellent App
body: I've been using the paid version of Lose it for 35 days and absolutely love it.  Almost all of the food I eat is already in the database and the scan function makes it very easy to log your food.  The paid version come with a lot of perks and recommendations.

title: A great tool
body: Simply put, this app works. It‚Äôs the best tracking app I‚Äôve ever used. Easy to use and accurate. The best part is the community. The members are extremely supportive. I‚Äôve made some great weight loss friends. I would recommend this app to everyone trying to lose weight or maintain a weight loss.

title: Love it
body: I never thought about how many calories I eat in one day until this app it‚Äôs great I love it. I have been trying to loose weight for a while and with in a week of this app I lost a poundüôåüòÅ!!! And even if you just want to keep track of what you eat this app will keep you happy and on track.‚ù§Ô∏è

title: It works!
body: Whatever your dietary goals (lose weight, track sodium, track exercise, or...) this app helps you do it in a positive encouraging way. Nothing else has worked this well for me.  Strongly encourage everyone struggling to give it a try!  Works with my Apple watch to keep me informed on all aspects of my day.

title: Simple, fast weight loss tool
body: I have been consistently using this Ap for over 220 days and I love it! It helped me to reach my weight loss goal of 80 lbs and now I use it to help me maintain my weight. It syncs with my iPhone and iPad and iWatch well. It was recommended by my nutritionist when I first started this weight loss journey and it is great!

title: Good and helpful
body: It works great! And I really like the app. I lost 30 pounds using it. I have to say though that I am very disappointed that they took out a lot of the best parts about the app and moved them to the paid version. Kinda sorry if them. Also it only remembers my meals for so long, then they are gone.

title: Love it!!!!!
body: I completely recommend this app!! I have always had a problem and understanding my calorie intake but this app helps you out so much. You can scan the barcode, log what you have ate and it is letting you know how much you haven consumed in a day. It has helped me so much. Recommend!!!

title: Keto?
body: I have the lifetime account, and have been using Lose it! For years through my attempts to lose weights.  I have finally found success eating Keto, but the Lose It ap is not very Keto friendly.  I do wish they would add a Keto diet profile, that is the reason for 4 stars over 5.  I do love the feeling of success as I see my weight dropping.  PLEASE add a Keto diet option!

title: No Russian food in database
body: I love this app! It‚Äôs so easy to use, it has everything I nee (water intake, calorie counter, adjustable calories per meal, custom # of meals, patterns, streaks, etc). The only thing that makes me unhappy is that it doesn‚Äôt have Russia as a choice of database! Being from Russia, loving Russian food, and visiting Russia, it is very hard to use this app in Russia! I would say it is soooo inconveniente that I decided to write a review! I am also a member, so I am sad that I can‚Äôt use this app while I‚Äôm in Russia.... please, fix this! And I will put a 5 start rating!
response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what you'd like to see us do to make the Lose It! experience better!

title: Love!!!!
body: If you‚Äôre a person who is really looking for progress and just need to see it this app is it! I was not happy and this app helped me lose 50 pounds! I can see what I put into my body everyday! I paid for the membership. I drink 8 bottles/ 1 gallon of water a day. This app tracks it and your workouts! Love it! I‚Äôm so happy!!!!!!

title: Great Tool for weight loss!
body: I have used this app for years and have lost 105 lbs. I use the free version and have taken it slow and steady. Losing  1/2 lb most weeks. Did it with diet only at first and have added walking for the last 3 years. I  belong to TOPS club and attend meetings weekly for weigh-ins. Keeps me accountable. You can do it!

title: Just track!
body: I have been tracking for 200 days straight, some days it is hard, but every day I just track.  The tool has a huge database of foods, so it is easy to find what you‚Äôre eating.  I have lost 48 pounds by doing NOTHING but tracking everything I eat so that I am self aware.  Good luck!

title: Excellent Engineers!
body: I noticed the app wasn‚Äôt accepting decimals when I tried to enter my weight.  I messaged customer service.  They replied in less than 24 hours saying a fix was already in the works AND provided a work-around.  It was only a couple days before the engineers had made the update!!!  Woo hoo!

title: LOVE THIS APP BUT...
body: The only reason I gave it four stars instead of 5 is because you can‚Äôt post pictures in the app within the social support groups. Sometimes I want to post pictures of my weight loss process pics (before and after), food pictures or see other people pictures but you can‚Äôt. Other than that, the app is GREAT!

title: So slow and buggy it‚Äôs unusable
body: The food database has always been slow. Now it hangs when scrolling on the logging page and super slow with the food selection. Also there is a nasty bug which selects the wrong item when you‚Äôre at the bottom of the list so you have to do it again. Buggy and slow, super quality folks. I can‚Äôt afford to waste so much time to try and log meals. I‚Äôve been using this for over 5 years and I‚Äôm through. Don‚Äôt waste your time, get something else.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Lose ‚ÄòLose it.‚Äô
body: This may have been a good app at one time (based on positive reviews), but it is no longer good.

title: Good deal
body: I‚Äôve used the regular lose it and it‚Äôs very helpful for tracking calories and exercise. I upgraded to premium when I started Keto. I looked at several apps and this was by far the best deal to track macros. Super easy to use. Tons of food to select from while tracking.

title: Recent change in app downgraded service
body: I loved this app and have used it for several years, but a recent upgrade took away the option to track protein and carb intake. You now have to pay in order to use those features. I feel it‚Äôs poor customer service to take away features that were already being used for free and put them behind a pay wall. I will likely now be searching out a new tracking app.

title: Nostalgic
body: This app worked and i lost like 3 pounds in two weeks but it also made me have a bad relationship with food and focus on the calories and numbers which lead to deprivation of what i really wanted . I downloaded this again and i‚Äôm getting nostalgic and a bad feeling but I know it‚Äôll be worth it in the long run so wish me luck. 1300 calories here i come

title: Best app ever!
body: I am NOT that tech savvy. I just FaceTimed for the first time yesterday & screwed it up so that had to call again.

title: Great app
body: When I first downloaded this app I really didn‚Äôt think I would pay for premium but then I say all it could do and it was only $20 for the whole year and it was worth it!

title: I love this app!
body: This app helped me track my weight so it helped me track my calorie intake and I lost 70 pounds by using this app for 2 months simply my making sure I‚Äôm not eating many calories! This is a great app that I recommend if you are having trouble having to keep track of calories! I love this app!

title: Keeping on Track
body: If you are looking for support and want to stay on track, than Loss It is the way to track!

title: Very happy
body: Lose it has worked very well for me it has helped me to lose 80lbs in 5 months and I attribute a fair part of that to this app combined with exercise. It has helped me to learn about nutrition and learn how to track it appropriately and I recommend it to anyone serious about losing the weight.

title: Reason for success
body: Since charting my entire intake, I have lost 12 lbs in 4 weeks!

title: Free version
body: Is wonderful. Has had all of my foods so far. I can log them every time or anytime. Not many free versions are as helpful as this one has been. And it helps that they didn‚Äôt have a system hack to where my email is on the black market like my previous app did.

title: Enough nagging to upgrade already!
body: I decided to upgrade to the premium version. Although I don‚Äôt need the extra bells and whistles, I figured I would never again be nagged with banners or pop ups to upgrade. WRONG!!! Now I receive numerous banners and pop ups wanting me to purchase a LIFETIME PREMIUM upgrade! I shouldn‚Äôt be subjected to this after paying a hefty annual premium. I just canceled my premium subscription so that it doesn‚Äôt renew.

title: A nice app
body: Ive been using Lose It for a little over a year. I lost 20 lbs, gained back 8 lbs and am struggling to get back down to where I was. One thing for sure is I record what I eat and get on the scale. Every day. Its become a habit and I think it has kept me from gaining a lot more back. Give it a try. It does help!

title: Keeps Freezing Up
body: This app is awesome, and I only use the free app. You can scan any barcode and it will add it to your food group for that day plus you can select the measurements.

title: One Day At A Time
body: The Lose It app has really helped me stay on track! I was never one to log what I ate but this app makes it so easy and it really keeps me conscious of what goes in my body. I upgraded to the premium and so glad I did! So much information and helpful hints and guides. It‚Äôs well worth the yearly fee. üòäüëç

title: Recipes
body: The app is great for tracking calories. The biggest drawback is not being able to edit a recipe.  I add items to a recipe as I cook.  Many times, I adjust my ingredients to suit my taste.  I hardly ever follow a recipe completely.  I make adjustments to use less oil, sodium, not use ingredients I don‚Äôt like or just make up my own recipe.  So not being able to change an amount of an ingredient or add new ones, is very frustrating.
response: We are sorry for the confusion! You can actually do this with Lose It!. For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: Confused
body: Why are there so many entries for the same food item and all of them vary in calorie count. Many of the processed items or restaurant (ie MacDonalds ) foods are all different. And misspelling are abundant. Also making it hard to narrow the search for an item. Who ever spelled ‚Äúsuidage) for sausage ? Your Lose It team needs to filter this to make it clear for those using your app! I don‚Äôt even consider premium because I‚Äôm not confident in the information being correct.

title: Awesome App
body: This App is extremely well engineered. Easy to use and very helpful not only to keeping track of calories but the type of foods holding you back. Definitely recommend for anyone trying to eat better and need a little help getting on track.

title: I‚Äôm addicted.
body: I can‚Äôt stop! The features are great, and it basically does the work for you. Means it‚Äôs not a chore. I‚Äôve lost weight, finally quit my caffeine addiction of many years, and have stayed motivated thanks to this app. I‚Äôve tried many apps actually, and what sets this apart is ease of use to a point of enjoyment.

title: Good but needs Time Stamp feature
body: This is a good app but could you please add a time stamp feature for every time you add a food and make it so we can adjust the time from the time it is at the moment we‚Äôre tracking. MY Fitness Pal has this feature for premium users. Why don‚Äôt you? It‚Äôs useful to know the timing of our meals and snacks. I‚Äôd really appreciate it.

title: Nice app, not a fan of the new icon though
