body: This is useful app, I really appreciate the work that went into this. It is easy to use, and it has a great database of foods built in. I think I liked the original format better, over the years I haven‚Äôt been a fan of some of the changes each update, but overall, it‚Äôs still a good app

title: Great app
body: I used the free Lose It app for a while but wanted the extra benefits of it so I bought the yearly subscription. I am happy I did. I really like it. The motivation to record on here everyday is up to me and knowing I paid money to do so definitely keeps me coming back. üòÅ

title: Good tracker, missing some obvious features
body: The app is overall a pretty good tracker, but the developers keep adding features I don‚Äôt need and not adding ones I‚Äôd really like. For instance it now pesters you to buy add on products but even with a premium subscription you cannot track alcohol or caffeine consumption, or even something really basic for heart health like potassium intake! I‚Äôve been using the app since 2012, I should add.

title: Need to sync w social media
body: I LOVE this app and have been using it for a few years.  I keep waiting for you to add the ability to sync w social media to add friends and also fitbit.   It‚Äôs really disappointing.  My friend and i are trying to challenge and encourage each other and its much harder with this app than others.   I may have to switch to something else finally but i really dont want to.  :‚Äô(
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Please Fix It!
body: I love this app and use it every day but ever since 8/7 it won‚Äôt open on my iPad.  It either opens then freezes on the log page from 2 days ago or it gives me a white screen then crashes.  Please fix it!  It works just fine on my phone, btw.

title: What a Gift
body: It‚Äôs amazing that this app is free, though I eventually upgraded to the premium and that was totally worth it. Such a powerful tool for the most important aspect of weight loss! More than helping you track your progress, it encourages you to view food in a whole new way. Truly a gift!

title: Fantastic
body: I was having a hard time losing weight and tell I got this app. I was shocked to see how many calories I was ingesting. I have had this app for five days and I‚Äôve lost 3 pounds. Definitely still need to do exercises, but if he did nothing but watch your calories you should lose. Love love love this app!

title: Best calorie tracker ever
body: I've tried them all and this is by far the easiest to use, especially with the camera to read the bar codes. Haven't found a single fluid it can't recognize.  And it files muh fluid alphabetically which is way better than the random entries in other trackers

title: Love love love!
body: I was hesitant to purchase this app bc I‚Äôve tried many meal tracking apps that weren‚Äôt fitting. But within the first week of using this app I saw results. It‚Äôs been 3 weeks and I‚Äôve lost almost 10 lbs. hoping to track my goal by December. I must admit I‚Äôm a little obsessed with this app. Highly recommend!

title: Keeping track, and keeping on track!

title: Great app.

title: Your app changed my life!! Thank you‚Äô

body: Lose it app has helped me lose 30 lbs by showing me I that I can stick to a log and enjoy losing weight slowly for my best results. Logging your food intake through ‚ÄúLose it‚Äù is truly one of the best ways to achieve long term success - Good Luck on your journey, whoever you are‚úãJRCozin

title: Losing it takes time and consistent efforts!

title: Good, but data entry will wear you down.

It takes a concerted effort to really get to the right food for the right meal, even if it is something you regularly consume. There is no native shortcut support, something that could easily overcome this.
response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know what you'd like to see us do to make the Lose It! experience better!

title: GREAT Update!!!

Great app! I definitely recommend it. It has contributed to my 35 pound weight loss! Thank you, Lose It team!!!
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Great!

title: I love this app!!!
body: It hold you accountable! If you‚Äôre looking to make some real changes in your life I don‚Äôt think it can be down without journaling what you consume. You have to be honest and exact so you know where to make those changes. With Lose It! You have the tool to do just that!

title: Confusing
body: After 3 days of tracking, I was reviewing ‚Äúmy day‚Äù and noticed the ‚Äúnutrients‚Äù tab. Here it shows how many grams of fat, carbs, and protein were consumed each day. While I never consumed more that 2,200 calories on any day, every day shows over 300 grams of fat consumed. I always thought each gram of fat was equal to 9 calories. Why is there a discrepancy between the calories tracked and the nutrients tracked?  What am I missing?

title: Great app

title: Great Free App

body: I love this app. It has allowed me to see patterns in my diet and actually change my dieting strategy to match my natural patterns which has been more successful for me. Also watching my weight line graph trend down is always happy. I only have the free version but def recommend

title: Easy to follow
body: Most things on the app are easy to find, and the vast array of workouts they have in their database is extremely helpful, and doesn‚Äôt take much time at all to log! If you try to log your entire day it takes about 5 minutes, but at each meal or workout session, it‚Äôs about 30 seconds.

title: Overall Great Tracking App

title: Really works!

I am now healthy for my weight and age and would recommend this to anyone looking to shed a fee pounds.

I lost 10 lbs in a week doing 1600 calories or less a day. I also have been fasting for 16-18 hour periods every other day. I am on day 9 and I lost 2 more lbs.

title: Keeps me accountable

title: Great for tracking calories

body: Got the app because I needed one that would sync easily with a series 2 iWatch activity and help me count calories. This works perfectly. Data is automatically updated from activity. Meal logging is super simple with UPC lookup. Couldn‚Äôt be happier. Great free app for weight loss.

title: Don‚Äôt waste the money
body: I joined because it says everywhere that they have professionals that customize your diet plan and work out plan. They do not. Nothing in this is customized. title: Lose It really works!

title: Love this app

title: Love it
body: This program really helps me keep track of what I'm eating and makes me stay away from the things that really aren't good for me to be eating.

title: Great app!
body: Lose it has made it easy to record my food, exercise & weight. I still try to eat sensibly on Feast day and log my food.  I‚Äôve lost 12 lbs in 10 days!  It feels great!!

title: Lose it
body: This app is great and easy to work my only problem is when I make big recipes like vegetable beef soup for the week.  It would be nice if you could make the whole soup recipe and then later On break it down into servings.  At least I haven‚Äôt figured out how to do it yet.

title: Love this app‚ù£Ô∏è
body: I absolutely love this app. It is so easy to use. I upgraded to the premium. Try it you will not be sorry. You will love it too. It tracks food, steps, exercise, body fat, has exercise tips, recipes and so much more. I‚Äôve lost 13 lbs. since using this app and couldn‚Äôt be happier. It keeps me accountable. üëçüèª

title: Good ap.
body: I use the free version, and so far I‚Äôve lost 9 pounds.  I‚Äôm very happy with that.  But posting the food should be easier.  I sometimes eat the same thing I posted before, but the ap rarely remembers it.  I‚Äôd like to start typing and see the same food on the suggestion list.  The ap treats it like a new food every time.  I‚Äôm getting tired of that.

title: Usfeful and straightforward
body: I've been using this for about two weeks and think it's a great tool. There's a large library of foods available and the barcode scan feature is great. Haven't upgraded yet, but probably will in a couple more weeks.

title: Lose it App
body: It has definitely helped with weight loss.  Need to upgrade to premium to access everything, but was cheaper than weight watchers.  Can track sodium and sugar levels with premium which has been a nice feature for me.

title: If You Truly Want To Reach Your Goal, This Is The App For You.
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for around a month now. I have exceeded past my goal & on top of that, I have a better understanding of the calories in the foods in which I was consuming daily. I wholeheartedly recommend this app. :)

title: Newest update created nothing but problems
body: It now redirects where it shouldn‚Äôt when I click a link. It has problems loading. And it has problems searching. The food guesses it gives as I enter the food is way off base. I wish there was a way to roll it back; it worked perfectly before. Added:What the‚Ä¶ Now when I try to go to the log from the daily goals, It sends me back to the beginning of the month in goals. The update stinks so much so I‚Äôm canceling the auto renewal
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: App is not what it used to be!
body: I used this app before and it was SO easy. Not any more! I entered in my coffee, no problem. Entered in my cream, no problem. Tried adding sugar, PROBLEM! I scanned the sugar container and it came up with Granola bar! Tried again and it got it right. The issue is that it shows 15 grams per serving. I can‚Äôt add 3 servings! You can only change the amount of calories l, not the number of teaspoons of sugar you used! Why make this so difficult??? I‚Äôm deleting!

title: It keeps you discipline.
body: This app works but you have to work it. The app has made some helpful updates that has made it very user friendly. If you discipline yourself to track everything you do throughout the day it will work for you.

title: Great app and it‚Äôs easy to use!
body: FYI: I got the free version. It has really made it easy to keep track of what I eat so I stay on my weight loss plan. If I work out it reflects the amount of calories I burned and I can then eat more if I choose. Thus far, my weight loss has been steady and on track!

title: Just one minor annoyance
body: This app is AWESOME except for one thing.  Hate when I go to add a food to a meal & want to scroll thru the list of ‚Äúmy foods‚Äù. The keyboard automatically pops up and you can‚Äôt get rid of it. So now you can only see half of the screen w/the list of your foods....the other half covered by the keyboard you don‚Äôt want to use.

title: Prefer to MyFitnessPal
body: I like Lose It because it‚Äôs design is more intuitive. I like the feature that tells me what patterns seem to be helpful or harmful to my goal. It has many customizable goal options too. I look forward to continued use on my fitness journey!

title: Can‚Äôt turn off Pattern Detector OR Daily Tasks
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It for years and I‚Äôm sad that it keeps getting worse and worse. First the awful and misleading Pattern Detector that free users cannot turn off, followed by a new ‚ÄúDaily Tasks‚Äù feature that no one asked for. I know you guys think that you‚Äôre adding functionality but you‚Äôre really just cluttering up an otherwise beautiful app. I guess it‚Äôs finally time to download My Fitness Pal :-(

title: Losing with Lose It!
body: I‚Äôm really sticking with my diet this time and Lose It! Is helping me.  They let me know how much I can eat per day, if I go over, my goal weight graph as well as my exercise and water.  A few of my friends have switched to Lose It! Because it‚Äôs so easy to navigate.

title: Helps with my macros!
body: I‚Äôm great at eating healthy food but I‚Äôve never been great at calculating macros. This app helps with EVERYTHING, it does it all for you. Just log in everything you eat, drink and what workouts you do. You even give to charity just by completing your goals! I‚Äôm obsessed with this app.

title: Version 12.2 and later took away features
body: It used to be that this app was awesome.

title: Still loving it...
body: Fantastic site to help track and monitor food intake. Makes food prep purposeful and brings awareness to good planning. The ONLY change I‚Äôd comment that was needed is the ability to delete food log items once entered. Sometimes a mistake is made but you are unable to edit/remove once entered in log. Otherwise LOVE it.

title: Why?
body: I paid for the subscription and now I can‚Äôt even do anything on the app?! $30 for a year for an app that won‚Äôt work now? Where do I go to get this resolved??
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Game changer
body: I‚Äôm obsessed with this app. After struggling with weight since hitting 40, I‚Äôm now in control of my calorie intake and bit my weight goal within a few weeks of using the app. Now I easily track my macros using the app, ensuring I‚Äôm hitting my protein intake goals to put on muscle. It‚Äôs pretty amazing.

title: User Friendly
body: Love this app. Love the mini pic of food items. So easy to record food and set goals. Especially like the barcode scanner for packaged foods. Eliminate guessing. It‚Äôs very motivating.  Recommend it for anyone but especially those of us who need that nudge to just ‚Äústart‚Äù a program.

title: Needs calorie goal
body: Overall I like Lose It.  I‚Äôve tried other food tracker apps and normally I return to Lose It after trying others.  I wish you were able to input your daily calorie target instead of the app calculating it based on weight loss goals.  If they add a feature to put your own target daily calories I‚Äôd give 5 stars, until then it‚Äôs just 3.

title: Great tool  - 7 year user
body: LoseIt has been an invaluable tool to keep me focused on my weight loss journey. Even when I am not perfect, I still track so I can stay honest with myself. LoseIt has helped me maintain an 85-pound weight loss and is helping me to get to ‚ÄòAthlete‚Äô level in my fitness. Highly recommended!

title: THIS APP IS BS
body: I give this 2 stars only because its a free way to count calories, if you are really trying to lose weight i understand counting calories if you eat alot of junk food, but if i eat an avacado for every meal this app tells me im eating too many calories, if i eat a salad with olive oil it tells me the olive oil is too many calories. This only counts calories for free nothing else and the way it works is unsafe i believe, it makes me feel guilty for eating high calorie vegetables. THIS AINT IT.

title: Quick and easy
body: Lose it is a quick and easy tool to track calories.  It‚Äôs easy to use and helps me keep up with calories so I can lose weight quickly.  I love the Lose It app!  It‚Äôs amazing the difference it makes in my weight loss journey.

body: This app has helped me lose SO much weight (20lbs in less than 2 months). And they make it very easy to track meals. Their database is extensive, there are a couple local restaurants I frequent that only have 1-2 locations and they are still in the database.

title: I love this app!
body: I‚Äôve used this app for about a year now and I love the app and give it 4 stars. I would give it 5 it it gave the option to track all macronutrients including potassium etc etc.

title: Works for me!
body: Lose it is a great way for me to monitor my food intake. I think the app is less cumbersome than some other apps I‚Äôve tried. The program gives me flexibility to eat whatever I want and work it into my weekly budget. When I use it... I lose it!

title: Losing!
body: I have been using this app for almost 4 months and am down 15 lbs. the best thing about it is it keeps you accountable, provides details about the food and exercise you do down the the mph and incline I walk to accurately calculate calorie burn. title: Lose it changed the way I eat.

title: Once weighed 485 pounds
body: Great app which is very easy to use. Already recommending to others

title: Almost Lost It But Glad I Kept It

title: So easy to track and lose!
body: I love this app! So easy to list exactly what I‚Äôm eating and see where my calorie Count is going. It gives me an honest reflection of what I‚Äôm truly ingesting. title: Charting

Many other helpful tools like allowing a social network, maintaining a historical weight chart as well as encouraging reminders to chartüòÉ!

title: Love this app!
body: I love this app! I‚Äôve been using it for about a month now & I highly recommend it! I love the reminders it sends me when I forget to track a meal & that each time I complete a day it tells me how close I am to achieving my goal. Very encouraging & definitely helps keep me accountable.

title: Easy and very helpful!!

title: Lose it
body: This is very easy to use and you really get to see how you‚Äôre doing with your calories It‚Äôs a great program and very helpful

title: Revised opinion - happily using this app

title: This app is amazing
body: I know what you‚Äôre thinking ‚ÄúThis is just another spam review‚Äù but that‚Äôs where you are wrong. So far I‚Äôve lost a pound a day and I feel great I was sketchy at first but I recommend you give this app a try just stay committed and you‚Äôll see the progress soon.

title: Best way to lose weight unless you only want to lose weight and don‚Äôt have a life!
body: This just makes sense. I overestimate some of my food calories just to be on the safe side. Some exercise amounts seem a little questionable. Makes me wanna take up boxing so I can have an extra beer!

title: Good tracker but needs sync option

response: So sorry for the confusion here! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can assist with this.

title: So easy!
body: My friend told me about this app and I‚Äôm so glad. The scan feature is amazing and although I always knew you should write down your food, this is too easy. I hate exercising but when I watch my calorie availability go back up I find I‚Äôm on the treadmill more!

title: Love this app.!
body: This app. has helped me be accountable for what I eat, and track my food. Also, through tracking calories, I have cut out a lot of carbs and refined sugar because I don‚Äôt want to waste calories on foods that don‚Äôt contribute to weight loss. With the help of this app. I have lost 25 lbs. in 2 1/2 months.

title: Premium required to connect Fitbit
body: I have used Lose It for probably four years or more. Always loved it, very easy to use and accurate. I loved being able to connect my Fitbit directly to the app and being able to do everything I needed in one convenient location. As of September 2017, they require you to have a premium account in order to connect your Fitbit to the Lose It app. Another expense that I cannot afford. I will not be returning to this app unless they change this.

title: Excellent app!

title: Lose It Works!
body: At the recommendation of my physician, I started to use Lose It and I‚Äôm pleased to say, I‚Äôve lost 40 pounds and am now out of the obese category and back in the preferred weight range for my height.   Lose It works but only if you are committed to making sustainable changes to eating habits

title: All in one!
body: This app has helped me reach my weight goals. Never had to worry about weight before until now. I love the fact that I can keep track of what I eat and I log my exercise activities as well. This is a great app that does everything I need all in one!!‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Great app for tracking food and weight
body: I was a Weight Watchers member for many years so I know the key to weight loss is being fully aware of what I eat and making good choices. This free app provides an easy-to-use method to do just that. Great database of foods as well as the ability to add your own.

title: Useful but needs to be more versatile for health purposes
body: Recovering anoretic.

title: Great App
body: Truly a great app. I‚Äôve tried several others and they never stick. This one is user friendly, it‚Äôs so easy to track the foods because the huge list you can search through. I‚Äôve had it for 2 weeks and I‚Äôve lost 10 lbs since day 1!

title: Really like this
body: Wasn‚Äôt sure I needed the premium but didn‚Äôt anyway. Seems to have all the foods and I love how it congratulates me for continuous food logging.

title: Ww drop out reborn
body: Ww drop  out after hitting goal several times. Changed the program and it stopped working. This app is just what I needed to get on track and do old fashioned calorie counting. Guess what‚Ä¶ it works!!!  May upgrade to premium bc it looks like it might be insightful. Just do it!!!

title: Amazing
body: I have to say this is so well integrated into the Apple ecosystem - shortcuts, widgets, Apple health - it made en switch from MyFitnessPal. Plus the attention to detail in the design, icons, layout is in a league of its own‚Ä¶ when developers put this much care into an app it makes me want to pay for it.

title: Excellent Tool
body: For me, weight loss comes easiest when I have a visual tool with which to track my food, calories, and macronutrients. I downloaded, and tried, several apps before selecting Lose-It! as my tool.

title: Great app, easy to use
body: I‚Äôm achieving my goal and making major eating changes.  Love being able to refer back to previous meals and create my own food dictionary. I can plan ahead for special activities like family gatherings and happy hours with friends.

title: Great tracking app
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for a while and enjoy the additional features.  My only request is to make the timestamp automatic, or a setting to enable and disable.  The extra step is always forgotten, but can be helpful for intermittent fasting and other diets.

title: Easy to use, effective, but too easy to accidentally purchase premium
body: What it says in the title. I love the app and its little motivational messages, but if you accidentally press the ‚Äúpurchase premium‚Äù button it automatically buys you a year long subscription that you maybe didn‚Äôt want. I‚Äôm out $20, but overall good app!

title: Very responsive to issues, love the support!
body: The app is clean, works well, and is much better than other leading calorie counting apps I‚Äôve tried. I did have an issue with accepting shared recipes, but support was quick, responsive, released a fix within the week. You guys rock!

title: The way to stay healthy
body: This is the only way to lose weight the practical way. Give yourself a calorie budget and eat what you like. It‚Äôs super easy with the built in scanner. Takes the guesswork out of the equation. A way to stay on track for life and health.

title: Great App
body: Excellent app. I love that you can scan pretty much any food package and it‚Äôll preload 1 serving for your food log. It also keep it in a ‚Äúrecents‚Äù list so that you can quickly add it on your next meal. Lots of other great summary and tracking features. Good interface and not buggy.

title: Best health app  ever
body: I have used other weight loss apps but never anything as thorough and helpful as ‚ÄúLose it‚Äù very easy to use, the food list is amazing and covystore bought items as well as restaurant foods. It also provides a huge list of calorie burning exercises an activities

title: Just started
body: I just started with this app about two weeks ago, I bought premium ( I previously had this app without premium & I remember losing weight) but now it‚Äôs even better I can track my overall health and levels of macronutrients. Plus more I would definitely recommend.

title: New to me
body: It has been a new adventure to journal the food I eat as  well as the activity, vitals & sleep.   It makes me more aware and allows me to use fewer calories than I would without the app.  My goal, now, after the first week is to make better nutritional choices.

title: I absolutely love it
body: I absolutely love this app! If there was one thing I‚Äôd change, it would be to separate the added sugars from the natural sugars instead of combining them into just ‚Äúsugar‚Äù. That would be the most helpful for me since most of what I‚Äôm consuming has natural sugars and I‚Äôm avoiding the unhealthy sugars.

title: Such a great tool
body: I love this app! The colors, the set up, the ease of use is just perfect for me. I‚Äôve used many other food logging apps and this is my favorite. I did pay for the upgrade to not see ads. A small price to pay in my opinion. Definitely 5 star worthy!

title: Awesome program
body: This program just keeps on getting better.  I‚Äôve lost 58 lbs so far with the help of the program. While the program does allow the min calories to drop below 1200 cal a day (not recommended), you can adjust it back to 1200.  It slows weight loss but is healthier.

title: Fantastic!
body: I am 81 and need to lose weight because of cartilage loss in my foot.  I have lost 28 pounds since May and am going for 50!  This app has been a blessing, keeping me on track.  Did not think I could do this as I am quite sedentary.

title: Flexible
body: I like that both macros and calories can be tracked, that barcodes can be scanned for nutrition, it saves common meals, and that it syncs with the iPhone health app. My only suggestion would be multiple goals for each category (so I can set macro goals for high and low activity days)

title: My husband lost 60 lbs and kept it off!
body: Lose it is great!  We have been using it for years and it really makes it easy to record food intake and exercise.  My husband lost 60 lbs 6 years ago and has kept it up by keeping up with lose it.

title: Incredible.
body: This app is amazing.  I lost about 45lbs and I'm still going to get that asthetic look.  The unfortunate part is the pay wall.  It's amazing if you pay for it.  Without paying it becomes mediocre.  My macro+ Includes for free what lose it charges.  If this is changed I will come back.  I just want to be able to track my macros.

title: Amazing in every way
body: I never thought I‚Äôd be the kind of guy that would count calories. I found it daunting and saw it as a mountain of info I‚Äôd never learn. FALSE! This app has the easiest bell curve, learning that you tend to eat the same things, and as it collects your meals it‚Äôs easier and easier. I lost 70 lbs! Best app ever!

title: Used to love it
body: I‚Äôve had this app for years and even used it to log food & exercise during my 40 lb weight loss journey, but recently I can‚Äôt use the app without it interrupting my logging to ask me to upgrade. It will close me out of what I‚Äôm doing to ask, every single time I use the app. I‚Äôve finally deleted it and am now only using my Fitbit app. I‚Äôm tired of the constant annoying pop up and am not interested in upgrading, especially after reading some upgrading horror stories here.

title: One of the best
body: This is one of the best calorie tracking apps out there. It connects to my Fitbit.  It has all the eating out places in it.  It works reliably and is easy to use.  My nutritionist and fitness coach both recommended it, along with one other app (MyFitnessPal maybe?).  Overall I am very satisfied.

title: Love the Lose It app
body: Easy to use with all the information I need to lose weight.  Keeps track of carbs, protein, fiber, and fat and provides some menu recommendations.  I‚Äôve tried many logging apps but this one really works.  Worth the effort to start logging.

title: Accountability!
body: I have an accountability partner for my workouts and now through this Lose It app I have an invisible accountability partner for my eating habits as well.  First time in ‚Äúever‚Äù that I‚Äôll be able to lose the weight and keep it off.  Thank you Lose It!  You‚Äôre an absolute blessing!!!

title: Hits all the Boxes
body: I have been using Lose It! For two days and I am hooked.

title: Love the app
body: This app has made me very successful in leading a more healthy lifestyle and lose weight, the only issue I have had is the app freezing up when I search for a food in the big search then press on ‚Äúmy foods‚Äù it freezes up almost every time

title: Best food tracking app
body: I love this app, you can scan the barcode with whatever food you‚Äôre eating. It really helps with not overeating because you‚Äôre tracking everything you eat. I‚Äôve lost 20 pounds tracking my food and eating less.

title: Love it!!
body: I haven‚Äôt upgraded yet... but the free part of this app is enough for me... I may upgrade later as I progress. Down 4 ponds in 3 days just by sticking in my calorie range! This app keeps you aware of how much you really are consuming in a day and has calorie suggestions for each meal.

title: Worth it!
body: I really like this app. It is spot on logical which makes it super easy to use.  Each day it surprises me with something I didn‚Äôt realize it did.

title: Excellent app, easy to use, insightful
body: After the first few days only requires a minute or so a day to enter meals. I am able to see where I am consuming too many calories and adjust portions and between meal snacking. Great for planning meals ahead, too. I‚Äôve lost 27 lbs in 6 months.

title: great for ED recovery
body: I have bulimia + binge eating disorder, this has been a fantastic companion in helping me eat healthy amounts of food and tracking my intake

title: Useable and sustainable.
body: Good intro to the world of dieting. Makes me conscious of portion size and the caloric value of different foods. I‚Äôve been amazed at the range and types of foods that are included in the program. I‚Äôm one week into this new adventure. Big thanks to the developers of this software. It was recommended to me by my doctor‚Äôs dietitian.

title: Excellent app!
body: In just one week, Lose it has completely changed the way I look at food! I felt hungry the first two days staying within the calorie limits for each meal, but now I feel full after each meal. One of the best tools on my phone!

title: Love it!
body: Very easy to use! Helps me to keep track of all meals, snacks, and munchies in between while tracking my weight and my progress. I can determine how rigorous of an exercise regimen to maintain, or how many calories to increase or decrease. Great tool for beginners and those serious about losing weight.

title: Free app portion is great!

If I could move back through the goal weight calendar easily, say with a slide or calendar popup, I‚Äôd buy the app. Also, I‚Äôd prefer to just buy the app, rather than subscribe.

title: App won‚Äôt open, crashes
body: I‚Äôve used the app for years, but wi the recent updates it won‚Äôt even open unless i restart my whole phone, which is obviously very frustrating. Please look into the two most recent updates and see if there is a bug that needs fixing. iPhone SE here.

title: Wish I could use decimals
body: I love this app and it‚Äôs been working so well for me so far. My only complaint is that there is only an option for fractions when counting your servings. I‚Äôd be easier to do decimals (or at least choose an option) since it‚Äôs more accurate if you‚Äôre using a food scale. Besides that it‚Äôs amazing.

title: Lose it
body: This is the first time of success in losing weight.  I love this app, easy to log foods, plan future meal calories to stay on budget.  (And I‚Äôve only been using the free version).   I will continue to use it to maintain weight and continue on with healthy eating to maintain weight loss.

title: Use to love it
body: It was a fantastic app. I‚Äôve used it for the last couple of years. But this last update has done nothing but cause problems ... it crashes over and over again!
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Moderately Helpful
body: The app does what it‚Äôs supposed to. You enter food and it tracks your calories after providing you a budget.
response: We are sorry for the confusion! Lose It! actually does this! For more information, please email us via loseit.live/help.

title: It works
body: I enjoy using the app. It keeps me on track. It seems like it can find almost any food I ask it to find. The scan feature iAd also great. I've achieved my first goal and am now half of the way to my second goal.  I highly recommend it.

title: 28 lbs. lost since active logging
body: This app is so essential in my goal to stay healthy. I‚Äôve had this app for years, but removed it. When I started becoming active, logging my calories versus calories burned using this app ‚Äì it made achieving my goals much easier. Thank you so much.

title: It works !
body: Due to a slow metabolism, I have had to count calories most of my adult life. This app makes it so easy. Have used it for years, and know as long as I stay within my calorie range, and exercise, that I can maintain my desired weight. Thank you Lose It !

title: Long time app user: get the scale
body: I would like to common meals like shakes pre-populated to make or easier, not all food scans will go through or are wrong, would like that fixed. Great app, motivating and a great resource for meal plans. GET the LOSE IT SCALE!!!!! Your weight goes right to your phone, as well as BMI and hydration percentage .

title: 32 lbs down.
body: This app helped me learn what foods were giving me all my calories. With that info, and tracking my food every day, I have lost 67 pounds in 142 days. I am happy with LoseIt. I feel so much better. Starting weight was 246. Weight this morning was 179. I haven‚Äôt been this weight in 25 years.

title: Nearly perfect
body: Truly great and easy to use. Perfect for tracking food in and exercise out. Would be 5 stars if the upgrade bags weren‚Äôt so frequent. I may upgrade because the app is truly great, but I don‚Äôt want to be bothered about it every third time I go to enter food.

title: Latest version breaks everything
body: I love this app and normally find it to be easy to use and that it works well. Since the last update though, the app doesn‚Äôt recognize when I have a network connection, so I‚Äôm perpetually stuck in offline mode. Not anywhere as helpful as it was even a day ago. Hopefully the next update fixes this - and comes soon. Really glad my Premium subscription renewed today :(

title: Vitamins and minerals
body: It would be great if we could chose what vitamins and minerals we have on the screen. Some may be wanting to keep an eye on Potassium while others are wanting to keep an eye on Magnesium. In my case, I'm not eating dairy so I'm wanting to keep an eye on my Calcium intake. This would be a great addition to the app. This is a great app and it's very useful. Keep up the good work!

title: Great App!
body: I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôm seeing results quickly! Easy to find foods or scan labels for calorie count. Portion size is helpful so I know how much I‚Äôm eating and realizing which foods are high in calories and which are good snacks. Also keeping track of steps is a great motivator for my activity level .

title: I‚Äôm 36. This is the first time in my life I‚Äôve been able to stick to a diet. Thanks LoseIt!
body: I usually stick to a diet for half of a morning. Thanks to LoseIt I‚Äôm actually sticking to my diet! I don‚Äôt always stick to 1278 calories but I track anyway and I have way more success days than failures. I‚Äôm done 5 pounds already! Yay LoseIt!

title: Lose It
body: This app is user friendly.  One can usually find the foods and portions easily.  I‚Äôm currently a 721 days in a row user.  I‚Äôve been able to maintain my weight during this time period -  a real bonus for me.  This app keeps me accountable and helps control my binging.

title: Scanner works great
body: The scanner is great, so far it has 99% of everything I have scanned. Correction: the only thing I haven‚Äôt found in the database so far is a piece of Carmel candy from a local candy store, so I typed in miscellaneous & sure enough, they have a category for that.

title: Excellent App
body: Been using this App consistently for over a year! Keeps me on track. Allows me to ‚Äúplan‚Äù my food by entering first, then actually consuming so I know how much I can have of each item. Love that I can enter my own recipes too! Lost 25 pounds and I‚Äôm keeping them off!

title: Be Honest
body: This app is great for tracking food and losing weight. I‚Äôve used this app off and on many times and the one thing that holds true is that as long as I accurately weigh out my foods and log everything honestly even if I screw up, I always lose weight.

title: Very comprehensive food listing
body: One of the things I really appreciate about this app is the fact that I can input almost any food and it‚Äôs on their list in terms of calories. Also the barcode scan is a very convenient feature.

title: Best weight loss program
body: This is a sustainable program and easy to follow because you follow your calorie count, not a point formula.  Also you can select your pace and change it at any time to fit your current goals.  I‚Äôm so glad I found this app.

title: Love this app!
body: Love this app! Been using the free version for a couple. It‚Äôs easy to use has a lot of varieties of food to track. Users can enter their own food (Found a variety of desi foods). Has everything we need to keep on track!

title: So easy
body: This app has a huge range of foods to choose from, including my local restaurants menu items. It has easy reminders, easy visuals, and plenty of logging options. It is 100% easier and more consistent than MyFitnessPal, no comparison. Use this app!!!!

title: Easy to use
body: I don‚Äôt usually pay for apps but really glad I upgraded. I love how easy it is to use

title: Big Help!!
body: The app just works. Simple, effective. Been the only way I can keep myself accountable to consistently lose weight. I‚Äôm down 10 lbs in 10 weeks and I‚Äôm right on track for my 20 lbs goal. I plan on upping my daily calorie limit when I reach it to help me maintain.

title: Great weight loss app
body: This app has been so helpful to me when losing weight. I‚Äôm able to track all my food (macros) and I can visualize all the food I‚Äôve eaten. It helps you learn portion control. If you want extra benefits go premium l, it seems nice. Thanks to the creators for keeping this app free!

title: BEST
body: I rarely review apps & products, cuz I mean, ain‚Äôt nobody got time for that. But the truly life changing things like this app I make sure the world knows. This is the easiest calorie app out there. I‚Äôve used it for years and I‚Äôve even tried other apps, this is by far the best. You won‚Äôt regret it!

title: To thine own self be true
body: I have found tracking to be a critical piece of the pie for weight loss. I log before I eat. So I know whether the quality of the food will be worth the calories. Is there protein, how much fiber etc.? I have begun logging my water intake to stay on track.

title: Best weight loss app
body: This weight loss app is the best one out there.  Simple, quick and easy to use.

title: Loosing weight!!
body: This is the greatest app since sliced bread.  Fill in your information and away you go!  Name of the game is portion sizes.  You can eat almost anything but just stay within your calorie count and you are going to loose.  I have lost 9 lbs. the first week.  Good luck everyone!!

title: Annoying up-sell
body: The app is beautiful and relatively easy to use. I actually enjoy logging my food, which is a big plus for this whole idea to work. However, one thing I loathe more than subscriptions is endless ads about subscriptions. I get it you want to up-sell me but I‚Äôm not interested and would just like the ads about it to stop. I‚Äôd pay for that.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! title: Not what it was
body: I‚Äôve used lose it for several years and it helped me lose weight. It was a great app during that time.

title: Ketosis tracking needed
body: It is great app. I use it daily with scale. It i great to track many things. 2 things are missing:

title: Stick with it.
body: If you truly stick with this app and make it a habit, it becomes a crucial tool for weight loss. I love how it gives you tips. I never would‚Äôve known that on days I eat potatoes, I eat 300 less calories. Or days I eat Olive oil in the mornings, I tend to eat less fat during the day.

title: Great App!
body: Really easy to use. Extensive library of foods so logging accurately is easy. and I like that it tells me my nutrients for the day. Highly recommend - whether you‚Äôre trying to lose weight or just see what you eat in a day (calories and macros)- this app will help!!!!

title: Most things great!
body: I like most of the features in the free app. I do wish when you were entering a food it allowed entry of sugar alcohols. I‚Äôm on a dr ordered low carb diet and some things I scan don‚Äôt take out the sugar alcohols to get net carbs.  I also wish that when you were searching, there was more consistency with choices, however that‚Äôs not an app issue, it‚Äôs from the person who entered it.

title: GREAT app!
body: This is by far the easiest app for tracking the food I eat that I‚Äôve tried. It really helps me stay on track with my weight loss goal. I usually don‚Äôt recommend apps but I have recommended this app to many other people because it‚Äôs so helpful. ü¶ã

title: Needs More Nutritional Information.
body: I love the look and feel of this app.  I decided to try the premium version but to my dismay its missing several things like: Potassium, Fiber (Soluble & Insoluble), Fats ( saturated, polyunsaturated, Monounsaturated & Trans), Vitamins & Electrolytes. I know MFP did most of what I'm requesting.

title: App suggestion.
body: I‚Äôve been using the app for over two years now to track macros and love it more than my fitness pal. My only suggestion would be to have and option for gaining weight also for when bulking. Instead of having the only goal be weight loss under the goal sections.

title: This App works
body: If you are serious about sticking to a limited daily intake of food to lose weight or to just manage diabetes this app is the real deal. You set your goals and then it‚Äôs up to you to log in what you eat and the exercise regimen of your choosing.

title: Amazing!
body: I am so glad I got this app! I lost 1.2 lbs in 4 days, though I do tend to gain and lose weight easily, it made me very aware of what I was eating and my calorie intake.

title: Good tool but..
body: I love this app and use it daily.  It‚Äôs easy to log food and has everything I need to finally get on track with losing weight and exercising.  The only thing I don‚Äôt like is how it asks me CONSTANTLY if I want to upgrade to premium.  It used to be every once and a while but now it seems to happen every time I open the app which means I‚Äôll probably delete it.

title: Promotion of unhealthy caloric deficit.

As someone recovering from an eating disorder, I was SHOCKED when the app suggested I eat 700 calories a day. This is absolutely asinine and not healthy at all. Please fix this. A starvation diet is NOT the way to lose weight.

title: Awesome

title: Why I Love this

title: Great tracking app
body: I love everything about this app.  The assessments are generally accurate for intake calories and output for exercise.  I‚Äôve thus lost 20 lbs in four months by methodically tracking, and yes diet and hard work.  The app is something which is sustainable and encourages long term lifestyle changes

title: Useless to me......
body: I‚Äôve been paying for this app for a couple of years now. It hasn‚Äôt helped me at all. I‚Äôm glad that it has worked for others, that‚Äôs why I have it a try. I‚Äôve actually gained weight, this app is very misleading. Also, the reminders aren‚Äôt working and I can‚Äôt edit them either. Therefore I can‚Äôt use them. The more I use this, the more I realize how many ways it can help me see the bigger picture of my diet and lifestyle, and take steps to avoid issues. I love this app!

title: Needs more nutrition
body: I like this app but I was surprised at the lack of nutritional information like fiber and vitamins. Also, it doesn‚Äôt appear that you can view or make changes to previous days. I‚Äôm paying monthly for this? I might just return to my fitness pal.

title: Lost 50 pounds on this.
body: Genius, weight watchers alternative for iPhone calorie counter. Sets the blame for failure squarely on my shoulders. As long as you log everything honestly and keep it in the green, you will lose weight for sure. Really shows you how many calories we needlessly use.

title: Persistent bug interfering with usability
body: It seems there's a persistent bug where every single time the app is opened, day after day, week after week a "25% off Premium" "Last chance! Ending soon!" sale is offered.

title: Cannot change goal weight
body: You can‚Äôt change your goal weight or even view it in the app. I don‚Äôt have premium but signing up allows you to chose a goal. There‚Äôs just no way to review and modify your goal weight. If you buy premium you can add other types of goals but it still won‚Äôt allow you to change simply your goal weight which is a basic feature in calorie tracking apps.
response: We're sorry for the confusion! Please email us via help.loseit.com so we can help you out with this.

title: A nurse
body: This app is easy to use and listed food items are comprehensive enough to allow an exact match or close enough.  I like the scale option so I can track my weight and how the exercise is incorporated into total caloric intake goals. Not a 5-star because I dislike the constant up-sale for more access.

title: Better than Weight Watchers App
body: Very easy to use. You can find almost everything on this app to help count your calamities and log exercise. You get weekly counts and if you go over you can cut back over the next days. Love this app! I lost 4 pounds in 2 weeks!

title: Premium for water??
body: I used this app 5 years ago and lost a lot of weight with it and I still /kind of/ love it. I enjoy most of it but I can‚Äôt stand that water logs are a premium feature. I‚Äôm sorry, but water is a necessity and that shouldn‚Äôt be something we need to pay for. Other than that I still like the app.

title: Great. But don't quit!
body: The first time I got this app I lost 15 pounds just by logging what I ate and playing Wii fit. But then thanksgiving came and I quit the diet. I'm back on it now. But it was extremely hard to start logging  again after quitting the first time. If you start the app and it's affective don't quit!

title: Awesome app!
body: I finally decided to start keeping track of the calories I eat and try and stay under a goal. This app has helped me a ton by making it SOOO easy to track them. While also reminding me that I am trying to get healthy. Love this app. Don‚Äôt waste your time with under armors!! Ha

title: Exceptional app ... if you‚Äôre honest
body: This has been my friend for nearly two years now and I have been careful to enter ALL that I consume, regardless of the outcome. If you remain true, at some point it‚Äôs easy to see that the only thing between you and weight loss is you. The holidays can be brutal but consistency counts, even if the numbers go up.

title: Lose it
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It for 5 months and have lost 33 lbs. Documenting my foods and seeing the carb/fat/protein/fiber ratio has been enlightening. I find that I‚Äôm eating healthier because I look for the best foods to fill in the gaps to improve my protein and fiber daily goals. It‚Äôs been easy, and it‚Äôs working!

title: Accountability!
body: I love using this app along side a fitness program and a nutrition program it allows me to remain accountable. It is also a great tool for tracking nutrition and weight progress. If I am not seeing results I can look at my history and make nutrition changes. Great app!

title: Apple Watch integration is legendary
body: What makes this app dynamite is the Apple Watch sync for exercise bonuses. After all, there‚Äôs no better reason to exercise than to be able to eat more food without feeling bad about it. Lost 25 lbs and the app makes it easy.

title: Horrible Fraudulent Charges
body: I usually don‚Äôt write reviews, but this is the third year that they‚Äôve auto-charged me their premium amount. I‚Äôve called them, emailed them, and contacted Apple to have them reverse this charge EVERY YEAR for three years. (I tried the trial and cancelled within the refund period).

title: Shout out to Lose It‚Äôs Engineers!
body: You guys are the bomb! Had a glitch and reported it. Not only did someone respond within 24 hrs, you came up with a fix that worked!!! Can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about the engineering team and this app!  Way to go!!! Thanks so much!!

title: AMAZING!!
body: This app is amazing I have never realized how much I actually eat in a day so tracking it helps a lot. It is also super easy to track what you eat they have just about any food, drink, and snack you could eat. They even have food from different restaurants.

title: This really works, if you‚Äôre diligent
body: The app is easily navigated, makes your stats easily seen & understood, you can add recipes, meals, & favorites, and there are exercises, meal plans, and lots of encouragement to be had. The only thing you have to do is USE THE APP diligently. It‚Äôs a good one. I highly recommend it.

title: Review
body: I love this app! It helps me to lose weight and stay focused with all the alerts. I love how some of the restaurants are on here so I don‚Äôt have to try to come up with calories. However I do notice that a lot of the mom and pop restaurants are not on here, which is understandable.

title: So easy to use
body: Search for your food or just scan the barcode. That‚Äôs it. The premium version may help if you hit a wall but I haven‚Äôt needed it. BUT, you must enter EVERYTHING you eat AND You really need to weigh yourself EVERY day. Lose It tracks everything and if you exercise your phone links in and subtracts calories. It‚Äôs FREE, try it!

title: Disappointed
body: I purchased the premium app in June of 2019. My understanding is that I was supposed to have access for a whole year.  Unfortunately I can no longer access premium since an upgrade occurred and the app is saying it expired.  My purchase records show otherwise...  I really like all the features premium has to offer but am finding I‚Äôm not getting any response when I try to reach out through the app.

title: Great tool for weight loss
body: I love using this app it keeps me accountable and it‚Äôs just so easy. I can add recipes, I can manually enter foods if they are not on their list. Don‚Äôt get me wrong their list off foods is crazy big but being Mexican some of my stuff is not on there. All in all great investment.

title: Great flexible fitness app
body: This app is great if you want to do things your own way. I compete in weightlifting and need to set my own macros and schedule day by day. This app helps me keep track of everything, from water and food to sleep and body fat percentage. Excellent resource for a good price.

title: Awesome
body: I purchased this app because I needed help to track my cholesterol. Turns out it‚Äôs been helping me track much more. I now have a healthier lifestyle and I‚Äôm able to look back at the beginning of all this and see a major progress in many areas.

title: I just got to the

title: Love it
body: I had trouble resetting my password. I finally checked my junk box l, and there was my reset email. On a different note, I would like to suggest that when you offer lifetime subscriptions, you consider the folk who already paid a yearly subscription.

title: Best App Ever
body: I have used this application off and on for years. It helps me when I need to loose weight, and it helps me maintain my weight. I have in total lost around 20 pounds since using the app. I have also been able to maintain that weight loss over time. Love it!

title: Rip off
body: This app was good until they started changing things. You have to go premium and pay each month to see your macronutrients for the day, track your water intake, log in your foods for the next day or days to come, etc. MyFitnessPal lets you do just the basics that Lose It charges you for per month for FREE. All I want to know is my nutrients for the day, log in foods for the week and log in my water intake but I have to go premium. Don't waste money for what MyFitnessPal lets you do for free.

title: Great app
body: I really like this app. I would‚Äôve given it a 5 star if it wasn‚Äôt for the app not logging in my info from my iwatch properly. Sometimes it will log it in sometimes it won‚Äôt. But all in all it‚Äôs a great app and it really helps whether you‚Äôre trying to watch what you eat or trying to lose weight.

title: Great App But Needs Some Help
body: I love this app but it would be nice to have duplicate foods removed once the officially verified entry is in the system.  I hate having to sort through lots of junk entries to find the right one.  Too many different entries with varying values for the same item.  Clean those up and this app would be much better.

title: Need premium account now to sync Fitbit.
body: I have used the loseit app on and off since 2012. It really does work for weight loss. When I start getting off track, I start logging my food again to lose the pounds I‚Äôve gained. What is disappointing now is that my Fitbit will no longer sync with the app. I now need to pay for the premium account. Not sure when this happened, but it‚Äôs very disappointing. This app is not as useful to me as it was before. I guess they just want the $$$. üòï

It's very focused on calories but wish there was more of an emphasis on carbs and ketones. There is a way to log blood glucose but nothing for ketones.

title: Helped me lose 45 lbs!
body: This app works great and really helped me to realize just how many calories I was eating each day.  With the help of this app and a little healthy tweak to my diet I lost 45 lbs and have been able to keep it off without the need of expensive diet programs!

title: Only as good as you make it
body: If you‚Äôre honest, and don‚Äôt give up. This is a real eye opener that makes you realize how easy it is to consume more calories than you might think.

title: So glad to be back!
body: So glad to be back with the program. When I first heard of this app I was skeptical, but I needed help. I lost 50 pounds and thought I could continue without it, I was wrong. I am back with it and losing again. Thank you for designing and sharing it!

title: Great program
body: Have used Lose It now for 8 years.  Lost my 18 pounds the first year and have successfully kept it off by tracking every day.  Simple to use and once you get your most common foods listed it only takes a second.

user_name: Wow so cool I love this

I use only the basic app. it always wants me to go premium.  I have not.  After I hit a goal I wish certain other ‚Äú special areas or the premium areas would open.  To give me a reward.  I am thankful to be losing the weight.

title: Fantastic help!
body: I know I slip up occasionally, but I won‚Äôt ever completely stop using this app. It‚Äôs a wake up call when you see what you‚Äôre eating and the value of the food - fat, carbs, protein, etc. I‚Äôve lost 41 lbs since January. Yes, it‚Äôs slow, but healthy and no diet. Common sense way to a healthy lifestyle.

body: I‚Äôd love to give it 5 stars, but I‚Äôve been using this app since Dec. 2010(!), and many features that were available to everyone just keep getting moved into the Premium version, like linking a Fitbit or joining challenges. title: Good
body: I‚Äôm using the free version and it‚Äôs great. title: Great App!
body: I have really been enjoying this app. I like that it syncs with my Apple Watch. The notification reminders are a bit comical which keeps me engaged. title: It‚Äôs good for tracking food
body: A little difficult to navigate. I keep getting lost & cant find what I need. Also it would be nice to be able to keep diary notes. It seems to have lots of features. I haven‚Äôt used many of them.

title: Best food log...
body: I have worked to log my daily food intake in many formats over the years.  This is the best and makes me be honest with myself!  I have bought the Premier edition to take advantage of the nutrition reports and the exercise challenges.  Can‚Äôt be without my LoseIt app!

title: An easy, fun way to attack your weight
body: I have a lot of trouble following a ‚Äúdiet,‚Äù but something about this app almost turns it into a game. Try to beat your calorie count! I love how very easy it is to log in foods and exercise ...and the line graph showing progress is somehow ...mentally inspirational.

title: It helps a lot
body: I've been using this for over two years  now and it really works. Giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because I accidentally updated the app and now they are charging for things that had always been free, like planning your meals in advance. I did not like that at all.

title: Great tool
body: I had been struggling to o get motivated with my eating while trying to lose weight. This app makes it so much easier to see what you are eating and make changes so you can be successful. I highly recommend to anyone looking to lose weight.

title: You need this!

title: Great app!

title: It works!!!
body: I need disciple and help losing weight. I need guidance or I don‚Äôt follow through. This app provides you with everything you need to stay on track. You can‚Äôt cheat because you know exactly what happens when you do!  I‚Äôm already down 6lbs in 3 weeks!!!

title: Love love love this app!
body: I've had this app for years and love it!

title: Keeps you honest!
body: I‚Äôve been using the Lose It! App on and off for almost 5 years, and I still love it! I‚Äôm not fanatical about it, but I use it when I know I need to get myself back to balance. Totally keeps you honest to what you are putting in your body.

body: I‚Äôve been using this app for about 18 months now‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. Lost 40 pounds over about 10 months and been maintaining my new weight by tracking intake via this app. It really works well!  Very impressed, and appreciative for the forced discipline.

title: Awesome
body: I love this app! I love all the foods that they already have recorded so you can find them easily. I love the little animated graphics that help you celebrate when you have logged! I love how it tells you when it picks up on a positive trend for you to see. I love the reminders to log!

title: I love lose it

response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Love this app!
body: This app is easy to use and useful for monitoring your overall health. You can keep track of your weight, water intake, sleep, and workouts as well as what you eat. The developers are quick to respond to questions and concerns. It‚Äôs a remarkable tool.
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: IT JUST WORKS!
body: i just started using this app and im really impressed with the results so far im 5 feet 10 inches and weighed 219.8 pounds and in just the first week of watching my eating i lost 10 pounds of fat ive just started my journey but i can promise you if you give this app a chance you will not regret it!

title: Amazing except for one thing...

title: Use it and lose it!
body: I‚Äôve have had thyroid issues for most of my life, which makes it so hard to lose weight. Since I‚Äôve been on lose it, I‚Äôve lost 11 pounds and know if I stay I track I might finally hit my goal weight.

title: Great aesthetics and function
body: Love this app, pro version or not. I find it a lot more intuitive and aesthetically pleasing than my fitness pal. I just wish it stored photos and allowed comparison of before and after. Then I could really have all of my health data in one app!

title: Great app
body: Love how easy they make rbis app to use. The premium feature are the best. Being able to plan meals the day ahead saves me so much time during a hectic day. Tracking more that just calories is great. I can even track my daily fiber intake. I‚Äôm really happy I have this app.

title: Useless Calorie Counts & faulty app
body: The app is useful overall. It makes me more mindful and aware of what I eat & drink. Daily weight blogging incentivizes. But the calorie counts are ridiculous. Three food item entries with identical descriptions will say 45, 100, or 180 calories. I get the calorie counts from a reliable source, then create a custom entry.

title: Love it!
body: Easy to log food because they have everything in the grocery store already stored. If not, just scan it!

title: Good App BUT
body: I've been using it and enjoying it BUT the latest update is making the app crash upon opening it. Also the app shows sodium levels when entering but won't total it like calories. Shame on you for not offering it in the free app. Everything shouldn't be about money and more money!

My Fitness Pal does include potassium but it‚Äôs an inferior app to Lose it in so many other ways. I‚Äôd rate the app 4.9 stars. If they added potassium to the nutrients, I‚Äôd give it a five.

body: It helped me loose 35 pounds by keeping me on track. Daily entries show you what‚Äôs going on. After awhile you get the habit of making entries that work to help you loose weight. You see how meals can work against your goals. Weight loss can be fun with this program.

Please upgrade the app to eliminate this pesky rounding issue so our nutrients record properly.

I am very happy with the insight and help this app has provided me. I have lost 50lbs and recently gained back about 9 lbs... why? I stopped using Lose It.

title: Use It!!

title: My most used app

If you‚Äôre honest in logging, you can see your pitfalls and correct them. Consistent logging equals results!

title: Great App

body: TW? Ok so I have had this app for over a year and before when I was trying to just maintained a healthy weight I thought it was fine, but I soon developed an ED (obviously not because of the app) but anyway I was eating about 600 or less calories a day and it didn‚Äôt tell me that that was absolutely absurd.  It just told me to log the food but never actually helped me rlly idk. I feel like maybe it should have warned me that it was a bad thing and now I‚Äôm kinda far into the Ed so I might delete it
response: We apologize that this has been your experience with Lose It!. We strive to provide a healthy weight loss program, and our goal is never to encourage unsafe dieting practices. body: this app does NOT tell you what is safe or unsafe. if i was eating 400 calories a day, that‚Äôs obviously not safe. however, the app doesn‚Äôt tell you. i thought it was fine until i actually talked to a doctor and it was completely unsafe. you‚Äôd think they would at least say something like ‚Äúhmm this seems a little low in calories are you sure you want to eat this less‚Äù or something like it. i regret using this app so much because it led to my ed. not worth it.

I canceled it and thought it was over. They have continued to try and charge me for the last 6 months!!! They won‚Äôt quit. I make sure I don‚Äôt leave money in my Apple wallet or they will just take it. Be careful if you want this app. They will keep on charging you and hope you don‚Äôt notice.

title: It works!

title: Reduced  Function
body: I've used it daily for several years - good food and exercise  library.

title: Easy
body: I‚Äôm not big on routines but I go right to the app and input my info.

title: Thank you! You have changed my life!
body: I‚Äôve always struggled with my weight and a family history of type 2 and I never wanted that and this is a great way to lose weight and eat less. Again thank you!

I didn‚Äôt even have a chance to look at the app to decide for myself if I wanted to sign up...   now I can‚Äôt cancel because I don‚Äôt understand your directions...   it says ‚Äúgo to this page‚Äù... but where is that page located???  So frustrating that I have to waste my time figuring out how to cancel something I never ever signed up for!  Seems like quite the scam...

title: Works Great @ Maintenance
body: I used this app to loose 60 pounds on 12 months and have been success at jerking the weight of now for 4 years. Seeing what yuou eat and the energy (exercise) needed to work off the calories makes you think twice about the 3rd slice of pizza, 2nd cookie, ....

title: Love it!
body: I have been tracking my food for six months and lose it has helped me lose about 35 lbs!

title: Lose It Works
body: Great app for tracking you daily caloric intake and weight loss. Much of the food that you eat is already in the app and you can scan the store items. Had helped me lose 35# to in just over two months.

title: Easy to use

title: This app traps you into paying

title: Excellent
body: I'm a relatively new user if LOSE IT, but it came highly recommended to me from a close friend. It's really changed my eating habits, making me much more aware of the food I consume. Thus far, I‚Äôve lost 40 lives using app, with. No real change to my activity rate.  Recommended

title: Great App

title: Great / powerful app
body: Still has some bugs.  It seems when multitasking is not stopped, the friends tab within the app will not show anything but a blank screen.

title: Good(ISH)
body: I am old enough to work out, I‚Äôm not going to say my age but a good age. The app says 4+ but it said I needed to be 18 or older. Sorry if this isn‚Äôt really that important, I just wanted to tell the people that are under 18 and think they can get this app that they are not able to. I hope you can change this little flaw.
response: The Lose It! program is designed based on the caloric and nutritional needs of adults. The program cannot account for the needs of members under the age of 18. For the health and safety of our members, we require a starting age of 18 or older.

title: Just do it!
body: This is a highly user friendly app and the bar graphic with the day‚Äôs calorie intake is so helpful. The HUGE list of foods / calories makes using this app a breeze. I‚Äôve tried many apps and this is easy, intuitive and well set up.

title: Stopped working.
body: I‚Äôve had the app for a few years now and I‚Äôve been making great progress. Unfortunately it just stopped working one day and even after the update won‚Äôt work. So, I had to get a different app to continue my progress which I hate but the show must go on. I was really looking forward to being a Lose it success story.

title: Great App- Some Disconnect from Online
body: I have used Lose It for several years. I feel the calories and macro data is accurate and helpful when I log.

title: Best and easiest
