title: An Easy Way to Lose Weight
body: What is helping me to lose weight is logging what I eat. If I have to log it then I may decide not to eat it or to have a very small portion. This makes me cognizant of what I am putting in my mouth and helps me make better choices!

title: Great Food Tracking App
body: This app not only tracks your dietary habits, it also allows you to set goals in many areas, such as water consumption, along with watching how much sugar, salt, carbs, protein, etc that you consume. There‚Äôs more than meets the eye than what the preview of the app provides. It‚Äôs definitely worth the free trial then the monthly subscription.

title: Weight lose
body: This app has really helped to keep me focused on losing weight. I love that it allows me to look up calorie counts for different foods so I can make healthier choices and budget my calories each day. I have no been hungry at all while losing the weight.

title: Amazing App!!!
body: Exceeded my expectations! So easy to use! Love that I can scan the bar codes on products and get instant calorie count.  Our whole family is truly having fun entering our food at each meal and talking about our choices. 5 stars for sure!

title: Perfect in almost every way
body: I docking it one star for the continual nagging to sign up for the premium version. Other than that, it‚Äôs fantastic. The food library is vast. The scanner is fast and accurate. It makes tracking calories and logging weight loss easy. As of this writing, I‚Äôm down 17lbs. It‚Äôs an essential app for me.

title: Great Weight Loss App!
body: This is a great app to keep you motivated and on track! Love the challenges and badges! Very user friendly. Your able to scan barcodes of food to add to the log and able to create your own recipes.I wish there were more themes to change for the seasons but that‚Äôs really only for decoration.

title: Amazing Tool
body: This app works remarkably well, it‚Äôs compatible with a wide variety of stores and restaurants. I used this over the summer (starting weight 250lbs) and from June to September I lost 30lbs. Keeping track of calories is essential for weight loss and this app will help you do just that.

title: This app helps!
body: I have been using this app to track my calories, nutritional intake as well as my exercise. The app is easy to use, just tracking everything makes me more aware of what I have done and what I need to do.

title: Awesome app to track your calories and nutrition
body: I‚Äôve used this app for several years. Whenever I need to get back on track and lose a few pounds, this is definitely a helpful tool. I cannot recommend it enough!

title: LoseIt
body: Great app. It really helps me focus on better eating and weight loss. When you accurately log in what you eat, that forces you to take a good look at what you‚Äôre eating. The articles are helpful and so are the recipes. And the gentle reminders to track your food are very helpful!

title: Lose It Ap
body: Had so much trouble trying to control hypoglycemia. I was throwing

title: This app has everything I need!
body: I have tried the other apps for logging food and exercise; I have used this app on and off for about 8 years.  This app is complete in what I need and easy to use!  I share with friends and is great for celebrating milestones!

title: Outstanding Weight Loss App
body: Great App for keeping tract of weight and calories. It is well organized and easy to use.  It also lists calories for all supermarket foods. The App even predicts how long it will take to get to your weight loss goal. Everyone who is on a diet should use this App!

title: Love this app!
body: I‚Äôve tried many food tracking apps, and this is my favorite so far.  Really wish it had a vitamin tracking feature as well, but everything else is great!  Would definitely recommend.

title: Monitoring low carb diet
body: This app has been very useful at helping me monitor my carbs.  It also keeps track of fiber which is vitally important to accurate carb counting.  I love the "scan" feature...just scan a barcode and all the data is entered automatically!

title: Keeps me in check
body: I've used this app a couple of times over the years. When my weight starts to get out of control, this app always helps me get back in line. It's easy to use and I love how it has most restaurant chains in their inventory of foods.

title: Great App
body: This app has really been the motivating force behind my weight loss.  It allowed me to chronicle and track my progress as I lost weight and educated me on food and diet.  I don't believe I could have done it otherwise as I went from 195 towards my goal weight of 170.  Thanks!

title: Lasted update revised: MUCH BETTER !!!
body: *** update on review***
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please email us via help.loseit.com so we can help you out here!

title: Great easy-to-use app
body: Very easy to use and fully featured, even the free version. The diet log section has an amazingly complete listing of nutrition information. I've yet to encounter a food that isn't already in there. Custom recipe feature is also super easy.

title: This app is my weight loss partner
body: I cannot be well on my journey without this app. So easy to use, with many foods from restaurants and groceries in the database. I use the  workout module to give myself permission to indulge. And seeing progress fuels motivation to continue the journey. Thank you, partner!

title: Ignore the rest of the apps
body: This is what MyFitnessPal should have done years ago, instead they decided to milk their user for profit and random their data.

title: Loseit app has helped!
body: This app has helped me not only loose over 60 pounds but it has helped me change my eating lifestyle into a more healthy way without giving up my favorites like Icecream and pizza. It is low pressure so it makes me want to continue with it

title: Functional but painful
body: This app works well, but if you try to search a restaurant the list is very very small, or a brand of food or even a type of food. I‚Äôve been using tracking apps for years and it seems this one doesn‚Äôt have the database that others do. Other than that it seems expensive for the time and effort you have to put in just to log food.

title: It Helped Me Lose 50lbs!
body: This is a great app and easy to use. It‚Äôs easy to find the foods and create new foods in your calorie menu. This app also makes it easy to track what you are eating and to track your weight loss goals. Totally worth every penny.

title: Very pleased
body: I really like this app.  I am using the free version ( not premium) and getting all the info I need.  The food list is fabulous.  There is nothing I haven't found, and it loads quickly.  I esp like the way it keeps the percentage of protein, carbs & fats for you.  Keeps me on target!

title: Data base issues.
body: I actually took off another star for the wack response.  Which was = to 0.  I left a message within the app stating that I keep getting unknown errors and I have to play around with my entries until the database figures it out.  Two stars for the app.  - 1 star for the lack of response except for the canned response on the App Store to reach out to them.  - 2 stars for the weak database UX experience.  Oh and I paid for the year.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Weight loss
body: Love this app!! I‚Äôm going to be honest; I love love to snack and of course I put on weight if I‚Äôm not careful. But with Lose It, I‚Äôm able to lose weight almost effortlessly. This is my 3rd time using this for weight loss. I‚Äôve been using this off and on since 2013!! It works!!!

title: Bummed
body: Lose it at some point did an update that won‚Äôt allow you to set a 900 calorie budget. That was the one feature that set them apart from MyFitnessPal. I‚Äôm on a medical weight loss system, I‚Äôm not to eat more than 900 calories, the center I‚Äôm going through promotes MyFitnessPal for their easy customer use. I was going to try and get them to switch to Lose It because it would better fit the program, now I won‚Äôt be as the one feature that set it apart from MFP is gone....

title: Liked the app but it‚Äôs not FREE!!! Terribly deceptive.
body: I used this app for a few short days, and liked it,  but after day 3 was pushed to purchase a plan to continue use.  I found this misleading given in the description on iTunes, in-app purchases wasn‚Äôt indicated but yet I was faced with making a choice to keep using it by purchasing a plan or not.  I opted for the latter.  Not a fan of misleading consumers.  SMH.

title: Too much premium interference
body: I like the app. It makes counting calories and nutrients easier. I just got tired of the annoying premium banner plastered across the page. I‚Äôve had premium before and it was worth it but like many others right now I can‚Äôt allow it in my budget. So I am quitting this app and going back to journaling the old way. Thanks lose it for showing me daily what I presently can‚Äôt have.
response: Thanks for your feedback on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make greats products for our members. To provide additional suggestions or for more information, contact us here: reviews@loseit.zendesk.com

title: Used to be 5 stars
body: The latest update has changed the main log page and it was not an improvement. It‚Äôs harder to see the logged info as the new ‚Äúadd food‚Äù buttons are so huge they take up most of the screen. Now instead of seeing most the day at a glance I have to scroll and scroll. Annoying.

title: Slow
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for the past 10yrs and love it, but there‚Äôs something wrong with it for a couple months now that takes forever to add an item from the list of food, I write on the search and the letters take forever to appear, it‚Äôs really slow. Any advice?

title: Great app
body: On year two on logging/tracking. Bought into the premium and it is worth it. It saves all of my past food, plus a have a year track of my weight fluctuations. I automatically log now which is awesome.

title: Suggestion
body: I know this tracks calories as a primary then carbs fiber etc. i wish you could switch to primary carb with calories secondary. That way it would show when you look at your monthly under and over for carbs and tailor it to each user specific needs

title: Love!
body: Once I downloaded this app, I was skeptical about it thinking it would be like other weight loss apps that I‚Äôve came across. I got the chance for the $20 all year membership and I do not regret a thing! So easy to use, just scan and go!

title: Awesome App!
body: I wish I had found this app years ago. It makes logging food and tracking calories, exercise, water and sleep so easy. After only a handful of days, I‚Äôm an addict and I‚Äôm seeing positive results. Oh, and it links to my iWatch too! Very happy with this app.

title: 6 years & counting!
body: Have used this app for 6 yrs & originally lost 20 lbs by being more aware of choices every day while not working very hard at ‚Äúdieting‚Äù. Since ( past 4 yrs) I have continued to keep this food journal & not regain. If I felt more inclined, could easily loose more. Great app!!

title: THEY DONT REFUND CANCELLED SUBSCRIPTIONS
body: Paid for 1yr subscription and after a few days I decided another app was better and I cancelled my subscription. Come to find out there policy includes a NO REFUND NO MATTER WHAT policy. YOUR STUCK with them until the end of your elected subscription regardless of cancelling subscription. So I‚Äôm out of 1yr fee for 2days of use with this app. Do yourself a favor and subscribe to 1month if you want to test it! At least your stuck with them for one month as opposed to 1yr! Hopefully the subscription really terms April 2021!

title: Tremendous help to lose weight
body: I have worked out for many years, but those years I driving blindly in my road to lose.  I needed a calorie tracker to track my energy consumption and the release of that energy.  This app does that.

title: Easy
body: The app is easy to use. One be as detailed or as bare bones as desired. I like that it has a community platform for encouragement and it is not a monthly fee. Probably the best thing is the reasonable cost plus the effectiveness of the program when used. I like be Lose It!

title: So easy to use!
body: I love the scan barcode feature. If they could add spell check suggestions when you do a search it would be perfect! Also the premium has quick, easy recipes that work and taste good! Kudos to the dietitians!!

title: Far exceeds the competition!
body: I used the other more popular app for many years. It became glitchy and time consuming to use. I tried this and was surprised! User friendly, organized, detailed, and many unique features!!!

title: Could be 5 star, but..
body: I really wish you could enter the exercise in reps and sets as well as minutes. So far, everything else is very user friendly. I‚Äôm still in my first week, so I will be interested in seeing the predictions/ goals that will create after week one. ü§ûüèª Consider the reps and sets! Thanks.

title: Easy to use and it works!!
body: Love this app. I was considering using another program but for the price of this and how easy it is, I had to try it. Started it 2 weeks ago and I‚Äôm down 8 lbs. the food database is excellent! You won‚Äôt retreat trying this app.

title: I use this everyday
body: Very happy to have this . If you are disciplined and honest to yourself you register everything you put in your mouth correctly, deduct your exercise you do and it will show you what you do right and what you do wrong . I love using it.

title: Great App!!
body: My doctor has wanted me to lose weight for the past few years, telling me I was pre-diabetic.  Both my wife and I have used for the past 6 months and I‚Äôve dropped over 30 lbs. and she‚Äôs lost over 40!  Gotta stay with it, though.

title: Keeping track works
body: Keeping track of what you eat really works. This is an easy app to handle that. But you must be consistent with logging everything you eat and your exercise. You will see results.

title: Missing two things from my move from myfitnesspal
body: I love that this app makes use of Siri Shortcuts! I do really miss two features from myfitnesspal though. MFP sends more data types to Apple Health and also allows users to import recipes from websites. I hope these are on the list for Loose It down the line...

title: Can‚Äôt upload progress pictures
body: I like all the features of the app and how extensive the food database is. Got the premium version and tracking water is so cool too. I would like to be able to upload pictures of my journey too. The visual is so important to document and motivate progress!! Can we add that feature to the app please, Lose It team?

title: Calorie information is sometimes wrong
body: So, after I paid for the premium version, I noticed that some of the information in the database is just plain wrong. I like the tracker‚Äîit‚Äôs easy to use‚Äîbut the inclusion of users‚Äô foods without any screening for accuracy is a huge flaw.
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Fantastic tracker!
body: I‚Äôm just using the free version and it‚Äôs amazing to learn what actual portion sizes are and how energy dense certain foods are. Been working out and calorie tracking for two weeks and I‚Äôm already down 6lbs past the initial water weight. Awesome app to pair with Apple Watch too!

title: Have used for years
body: This is the app I love to use to keep track of my weight. I have used it for about 4 or 5 years now and I love how I have a years-long record without having to pay extra or do anything special.

title: Live saver
body: I absolutely love this app! It has really helped me keep track of what I‚Äôm eating and has opened my eyes about the quality of the foods you put into your body! This combined with healthy eating and the gym and I‚Äôve already lost almost 10 lbs in 2 weeks! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!

title: Frustrated with this subscription
body: The application became to bothersome to use after several weeks. I had already upgraded to the premium subscription and what a waste of money. Not to mention the fact I canceled last year through the several steps I had to follow to find out that this year I was charged again in my annual subscription!!! Looks like they never canceled it! What a joke! So frustrating!! So yet again I canceled, let‚Äôs see if this time it sticks.

title: Not working
body: I‚Äôve had this app for a while and decided to start using it today. Everything was going fine until I tried to scan the barcode on my food. It keeps saying ‚ÄúError Finding Food. This feature requires a network connection. Please check that you are connected to a network and try again.‚Äù I‚Äôm on my home WiFi so how am I not connected. I will be deleting the app and using the other one I was using in adjacent to this one.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: AirDrop Sharing not working
body: Just switched over to LoseIt from MFP and am really enjoying the app.  Unfortunately, AirDrop sharing appears to be completely broken.  The AirDrop works, app opens and displays the foods, but then when you click Add nothing is added to any meal.  Seems like the last import step is completely broken.  Hopefully this gets fixed soon!
response: So sorry for the trouble here. We expect this to be working normally now. Please update your app to the latest version, and if you are still experiencing any issues, contact us via loseit.live/help.

title: This really helped me lose weight
body: When I found this app I was struggling with my weight; the biggest in my life. A few months later I‚Äôm 35 lbs lighter. The app made me conscience of what eat bite and physical activity was worth to my body. Trimming Calories became a game that I wanted to win thanks to this app.

title: This is IT!!!
body: I started using this app yesterday and I am IN LOVE with this app. Easy to use (and believe me cause for me is too much to say); practical; encouraging, simple, accurate... ‚ò∫Ô∏èI mean  üëçüèºüëèüèΩthe number‚òùüèºApp that does it all, üòèbut loose YOUR weight. Stick with this app and you will have the helper you need!!

title: LOVE THIS APP!
body: I never thought I would enjoy measuring and recording my food. I love this app! It really helps you see the whole picture of what your needs are patterns foods that cause the weight loss. I used the free app for 2 days then bought premium. The weight is dropping nicely!

title: Review
body: I love the app. I wish you would allow users to customize their week you only allow Monday as your week beginning day. I also wish you would have a better weight log / interface

title: It‚Äôs fun
body: It makes you motivated and makes working out fun, because it tells you how much calories you are losing and have left to eat so its like the more you work out the more you can eat! It‚Äôs a reward based weight loss system

title: Great app
body: This app has been very helpful for counting calories, and has helped me lose 10 lbs so far. However, I wish it would let you see insights with a membership. Seems like most of the important info is for paying members only. Other than that, I

title: Changed my life!!!
body: Since Lose It ...I am in control...I love that!! This is the best app on the market... when ever I went off the rails ....Lose it got me back on track....!!  Much better than a workout buddy,.!! The articles have helped me as well.. Thank you Lose it !!

title: wish one thing was different
body: I love this app, however I wish that we could enter more specific weights. Instead of whole numbers, we should be able to enter .5 and maybe even more specific decimals.

title: Better Approach
body: It‚Äôs easy to count the calories, plan ahead, be motivated, and best of all, lose the pounds.  My son uses this. He‚Äôs a bodybuilder. He counts the protein, carbs and fat intake with this easy to use app. In 12 weeks he is shredded, losing fat and having the right amount of protein to pack on the muscle.

title: My Go-To
body: I‚Äôve tried a lot of different free fitness apps... Weight Watchers, My Fitness Pal, FitBit, and many more. This is the only one that I LOVE. I‚Äôve only used the free version, but it allows me to track my food, look at my macro ratios AND grams, as well as track my weight and exercise. It does it all.

title: Your great!
body: Lose it is spectacular !  I tell all those that are looking to ‚Äúlose ‚Äú that it‚Äôs not a diet as it is a food intake monitoring method and much more . Being a member since 2014 ‚Äî yal have improved lose it more and more  . Us out here love the changes keep it up!!!!!

title: Addicted
body: I‚Äôve been using the premium version of Lose It! for just over a year and I don‚Äôt know what I would do without it for a single day. I use everything that the app has to offer and I‚Äôve lost over 135 pounds in one year üòÅ

title: So awesome
body: When I started the app in January of 2017 I weighed 197 pounds, today I am 119. It‚Äôs a great way to track your calories, what you intake and what you burn. It was a pretty strict diet (I picked the 1-2 pound a week plan)but it was exactly what I needed to beat obesity. I have a friend who used it too and she dropped 30 pounds.

title: Successful weight loss
body: Weight loss is not an easy thing to do for most of us , and probably like you, I have tried many types of diets , with some success.

title: Love this app
body: This app keeps me honest! I snap it log it and it reminds me to keep on track. I can‚Äôt forget now I‚Äôm on auto pilot. That was all ways my excuse. I forgot! Not anymore this is so worth it to have gentle guidance and a push without guilt.

title: Current version keeps crashing
body: I love this app normally, but since the most recent update a few days ago, it crashes every time I try to open it, even after I shut off my phone and restarted. Please fix! I love this app and don‚Äôt want to switch to something else!!!

title: Zain‚Äôs mom
body: I never understood why I couldn‚Äôt lose weight as easily as others. I never ‚Äúoverate‚Äù. I started tracking my calories on my App. I never knew the amount of calories that were in foods I considered healthy. It helped me make better choices. I actually eat more now with less calories. Knowledge is power.

title: It‚Äôs up to you
body: The eating green bar moves to the right, your exercises move it back to the left.  You set the perimeters, so it‚Äôs up to you.  45 lbs down; used the program since about 2010 (I think).  It‚Äôs free, so stop complaining about ads...remember the free-lunch bit.

title: Excellent app
body: I have the free version and love it. Lost a few pounds already. It makes tracking food easy. One beef, in an earlier version they tracked my steps automatically. With the latest version, the step tracking is gone. Really, Lose It? You're taking away capabilities to make more money?

title: Great app!
body: I started using Lose It! about a week ago and didn‚Äôt know what to expect. I‚Äôm glad I chose it. It‚Äôs easy to search for food. The exercises are somewhat limited, but you can create your own. Overall, I highly recommend the app.

title: It holds me accountable
body: I like that the app keeps me motivated by tracking food, exercise and weight. It shows me foods that aren‚Äôt worth having due to the high calories or fat content.

title: Love this
body: Although I‚Äôm not as good as I should be, I open up this app a few times a week, to see my weight loss graph which is awesome. I love the exercise section as it helps me see how much more food I can eat (eeks!) or how much better I can be at exercising! Overall it‚Äôs easy and fun to use and sort of see it as a nudge which it great!

title: Great app overall
body: Overall I love this app. My only complaint is that you have to purchase a yearly plan rather than being allowed to go month by month. I don‚Äôt want to be forced to commit to a yearly plan, but I would definitely try out a month.

title: Love it but...
body: Some recommendations to developers:

title: Totally BLACK APP  after update today!
body: After updating LOSE IT APP this morning when I touch on the APP in order to update and track my food, Wright, etc., I can‚Äôt because it‚Äôs totally BLACKED OUT.

title: Where are the Ounce and Gram measurements?
body: For literally everything? We weigh all of our food and there is a whole slew of things that measures in grams on the packaging but the option isn‚Äôt available when you try and input it. Some things do but it‚Äôs so rarely, it‚Äôs become a daily frustration trying to input recipes. I‚Äôm dieting, I need to keep track of things accurately and not just guess how many cups or tablespoons whatever ingredient is. Please make this standard for all items.

title: Great tool
body: It‚Äôs a great tool to keep you up to date on your food and exercise consumption. I eat lot of Mexican food and am able to find Mexican recipes in the food search calorie counter. Which makes it a lot easier to count you calories.

title: Maintaining
body: I love it.  I started this program to lose some weight after gaining some when I broke my right foot & was not allowed to put weight on it for 6 weeks; that was 2 years ago.  Now I use it to maintain my weight & to make sure I am eating a balanced diet.

title: Love it!
body: I have used this app since seeing it on the today show.  I have lost 26 pounds and it is helpful when I travel at avoiding the pitfalls.  The plus is you know your food intake.  The only negative is it does not get my activity steps from my Apple Watch.

title: Nice app for tracking fitness goals
body: This app does a wonderful job helping keep track of calories using a large database of food products and restaurant menu items. But what sets this app apart are the number of options one has for entering portion size.

title: Awesome app
body: This is super easy to use and really keeps you on track. I find myself looking forward to logging food and exercise. Checking the app even when I have nothing to log. Just to check my progress. I love Lose It!!!!

title: It works
body: Lost 50 in 200 days using this app. It's really just a great tool for informing better food and exercise choices. I like the way you can customize the name and calorie distribution targets of different meals. The premium features are worth paying for.

title: Great app
body: I've been using Lose It off and on for years- before MFP came out. I stayed loyal to this app and don't regret it. I recently upgraded to the premium version so I can set macro goals and customize my breaks. I can have up to 6 "meals"  a day that I track. I really like this!

title: So far, great...
body: Massively better than the horrible nutrisystem app....  this one is very easy to find and enter foods, and scans even the nutrisystem foods.... fast, efficient...

title: Motivation
body: Even though I often go over my daily caloric limit, I honestly track my meals, snacks and beverages and believe that I make better choices because of it.

title: Honesty check
body: Best app to lose and maintain weight. I‚Äôve tried so many others and this is the only one that has worked for me.

title: Almost perfect!
body: What it really needs is a way to write up full recipes, with notes and instructions. Also, having fluids automatically add to water goals would be amazing.

title: Great weight loss tool
body: The lose it app is a wonderful way to keep track of goals and to lose weight.  The search and scan tool is wonderful and a big help to track all nutritional information from foods. Thank you.

title: Consistently Awesome
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It on and off since 2012. It‚Äôs simple, intuitive, and consistent.

title: Nice App - Please add Potassium
body: I have used Spark People for years and they allow you to select which micronutrients to track. While the food tracker on this app is superior, I really need to be able to track certain micronutrients, and especially Potassium. It is so important to be able to keep Sodium and Potassium in balance.

title: The BEST app
body: This is the best app. The free version is perfect. It‚Äôs so easy to keep track of your calories and weight. If it wasn‚Äôt for this app, I wouldn‚Äôt have been able to lose weight, keep track of my calories and even know how to count calories!

title: Membership question
body: I love the app. I have lost 34 lbs since March, having never dieted before. I was amazed.

title: Engineers give speedy service!
body: Two days ago I noticed that I could no longer save my weight with a decimal point (100.3 for example). I sent a note to support, got a speedy reply that they were on it and today- voila- it's fixed!  Thank you so much!

title: Love the app but...
body: The new log format that is expanded is terrible! You can‚Äôt get a quick snapshot of your whole day all in one view. Please return the old view or at least make it an option to keep it compressed! Thank you!

title: Suddenly can‚Äôt update weight
body: The last three days I have suddenly been unable to enter my daily weight.  I tried deleting the app and re-downloading and had the same experience.  Other than this issue the app is great, good database of foods, pretty easy to enter a new food or recipe.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work properly
body: The app worked fine until they excepted my payment after the trial period. Then there were technical issues and I have for two days been unable to log my weight (a critical feature of the app!).

title: Best program ever
body: This program changed my life.  Counting calories led me to lose 70 pounds and change every aspect of my health for the better.

title: Seems good
body: Seems good for tracking food. It would be helpful to have it sync with the peloton app or mPaceLine to synchronize promotion ride metrics. As it is when I ride on the peloton bike it just puts it at stationary bike and does not give metrics that are even close to accurate which will greatly affect the calorie intake that I should have each day.

title: Easy to use
body: I find the Lose It app easy to use. I really dislike recording my daily food intake but this is a very simple way to do it. I‚Äôve found that when I record my food I am aware of my calories per day. As a result, I lose weight.

title: Super sluggish performance.
body: I have always loved this app, but have not really used it in there late six months. I just started using again this week and it is suddenly super sluggish. Takes several seconds to load meals or super between macros. And trying to do anything on a future day for planning is painful. Please fix there's performance issues.

title: Great App
body: I really like the Lose It App. I track my meals calories and macronutrients as well as my weight loss progress.

title: Lose it
body: Really like using this app.  The barcode function makes entering food easy and the library is extensive as well.  It also allows you to setup emails on a schedule that fits you to follow your progress.

title: Lose it!
body: I purchased a lifetime membership because Lose it! is the best way for me to think about what I‚Äôm eating and how much exercise I‚Äôm getting. I did get down 15 pounds with ease. It‚Äôs my ‚Äúgo to‚Äù program when I‚Äôm tired of trying something else.

title: Thanks LoseIt!
body: LoseIt App has helped me lose 53 pounds over the course of about a year. Being aware of my calorie intake has been the key to my weight loss. I didn‚Äôt realize how some of my favorite foods were so high in calories until I started using the app. Thanks LoseIt!

title: Love Losing Weight
body: Losing weight on this app is great can't wait to upgrade to premium. Plus your in control of everything you eat the results are tremendous ,just keep at it and before you realize it you‚Äôll be eating like a genius.

title: Getting less with each update
body: Used to like it. Not love it since if you want to track water it‚Äôs a premium feature. Now it no longer syncs with my fitness app unless I upgrade to the premium program. Also getting tired off the upsell every time I open the app to enter a food. I did have premium‚Äîit wasn‚Äôt worth it so I canceled it.

title: Lose It Really Works
body: If you use this app faithfully it really works! I have lost 55 pounds using Lose It!! It took a year but losing it slowly is the healthiest way to lose weight, it helps establish good habits, shrinks your stomach so you don‚Äôt get as hungry, and I feel great!!!!!!

title: Nicely done
body: The only reason I‚Äôm not rating this at 5 Stars is that I‚Äôm not a fan of AUTOMATIC subscription renewals. I‚Äôd be more likely to upgrade to premium for a year if the subscription didn‚Äôt automatically renew. That‚Äôs just me though, and regardless, the free app covers all the bases for aiding in a basic weight loss program. Great app overall.

title: Accountability
body: This is one of the best accountability tools I have ever used.  I have lost over 12 pounds in the last5 months and am more conscious of eating a healthier diet not ward off diabetes.  I was diagnosed as a pre-diabetic last year.  My blood pressure has come down so that I am off one of my

title: Success
body: I have been using this app for more than 200 days and am pleased with the success it has helped me to achieve. I feel better,  am more comfortable and energetic.  It‚Äôs a great tool for a healthy lifestyle and weight loss.  The app was recommended to me by my medical provider.

title: Lost it
body: This program has helped me lose 25 lbs. in about 3 months. Its easy to use, and has made me accountable for what goes in my stomach. And, I am able to track not only the calories but the kind of calories, amount of exercise, etc.

title: Update a Great Application To Death
body: This is a great application that helped me lose over 80 lbs over several years.  I continue to use it to help me keep off the weight.  The problem is they have updated it to the point that it is slow and buggy.  They need to get it back to the great product it was.  If not I am sadly going to have to move on to another product after it did so much for me!
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Multi- Featured, Easy to use
body: Been using Loseit for years now off and on.  Easy to leave it when not needed and quickly come back to it to lose a few pounds when needed.  One of my all time favorite apps all around.

title: Even paying is way basic
body: Does grade foods... TOO MANY FOODS are incorrect and with no data and extreme amount of duplication! I miss calorie count app! It was way better! You can‚Äôt even use the same meal for the next day if you had the same exact thing you have to re-log it instead of just clicking to use the next day! No good alerts. I wasted my money.

title: Great Accountability Helper
body: I love using this app, as it is a tool to hold myself accountable for my weight loss journey. I love the recipe ideas, I love the challenges and how truly easy it is to track my eating. I would recommend this for anyone looking for help to begin your weight loss/healthy lifestyle journey.

title: Great for budgeting calories
body: Easy to look up foods or add exercises. Love that it allows me to budget for the week as well. So if I go over a little on one day, I don‚Äôt feel so defeated and can make it back up in the coming days and stay on target for the week.

title: Still freezes
body: When inputting a good and moving from search to meals.  I have premium but it was the same in the free version.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Great App
body: This app helps keep you focused on what your food intake is throughout your day. No matter if your tracking your calories or carbs, which is what I am doing since I am diabetic. It doesn‚Äôt have everything but you enter the item yourself.

title: Keeps me on track
body: I love using Lose It because it keeps me focused and aware of my diet & fitness goals. With the App I am more accountable to what I eat, how much Water I drink and the overall macronutrient breakdown for my body. Before this I was just guessing and I was off by far.

title: I love it!!!!!!
body: Can‚Äôt express how much I love this app. I highly recommend it, if they ever delete this app I‚Äôd be in so much trouble. It really helps me loose weight for some odd reason and it‚Äôs really hard for me to do it without the app so I just need it so much and glad it was created. üòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉü•∞

title: Success the first week.
body: Has helped me to stay on track and focused.  It is so easy to use and log in information.  Takes all the guess work out of counting calories.  May try premium Lose it later.

title: Free is good for me
body: Been using the free version for a month.  Can‚Äôt complain at all.  Easy to find foods and I‚Äôm only using it for nutrient value which is easy in the free version.  I‚Äôve been doing keto for 2 months and this helps keep track of my fat and net carbs with ease.

title: Glitchy
body: I‚Äôve used lose it for the last 7-8 years and it‚Äôs so much worse than it used to be. The ‚Äúupdate‚Äù function that should happen irregularly is a pretty consistent feature when I log on in the morning. The barcode scanner either doesn‚Äôt register the barcode or inputs food incorrectly. And the pop ups for Lose It Premium are constant. I‚Äôm no longer impressed with the product and will likely switch to another soon.

title: Keeping up with the food i eat!
body: Lose it has allowed me to easily keep up with what i eat which has helped me maintain the weight that i have lost for several years. Before Lose it, i would always gain it back! Thanks!

title: Keeps me on track
body: Lose It helps me to stay on track!  Also I love the huge database of food items contributed by everyone using this app.  And that we can easily add foods, and all their stats, not listed just by scanning it‚Äôs barcode.

title: Scans everything
body: I like this app better than MyFitnessPal.  Lately it seems like things I scan don't work on MyFitnessPal, but they do work on Lose it, which saves a lot of data entry time.  I also like the interface better.

title: Lose It
body: Great app, takes some getting used to! I wish we could delete foods that were created which have only calories listed with macros as n/a, frustrating to those of us tracking macros.

title: üíú
body: I really like using this app for weight loss and to check nutrition for weight maintenance.   I‚Äôve used other apps in the past-no shade-but this is the only one that works best for me.  I just üíú everything from food icons to ease of planning to nutritional input.

title: Love this app
body: It really helps to have insight into your eating habits . It also makes it much  easier to keep track of calories to help you lose weight.  It takes out all the guessing and really makes a difference.  Love it .!

title: This used to be a good app
body: ‚ÄúThis is a one time operation‚Äù my foot. Used to happen once a week or so. Then once a day. Now it happens almost every time I open the app. It‚Äôs super annoying. I‚Äôm pretty sure the updates are mainly to change what ad promotion you see, so the user experiences a delay for the update and then a delay to dismiss the ad. The user experience is now really irritating. Ruined what used to be a simple, effective and amazing app.

title: Ease of use
body: The foods are easy to scan or find. Equivalencies for homemade entrees are easier than listing ingredients tediously.  In the long run this is more doable. Portion and serving sizes can be dialed easily. I have had some difficulties that I cannot now recall but overall this is a positive experience.

title: Amazing
body: I love this app. Helps keep track of your calories and much more. You can scan the barcode of what ever you are going to eat and the quantity. This is the only app i have liked since I have tried many others.

title: Great app!
body: My husband and I have both been using this app to watch our calorie intake.

title: Rip off!
body: I upgraded to premium. Received email from Apple confirming payment & premium subscription to Lose It. Lose It app says error occurred with transaction -won‚Äôt recognize the upgrade. Contacted Lose It support yesterday. No word from them.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: Very pleased
body: The app is easy to use, reminders are very helpful and being on my phone is a real plus.  I have lost over 3 lbs in two weeks eating regular stuff no crazy pills or special foods just writing everything down and counting calories.

title: I love it!
body: Really helps accountability when it comes to showing yourself what you have eaten. And has the tech to scan food so you don‚Äôt have to find it, but if you did need to search for the exact food, they have it!

title: Time will tell but pleased!
body: This is my husband‚Äôs and my first week of logging, but so far we are pleased with the app. Very user-friendly. Caution: some food selections only track calories so be mindful of whether the macronutrients are also logged. Just upgraded to premium and excited to explore more!

title: Pam
body: Tracking the small stuff has made all the difference! I love chocolate and snacking. Both deadly to my waistline and my HgbA1c. The processes of recording my binge snacking and that extra glass of wine now and again has made me more mindful of my calorie intake... Its all good, I‚Äôve lost ten pounds, 10 more to go!

title: Great weight loss and fitness app
body: I love this app and would have given it five stars if it didn‚Äôt keep needing to reboot every couple weeks and say this was a one time process and go through this long restart. I love that it has brand name and restaurant food to make it easy to keep track of calories.

title: I get it
body: Great app for tracking food. A good data base for almost everything at home and eating out. Very user friendly and easy to use. I would give higher rating if it wasn‚Äôt for the incessant amount of daily ads asking to up grade.

title: You'll reach your goal... never
body: Have used this app off and on since 2010.

title: What happened????
body: I haven‚Äôt used this app in almost a year but my how it‚Äôs changed.  It used to be so easy and no stupid ads that pop up. You used to be able to add multiple foods at a time and now can‚Äôt. You also used to be able to paste recipes links and it would auto load the ingredients, but that gone too. I had to delete this app and will find a better one. So disappointed.

title: Best weight tracking app out there
body: I‚Äôve tried quite a few apps and this app kills them all. Great work on it guys! Helped me lose weight more than once. Helped me track goals. Helped with joining challenges and setting my bars higher.

title: Disappointed
body: I did use Lose it in the past and really loved it, very user friendly and, above all, I could link my Fitbit! Today, I started using Lose it again, and disappointment: you must have Premium to get your Fitbit linked. That‚Äôs why I only put 3 stars. I am going to look for another app which doesn‚Äôt oblige me to pay to use both.

title: Really great app
body: App is super cheap and is worth the 30 bucks cause if you follow it and join the challenges you lose weight and it tells you when you will hit your goal weight mines is December 2018 and I lost 12 lbs so far so it‚Äôs definitely working

title: Best app ever!
body: I have been using this app for over 2 years and I have lost 40 lbs! I don‚Äôt think I could of done it without the app! I walk 4 miles a day and track my calories using it and wow what a change it had made in my life! I absolutely love it!!!!

title: Unable to switch to premium
body: I‚Äôm unable to switch to premium it keeps telling me an error occurred not sure what‚Äôs going on all my other apps work just fine. Anyway I love this app just wish I can do more at this point.

title: Ok interaction with Apple health
body: I use Apple health to manage everything. This app is great with sending over all the food data. Protein, carbs exe. Only think I don‚Äôt like is water data does not go over to health app. I need to use a different app to integrate my water. I returned premium. Free version awesome!

title: It works!
body: Lose It! Is perfect for our needs. My husband has lost over 75 lbs in just six months and I have lost more than 30 lbs. in a little less time. We credit Lose It! for making us aware of what we are consuming and for helping us make better choices.

title: Helpful app, annoying add
body: Love the database and the tracking it‚Äôs worked very well. However I find it rather annoying that seemingly every single time I open the app I get an add pop up trying to subscribe to the premium app features.

title: Super helpful app (at least for me)
body: It may seem tedious to write down everything you eat, but it also gives you a piece of mind.  This app helped me reevaluate what a real portion is and whether or not a certain food item is worth the calories.

title: A great tool
body: If you‚Äôre looking for an app that tracks what you eat, how you exercise, and easily gets you involved with other people working toward a similar goal (if you want to) then this app is for you.

title: LoseIt Review
body: Works so well. Makes me honest. When I use I lose weight. The barcode scanner inserts the food product in my personal food database! Excellent product.

title: A key to meeting your weight loss goals
body: I‚Äôve used Lose It off and on for years. If I stop tracking what I eat, I put in a few pounds. I fire up Lose It again and get back to my goal weight. I recommend this app the my weight loss clients.

title: Gone
body: This was one of the best apps I've ever had. I've lost 30 pounds with it. And then one day - Bam! - it's gone, nothing but a blank screen, and there seems to be no way to get it back. So we go from 5 stars to 1. Come on, people, can't we fix this?

title: It‚Äôs working for me!
body: Love how easy it is to log meals with easy access to comparable meals for the calorie count on the app.  Was struggling with the last 11 pounds and now I lost 3 of them in 2 weeks.  Lose it helps me find nutrition dense low calorie foods and I never feel hungry!

title: Lose It! is the best!
body: Lose It! is the best application if you are trying to lose weight. I recommend upgrading to the pay option because it allows you to track EVERYTHING! Food, micronutrients, water intake, you name it. I love it üòä

title: Very helpful program
body: I use LoseIt to keep track of my carbs and sugar intake to control my diabetes , and to lose weight and keep it off.  This program makes it very easy too keep track of my diabetes and weight issues.

title: Success
body: I just started using this app a week ago and I absolutely love it. It keeps me accountable and even helps with my portion control. I‚Äôve lost 2lbs in a week and a half. I still have a ways to go but this is so much easier then diet shakes or skipping meals.

title: Great app but having some issues
body: I love this app but since the recent update I‚Äôm unable to you use the search function. Not sure what‚Äôs going on but this is making it extremely hard to use.

title: right
body: Great app I‚Äôve used for a while now and it helps me keep on track of my calories easily.

title: The best app to lose weight
body: I love this app. It gives you every possible food breakdown. If you a San bar on the food chances are it has the nutritional information stored. The groups you can join are really supportive. I wouldn‚Äôt use anything else.

title: Change it back
body: Really tired of apps that have big UI changes without giving us an option. The new layout displays significantly less information on screen. I now have to scroll and there is a lot of wasted space. I am a premium member and so glad I haven‚Äôt purchased the lifetime subscription. I might stop using this.

title: Double Counting and Terrible Customer Service
body: It used to be great and I used it every day - now it doesn‚Äôt work and there is no fix!!!
response: Apologies for the trouble here! Our engineers are aware of this issue and working on a fix. It'll be out in an upcoming release.

title: Amazing App!
body: This app helped me lose a lot of weight and I‚Äôm still using it! I highly recommend to use if you want to keep track of food! You don‚Äôt even have to use it to lose weight, you can just use it!

title: Crashes while loading
body: I love this app and have been using it daily for years. All of a sudden, after working fine earlier today, it now crashes every time I try to open it.

title: Back on Track
body: As a result of my recent weight gain, I have decided to start using the app again while working out and have been successful in losing weight yet again using this App. I look forward to reaching my goal.

title: Calorie tracking made easy
body: I have used this app off and on for a few years.  It is easy to use to track calories and exercise.  Seeing the lost weight is a motivator to keep going. This time I have 410 days straight using it, lost 25 pounds in over a year and kept it off.

title: Love this app
body: I‚Äôve recently started taking my health more seriously. I‚Äôve been logging my food and working out consistently for over a month now. Sometimes logging seems tedious and cumbersome, but the insight and results are worth it.

title: My favorite App!
body: If you want to lose weight and keep it off - this is the BEST way to do it. There are no fads - just count calories. This makes it easy and fun to do - slow and deliberate way be the race. I have lost 45 pounds and kept it off for 2 years.

title: Best of the best
body: I used MFP and LiveStrong‚Äôs apps for years. When I found Lose It, I knew immediately I‚Äôd been missing out. Although the core functions are relatively the same, Lose It is in a league of its own. Also, the premium is actually worth it.

title: Great help!
body: I have lost over 30 pounds with this program that has helped learn how much food I need to eat. It is easy to use and provides just enough encouragement. I really liked the comment when I reached 20 pounds lost - I had lost the weight of 2 cats.

title: Helps Tremendously!
body: This app really helps me to track calories!  It‚Äôs easy to input what I ate - the database is thorough and the barcode is perfect. It helps that I see how many calories are left for the day as the day progresses.  I watch my intake, log my water and see results!

title: First Diet
body: I‚Äôve never been on a diet before. I‚Äôm a 55 year old retired Marine. I wanted to lose 8 lbs and this app has been great, as it had a tool that translated my goal into a calorie budget and an easy way to track my progress. It‚Äôs working already, I‚Äôve lost 4 lbs so far.

title: Love this app!
body: I‚Äôve tried others but this is my perfect fit. Lost 10 pounds already. [Update: 19 pounds lost.  It‚Äôs strength is the option for a slow start which brings calories down slowly and gently so you learn to adapt and make better decisions.]

title: Love this app!
body: I have been using this app for a few years, and I love it! It links with my Fitbit and the Fitbit Aria scale which makes tracking my calories and weight super easy. Can not say enough great things about it! Highly, highly recommend it!!

title: Affordable
body: Lose It has all the perks of much more expensive plans. User friendly, convenient. My first year is about to expire and I renewed my membership. I lost the weight. I am keeping it for times I wander and need to get back on track.

title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON PREMIUM
body: Useful little app, however I fell for the ‚Äúpair with your Fitbit‚Äù Premium access only to discover it offers nothing more than your Fitbit app already does. Plus it doesn‚Äôt sync properly or have consistent data as your Fitbit. Different goals, calorie allotment, etc. Also don‚Äôt bother requesting a refund, you won‚Äôt get it. Most apps give you a trial period. I should have known this was a ripoff when I saw they didn‚Äôt offer a trial. Oh well, enjoy my $40 you snakes!

title: It woke me up !
body: I had no idea how many calories I was eating everyday till I could actually see them for myself. This guide really helps with keeping your weight down just follow the calorie guide they give you and your weight will melt off.  Very satisfied ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Always There!
body: I‚Äôve lost 30 lbs over the past few years. It‚Äôs been a bumpy ride and I couldn‚Äôt have done it without the support that Lose It provides in so many ways. Thanks for being there for me, Lose It!

title: Best app
body: Seriously, the best app for tracking. The scan food feature makes tracking calories painless. Tons of foods listed, has helped me lose weight and maintain.  Also helps me get back on track when I‚Äôve gotten careless.

title: Best Thing for Weight Loss
body: This is the best app I have found to monitor my weight loss and to watch my carb intake.  I have lost 34 pounds over a period of 4 months and my blood sugar level has gone from 165 to 130 as of today.  I am no long on 1,000mg of Metformin/day.

title: Works fine.
body: Could be better if took into account the following: intermittent fasting, allow for indicate eating out, and better account for Keto approach. And find erroneous food entries. Sometimes just locks up.

title: Bug in the latest versions
body: I love the app, but on the rare occasion sometimes officially-verified food like coca-cola or pepperoni pizza will clock at 0 calories, which then makes it bug out and unable to log this food item at more than zero calories.

title: I‚Äôm losin‚Äô it!!
body: Literally this is the first time I have lost weight since I hit my forties. Never realized just how much calories I consumed before. Now, it‚Äôs all about portion control. I still eat whatever I want, just not as much. This app has been extremely helpful!!

title: Love it!
body: I just started this so it might be a little premature to say I love it. I‚Äôm 57 and 40 lbs overweight. This app is easy to use and it connects with my phones health app. I‚Äôm doing ok!!  I‚Äôve already lost 3 lbs and I expect to see what I need to change. Spend the extra money it‚Äôs worth it.

title: -20lbs !!!
body: Tracked my calories with Lose It and lost 20+ pounds! It helped me understand the food I was eating and how it affects my body. Just up graded to Premium and ready to lose the last 10, which for me has been rough. Now I‚Äôm tracking my macros üòç... Thanks Lose It!

title: Good App
body: I enjoy using this app. It has helped me tremendously and the only thing I don‚Äôt like about it is having to pay for the extra units and I think it‚Äôs a little expensive. But with what the free app offers it is very helpful and works if you follow it

title: Dr. Recommended
body: My doctor uses and recommended this app to me in 2016. What a motivational and eye opening application. I truly recommend this app to anyone who thinks they can't lose or maintain the weight... Because with lose it -if I can most definitely anyone can.

title: Basic app works!
body: I have only been using the app for 2 weeks but it‚Äôs easy to use and it records my exercise automatically thru the Runkeeper app and Apple Health app.  I also like how you can scan barcodes of your food and adjust portion sizes.

title: Tracking Food is What Works for Me
body: This is a great tool that I have used to lose weight. When I use it, it works. I suggest setting a goal of 1 pound per week, as I have been more successful in sticking with it when the calorie count is not too restrictive.

title: Love this app
body: I love the simplicity and use of this app. I have a premium membership that lets me login my food in advance. It‚Äôs easy to keep track of my weight, water intake, exercises, and my calories. I‚Äôve met lots of nice people here they give lots of good support, all stuff I need to LoseIt!

title: Paid version not good value
body: I tried, I really tried. For logging calories it does it's job. But I feel like I was duped into paying $40 to "unlock all these great features" but the workouts are totally worthless (read WORTHLESS, seriously Instagram accounts do better) and all those features in the paid version are way more glitchy. I don't remember the free version bring glitchy at all. Sooo disappointed

title: Good But
body: I use Loose It for the Food Diary recording my food intake.  I am a Home Economist and have used a Food Diary as a primary medium for weight controll.  The constant advertising to bump to premium is a pain.  The foods contained are quite adequate. I have not had to substitute as I often had in other programs.

title: Won‚Äôt let me family share the premium!
body: My family does family sharing on the iPhone and i have tried every thing to get it to share (my mom has lose it premium and I want it so I can do the macro nutrient log) it will not share the premium. Now I have to go to fitness pal but now I can‚Äôt share this experience with my mom because we will have different wight tracking apps. Total bummer! If anyone can help that be great or I‚Äôm going to drop lose it.
response: Unfortunately, family sharing doesn't apply to in-app purchases such as subscriptions. More information here on what Apple shares across family sharing: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT203046 If you have any other questions please let us know.

title: Awesome
body: Good app just needs a place to log meditations and make free notes

title: Bad at tracking net carbs
body: I‚Äôve always loved this app and it‚Äôs ease of use and finally decided to pay extra so I can track my net carbs.. well, it was a waste of money since it‚Äôs terrible at tracking NET carbs. And impossible to find contact information.
response: So sorry for the confusion here! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can assist with this.

title: App
body: I went through the app seems cool. Just don‚Äôt want to be involved as a member right now. I believe the account is on a trial. I tried to find where to cancel it but couldn‚Äôt find that option anywhere. I don‚Äôt want to get charged

title: Everything is locked.
body: I downloaded the app because I grew tired of MyFitnessPal. However I need to keep track of my daily protein. While I like that I can connect my Apple Watch I really dislike the ‚Äúpremium‚Äù feature to check my protein. I will be deleting this app and searching for a free app that does not strong hold my input in efforts to make me pay more for premium. I don‚Äôt object to paying, I just want to know what I‚Äôm paying for. I learned my lesson after paying so much for MFP.

title: It‚Äôs intuitive & easy to use
body: I like the app well enough but there are other FREE ones out there that allow you to log your water.  In order to do it on this one, you have to pay for the premium service which seems ridiculous. That‚Äôs why I only gave it 4 stars.

title: Not worth the premium subscription price.
body: Tried unsuccessfully to end premium subscription before annual charges. Unable to do so. ITunes directed me to the vendor, Lose It directed me to iTunes. Although customer service was friendly, they are not very empowered to help. No responsibility from vendor left me with a bad experience overall. Seriously, the app is not worth the $30. I would have been more generous with my rating if it was under $20. Also, not comfortable with the privacy terms.

title: Fantastic app!
body: This apps free version is good but the upgraded version is even better. You can track everything . I like that you can scan barcodes. It also works to track all kinds of foods: restaurants, pre-packaged diet food, etc.

title: Exactly what I was looking for!
body: I‚Äôm really enjoying this app! I‚Äôve tried using MyFitnessPal to log keto/low carb before but I need to see net carb. No complaints here, easy to use, syncs well with other devices, scanner for food hasn‚Äôt let me down once yet either.

title: Lose weight with this one
body: My first diet and I have to say the app has made it easier than I expected. Easy to use and I would recommend it to anyone interested in losing without feeling deprived. If you know how many calories something is you gauge what you eat better.

title: User friendly
body: I used myfitness pal for years and overall found it just ‚Äúokay‚Äù and couldn‚Äôt always find the accurate entries I was looking for. This app is so much more visually appealing and SO much faster at finding your items!!! Very pleased!

title: Great!
body: I love how I can track things offline so easily compared to other apps (I fly a lot working for the airline and don‚Äôt always have internet) but I wish it was more social and the website was more user friendly

title: Motivating and fun!!
body: It is so easy to log your foods during the day, which helps  me see the changes I need to make to reach my goals. I just synched up my Fitbit with the Lose It app. Anxious to see how it will help motivate me as well. Reminding myself... I am worth the time and effort!!

title: Definitely helps
body: The app helps to keep me on track.  My only complaint is it‚Äôs hard to find out calories for an item that hasn‚Äôt been eaten yet. I do like the variety of products it does contain‚Äîeven new items

title: Endless add, never ending offers

I‚Äôve been tempted to sign up, essentially to pay a protection racket $4 a month so I don‚Äôt have to keep clicking ‚Äúno.‚Äù  But I‚Äôm sure if I do so there‚Äôs gonna be another super premium status these guys will have hiding to hustle me for more.  It‚Äôs ‚Äòturtles‚Äô all the way down.

title: Missing just a couple of key features
body: LoseIt is integral To my fitness regimen and it‚Äôs not too strong a statement to say I couldn‚Äôt maintain my weight without it. Would love an option for friends to see and copy each other‚Äôs meals. Also, showing iron as a nutrient to track would be good. These are quibbles.

title: Personal Trainer.
body: This app gets all the credit for guiding me back into shape. When I use it, I lose it. When I get lazy and don‚Äôt record my calories and exercise bad things happen.

title: The best
body: This has everything you could need to track progress. Along with challenges to keep you going. I've tried many other apps and this is by far the best for weight loss.

title: Finally
body: Finally loosing wait for the first time in 7 years! It‚Äôs great to have personal accountability and total flexibility round the clock. Not only am I loosing lbs, but I am eating better and making better choices due to this apps clear cut yet non-pushy format.

title: Easy to track
body: This app makes tracking very easy. It keeps A list of your foods and you can enter your goals and track your weight. I do not have the premium but I am satisfied with the basic app.

title: Comparison
body: Compared to the Weight Watchers online app  the Lose It app is much easier to use and certainly less expensive. I immediately cancelled Weight Watchers and have been using this app ever since. I have recommended it to friends.

title: Lose it
body: I went to this app because I have a lot of friends on my fitness pal. I failed losing weight in the past and didn‚Äôt want them to see it again.  This app is ok very basic have to pay for anything extra. I also can not connect my fitbit to it. Not sure why because it says it‚Äôs compatible. It‚Äôs serving it purpose.

title: Feedback in real time
body: Lose it app is so effective. Best tool I have ever used. I am on track to exceed my goals because of it. Easy to use, entering foods and quantities goes so fast I have no problem being consistent with it. Highly recommend it.

title: Great when it works
body: I love this app when it works, however twice in the last 3 days all I get is the yellow and orange screen when I open the app go try to log food. I‚Äôve been debating going the full upgrade but will not as long as these issues continue. Reinstalling fixes it but it‚Äôs an unnecessary problem! Please fix

title: Dead on accurate
body: Good app. Helped me open my eyes to how many calories I was taking in and has helped me to lose over 20 pounds in 10 weeks. No special diet, just haven't been eating as much and exercising. If I can do it anyone can! Recommend.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! I‚Äôve lost my weight with this

title: A Great Help

title: Great app
body: As with most successes losing weight takes diligence and hard work. Lose It helps you keep on track and remind you half of the journey happens in the kitchen. Love it, slow success after many months.

title: Easy and motivating

title: Great tracker
body: Best food tracker app I‚Äôve used. Easy to use and easy to customize. I do have one request, I wish they would add a place where I can take progress photos of my progress then I wouldn‚Äôt have to use a different app.

title: Love it
body: Love being able to scan the items easy and fun to use. Really help putting into perspective. Even making your own recipes, food tracker. It just keeps getting better. Thanks lose it!

title: Weight loss after Covid
body: I used this apt in the past and it was very helpful for weight loss and maintenance.

title: Great app
body: I found it‚Äôs the easiest way to record food, because the library of foods is so big, bigger than other apps I‚Äôve tried.   But it doesn‚Äôt record my steps.  At least I haven‚Äôt figured out how to sync it.

title: Best weight loss app
body: The app is intuitive and easy to integrate into a busy life. I have been recording everything I eat without much of a time drain. I track several goals and it has been instrumental to my loss of 40 plus lbs :)

title: Great App but NEEDS A FIX
body: This is a good app to track your food. The data base of food is good. However after the last update the icons at the bottom of the screen are not visible ‚Äî the Home button, the Goals button etc. Becsuse I remember where they were I can tap and get there. BUT THIS NEEDS TO BE FIXED.

title: Weight loss tracker
body: I‚Äôve been able to finally move the needle on weight loss.

title: 5 Stars! Recommend!
body: I use the free version of this app and it‚Äôs been absolutely amazing. I‚Äôve lost 23 pounds in 50 days by tracking my calories and following the activity level on the app. Love it and recommend it to everyone I can!

title: Great app!
body: Ok so this app is awesome I just wish there was more free stuff without having to upgrade but I also wish that you could count in the calories you naturally burn throughout the day. But all in all this is an amazing app and I totally recommend! üëçüòÅ

title: A good start
body: This app is a wonderful start to get your feet in the water however the weight loss ‚Äúestimation‚Äù after every log is always very off. Same with the estimations of ones BMR. This app also tends to glitch a lot especially with numbers. I find my weight being changed consistently throughout the day, ie: I‚Äôll weigh in at 187.3 and It will reset me to to 193.

title: Liked old version better
body: Before the update you could go back in the graph and actually see the previous weight. Now the lines are all blurry and it‚Äôs not possible anymore to ‚Äúgo back in time‚Äù. I liked the old version much more.

title: Barb1milam

title: Oh, where to begin...
body: This app is extremely slow in execution, very often fails to scan food barcodes correctly or at all, has inappropriate units for many foods, and is constantly reminding you to upgrade. I‚Äôve also read the company sells your personal information, which would explain why I now receive at least one junk email each and every day since setting up the app. I do not recommend this app at all.
response: Sorry for the trouble here. Can you please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can look into some of these issues?

title: Best Weight Loss App!!

title: Lost over 40lbs using app but deleting now

So I kept it on my devices but I can‚Äôt anymore. I‚Äôm removing it. I understand developers have to make money but if you‚Äôre gonna make the free version unusable then don‚Äôt offer it free. Thanks again for the good time and good luck going forward.

title: Great but...

title: Great app

title: Disappointed
body: I have used this app off and on for many years. I have paid sometimes but currently I do not. I don‚Äôt mind the adds usually but today has been full of ads for fast food. To me it seems hypocritical  for a site to ‚Äúencourage‚Äù a healthy lifestyle to use such ads. I will no longer be us no this app.
response: We can block specific ads after they have appeared but unfortunately cannot block them in advance. For this reason, some members may see undesirable ads when they appear. We appreciate the report, and we will continue to try our best to block ads that could be distasteful or unhelpful.

body: Overall, this app is okay, but I have a problem with their ‚Äúverified‚Äù information on foods that are logged.
