body: This is a great tool to help you lose weight. It‚Äôs easy to log your food, but you can also monitor macronutrients (protein, carbs, sodium, etc). There‚Äôs also a great social network of others losing weight.

title: Love this app!!!
body: A friend recommended this because she had such success with it!  My goal was to lose a pound a week.  I have been on this for 15 days and have lost 8 pounds!!!!!!  I have learned so much as I never counted calories before.  Thank you, Lose It!!!!!

title: WRONG calorie values listed
body: I thought I was doing good.  First 2 weeks I lost 6#.  I was very vigilant about inputting my foods and drinks.  I would even look up things before I ate/drank them.  Then I gained weight.  WTH!  So I was more cautious and went well under calories....only to discover that your alcohol items listed have the wrong calories on them!!!!!  Why?!  I was seriously committed to using this.  I have over 50 # to lose.  If I cannot trust what is listed in your app I cannot use it.

title: Great App
body: I‚Äôm really enjoying Lose It, it‚Äôs very easy to use and intuitive. My biggest issue is that it doesn‚Äôt connect to my Garmin watch. I don‚Äôt always have my phone with me, and I don‚Äôt think the step counter on my phone is as accurate. Hopefully they‚Äôll add integration with Garmin soon!

title: On Track
body: I did purchase Premium, no regrets.  Love the upc label scanner. Tracks net carbs too!!   It‚Äôs the perfect tool for tracking all kinds of other points.  It depends on what is important to you.  It give great advice on how your or better eating habit effects your weight loss.

title: On point
body: My son recommended this app and I have been using it for two weeks. It is very easy to use and I am down 4 pounds. It has really help me stay on track and knowing I can still eat what I like but at a portion size...

title: LOVE IT
body: This app is amazing! I have yet to eat something that wasn‚Äôt already in the database so it‚Äôs been pretty easy. I‚Äôve checked some things for accuracy (calories/carbs/portions) and so far it‚Äôs been correct!

title: Helps keep me on track
body: Great app for keeping track of everything from how much you are consuming to how long you exercise, clean house or meditate. Definitely a helpful little app.  Most importantly, it‚Äôs easy to use.

title: Love the APP
body: I have used this app consistently for almost 2 years. It is very effective and good. Only drawback is that I would like to be able to update goals with a new weight target, and even with the annual subscription, I cannot do so.

title: Over 50 Pounds Lost and Keeping it Off
body: I started using Lose It! App back on December 27, 2017 and lost over 50 pounds in six months. The great thing is once I lost the weight, I am keeping it off by continuing to use the app daily. I never felt better!

title: Essential!
body: This app should be installed on every new phone. Even if you eat nutritious food, you still need to be aware of your calories and the balance of your macro nutrition... Lose it makes it easy to do all of that!

title: Easy to use
body: Keeps me accountable and syncs w my apple watch seamlessly. I know my calories & steps every day. Lots of foods loaded into the calorie tracker and easy to add my own recipes. I find it a little better than My Fit Pal app and use it now instead.

title: Lose it love it!!
body: I‚Äôm enjoying this new app that my friend introduced me two almost 2weeks ago so far I‚Äôve lost 5.5 pounds just counting calories not even exercising yet! It‚Äôs so simple and amazing all the products that are on there even the restaurants.

title: Success
body: I started my desire to lose weight at 267 lbs. I‚Äôm now at 241 lbs. I owe the success to my weight loss to the Lose It app. It offers a wealth of information, sets calorie budgets that effectively lessened my appetite. Great app. It also calculates when you will hit your goals. Lose It. Love it.

title: Lost 25 pounds
body: As long as you keep your calories around what the app tell you then you will lose weight. Just have to count every little calorie. Takes about 3 to 4 weeks to see results so be patience.

title: Unhealthy
body: While this app does as it says, encourages you to follow a certain diet, it became an unhealthy obsession for me. And this is just for me personally but I want anyone whose thinking about using the app to know this. I don‚Äôt have a great food relationship, I probably try to consume 1,300 calories a day or less. But with this app my ‚Äúdiet setting‚Äù had me at 1,170 a day. I became obsessed with staying under that. I want you to know there is that possibility
response: So sorry for the trouble here. Your calorie budget should not have been set below 1,200 calories/day. Please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can look into this!

title: Easy to use
body: Very easy to track food calories. I have not tried the premium version to unlock all of the extra benefits yet. But using the app just for its easy tracking has me down 15 pounds!

title: Really solid app with minor issues
body: Functionality A+

title: Love this app
body: I have used My Fitness Pal on and off for five years. LoseIt is so much better. Easier to use and works better with Apple Watch. Logging is fast and easy. It is so much I know I will exercise more and lose those 8 pounds fast.

title: Can‚Äôt fail.
body: I had developed my own method of tracking calories and exercises in a spreadsheet several years ago - and it worked. This app is the same concept but several times better.

title: Good for tracking - bad for accuracy
body: These types of apps are good for tracking calories, but if youre not losing weight its not your fault - these apps just "guess" your caloric needs, they dont actually measure your metabolism.  It overestimated mine by almost 700 calories.  How do I know?

title: Perfect for weight loss journey!
body: I love using this app! Because I can scan bar codes on the foods I eat, I get a much better understanding of what and how much I‚Äôm actually consuming. Been using a week and already feeling so much better!

title: Pre-populated data makes logging easy
body: I‚Äôm most likely to log everything I eat when the data is already in the system. Great program.  I like the reminders it sends me to keep me on track.

title: Want to Lose Weight?  Use the Lose It! App
body: If you're serious about losing weight, install the Lose It! app and get to work.

title: Thank you lose it
body: I‚Äôve lost 114 pounds in about 250 days. App is easy to use and really keeps you accountable for your intake of calories . I‚Äôm almost 60 years old and this was the single biggest cheerleader I‚Äôve ever used for weight loss.

title: It works!
body: This app really works.  I‚Äôm almost halfway to my goal of losing 30 lbs, and I‚Äôm no longer overweight- thanks largely to this app.  Nothing else has worked as well for me at solving the seemingly simple problem of burning more calories than you consume.

title: Two weeks in, still pretty sweet
body: I've only been on for two weeks, but it has been great at helping me regulate my food intake and activity log. I don't have a Fitbit or Apple Watch or anything like that so it's nice to know how my hikes, jogs, yard work, yard games and other activities stand up against the foods I eat.

title: This app is fantastic
body: I was up to 324 pounds, which is not something I'm proud of, but thanks to this app I've lost 35 pounds so far and am on my way to lose even more! It really helps me keep track of what I eat and how much I eat, which is a big help!

title: Lose it App really helps!
body: Lose it is forcing me to analyze what I am eating! Nothing is hidden now! I am slowly but surely losing weight. The simplicity of putting the info in the system can‚Äôt be praised enough, the ability to customize is great. üòÄ

title: It works
body: Great aid to losing weight.  Simply stay within your calorie budget.  I found that it helped to make good decisions when heading out to eat. Great database of restaurants and food.  I planned my selections a head of time.  I liked the fact that it syncs with my Fitbit.

title: Love the barcode scanner
body: What a great app! I especially love the barcode scanner which let's you automatically add food just by scanning the food's barcode. This app is so easy to use and now my husband has started to use it too.

title: A great tool to keep in track
body: Lose it is a great tool to keep in track with my goal to lose weight and be healthy. Helps me tracking my meals therefore knowing what‚Äôs best, missing or what to add. So far I went from 236 to 206 pounds in 4 months.

title: Why won‚Äôt this run on my iPhone 8?
body: I‚Äôve used this app since 2013, and have loved it. It is very handy‚Äîit‚Äôs quick to use and the UI is great. But‚Ä¶it always crashes on my current phone. Can‚Äôt get it to stay open for long. Rating would be 5 stars otherwise. üò¢

title: Love lose it!!
body: This app is so easy to use and costs nothing for the basic service.  I have lost over 20 pounds and lose it has made it easy.  Try it, you have nothing to lose, but weight!!

title: Shout out to Steve
body: I‚Äôm a free app user for several years. I reached out when you could no longer enter decimal points for weight. Steve quickly resolved the issue within a short time. Thank you for supporting your fan base!

title: Recent improvements
body: I‚Äôve been using this app off and on for 6 yrs. it was just ok. With new additions- increase in micronutrients tracking and the scanning ability it is awesome.  Better than WW. I‚Äôve started keto and very easy to track!!

title: Great app for losing weight
body: So good! It keeps track of all your calories and tells you how much you‚Äôve burned based on what exercise you have done...it also tells you how much food you can consume each meal... such a great app.

title: 700 cal?
body: Does it‚Äôs job, I guess. However, it put me on a 700 calorie plan. It doesn‚Äôt necessarily encourage restricting, but the pop up saying 700 calories isn‚Äôt recommended, is very very small print and can be easily missed. I had a 400 calorie lunch and a 300 calorie breakfast. And I had no more room left for dinner. This could be very dangerous for someone struggling with restricting and ED. I think a calorie minimum would be helpful, instead of the app recommending I eat 700 calories daily to reach my goal..

title: This app is amazing
body: This amazing app has help me lose weight by opening my eyes to the calories in food. It keeps me on track with food intake. I still have long Way to go but know I‚Äôll get to my desired body with the help of this app.

title: Not sure what‚Äôs going on
body: I love the counting aspect of this app but everyday when I‚Äôm done logging, I click the button on the app and it gives me the date I should be done losing weight by. This day gets pushed back by a day EVERY day even though I‚Äôm staying under my calorie goal every day! Is this a known issue? It‚Äôs really frustrating!
response: Sorry for the confusion here! Please reach out to us at loseit.live/help so we can assist you with this!

title: I always come back to this app
body: I‚Äôve tried some other tracking apps but I just like this one the best. Good graphics, remembers your previous foods and is just all around really easy to use. Scanning foods helps.

title: Very satisfied
body: I decided the only way I was going to get through the holidays was to be aware of what I was mindlessly eating.  This app has helped me control my endless snacking because I was able to see how many empty calories I was eating, I love it!!

body: When using Lose It! to track exercise routine, it doesn‚Äôt match my Wii Fit. For example, if I do 10 minutes of Rhythm Boxing, Wii Fit says I burned 71 calories, but Lose it says I only lost 30 something calories. It‚Äôs not fair

title: It works...
body: With Apple Watch to capture calories burned in workouts, huge feature!!!  So far I‚Äôm loving the ability to count and log calories, it‚Äôs making me think twice before I eat something.

title: Great Calorie Tracker
body: I love this app! It is a great way to bring awareness on how many calories there are in foods. Last year, I tried this app, but I was not really committed to giving up on unhealthy food. This year, I combined cardio and cut back on carbs and the weight is burning right off of me!

title: Does a lot
body: I‚Äôve used Lose It in and off for several years. I was using I to track calories and sometimes exercise. I recently started using it recently to track Macros and there is a LOT more to this app than I realized. I‚Äôm super thrilled with the level

title: Great app
body: This app has a few drawbacks such as the fact that people can upload the calories for an item that they log so you must be careful to know the calories for your items. I love to see my progress and store my recipes and pictures of the food.

title: Love This App

title: Only way to lose for me

title: Excellent for tracking meals
body: I‚Äôve used this Ap for two years and it is effective for monitoring your diet and other related measures. When you see the info on what you are eating, it makes you more conscious of your diet decisions.

title: Great app
body: I love this app! I was able to lose 45 lbs. in 7 months! It‚Äôs great for keeping me accountable to what and how much I‚Äôm putting in my mouth. It gives me balance of healthy Choices and still allows me to have a treat so I don‚Äôt feel like I‚Äôm on a diet.

title: The best food tracking app
body: This app is easy to use and tracks calories, weight, water consumption as well as your macro nutrients. Whatever diet you are following and whatever your fitness goals this app is guaranteed to guide you to achieving them.

title: Fast logging of food weight and h20
body: I switched to this app after the other popular app was too slow to start up. It has all the same stuff and LoseIt is a better interface

title: Easy to use!
body: Great app that has just about every food item or prepared item I eat on the list of foods.   Love the encouragement it gives when you‚Äôre on track and even when you aren‚Äôt.

title: Too Pushy and Greedy
body: While I had great success BEFORE premium existed, the direction change has hurt the app immensely. While I feel the app can help, it is not the same. So sad as before the pushy prompts for premium, it was perfect. I wish they would have never moved to a subscription based approach, just charge for the app once and allow people to find success, the subscription based approach reminds me of the WW group.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

title: One of the best apps I‚Äôve ever used!
body: I‚Äôve had this app for about five years and I absolutely love it. In the past year and a half I‚Äôve upgraded to the premium package instead of using the basic free one. The free one is just as good as the premium package.

title: Pretty well done
body: There is a ton that you can do with free version. My wife purchased the app and we can‚Äôt tell much benefit to the purchase beyond no adds and can put in meal for tomorrow to plan ahead on calories which is helpful to her.

title: Love this app
body: My son suggested this app for my husband and I it‚Äôs working

title: Easy to use effective weight loss tool
body: As long as I log what I eat daily, set my goals, enter my weight, I lose weight!  Finding foods in the log is easy.  The fact it retains my log, I can quickly enter repetitive meals and foods.

title: Obsessed - in a good way!
body: This app opened my eyes to the fact that I was never in a calorie deficit even though I was eating healthy foods. I was never going to lose weight that way. Now I know exactly what I‚Äôm eating and the macros too. Awareness is everything.

title: Cool app
body: I really like the ease of adding my info on a daily basis and auto population of foods I eat. Very user friendly.  My only thought to make it better would be a place to log your BP and if someone is a smoker trying to quit, a place to log that progress.

title: Lose it really helps
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It for a month I‚Äôve lost over 10 lbs. they make it super easy to keep track of your calorie intake and so much more. It doesn‚Äôt feel like a chore it‚Äôs fun I totally recommend it üëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

title: Best free weight loss app ever!
body: I used to pay a monthly fee to use weight watchers online but this is at least as good and maybe better. So easy to use and if you follow the personalized plan, you will eat better and lose weight!

title: Nice when it works
body: It‚Äôs a great premise, but things aren‚Äôt working. There are challenges you can partake in, but they don‚Äôt track properly. My yearly challenges all got stuck at the same loss my March challenges closed saying 0 lbs lost and now April‚Äôs are doing the same thing. Been asking customer support for help for months now, but they are not willing to offer any help, and refused to escalate the problem up.

title: Good app, but have to pay for too many features
body: It‚Äôs a good app to keep up with your food intake, but you must pay too much to log to many basic information that other apps might give you for free, such as your water intake. Still, it‚Äôs a pretty good app for your food.

title: Lose it,
body: I love lose it because it helps me keep up with my weight and calorie intake. Otherwise I wouldn‚Äôt keep up with it. I am confident this lose it app program will help a lot of people that are over weight or underweight.

title: Love it... But...
body: Please get rid of the community posts. I only want to see stuff from people I intentionally follow and who follow a similar diet to me (keto/Leche/gluten-free) I feel like I can‚Äôt find them anymore amidst all these community posts with pictures of foods I would never ever eat.

title: Good app
body: This app is really great to use. I only have one complaint and that‚Äôs with the news feed on the social page. I with I could turn off seeing everyone else‚Äôs posts. I only want to see my friends. I don‚Äôt want to see someone sitting in her yoga pose or a picture of their buttered toast.

title: Huh???
body: It keeps saying that I‚Äôm consuming more and then less, it‚Äôs proven that walking 2,000 makes you burn 100 calories well depending on your weight too, but when I walked over 10,steps it only records less calories so I watched professional athlete about burning calories and they even prove it, what‚Äôs wrong with this app, had to delete it

title: Do not pay for the premium!!!
body: I paid for the premium subscription, and it says in my subscriptions that I have an active subscription, and yet my app says that I do not have premium and won‚Äôt give me any of those features! To make the whole thing worse, there isn‚Äôt even any help or contact us anywhere on the app! So I can‚Äôt even get it fixed! So bottom line, do not pay at all, you‚Äôll be wasting $40! Just do the free version.
response: Sorry for the trouble with this! Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can help you out.

title: OK for tracking but I don‚Äôt understand why you have to pay premium to track water
body: Water should be included as part of the meals I can understand the other items being extra I guess but there are many freebie apps that allow all of the above and exercise and track my steps

title: Great app
body: I just started last week but it is easy to keep track of my meal and weight.  I‚Äôve been on others but this is fast and easy.  You can even just scan a barcode.

title: Keeps me on track
body: This is the best and easiest calorie tracker. Logs food fast and integrates with my exercise tracking app and steps. Keeps me mindful of the goal. I recommend the upgraded version for the additional information and support.

title: Helps to...
body: Keep track of daily intake fairly easily, which is helpful to stay on target, but I've been very consistent in entering amounts for the past eight months, and theoretically this should be helping me to consciously lose weight by lowering caloric intake, but my weight goes up and down and I've lost about 2 pounds when all is said and done.

title: The only way to lose and maintain!!!!
body: LoseIt has helped me lose over 50lbs!!!! It's easy to use, customizable and provides you all the info necessary to be successful.

title: Exactly what I needed!
body: LoseIt worked great for me! I was able to lose 30 lbs in about 60 months and I have been able to keep the weight off. If my weight ever starts to creep back up I just start logging again.

title: Great tool for weight loss!
body: This is a amazing app! Lost 16 pounds so far.....about 40 more to go. It really helps keep you on track and makes you think about what you're putting in your body! I recommend this app all the time!

title: Great app for losing weight!
body: This app is a great tool for losing weight. The key for me has been to keep active, but not record the activity. This forces me to limit my calories consumed, and not consider the calories burned with exercise. I‚Äôve lost 9 pounds in 4 months!üòÄüëç

title: This helped so much
body: I‚Äôm horrible counting nutrition info on my own.  This app is helping so much.  It is easy to use and always works!! Has helped me already lose over 50 pounds.  I thought I would never lose 10 pounds!!

title: Used to be great
body: This app used to be my favorite. It was easy to use and helped my to lose 30 pounds by tracking daily. I fell off the wagon and came back to it to lose the weight again, but now I can‚Äôt even sync my Fitbit without upgrading to premium. I use to be able to! That was very helpful, I guess I will have to start searching for a new app. I hear My Fitness Pal allows me to sync for free.

title: Stay motivated
body: I appreciate the app because it continues to motivate each day not to give up. Thanks for helping me get down to the 50‚Äôs! Now working on going down to the 40‚Äôs! Could not do it without your on going Support!

title: You can‚Äôt change the calories burned in your exercise
body: Unlike My Fitness Pal, you cannot  change the calories burned on an exercise. That means if you did Pilates one day and burned 159 calories but then did it another day and burned 165, you have to make a whole new exercise to record it since it won‚Äôt let you adjust calories. Also, does not let you search a restaurant near you.

title: The best app I have ever used!!!
body: It is helping me a lot. I have about three months that I‚Äôm using it and it is awesome. I lost about 10 kg using this app and exercising every day. This app keeps you motivated. I recommend it to everyone who wants to loose weight.

title: Useful in the long term, good support
body: The app is updated and frequently. If you run into issues they are responsive to feedback. This app is very convenient because it reliably scans in most food items with a barcode.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Great App!
body: I love Lose It! My Eye Doctor told me about it a couple of years ago. I used it on and off. Now, I use it faithfully everyday. Even if I eat junk food all day, I make myself accountable. Now, I am finally sticking to it and losing weight! Thanks Lose It!

title: Well worth the annual cost
body: I am so pleased with how well this app integrates with my iPhone and Apple Watch. I am especially grateful for being able to track my fiber in the app and set goals for all nutrients (and ignore others if I wish).

title: Used to be great
body: I HAD been using this app daily for almost  10 years now, until recently when for the last two weeks or so it refuses to open on my iPhone XS Max. It‚Äôs pretty useless when you can‚Äôt record your meals because it won‚Äôt open. And the contact us form on the website won‚Äôt allow you to send them a question. It only attempts to answer it but it‚Äôs a boilerplate answer that fixes nothing.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. title: They keep removing features from the free version
body: They are super pushy with their premium service. Basically every day I get a pop up that says ‚ÄúBuy premium! It‚Äôs on sale! But only for the next 72 hours! Time‚Äôs running out!!‚Äù It‚Äôs ridiculous! Not only that but they keep moving features to premium. I used to be able to track water but now that‚Äôs a premium feature. This whole app is a scam and I‚Äôll be looking for a replacement.

title: Good app, but Better if it used Brand Names
body: This app is very helpful and a great way to track your food intake and exercise output.  This latest update with iOS 14 widgets for calories is great. However, it would be great to also have widgets for sugars and carbohydrates as well.   This will help many diabetics. Thank You.

title: Excellent App
body: Helps you evaluate what you are eating. Helps you lose weight. Let‚Äôs you enter product details for items you eat. Best thing I have ever found to help me stay healthy while trying to lose weight.

title: Suggestion for developers
body: Please make the app compatible with the galaxy active smart watches! I love lose it, I‚Äôve been using it for years and decided to get premium this year. I just really wish I could sync my active 2 with the app to make things more accurate

title: Not sure why but this is motivates differently
body: I have used my share of tracking apps but for some reason this is the one that I have success with.  I stay motivated with Lose It and actually use it.  It a winner.

title: Update
body: I previously gave this app 3 stars because the calorie and carb information is all over the place and needs to be verified by an outside source.  That said, the tracking aspect of the app works well.  The user interface is great. Bottom line- losing weight at a steady and healthy rate.

title: Love this application!
body: I got upset when I saw what I was letting me go to my body. I had abs and always been an athlete. This app lets me obsess and focus on my goal to get back to where I feel comfortable in my skin. This is really easy and fun. Take it a day at a time.

title: Keeps me on track!!! Down 50+

title: Love the App! Super Easy!
body: Love using this app, so incredibly easy to use and navigate! Tons and tons of foods in the database that help you easily mark down what you eat and the accuracy is almost dead on all the time!

title: Great app but...
body: I‚Äôve used this App for a couple of years, but lately the upgrade to premium ads are relentless...they are harder to bypass than before. There used to be a polite ‚Äúno thanks‚Äù but now these banners pop up frequently and make the app difficult to move out of the way. Very annoying and not inspiring me to want to upgrade!
response: Thanks for your feedback on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make greats products for our members. To provide additional suggestions or for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help Best, Dia

title: IT WORKS IF YOUR DETERMINED
body: LOVE the app I‚Äôve struggled with weight my whole life and finally had enough and decided I was gonna eat better and start walking/running. I‚Äôve lost 44 pounds so far since using lose it and it‚Äôs been almost two months.

title: Awesome tool!
body: LoseIt has been a great tool to support my weight loss efforts.  It‚Äôs easy to use, has many helpful features, and a terrific online support community.  I‚Äôve loss 40 pounds using LoseIt.  Something I‚Äôve not been able to do before.  Love it!

title: AMAZING
body: This is the best thing if you wanna lose weight or just be healthy. Keeps me in check and leaves out all the guess work.

title: Consistent
body: While this app is always consistent and the one I keep coming back to it‚Äôs frustrating to see more and more of it put behind a pay wall. It does have one of the best food data bases though and is the most user friendly for me.

title: Best Weight Management Tool Ever
body: I‚Äôve been using this for over a year and have lost 40 pounds. Easy to use, very accurate, and links with many other devices. Allows for single-source management of diet, health, and exercise.

title: Can only input times in 5min increments
body: I‚Äôve been a loyal fan of this app since 2011 and just went to input a treadmill run to realize I can only add my time in 5 minutes increments. I love the precise times that were previously available. Hope this is just a glitch and it gets fixed. Most people don‚Äôt want a generic time, but one we can compete with ourselves on down to the second.

title: Free app is fine. $39 annually is BS!
body: I lost 30lbs with this app. That was back when some of the ‚Äúpremium only‚Äù parts were free. I refuse to pay $40 annually for ANY APP!  If this app had coaching or other weight loss help, I might reconsider. I hate that company bottom lines have ruined this app. If you can afford it and are willing to be honest with your calorie intake, it will do a good job for you. Still like the app, just don‚Äôt love it anymore.

title: Good. But double check nutrition stats with secondary sources
body: I really like this app. I do wish the food/nutrition database was more accurate. I have found that I need to do additional research online to be sure that the nutrition data is accurate.

title: Fun to use
body: This is my second week using Lose It and it has been a wonderful experience. It is very interesting to track my food intake and get an accurate read on my daily intake.

title: Love it
body: I had heard this was a good weight tracking app, so I got it.  I have been very happy with it.  After having it for three months I bought life-time and continue to be use and like the app.  I appreciate how it syncs to my Fitbit watch and Aria Scale.

title: Learning to navigate
body: I have just started using it because I couldn‚Äôt figure out how to use it. If I get use to it I may start the premium and pay for more help, but right now I‚Äôm not sure how to use this app.

title: Linda
body: This app has made all the difference in my weight loss. It has a huge bank of foods with nutrition and calories broken down. So easy and accurate. Also helps keep track of exercise. Love it!!

title: Just stick with it!!
body: This app is awesome. It‚Äôs easy to use and has many functions that help me in my struggle to lose weight. Love the recipe part of the app. I can create my recipe in the app and I know exactly what the total calories for a dish is. It makes it easier to know how much I can of a dish I love, and helps me to stay with in my daily/weekly calorie count.

title: In using Lose It, gained a great tool!
body: This Lose It app has been a great tool for me in my weight loss journey! It‚Äôs simple to use and very practical, as I keep a log of what I eat plus all exercise! I highly recommend it to all my friends!

title: Freezes up
body: We love this app.  It works well except that it freezes up and I have to shut my phone off in order to get it to work again.  I use the food database but think it should be updated to get rid of duplicates and assure accuracy

title: Great tool
body: This app is awesome. I‚Äôve used it in the past and lost weight, now I‚Äôm trying to get back on track and this app helps keep me accountable. Even on the bad days I log my info and it really opens your eyes to how horrible you ate.

title: Two is Better than One
body: The Loose It App keeps me in line. As long as I enter my meals it does all the math for me. It‚Äôs linked with my Fitbit which makes me want to exercise and possibly earn extra calorie rewards. It‚Äôs a win win in my book üòä

title: Love this app
body: I love this app

title: Needs an update
body: I‚Äôve used this app for years. But it is not acting right. It won‚Äôt let me add food to my log. That‚Äôs a serious problem. I‚Äôve had the add button not even be there it says done instead and doesn‚Äôt add food. I just tried to create a new food and I click the add button about 1000 times and it wouldn‚Äôt add.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. We expect this to be working normally now. Please update your app to the latest version, and if you are still experiencing any issues, contact us via loseit.live/help.

title: Not happy!
body: I‚Äôve used this app as a premium member for years. Now with all the updates, it is not as user friendly. Some of the features I one counted on are no longer available. Not happy at all!

title: Like it, but not notifications
body: I do like this app pretty well, but the notifications are usually wrong. It tells me in the morning I forgot to log my dinner when I didn‚Äôt. I did log it, and made sure to mark finished logging. Not sure why it keeps doing this.

title: Quick and easy
body: This app is better than going to meetings for me. It sends me reminders & motivation. scanning food and putting in my food log is super easy! thank you for making such a wonderful app

title: Keeps me accountable!
body: I don‚Äôt put anything in my mouth that I don‚Äôt log. As a student, I do a lot of mindless snacking. I have used the recommendations the app has suggested to reach my goal and learning to ‚Äòeat to live‚Äô again. Lost 4 pounds in my first week!!

title: Inaccurate data...
body: I‚Äôve been using this app since July and I‚Äôm down 30 pounds despite the inaccuracies. I have to double check every entry. Please stop allowing users to update random foods and do a double check on the math. 1 g of fat is 9 cal, protein and carbs are four.  You can‚Äôt have 50 calories when fat is 25 grams.  I‚Äôm moving on to a different app that doesn‚Äôt allow users to update the main database and the data as checked for accuracy.

title: Easy way to Lose It
body: Set goals and track progress, log foods and see what calories remain in the daily budget.  Add exercises from walking to vacuuming.  This program helps me get motivated to do something healthy for me.

title: Love this app!!!
body: Love this app!   Works well with my Fitbit and communicates with phone as well as tablet!   Also has a great library of foods that you can scan.  Not just common name brands.  Very easy to track your day with all these features!!!!!

title: Easy to use and keeps you on track to lose weight
body: Once you decide to lose weight, this will help you do it. It keeps you from starving, but makes sure the loss is steady.

title: Wow!!!
body: I starting using this Jan 1, along with adding exercise everyday I have lost 26 lbs in 6 months. The only downside is the challenges, users can manually enter anything they want and may not be how the challenge is intended. It makes me not want to participate otherwise I would give it 5 stars.

title: Wow!
body: Love this app. Just by recording what I‚Äôve eaten each day, I can see how unhealthy I‚Äôve been eating. Things I‚Äôve thought were low in calories are Not! I‚Äôve lost 5 lb in a week. I love how I can just scan my food and the nutrition info is right there.

title: I like this APP
body: This app has made tracking food and exercise and water among many other items very easy. The data is easily accessible and show you overall patterns of eating etc.

title: Good for a free app
body: The range of calories for the same foods are really broad so it‚Äôs hard to know how accurate my log is. Also if you don‚Äôt pay for premium it‚Äôs just straight calorie counting but not all calories are created equal which some other apps take into account. Considering it‚Äôs free though it does help me make better choices and trade offs

title: Love this app!
body: Without this app, I never would've been able to stick with this diet & lose 40+ lbs. The daily logging and the ease of entering all my food items made it quick & easy to use. Thank you, thank you!

title: Very Happy With App
body: My husband and I needed to lose 10-15 pounds and found this app. We love it! It‚Äôs easy to use and keeps you on track. I will probably use it even after I‚Äôm done losing weight to keep my weight off.

title: Recommended
body: This app has really helped me become more aware of not only my caloric and nutritional intake, but has made me more conscious of my eating patterns. My only recommendation is that the water intake tracking should be part of the free app functionality, not paid subscription - just my humble opinion.

title: Exercise too narrow
body: The exercises that are associated with this app are limited to a narrow range of participants.

title: Keto
body: Just started Keto a couple weeks ago and this app works great. I upgraded to premium and you can set your goals and really watch your macros. I linked the app with my Apple Watch to get excercise and step info to get bonus calories.

title: Stay on track!
body: I can say that this App is exactly what I needed to keep me accountable for my eating habits. I struggle with the day to day meal plan when I‚Äôm trying to lose weight and this app makes tracking everything so easy.

title: Terrific!
body: This app is easy, straight forward and I use it every day. I log everything and eat a high fat low carb diet. The lose it app shows me the % of fat, protein and carbs I eat every day making my weight management much easier.

title: Great app
body: Great for tracking and makes you more aware of the junk food you eat and helps you lose weight.  Free version works great.  Don't change anything about the free version and I'll use it forever.

title: An Essential Fitness App
body: Lose it is a wonderful tool to help achieve both dietary and fitness goals. By tracking calories burned and consumed, Lose It provides a very clear guide to which behaviors need to be modified. It‚Äôs also very easy to use.

title: Wow
body: This app is amazing it show you a clear way to achieve you goal and is easy to use with other apps it take forever to log but with this one it is so easy I ready to keep up my New Years revolution with this great app

title: Family friendly
body: I love this app!  I have tried to get my husband on a diet with NO success.  Then I told him about this app and loaded it on his phone.   Well... now he is very conscious of what goes in his mouth and is planning healthier meals!  Thank you Lose It!

title: Great Awareness Creator
body: Allows keeping track of intake including snacks, and exercise. Validity of calories varies from accurate to wishful. Same with exercise I think.

title: Premium
body: I like many features on the app but for some things such as exercise videos or water intake and meal plans you have to purchase a premium membership. There are other apps that offer those things with the basic plan.

title: Great app
body: The app is very good and easy to use.  It helped me realuze  how much carbs I was eatin.  I gave it 4 starts instead of 5 because you can‚Äôt update or edit  your foods once you entered them and some of the nutritional facts available in the database entered by other users is incorrect.  I do like the scanner capability.

title: Easy to use and informative
body: This app really keeps me aware of what I'm earring and not, or not!

title: Lost 66 pounds!
body: I lost 66 pounds using this app. It really wakes you up to your daily caloric intake. I was shocked at how quickly calories add up. Love this app and even after I hit my goal weight I still use it to maintain my weight and haven't gained any of it back! Love this app!!!

title: Has helped me lose weight without stress!
body: This app has been instrumental in the 27 lbs weight loss that I‚Äôve achieved this summer. I do not believe that I would have been as successful without it and I encourage others to use this app all of the time!

title: It just works
body: The only way to lose/maintain weight is to track EVERYTHING you eat. This app lets you easily do that and more. The premium features are worth the price if you‚Äôre committed to that goal.

title: Great
body: I‚Äôve lost 30 lbs with this app before... fell off the wagon... (my fault obviously lol) been using it again and lost 5 lbs already. It REALLY helps me to track my food and exercise to effectively lose weight. And this app is a definite help. Would recommend

title: Great app
body: Love the design and functionality of this app. Tracking my calories has been the most important part of my weight loss journey. That ensures I‚Äôm in a calorie deficit. It‚Äôs been a lot of ups and downs but am proud of my progress. 30 pounds lost.

title: It works
body: Since I started using this ap

title: Great calorie counter, doesn‚Äôt work with Versa2
body: Great for tracking calories. Scanning of products works great. But I had hoped it would work well with the Versa2 ,but it doesn‚Äôt. It doesn‚Äôt load the steps from the Versa. I‚Äôm losing weight, but would have preferred an app that worked with my Versa 2.

title: Every day useful!!
body: I use ‚ÄúLose-it‚Äù every day. Lost 40 lbs, watch what I eat, but can still have fun stuff occasionally when you know the overall picture! It makes me be thoughtful but not fanatical about what I eat! Love it!

title: Great app but needs some improvement
body: Love speed that the app supplies nutritional information. Would like to create and save my own recipes with nutritional information and l really would like to save my salads with nutritional information so I do not have to enter each ingredient every time.

title: Glitchy
body: I have used this app for more than a year. I even paid for premium membership, but did not renew. While it basically does what it‚Äôs supposed to do, using it can be frustrating. About every other day, I have to reboot my phone to get the search feature to work. I really don‚Äôt appreciate the constant rebooting especially when I paid to use it.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screenshots if that helps demonstrate the problem), the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: It works!
body: I‚Äôve lost a little over thirty pounds using this app! I would really like the app‚Äôs icon to display the remaining daily calories, so that I can quickly check to see how many calories I have left.

title: Love the app hate all the emails
body: I joined a group and commented. Since then I‚Äôve been flooded with emails every time someone sneezes after the comment. How can I stop those emails! If I want to read the comments I‚Äôll go to the app. LoseIt opinions are NOT my whole world!!
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Great app for tracking food
body: I was on Noom which worked really well - but hard to track food. This app is so easy! Gives micronutrients too! Using it to lose last 10lbs and maintain my loss!  Great blog too with helpful tips!

However, as time has passed, more and more of those features are only available if I subscribe and pay for it.  Why would I do that when there are so many other apps and website where I can do it for free?

title: Love app....but....
body: I found the app to be a great tool to track ‚Äúwhen I bite it, write it‚Äù.  I was disappointed to find out it the app is not available across all Apple IOS platforms. Specifically, on my newest iPad Pro.  I enjoyed the ease of having access to my synced data regardless of the device I was on, laptop, iPhone or iPad.  They need to fix this.

title: Accountability
body: I love this app keeping me accountable and logging every single thing I put in my mouth. It‚Äôs helping me to reach my goal weight. I also love the connectivity to Apple Watch to see how my exercise and activity impacts net calories. It‚Äôs a virtual personal trainer!

title: Love This App
body: I like the way the app tracks your daily sugar,fat,carbohydrates,sodium and more as you enter your daily food intake. I like the reminds it sends me when I forget to enter a meal for the day. I love the words of encouragement and awards they send to help keep me motivated.  üòÄ

title: Helps keep me on track!
body: I really like this app and know that once I commit it helps keep me on track and moving towards my goal!  It recognizes prior foods I‚Äôve eaten which makes it quick to log meals. Very user friendly.

title: Weird Update
body: I used this app every day for a while until I can‚Äôt access it anymore. Says I have to buy it? Even tho I already have a membership? Well, either way for those that can still use it it‚Äôs a great app to track. For those of us who can‚Äôt, it‚Äôs pretty useless because we can‚Äôt track anymore.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: Best little diet app
body: This app is simplified but yet has everything you need to stay on track and lose weight.  I have tried others.  This app is perfect.  Everything is there...with no extra fluff. Thanks!

title: Great tool!
body: This is no earth shattering new development.  It‚Äôs a tool that makes it easy for you to track how many calories you‚Äôre consuming.  Regardless of your approach to weight loss and calorie monitoring, this is an easy to use helpmate.

title: It works.
body: If you stick to the plan it works like magic. There is no other plan that is as effective as this. Believe me, I‚Äôve tried them all. This isn‚Äôt a diet, it‚Äôs an eating habit change. It‚Äôs hard. It‚Äôs worth it.

title: Way better than MFP
body: I‚Äôve used MFP for two years now and just switched to Lose It. It works so much better and information for food and restaurants seems to be way more accurate!!

title: Very useful app.
body: This app has really helped me get control of my terrible eating habits. The user interface is well designed and easy to learn. I love the way it breaks down my food intake into the various macros. I highly recommend this app.

title: Needs a notes field

title: It Really Works If You Put Your Mind To It!!!!
body: I love this app, it really helps me see how many calories I‚Äôm taking in so I know what I can eat in a day. I don‚Äôt have premium but it still works great! I have lost almost 15 pounds since starting it in April!!

title: Used to be great
body: The lose it app was great until they decided to move most of the functionality over to the premium section. You can no longer track your body fat or BMI without paying for the premium subscription. So much for the Lose It scale I bought ‚Äî it‚Äôs a bit of a waste of money now. I‚Äôm also no longer recommending this app to friends.

The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

body: regretfully I must admit loseit developers has taken a once great aid for personal health and made it another money grabbing app. I have used  this app

title: Great Info on this app!
body: I have been so impressed with this app.  My grandson and his buddy have lost 50 pounds and 80 pounds respectively.  They have encouraged me to use this app as I have 20 pounds to lose.  This gives me food awareness

title: Great App
body: Very easy to use, just scan the barcode and go. It doesn‚Äôt require much time to do and you can see what you are really eating. Eye opening. I also like how it logs my steps and activities along with my Aria scale weight.

title: My experience with this app
body: When you see how many calories you have left for the day and if you exercise your calories increase you will work out more and make better choices when you need to record them

title: I wish I could track my period
body: Get great app. I‚Äôve been using it since the beginning of the year and it‚Äôs help tremendously with portion control. The only thing I wish it could track is my mensural cycle. Women can gain ‚Äúweight‚Äù for that period of time and then all goes away.

title: Amazing
body: I just started using this app but I absolutely love it! The calorie calculator is exactly what I was looking for and is so easy to use! I love absolutely everything about this app and I know it is going to be an invaluable tool in my weight loss journey.

title: I love this app but,
body: I love everything about this app it would nice for a different picture for it and a new UI everything else is perfect. It would make it better if I could link the data to the Apple health app and also use it on my Apple Watch! Please consider this. :)

title: Paddle board girl
body: Excellent program!  Really makes you aware of how many calories you are eating. It is a very user friendly program. I would recommend this to anyone trying to improve their health!

title: My health
body: I struggle Still need to break old bad habits and learn new nutritional and healthy lifestyle. Number one buying proper healthy food. Number to learning new ways of preparing and cooking of nutritional food

title: Upset.
body: I‚Äôm really upset because my friend told me about how great this app is. She introduced it to me, showed it to me, got me excited to use it. Told me that it was free unless you wanted to do a bunch of extra stuff. So I went to download it and found out I only get a 7 day trial???? I‚Äôm not sure what the difference is but it‚Äôs frustrating as I don‚Äôt want to pay $40 for something I am only needed to use short term. :/
response: So sorry for the confusion here! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can assist with this.

title: Love lose it!
body: Wide variety of foods in dictionary makes logging easy. Just wish you didn‚Äôt have to pick B,L,D for every food logged.

title: Using this app for years
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for years. On and off. I just now upgraded to premium . Easy and great way to see what I eat with portions listed as I quickly view my daily calories.  Great app!!

title: Easy to use
body: This app. Has made my journaling easy and much better. The part I most dislike about dieting is to put everything down with this, search & add. Really user friendly!

title: what happened??
body: I used to love this app. Overall, it has remained consistent and reliable. However, I am VERY unhappy that you are no longer able to synch your fitness device (such as a Fitbit) without paying for the ‚Äúpremium‚Äù version. That‚Äôs just crap. Why on earth would I suddenly want to pay for a service that was a free part of the app for so long? Please change it back!

title: I‚Äôve been using this app for over 2 years
body: I have used this app for over 2 years now.

title: Great App!
body: This is a very effective app, easy to use and more tracking features than the one I used before.

title: Updated review
body: After LoseIt retracted their unfortunate forced community posts and let us choose who our friends are, I‚Äôm going back to being pleased with the app‚Äôs tools and the ability it allows me and my sisters to encourage each other in our weight loss goals.
response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us! We work hard to deliver excellent experiences, and we're sorry we missed the mark with you on this one. We'll make sure the product team sees your message.

title: Updated
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It for a few weeks and the app itself is pretty basic. Curiosity got the best of me and I did the DNA test. The test was very inaccurate- like saying that I‚Äôm prone to having normal blood sugar levels but I am a diabetic. Then saying that I may have an issue with gluten which I don‚Äôt. This makes me question the integrity of the app.

title: Fabulous App for anyone Who is Serious about Eating Healthy and/or Losing Weight!
body: This is a fabulous app that provides motivation and a plan for losing weight. The patterns part of the app is particularly useful and the tracker is easy to use. Highly recommend!

title: 60 years old finally found the help to lose it
body: By tracking my calories I‚Äôm making better choices and actually eating less.

title: The lite version is great, let me use JUST that.
body: As someone trying to pull back on the reigns a bit and start 2019 fresh I enjoy this easy to use and well maintained app.

title: Weigh Loss
body: I find this app very easy to use I like the fact that you can go back to correct your earlier mistakes.  I have started to lose weight the first week. I have tried on my own  with no success.  This app works great.

title: Easy to use
body: Lose It is the first app I‚Äôve used for weight loss.  It is easy to use and navigate, which is important because being on the diet itself is hard enough!

title: Makes it easy to log
body: I have tracked calorie counts in the past and found it a cumbersome task. This app speeds up the process nicely. I eat mostly whole foods, and there is a fantastic database on the app. You can also create custom entries. Very easy to use... and you get nutritional breakdowns as a bonus.

title: Easy to use
body: Easy and handy app to use.  Can also log in to the web based version from a computer (convenient because I cannot take my phone to work.).

title: Tracking more accurately
body: Having a good time using this app. Keeps me on track, especially like the ability to scan barcodes.  Makes it so much easier to track accurately!

title: Straight forward simple to use.
body: When I use it - I lose it - weight that is. Also the figuring out of macro units of fat / carbs /sugar is helpful for steady weight loss and long term success. So many little things that make this app a big success.

title: Perfect for tracking calories
body: While my goal isn‚Äôt always to lose weight, I use this constantly to track what I‚Äôm eating. It encourages healthy eating, the reminders are great, and the upgrade is really worth it!

title: Love the program!
body: Keeps me on track and because of  it I‚Äôve lost 25 pounds.  Great program.  I wished I could get it to sync with my iPad.  I use to have syncing but not now.  Any suggestions?  I usually just keep it on my phone.  Thanks.

title: 50 lbs Down today
body: Started with Loseit 8 months ago. Have not missed a day following the program. Best results I have ever had from any other diet program and have tried them all. At my goal weight. Feeling great.

title: The key to my weight loss
body: One year into my new healthy CICO lifestyle with significant weight loss. I‚Äôm closing in on my ideal weight and log everything with Lose It. I would not be successful without this fantastic easy to use tool. Thank you Lose It.

title: What happened
body: I‚Äôm on my iPad Pro, attempt to make a new account. It asks me what my goal weight is, and nothing else. It then sets a 2,200 calorie goal and assumes I want to gain 10 lbs to get to my goal weight because it didn‚Äôt ask me anything else and now I‚Äôm spending my morning trying to figure out how to change the calorie budget - or just start over. And you want me to sign up for premium when you can‚Äôt even develop an app properly?
response: Sorry for the confusion here! Please send us an email via help.loseit.com so we can help you out.

title: Best app for my health
body: My cardiologist told me about this app. I am a diabetic and have had several strokes. Just logging in my food makes me accountable. I have some bad days, but the next day is a new day. I have lost 25 lbs since I started using it.

title: Goals
body: My goal was to lose 50 lbs.  this would put me at 170 lbs.   I need to loose more but if I can get to this weight it will be the lowest I have been in 23 years.   I really like the ease of recording my calorie intake. I think this will work for me.

title: One month in and seeing results
body: Just be honest with yourself, if you go over you limit you go over.  You'll find yourself making up for it the next day.  Down 14 pounds in a monthüòÑ

title: Finally
body: I have been logging food for two years on WW and not lost a pound. In order to lose weight, counting calories is a must and this app allows me to do that with ease. One week on the app, one pound gone. About time!

title: Lose it
body: I‚Äôve been using this app for 1,000 days today.

title: Great tool
body: This app is easy to use and find the food information you need to count calories, fat, protein, and carbs. I‚Äôve used it for a few years now. Lost 30 lbs the first year and have kept it off!

title: Love the app!
body: It takes a while to learn the app, but after you do it is great. I really like how it can keep your meals and if you eat the same thing you can just punch it is instead of hunting the foods down.

title: Does it all. Reliably.
body: Been using the app for years.  I especially love the excel-formatted weekly reports. Easy to share with my nutritionist. For logging, everything I scan comes up. All the restaurant foods are there. All in all, top notch.

title: Tried everything
body: This app is working for me!! I‚Äôve done everything it seems to lose weight. It‚Äôs goal prediction for me makes it like a game. It‚Äôs so easy to use. I‚Äôve gotten like 6 friends using it now.

title: Great App, it would be perfect if it had one more thing..
body: Love the app, doesn‚Äôt spam you with ads which is nice. But it would be nice to be able to purchase premium features and no ads as a one time purchase rather than a monthly or yearly subscription.

title: More workout options!!
body: The app is great, just needs more workout options, I couldn‚Äôt find any of the workouts I do in the browse section. I know that i could‚Äôve used the ‚ÄúCreate New Exercise‚Äù option, but i don‚Äôt know exactly how much calories I burned from it.

title: Awesome
body: Easy to use. Love that it stores my foods and whenever I go back to it, most commons foods pull up immediately. Also, scanning items is quick and efficient. They have almost every food I use.

body: I have been a premium user for a while and have used the app for over ten years. I need now need to track iron levels for health reasons and would really like to not switch to a competitor. Please, please, please add vitamin and mineral tracking! I don't want to lose all my data/progress.

title: Issue with current release
body: Issue fixed! A great app that‚Äôs intuitive and with the widgets in the latest iOS release, indispensable for me. It helped me lose 30 lbs during Covid lockdowns, and continues to help me maintain. Keep up the great work!
response: Sorry for the trouble here! This was a known issue that our engineers worked quickly to resolve - the fix has been released today. You should see it working again once you update the app to 12.6.400.

title: Still has not added breakdown of fats
body: Wrote about a year ago and was told they are working on it.  Committed to another annual and still do not have the option for tracking your day.

title: Invaluable
body: All you need is this app and a good scale and you‚Äôll lose weight.  It‚Äôs that easy.  Glad I chose this over the MyFitnessPal.  The interface is simple and easy to use, and highly customizable.

title: The best app for calories counting!
body: I have used many apps but I used to delete them after one day of use. I have been using "Lose it" for more than one year, it's great, easy to use and intuitive. Good job!

title: Constantly updated, works great!
body: There have been some amazing updates to the app, and it generally works great to keep track of food. Integration with Apple Watch is fantastic now, and it‚Äôs very easy to use.

title: Easy to use and keep motivated!
body: Calorie Tracking system is easy to use. Love that it provides a projection on when you will hit your goal based on your weekly calorie intake. Helps me stay motivated!

title: crashes after update
body: I enjoy this app, but it crashes after the latest update. it won‚Äôt even open. not able to use it. it worked great until this afternoon. i logged in breakfast and tried to enter lunch, but was not able to. hope this gets fixed.
response: So sorry for the trouble here. We expect this to be working normally now. Please update your app to the latest version, and if you are still experiencing any issues, contact us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com.

title: Lose it app
body: This app is great for tracking what you eat and populates items as you type.  I like that it forecasts the date you‚Äôll achieve your weight loss goal. I don‚Äôt like that you have to pay to track things like your water consumption.

title: Very User Friendly
body: Great app. Been using it for over about 9 year and have lost about 60 lbs. Inputting all of your daily food intake into this app makes you think before eating junk/fast food. Well done! :)

title: Super effective! Five stars!
body: This app is so amazing! Hands down to the creators. As long as you commit to calorie counting and weight loss, this really works, massive! I lost 10 lbs in 16 days. This app will make you health conscious and eat less than your daily calorie allowance. I love this!

title: Great for the price!
body: The only thing I wish was better was the macros. My net carbs is sometimes off. The app sometimes doesn‚Äôt factor in certain things for some reason. If the macros were always accurate my wellness journey would greatly be improved.

title: ‚ÄòLose It‚Äô works!
body: I reached my weight loss goal of 17# using the ‚ÄòLose It‚Äô app.  Lose It is the first weight loss plan that works for me.  I‚Äôm going to keep using Lose It to maintain my weight loss.  I love how I can enter my own recipes into the data base.

title: Lose It
body: Using Lose It has helped me to lose 43.8 pounds and go from 20 W to small- medium tops, size 8-10, and size 12 petite trousers.  I record everything I eat and drink on my phone.  I can eat out and still lose weight.

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
body: I love this app, my husband and I have used it for about five years now when we get off track and need to get back on a healthier lifestyle.  It‚Äôs extremely user friendly compared to the other popular apps in this category.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

title: Lost almost 50 lbs
body: This app helped me lose almost 50 lbs. I continue to use it maintain my weight and always log in my food and exercise. Thankful for this app and have suggested to folks who ask ‚Äú how did you do it ?‚Äù

title: Wonderful App
body: I lost 15 ponds in 3 months using this app. I stopped using it and gained 5 back. I will always depend on this app to keep my weight in focus. You really don‚Äôt know what and how much you are eating without seeing it. It is my accountability coach.

title: Calorie Adjustment
body: Please add the feature where we can manually adjust our calorie goals and not just based on how much weight one would like to lose. Unless that feature is already available, I‚Äôm not really sure how to adjust it myself.

title: Leenette

title: Great long term health management
body: I can track not only my diet, calories, nutrients weight and exercise, but also log important contemporaneous details like water intake, blood pressure, and blood glucose, and BMI. This makes it a great long term tracking tool. The graphs are wonderful.

title: Garbage
body: Got bumped off on two email accounts with known passwords- error said cant connect - not in cloud. I can‚Äôt re register on existing email and will not obtain another email for this device. Also was informed of potential dark web activity through this service from 3rd party.  Password re set does not work as it comes back in email in a Chinese written language. Stay away from this product !!! -5 star garbage

title: Great, but no premium for me
body: I really like this app and I‚Äôd be happy to pay $30 per year, but I don‚Äôt want to be auto renewed at $40 per year so I will not be subscribing.  I actually don‚Äôt need most of the premium features but I‚Äôd be happy to support the app development if the auto renew wasn‚Äôt 25% higher.

title: Why the changes?
body: I have been using this app for 5 years and it is wonderful. But recently it has slowed down and the ability to look up foods or create foods has changed and it not as efficient as it had been. I pay for Premium and it is so incredibly slow.  Any fixes coming?

title: Very thorough
body: I believe this app has everything in it. If you look for any kind of snack food or retail product, you‚Äôll find it in this app. Panera products, variety of chips and drinks, just completely thorough! Thank you

title: Great Tracking App

title: So helpful
body: Helps me keep track of everything. My Fitbit is connected which helps with exercise. Easy to use and follow. A little bummed that the recipes won‚Äôt load. I would love to see what they have.

title: Insufficient streak length??
body: I haven‚Äôt upgraded yet I‚Äôve only been using the app for about two weeks‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm loving it so far but it says that after seven days you‚Äôll be able to give me a projection‚Ä¶ And I just logged my eighth day in a row and it says insufficient streak length?? What‚Äôs that about???

title: Fun app to use!
body: I‚Äôve had a lot of fun using this app.  It‚Äôs easy to use and has cute pics of food, etc. to go with each item you track. It‚Äôs motivating to want to use. The social community is also very supportive.

title: Shares all your data with Facebook
body: This app was actively sharing every piece of data you put in with Facebook without asking your permission or allowing you to turn it off. The Wall Street Journal recently had an article about it.
response: We explain more information about how we were sharing user activity data through the Facebook App Events API in this statement: loseit.live/data_privacy

title: Motivating

title: Used to be better
body: I‚Äôve used this app since 2010 and it has worked to help me lose weight. But the free version has become too cluttered with ads and other nonsense touting the app‚Äôs premium bundle. I don‚Äôt want or need the benefits of the premium version and I don‚Äôt want to pay $30 a year to make the ads go away. So after nine years of using the app off and on, I‚Äôm deleting it.
response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on how the ads come across. Lose It! Premium subscriptions, along with ads, are what keep Lose It! in business and allow us to make great products for all members. To provide specific suggestions or ask for more information, contact us here: loseit.live/help

But it is great starter up for u to lose weight in beginning .....

title: Recent update lost many of my favorite foods
body: Under ‚ÄúLog‚Äù when adding to a meal an item that I expected to find under ‚ÄúMy Foods‚Äù, it‚Äôs not there. Common food items that I have used this month have disappeared from the list under ‚Äúmy Foods‚Äù, items such as mayonnaise, tuna in water, tomato-slices, & cream cheese. Now I have to go retrieve the container from the trash can and scan it again
response: So sorry for the trouble here! Please email us via help.loseit.com so we can look into this!

title: Great to keep you on track
body: I like that since I tend to eat the same things that meals can be entered all at once.  It also lets you go to restaurants for calories.  A lot easier and more fun to track nutrition.

title: Best for weight loss
body: Keep your goals to just a couple of pounds and you‚Äôll lose the inches in just weeks and stay motivated! So many food are in the database! Easier to use than other apps!

title: Good but ruined by constant premium version ads
body: The review title says it all - a good app that has been ruined by constant ads for the premium version. I would actually buy the premium version if it were a reasonable price ($5 to $10) but they want me to subscribe as if this were cable TV for a much higher price. Is LoseIt serious?

title: Keeping track
body: I love the Lose It app! There is a great database of food and writing it down has been key to losing weight and following my macros, water, exercise etc‚Ä¶would highly recommend.

title: Love this app
body: I love the app because it records everything you can possibly think of that will help you lose weight. The barcode scanner works well. And the premium app is well worth the price.

title: My weight loss journey
body: I love using this app to keep me accountable to everything I eat and drink.  I also love tracking my exercise and I am addicted to it. I have lost 65 pounds and weigh the same as when I got married 33 years ago!

title: Carbs not correctly displayed
body: Carbs are not being accounted for properly. It should include Net Carbs as well. I‚Äôm sure you know how to come up with this number, but I‚Äôll explain it anyway, you take Total Carbs and subtract Fiber and Sugar Alcohols.

title: Want to lose weight?  Use this!!
body: I tried working out for months‚Ä¶ no change.  Started counting calories with this and lost 5 pounds per week.  Dropped 40+ pounds and gained the discipline and knowledge to keep it off.

title: New Personal Journey
body: So far, lovin‚Äô this app. Used it a few years ago and just getting back to using it again presently.  It‚Äôs incredibly user-friendly.  Highly recommend it!

title: Great app
body: I‚Äôve used this app for well over a year now to track my calorie intake, weight and health habits.

title: Easy app
body: Have been using this app for about a month and has been very helpful with keeping my food log and workout routine documented. Easy to use and helping with weight loss

title: Life changer
body: This is the only thing that kept me on track. Though I have not upgraded I still log my daily intake, a big help for me it keeps me aware of what I‚Äôm putting in my mouth. Super easy to use.

title: Lodestar
body: Lose It! App has helped guide me for over a year!  Whenever I have ‚Äúfallen off the wagon,‚Äù I return to the app to get me on track!  Exercise, adjusting meds with my doctors, & using the app, has restored my weight to a sooo much better place!

title: Worst customer service ever
body: I paid for the upgraded features but can't access them. Emailed customer support, per their help center's instructions. Got an automated 'we got your email' response but never heard back from the company. Would you believe they don't even have phone support? So if they ignore your email, there is nothing else you can do. Who ever heard of such nonsense?
response: So sorry about this! Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you.

title: Upset! I did a DNA test through this app and now I can‚Äôt access it
body: I paid $60 for the DNA test and since the app has been updated, It seems I need to pay for the premium to access it.  This is unacceptable!  I‚Äôve used this app for 8 years now and I feel like you are screwing me!  There is no way to contact a customer service so I just have to leave a nasty review.  Not happy at all!

title: So easy to use!
body: I love this program because it‚Äôs very easy to use; it gives you good visuals on calorie counts, fats, proteins and carbohydrates; and allows you to enter a lot of other things as well. It‚Äôs worth the 20 bucks.

title: Does its purpose but to young
body: This app does great! The only problem is that they say it is for 4+ but this food tracker tells a lie. It should say for 12+ because if you say you are 11- it makes you 12 years old.

title: Absolutely incredible!!!!
body: The free version is amazing but had to upgrade to premium bc devs deserve it. This app has everything!

title: Results

title: Great App!

title: Easy to use
body: LoseIt app makes it easy to count your calories. I like that it remembers what I usually eat at meals and offers them as suggestions so I don‚Äôt have to type it again. The scanning of UPC codes is amazing

title: Lose it keeps me on track
body: Great way to count calories and record exercise.. keeps my weight in check, haven‚Äôt gained a pound in 2 yearsüòÅ

title: Accountability and motivation.

title: GREAT APPP , LOVE IT
body: This app is AWESOME, I used this app about 6 years ago and lost 50 pounds. I had stopped using it the past 3-4 years and gained my weight back. Been back on it the past 3 weeks and I‚Äôve lost 7 pounds. I will NEVER STOP USING IT AGAIN. On my way back down in weight üòçüëçüèª.

title: Lose It works

title: Has done the trick for me!
body: Recording your daily consumption and assuring the proper balance of fat, carbs, protein, fiber and sodium within a defined calorie range is key.  After a lifetime of up and down weight, rigorous adherence to this process has resulted in a new me...and, 30 pounds lighter!  Love it!

title: Actually helpful!

title: It Works
body: It can be a pain to measure all my food, but if I keep accurate record of what I‚Äôm eating, I have lost weight using this App. I like the handy barcode scanner, and the cute interface and icons gamify the experience.

body: I have been using the app for 1 week and I like it.  I have several meals each week that are the same so it would be nice to be able to name a meal and just put the name of the meal in, not have to put each thing in individually.

title: Best app ever
body: I‚Äôve used this app for years. It‚Äôs so easy to use, and it doesn‚Äôt have a lot of pop ups. I‚Äôve tried all of the other apps similar to this and lose it is far better than the rest.

title: Exactly what I need
body: Achieving a weight goal is a good thing, but keeping it isn‚Äôt easy. Lose it! Gives me the exact tool I need to stay on track. It‚Äôs a great thing to know how many calories I‚Äôm eating everyday without having to guess or translate it into weight watcher points.

title: Not worth the money
body: This app is alright for the food selection availability, but I payed the extra $35/year to be able to connect it to my Fitbit and it doesn‚Äôt even connect half the time. The steps are very rarely accurate and you have to go through a lot of unnecessary logging in and out of both sites online to try to sync it back up. Even that only works half the time. Definitely won‚Äôt be renewing.

title: Great app

title: Absolutely Fantastic App!

title: LOVE!

title: Daily intake
body: I use the app daily, it‚Äôs a game changer in taking care my health. I can‚Äôt lie, cheat or deceive myself if I use the tracker daily and correctly.

title: Great app to track and lose the Pounds
body: So far it‚Äôs really easy to track and see results. 2 weeks in and down 14 pounds. Only draw back is some of the better options are only available if you get the premium version.

title: Constantly pushes premium version
body: It works as a calorie counter, but everywhere you turn is another pop up ad or another button that will bring you to the premium sign up page. Its obnoxious.  I want to see just the tools that are available to me when I use an app, not the 50 or so that I might use if I decided to pay the premium.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: No ‚Äúsign out‚Äù function
body: I‚Äôve been pleased with the functionality of the app with the exception of not being able to log out of my account on my iPhone in order to log into a different account. I‚Äôm the calorie counter for two people, and the absence of this function has caused me to abandon this app.

title: Paid for premium but not getting premium features!
body: Already paid for premium. For some reason, every time I try to use premium features, it tells me to subscribe. I have hit the subscribe and it then says I‚Äôm already upgraded to premium. I‚Äôve tried canceling my subscription and resubscribing to no avail. I certainly want my money back if this can‚Äôt be resolved. I‚Äôve always loved this app but this is frustrating.
response: We're sorry for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us via loseit.live/help so we can further assist you.

title: Easy to use

title: Amazing!!!

title: Lose It review
body: Keeps me on track. I know exactly what my readings are so there is no excuse for not doing the right thing. My doctors love it because it gives them specific information over time.

title: Easy to use!
body: I‚Äôve tried other free, weight loss apps and this one is the best. It‚Äôs easy to use, straight forward, and if you follow the plan and log your actual honest calorie intake, you will lose weight. A+++

title: Good except.

title: Loose it

Thanks for ‚Äî literally ‚Äî nothing.

title: David

title: Thanks for helping me stay on Track

title: Works!

title: Easy! Easy!

It was amazing for what it was as a plain Jane logging app but now I‚Äôm thinking I may just switch to myfitnesspal

title: This app WORKS

title: Lose it
body: Legitimate help for my weight loss. I didn‚Äôt realize how many extra calories I was eating daily. Now that I can easily keep track of every calorie my weight has fallen off. Thanks for the help.

title: Great tracking app
body: I love this app. It really gives a reality check of the amount of calories we eat and the type of calories. It is a lot of fun to analyze your eating habits and it tracks exercise from other apps like Garmin and Apple heart.  Love it!!!

By the time start recording or get exercise in, midnight comes and starts everything over which leaves my info inaccurate for my day which is from 4p to 8/9a.

title: Love it
body: It has helped me reach my and my doctor‚Äôs goals. I lost 15 pounds. I‚Äôm now using it for maintaining my weight. Keeps record of your foods so it is easy to add them again. The scan feature is great. I would have paid something for it. It is a treat that it is free. Thanks a lot.

title: So easy to use!
body: This is my first day using this app and I love it! You‚Äôre able to adjust your serving so it‚Äôs super accurate (i.e. you ate half your dinner and eating the rest for lunch)!! I highly recommend for anyone needing to count calories.

title: Excellent tool

title: Great app, horrible price..

title: Great App

title: Past 2years

title: Easy to use
body: I‚Äôve been using Lose It for years!! It‚Äôs a lot to input at first, but it saves your food to make it easy to find for next time. I love the barcode option too!!

title: Amazing
body: This app is so easy and has almost all my crazy food options because I do like to eat weird food. And that‚Äôs what make me to keep using it, because it‚Äôs fast and on point.

title: Bug today

title: Great App

title: Easy  and effective
