Every time I would try to use the app it would try to make me log in with a weird Apple address and would constantly reset my password and wouldn‚Äôt save my login. It repeatedly pop up the login screen and became unusable. I‚Äôve lost 4 years of log data and I‚Äôm leaving this app permanently. Good riddance.
response: We apologize for the trouble you've encountered. Please reach out to us at reviews@loseit.zendesk.com so we can assist you further.

title: It really works
body: I have been on a fitness yo-yo for decades. This app has helped me drop weight (10-20lbs) three times. When you get fed up with being heavy and decide to ‚Äúlose it‚Äù, add this app to your daily regiment. It is an effective tool.

title: Keeping track
body: I am coming back to Loseit to keep track of what I‚Äôm eating. I have gained 10 pounds and didn‚Äôt realize I slipped into old ways. Tracking on loseit for 6 days and I already lost 2 pounds. Live this app!

title: Must have app if you want to lose weight

title: Wonderful

title: Mostly great but missing something

title: Love this app
body: It‚Äôs very simple to use and keeps you honest about the calories you are consuming.  Very deep database of foods so it‚Äôs simple to input what you just ate. Interconnected with other activity apps that track your calories burned.

title: Best thing since Weight Watchers!

There was an update or something recently that lost many of my settings which took a lot of time and research for me to initially compile.  Now the app is difficult to navigate, cumbersome and less intuitive. I don‚Äôt believe I will renew. Not happy at all with the new format.

title: Easy Way to Track Calories
body: Get the premium version, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

title: Lose it
body: So Easy to use and so convenient. Love the ability to take a picture of bar codes and calories enter for me. This app forces me to take a realistic assessment of the food I am eating.  Love this app  I highly recommend it!

title: Love it
body: I really like this app. I love that you can scan the food directly. I also love that when you start typing in a food, a ton of options appear. Makes it so easy to count calories.

title: Improvement
body: The only way you can improve anything is to measure, tweak what you‚Äôre doing, measure again and if you don‚Äôt like the outcome, tweak it again and remeasure until you do. (D.Ewards Deming)

title: Great app!
body: Takes a bit to learn it but only because it is so detailed and in-depth.

title: Good app
body: Good app. Useful functions. It would be nice if their were more verified nutritional entries for items available from National and regional restaurants. Also, some nutritional info obtained from scanned UPC barcodes does not match what is on the product package.

title: Awesome and fun tool to lose weight!
body: I downloaded this app as a help and motivator for losing about 20 pounds. By counting calories, I am aware of what I eat and what portion size I should be consuming. It is fun to search the vast database for the foods I am eating and then log it in.

title: Super easy to use
body: I can quickly use Lose It! to track my food. It is easily customizable to track my chosen goals. It is the best app I have ever used for this and I have used a few.

title: Love it
body: Great app! Never seems to crash, the challenges and features are awesome. Tracking is made simple. Just started the keto diet and having it be able to track net carbs is a great!

title: Worth it!
body: I don‚Äôt have the premium version, but even without it, this app helped me lose about 20 pounds so far in little time, and really helps to remind me to eat healthy every day. I recommend!!!!!!

title: Declined in quality
body: I used this app for a few years and it‚Äôs quality and usability gradually declined. I‚Äôm deleting it today because I can no longer use the barcode scanner to log foods and it asks me to login every time I enter the app even though I‚Äôm permanently logged in. I‚Äôm switching to a different food tracker app.
response: Sorry to hear of the trouble! Please send us an email via loseit.live/help so we can look into what‚Äôs going on here. The more detail you can provide about what exactly you are experiencing (including screen shots if that helps demonstrate the problem) the quicker we'll be able to troubleshoot!

title: Happy user
body: It is really easy to post daily calories. And it keeps me on track, I have lost weight slowly but safely. I‚Äôm learning a new life style. Hopefully I will be able to keep the weight off this time.

title: I love the net calories!
body: I have been looking for a calorie counter that used a net calorie count. I love watching my intake, but seeing the calorie count after deducting exercise. The food and exercise searches are very quick and  thorough. Thank you!!!!

title: Love this app but...
body: Love this app, very easy to maneuver however it is exceptionally annoying to have to decline the pro version multiple times a day... I get it, they need to make money, however I think asking once a day is plenty. Still love it though!

title: It‚Äôs working!!
body: I really love this app. I didn‚Äôt think that I would like tracking every single thing I eat but here I am two days later and I‚Äôve lost 5 lbs. Now I have 95 more to go! By the way, I‚Äôm using the free version.

title: Great app!

title: Disappointed
body: I really liked the free app and was using it for a few days. Suddenly the free app stopped working and all that is displayed is the link to sign up for the Premium version. title: Excellent!
body: This is the best app for control your daily meals. It has a lot of options and allows you to keep up on track with your goals. I‚Äôm using since 2015 and it helps a lot.

title: Why the update?
body: This was a great app until the most recent update and now I have to reinstall it at least once a day. The issue is that the app won‚Äôt start‚Äî you get a blank screen with an orange stripe on top and no matter what you do, you can‚Äôt fix it without reinstalling. If it‚Äôs working fine, why constantly update it until a problem like this comes up? It it ain‚Äôt broke, fix it till it is kinda thing?

title: More safeguards needed.
body: My 11 year old who is battling an eating disorder was able to download this app and enter his info. He is 74lbs and put a goal into lose 1 lb. this app needs better safeguards to ensure that the users are of age and should also know that anyone listing that low of a starting weight does not need to lose weight. Luckily we caught this quickly after it was download and took the device away and deleted the app.
response: We apologize that this has been your experience with Lose It!. We strive to provide a healthy weight loss program, and our goal is never to encourage unsafe dieting practices. The Lose It! program is designed based on the caloric and nutritional needs of adults. The program cannot account for the needs of members under the age of 18. For the health and safety of our members, we require a starting age of 18 or older.

title: Long Time User but HATE new version

title: Excellent

title: Lose It is great and simple to use

title: Great App

title: Friends profiles
body: I don‚Äôt like that I have to go to the website to see my friends profile. That seems silly. I use the app because it makes it easier. I don‚Äôt want to have to login into the website every time I want to see how many calories or what meal my friend ate. Pretty disappointed.

title: Gamechanger

title: I like the app but...
body: I wish I would have read the fine print: ‚ÄúExcept with respect to Helix DNA Kit returns and refunds as set forth in Section 16.1 below, all fees and charges are nonrefundable and there are no refunds or credits for partially used periods. All Premium Services and Your rights to use them expire at the end of the paid period of Your Premium Services account.‚Äù

title: Critic

title: Easy way to own your choices!!!
body: Tracking food and fitness has been the tools I‚Äôve used to lose 50 pounds and achieve a healthy BMI!  I have tried several different methods of tracking over the past 40 months. I also have experienced tracking ‚Äúpoints‚Äù many years ago. I am convicted that tracking feels like freedom to a healthy lifestyle. I discovered the Lose It app via word of mouth 3 months ago and was looking for a change from a previous app that was not providing real time data between my calorie burn and my calorie intake. Also I wanted an app that allowed me to add a picture of food to track later if I was in public or at someone else‚Äôs house eating. I wanted to pursue the next level of tracking and remove the last layer of fat if you will to achieve my ideal body and health at the age of 44. I purchased the year subscription and got started. I began by loading one week of my previous tracking data from my old app and started tracking on the Lose It app. I found the Lose It app to be so much easier and user friendly than any of my previous tracking methods I‚Äôve tried. I found it took seconds to add my meal and it is so easy to adjust the portion size based on my food scale measurements. The recipe builder is easy to use and easy to modify for meals created from scratch. I was so excited about the the ease of use, the real time data between my Apple I Watch, my calorie burn, the graphs, stats, badges, and tools of encouragement that I made a commitment to myself that this was going to be my lifestyle. I decided to commit to my health and purchased the Lifetime subscription. I am convinced that health is earned through day to day choices. It is easy to be influenced by others, the culture, events, situations, stress and all the other outside factors that can make health feel so challenging. At the end of the day the Lose It app does an incredible job giving the power of making choices and taking self responsibility for those choices easy and fun! I highly recommend Lose It app. Lose it has helped me lose that last ‚Äúhard‚Äù 10 pounds in only 80 days of consistent tracking.

title: Way better than other apps
body: This app is amazing even using the free version, and the fee for premium is far less than other apps. It‚Äôs basically the cost of going out to dinner once or twice, for an entire year. USE THE PREMIUM. I didn‚Äôt think it would be worth the functionality, but bought it anyway to support the app since I‚Äôm getting so much use out of it. The premium functions will reveal key information to you. For example, my highest contributor to saturated fat by far was an occasional slice of reduced fat swiss cheese (yikes lol). I was getting way too much sodium from using tuna as a regular protein source. Baby carrots are my best source of fiber, by far better than any whole grain items lol. I thought mini candy canes were no big deal occasionally because of the low calories, but they managed to top the list for simple carbs...and I didn‚Äôt even eat very many of them! It‚Äôs amazing to see this charted out for you, and allows for simple changes to what you‚Äôre eating for big gains to your health. The free version of the app is great as well, extremely easy to use, nice clean uncluttered interface, and easy to chart your calories and macronutrients. Tells you how many calories you have left for the day. Easy to re-enter foods that you eat a lot, since they will pop up at the top of the list in the same quantity as last time (but you can adjust quantity quickly as well). Doesn‚Äôt constantly give you annoying pop-ups recommending premium upgrade like some other apps. I definitely recommend using this, it‚Äôs really worth the small amount of time it takes to enter the foods you‚Äôre eating. You might think you know everything about your diet, but you‚Äôll probably find some new info using this app.
